O relatório é acompanhado de uma E-fact que apresenta uma visão geral das questões suscitadas, assim como uma lista de verificação que identifica os riscos mais comuns nos parques eólicos, tanto terrestres como offshore, e medidas de prevenção.</p>  <p>   Ler a publicação:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Relatório: Segurança e saúde no trabalho no setor da energia eólica</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Trabalhar em segurança no setor da energia eólica</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lista de controlo de identificação dos riscos: a saúde e segurança no local de trabalho (SST) no setor da energia eólica </a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/pt/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"hu";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Munkabiztonság a szélenergia ágazatban";"<p>   A szélenergia ágazat egyre növekszik, de vajon milyen mértékű a munkavállalók biztonsága? Az ágazat kockázataira jó példa a veszélyes anyagok jelenléte vagy a magasban történő munkavégzés. A kockázatok esélye még nagyobb nehéz körülmények, például rossz idő fennállása esetén.</p>  <p>   Jelentésünk részletes információkkal szolgál a munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségügyi kockázatokról és megelőzésükről a szélturbinák életciklusának különböző szakaszaiban, és ismerteti azokat a jövőbeli kihívásokat, amelyekkel az ágazatnak szembe kell néznie. A jelentéshez a lefedett témákról áttekintést nyújtó e-tájékoztató, valamint a parti és a vízi szélfarmok létesítményei tekintetében a gyakori veszélyeket és megelőző intézkedéseket azonosító ellenőrző lista kapcsolódik.</p>  <p>   Olvassa el a publikációkat:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Jelentés: Munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem a szélenergia-ágazatban</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-tájékoztató: Munkabiztonság a szélenergia ágazatban</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Veszélyek ellenőrző listája: Munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelmi (OSH) kockázatok a szélenergia ágazatban </a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"bg";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Безопасен труд в сектора на вятърната енергетика";"<p>   Вятърната енергетика е развиващ се сектор, но дали работещите в него хора са в безопасност? Работа с вредни вещества и на голяма височина са примери за рисковете в сектора, които могат да бъдат засилени от трудни условия като лошо време.</p>  <p>   В нашия доклад се съдържа подробна информация за рисковете относно БЗР и тяхното предотвратяване на различните етапи от жизнения цикъл на вятърните турбини и се разглеждат проблемите, с които секторът трябва да се справя в бъдеще. Докладът се допълва от електронна справка (e-fact) с преглед на въпросите и контролен списък, посочващ общите опасности и превантивни мерки за вятърните съоръжения на сушата и в морето.</p>  <p>   Прочетете публикациите:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Доклад: Безопасност и здраве при работа в сектора на вятърната енергетика</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Безопасен труд в сектора на вятърната енергетика</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Контролен лист за определяне на опасностите: Рискове за безопасността и здравето (OSH) в сектора на вятърната енергетика</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/bg/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"mt";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Xogħol b'sigurtà fil-qasam tal-enerġija mir-riħ";"<p>   L-enerġija mir-riħ hija qasam li qiegħed jikber, iżda kemm jaħdmu f'kondizzjonijiet siguri l-ħaddiema f'dan il-qasam? Sustanzi perikolużi u l-ħidma fil-għoli huma eżempji ta' riskji f'dan il-qasam li jistgħu jkunu intensifikati minn kondizzjonijiet diffiċli, bħal maltemp.</p>  <p>   Ir-rapport tagħna jipprovdi informazzjoni dettaljata dwar ir-riskji tal-OSH u l-prevenzjoni waqt stadji ta' diversi ċikli ta' ħajja tat-turbini tar-riħ kif ukoll jikkonsidra l-isfidi tal-futur li dan il-qasam jeħtieġ li jindirizza. Dan huwa appoġġat minn e-fact li jagħti ħarsa ġenerali lejn il-kwistjonijiet kif ukoll lista ta' kontroll li tidentifika miżuri perikolużi u preventivi għal installazzjonijet għal irziezet tar-riħ kemm fuq l-art kif ukoll fil-baħar.</p>  <p>   Aqra l-pubblikazzjonijiet:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Rapport: Saħħa u sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol fis-settur tal-enerġija mir-riħ</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Xogħol b'sigurtà fil-qasam tal-enerġija mir-riħ</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lista ta' kontroll għall-Identifikazzjoni tal-Periklu: Ir-riskji tas-Saħħa u s-Sikurezza Okkupazzjonali (OSH) fis-settur tal-enerġija mir-riħ</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/mt/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"it";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Lavorare in sicurezza nel settore dell'energia eolica";"<p>   L'energia eolica è un settore in crescita, ma i suoi lavoratori operano in sicurezza? Le sostanze nocive e il lavoro in quota sono esempi dei rischi in questo settore che possono essere intensificati da condizioni difficili, quali condizioni meteorologiche estreme.</p>  <p>   La nostra relazione fornisce informazioni particolareggiate sui rischi per la SSL e la loro prevenzione nel corso delle varie fasi del ciclo di vita delle turbine eoliche e prende anche in considerazione le future sfide cui deve far fronte tale settore. È integrata da un e-fact che presenta una rassegna delle problematiche e una lista di controllo che identifica i pericoli comuni nonché le misure preventive da adottare per le installazioni dei parchi eolici onshore e offshore</p>  <p>   Leggi la pubblicazione</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Relazione: Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector (La sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro nel settore dell'energia eolica)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Lavorare in sicurezza nel settore dell'energia eolica</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lista di controllo sull'individuazione dei pericoli: i rischi per la sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro nel settore dell'energia eolica</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/it/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"lt";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Saugios darbo sąlygos vėjo energijos sektoriuje";"<p>   Vėjo energija yra besiplečiantis sektorius, tačiau ar saugūs jo darbuotojai? Kenksmingosios medžiagos ir darbas aukštyje — tai šio sektoriaus darbo pavojų, kuriuos sunkios sąlygos, kaip antai blogas oras, gali dar labiau sustiprinti, pavyzdžiai.</p>  <p>   Šioje ataskaitoje pateikiama išsami informacija apie darbuotojų saugai ir sveikatai kylančius pavojus ir jų prevenciją įvairiais vėjo jėgainių gyvavimo ciklo etapais ir aptariama, kokius klausimus šiame sektoriuje teks spręsti ateityje. Ataskaitą papildo E.&nbsp;faktų straipsniai, kuriuose apžvelgtos pagrindinės problemos ir pateiktas dažniausiai pasitaikančių su sausumos ir jūros vėjo elektrinių parkų įrenginiais susijusių grėsmių ir prevencinių priemonių sąrašas.</p>  <p>   Skaitykite šiuos leidinius:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Ataskaita: darbuotojų sauga ir sveikata vėjo energijos sektoriuje</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Straipsnių serija E. faktai: Saugios darbo sąlygos vėjo energijos sektoriuje</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Kontrolinis sąrašas, padedantis nustatyti vėjo energijos sektoriaus darbuotojų saugai ir sveikatai (DSS) kylančius pavojus</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/lt/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"et";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tuuleenergiasektoris töötamise ohutus";"<p>   Tuuleenergia on kasvav sektor, kuid kui ohutu on see töötajatele? Ohtlikud ained ja kõrgustes töötamine on näited selle sektori riskidest, mida võivad suurendada rasked tingimused, näiteks ekstreemsed ilmaolud.</p>  <p>   Meie aruandes antakse üksikasjalikku teavet tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu riskide ning nende ennetamise kohta tuulikute olelustsükli eri etappidel ja hinnatakse tulevasi probleeme, mis võivad selles sektoris tekkida. Aruandele on lisatud väljaanne E-fact, milles antakse probleemide ülevaade ning sagedaimate ohtude ja ennetusmeetmete kontroll-loetelu nii maal kui ka meres asuvate tuuleparkide jaoks.</p>  <p>   Väljaanded:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Aruanne: „Tööohutus ja töötervishoid tuuleenergia sektoris”</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: tuuleenergiasektoris töötamise ohutus</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Ohutuvastuse kontroll-loend: tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu riskid tuuleenergeetikas</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/et/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"sk";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bezpečná práca v odvetví veternej energie";"<p>   Odvetvie veternej energie sa rozrastá, ale ako je to s bezpečnosťou zamestnancov, ktorí v ňom pracujú? Medzi príkladmi rizík v tomto odvetví možno uviesť škodlivé látky, ako aj prácu vo výškach. Tieto riziká môžu byť ešte vyššie v dôsledku náročných podmienok, ako je napr. extrémne počasie.</p>  <p>   V našej správe sú uvedené podrobné informácie o rizikách v oblasti BOZP a ich prevencii počas rôznych fáz životného cyklu veterných turbín. Zvažujú sa v nej aj problémy, ktoré sa v budúcnosti budú musieť riešiť v tomto odvetví. Informácie uvedené v správe potvrdzuje aj elektronický informačný leták ponúkajúci prehľad týchto otázok, ako aj kontrolný zoznam, v ktorom sú vymedzené spoločné nebezpečenstvá a preventívne opatrenia pre veterné elektrárne na zemi i na mori.</p>  <p>   Prečítajte si tieto publikácie:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Správa: bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri práci v odvetví veternej energie</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Working safely in the wind energy sector (Elektronický informačný leták: Bezpečná práca v odvetví veternej energie) </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Kontrolný zoznam na identifikáciu nebezpečenstiev: Bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri práci (BOZP) v odvetví veternej energie </a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sk/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"el";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Εργασία με ασφάλεια στον τομέα της αιολικής ενέργειας";"<p>   Ο τομέας της αιολικής ενέργειας αναπτύσσεται δυναμικά, αλλά πόσο ασφαλής είναι για τους εργαζομένους; Οι βλαβερές ουσίες και η εργασία σε μεγάλο ύψος είναι μερικά παραδείγματα των κινδύνων στον κλάδο αυτό, οι οποίοι οξύνονται περισσότερο σε δύσκολες συνθήκες, όπως σε ακραίες καιρικές συνθήκες.</p>  <p>   Η έκθεσή μας περιέχει αναλυτικές πληροφορίες για τους κινδύνους ΕΑΥ και την πρόληψή τους στα διάφορα στάδια του κύκλου ζωής των ανεμογεννητριών, ενώ εξετάζονται επίσης οι μελλοντικές προκλήσεις που καλείται να αντιμετωπίσει ο κλάδος. Συνοδεύεται από το ηλεκτρονικό δελτίο e-fact, το οποίο παρέχει μια γενική επισκόπηση των ζητημάτων στον τομέα καθώς και κατάλογο ελέγχου των συνηθέστερων κινδύνων στις εγκαταστάσεις χερσαίων και υπεράκτιων αιολικών πάρκων και των μέτρων πρόληψης αυτών.</p>  <p>   Διαβάστε τις δημοσιεύσεις:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Έκθεση: Η επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία στον τομέα της αιολικής ενέργειας</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Working safely in the wind energy sector (Εργασία με ασφάλεια στον τομέα της αιολικής ενέργειας)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Κατάλογος ελέγχου για τον προσδιορισμό της πηγής των κινδύνων: Κίνδυνοι επαγγελματικής ασφάλειας και υγείας (ΕΑΥ) στον τομέα της αιολικής ενέργειας</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/el/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"lv";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Droša strādāšana vēja enerģijas nozarē";"<p>   Vēja enerģija ir augoša nozare, bet cik lielā drošībā ir šajā nozarē strādājošie? Kaitīgas vielas un darbs lielā augstumā ir risku piemēri šajā nozarē, kuru ietekmi var pastiprināt grūti apstākļi, piemēram, ekstremāli laikapstākļi.</p>  <p>   Mūsu ziņojumā ir sniegta plaša informācija par DDVA riska veidiem un to novēršanu vēja turbīnu dzīves cikla dažādos posmos, un tajā ir arī apsvērti grūti nākotnes uzdevumi, kurus nozarei vajadzētu risināt. Ziņojumu papildina e-faktu publikācija, kas sniedz šā jautājuma pārskatu, kurā ir identificēti visbiežāk sastopamie draudi un profilakses pasākumi iekšzonas un ārzonas vēja ģeneratoru parkiem.</p>  <p>   Lasīt publikācijas:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Ziņojums: Darba droība un veselības aizsardzība vēja enerģijas nozarē</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fakts: Droša strādāšana vēja enerģijas nozarē</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Apdraudējuma noteikšanas kontrolsaraksts: Darba drošības un veselības (DDV) riski vēja enerģijas nozarē</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/lv/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"de";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sicheres Arbeiten im Windenergiesektor";"<p>   Windenergie ist eine boomende Branche, aber wie sicher sind die Beschäftigten in dieser Branche? Gefährliche Stoffe und Arbeiten in großer Höhe sind Beispiele für Risiken in dieser Branche, die durch schwierige Bedingungen wie extreme Wetterverhältnisse noch intensiviert werden können.</p>  <p>   Unser Bericht enthält detaillierte Informationen über Risiken für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit und die Verhütung dieser Risiken in den verschiedenen Stadien des Lebenszyklus einer Windturbine und befasst sich auch mit künftigen Herausforderungen, die in dieser Branche zu bewältigen sind. Begleitet wird dieser Bericht durch ein E-Fact, das einen Überblick über die Probleme gibt und eine Checkliste enthält, in der allgemeine Gefahren identifiziert und präventive Maßnahmen sowohl für Windkraftanlagen auf dem Land als auch vor der Küste bereitgestellt werden.</p>  <p>   Diese Veröffentlichungen lesen:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Bericht: Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in der Windenergiebranche</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Sicheres Arbeiten im Windenergiesektor</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Checkliste zur Gefahrenerkennung: Risiken der Sicherheit und des Gesundheitsschutzes bei der Arbeit im Windenergiesektor</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/de/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"fr";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Travailler en toute sécurité dans le secteur de l'énergie éolienne";"<p>   L'énergie éolienne est un secteur en expansion, mais dans quelle mesure les travailleurs de ce secteur sont-ils en sécurité? Les substances nocives et le travail en hauteur sont des exemples de risques dans ce secteur, lesquels peuvent être aggravés par des conditions difficiles, telles que les conditions climatiques extrêmes.</p>  <p>   Notre rapport fournit des informations détaillées sur les risques en matière de SST et leur prévention au cours des différentes étapes du cycle de vie d'une éolienne, et examine également les défis futurs que ce secteur devra relever. Il est accompagné d'une fiche d'information «e-fact», qui donne une vue d'ensemble des problèmes qui se posent dans ce domaine, et d'une liste de contrôle identifiant les dangers fréquemment rencontrés dans les fermes éoliennes terrestres et en mer, ainsi que les mesures préventives applicables à ces deux types d'installations.</p>  <p>   Lire les publications:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Rapport: La sécurité et la santé au travail dans le secteur de l'énergie éolienne</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>> (en anglais)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Travailler en toute sécurité dans le secteur de l'énergie éolienne (en anglais)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Liste de contrôle de l'identification des dangers: les risques en matière de santé et de sécurité au travail (SST) dans le secteur de l'énergie éolienne</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"es";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"El trabajo seguro en el sector de la energía eólica";"<p>   La energía eólica es un sector en auge, pero ¿trabajan seguro sus trabajadores? Las sustancias nocivas y el trabajo en altura son ejemplos de riesgos en este sector que pueden intensificarse por unas condiciones difíciles, como las condiciones climatológicas extremas.</p>  <p>   Nuestro informe ofrece información detallada sobre los riesgos de seguridad y salud laboral y su prevención en las diversas etapas del ciclo vital de las turbinas de viento, y también considera los retos futuros que tiene que abordar el sector. El informe viene acompañado de una ficha informativa (e-fact) que ofrece una visión de conjunto de los problemas y una lista de comprobación que identifica los riesgos comunes y las medidas preventivas en las instalaciones eólicas tanto costeras como de alta mar.</p>  <p>   Leer las publicaciones</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Informe: Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector - Seguridad y salud en el trabajo en el sector de la energía eólica- </a>(en inglés)</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: El trabajo seguro en el sector de la energía eólica (en inglés)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Hazard Identification Checklist: Occupational Safety and Health (OSH) risks in the wind energy sector (Lista de comprobación para la identificación de peligros: riesgos para la seguridad y la salud en el trabajo en el sector de la energía eólica)</a> (en inglés)<br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/es/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"sv";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Säker arbetsmiljö inom vindkraftsektorn";"<p>   Vindkraftsindustrin växer men hur ser säkerheten ut för de som arbetar inom sektorn? Farliga ämnen och arbete på hög höjd är några av riskerna inom sektorn som kan förvärras av svåra förhållanden, t.ex. extremt väder.</p>  <p>   Vår rapport ger detaljerad information om arbetsmiljörisker och hur de kan förebyggas under de olika stadierna i vindkraftverkens livscykel. Den tar också upp framtida utmaningar som sektorn behöver ta itu med. Rapporten backas upp med ett e-faktablad som ger en översikt över aktuella frågor och en checklista över vanliga risker och förebyggande åtgärder för vindkraftparker både på land och till havs.</p>  <p>   Läs publikationerna:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Rapport: Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-faktablad: Working safely in the wind energy sector (Säker arbetsmiljö inom vindkraftsektorn)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Kontrollista för att identifiera faror: Arbetsmiljön i vindenergisektorn (Occupational Safety and Health (OSH) risks in the wind energy sector) </a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sv/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"da";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Et sikkert arbejdsmiljø inden for vindenergisektoren";"<p>   Vindenergisektoren er en sektor i vækst, men hvordan forholder det sig med sikkerheden for dem, der arbejder inden for sektoren? Skadelige stoffer og arbejde i høj højde er eksempler på risici inden for sektoren, som kan blive forstærket af vanskelige arbejdsforhold, f.eks. ekstreme vejrforhold.</p>  <p>   Vores rapport indeholder detaljerede oplysninger om arbejdsmiljørisici gennem vindmøllernes forskellige livscyklusfaser, og hvordan disse kan forebygges. Den understøttes af et e-faktablad, som indeholder en oversigt over problemstillingerne og en tjekliste, der kortlægger almindelige farer og forebyggende foranstaltninger i forbindelse med vindmølleparker på land og til havs.</p>  <p>   Læs publikationerne:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Rapport: Sikkerhed og sundhed i vindenergisektoren</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Working safely in the wind energy sector (E-faktablad: Et sikkert arbejdsmiljø inden for vindenergisektoren)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Tjekliste til identificering af risici: Arbejdsmiljørisici inden for vindenergisektoren </a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/da/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"nl";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Veilig werken in de sector windenergie";"<p>   Windenergie is een groeisector, maar hoe staat het met de veiligheid van het personeel? Het werken in deze sector brengt risico's mee, bijvoorbeeld door het gebruik van gevaarlijke stoffen of het werken op grote hoogte, die nog vergroot kunnen worden door moeilijke omstandigheden zoals slecht weer.</p>  <p>   Ons verslag geeft gedetailleerde informatie over de risico's op het gebied van veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk aan de hand van de verschillende stadia in de bestaanscyclus van windturbines en geeft ook aandacht aan de toekomstige uitdagingen die de sector moet oppakken. Het gaat vergezeld van een e-fact met een overzicht van de aandachtspunten en een checklist met bekende gevaren en preventieve maatregelen voor windmolenparken op het land en op zee.</p>  <p>   Lees deze publicaties:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Rapport over veiligheid en gezondheid in de sector windenergie (beschikbaar in het EN): Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-fact: Veilig werken in de sector windenergie</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Checklist gevarenidentificatie: gezondheids- en veiligheidsrisico's in de windenergiesector</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/nl/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"sl";"/en/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector";"published";"2014-04-14 16:29:19";"2014-07-25 10:48:03";"2014-06-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Varnost pri delu v sektorju vetrne energije";"<p>   Sektor vetrne energije sicer raste, a kako varni so delavci, ki so zaposleni v tej panogi? Škodljive snovi in delo na višini sta samo dva primera nevarnosti pri tem delu, ki jih lahko dodatno otežijo še težki delovni pogoji, kot so na primer ekstremne vremenske razmere.</p>  <p>   Naše poročilo vsebuje podrobne informacije o tveganjih za varnost in zdravje pri delu ter o njihovem preprečevanju skozi različne življenjske cikle vetrnih turbin, obravnava pa tudi prihodnje izzive, s katerimi se bo morala ta panoga spopasti. Dopolnjuje ga tudi bilten e-dejstva, ki povzema glavne težave ter vsebuje kontrolni seznam pogostih nevarnosti in preventivnih ukrepov za vetrne elektrarne na kopnem in morju.</p>  <p>   Preberite publikacijo:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Poročilo: varnost in zdravje pri delu v sektorju vetrne energije</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-79-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>E-dejstvo: Varnost pri delu v sektorju vetrne energije</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/e-facts/e-fact-80-hazard-identification-checklist-occupational-safety-and-health-osh-risks-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Kontrolni seznam za opredelitev nevarnosti: tveganja za varnost in zdravje pri delu v sektorju vetrne energije</a><br />   <br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sl/teaser/safe-working-in-the-wind-energy-sector/wind energy.jpg";"";"green_jobs";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo helps ‘when stress strikes’";"<p>   ‘When stress strikes’ is the latest Napo film that can be used as an unconventional tool to raise awareness on psychosocial risks in the workplace, such as excessive demands, low control, constant pressure, unacceptable behaviour, lack of respect, change, bad planning and contradictory instructions.</p>  <p>   Stress prevention is a must for a healthy workplace and Napo illustrates this with a good dose of his inimitable humour. As in all films in the series, Napo drives attention to workplace dangers and triggers reflections for improvement.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.youtube.com/watch?list=PLXgIzX4W16jfGVN_0s_7xpCHT_HPVSRjf&amp;v=BuzrH0tVTDM<@#&>>Watch ‘Napo in …When stress strikes’</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress Campaign</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/en<@#&>>More Napo films</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"sl";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo pomaga, „ko te strese stres“";"<p>   „Ko te strese stres“ je najnovejši film z animiranim likom Napo, ki se lahko uporablja kot nekonvencionalno orodje za ozaveščanje o psihosocialnih tveganjih v delovnem okolju, kot so denimo pretirane zahteve, pomanjkanje nadzora, stalni pritiski, nesprejemljivo vedenje, pomanjkanje spoštovanja, pogoste spremembe, slabo načrtovanje in nasprotujoča si navodila.</p>  <p>   Preprečevanje stresa je nujno za ustvarjanje zdravega delovnega okolja, Napo pa nam to nazorno prikaže z dobršno mero svojega edinstvenega humorja. Kot v vseh ostalih filmih iz te serije, Napo tudi v tem filmu usmerja pozornost na nevarnosti, ki so prisotne v delovnem okolju, in spodbuja k razmisleku o izboljšavah.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sl/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=sl&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Oglejte si Napov film „Ko te strese stres“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sl<@#&>>Kampanja „Obvladajmo stres za zdrava delovna mesta“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sl<@#&>>Drugi Napovi filmi</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"et";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo tuleb appi, kui stress streigib";"<p>   „Kui stress streigib” on uusim Napo film, mis aitab originaalse vahendina tõsta teadlikkust töökoha psühhosotsiaalsetest riskiteguritest, nt liigsed nõudmised, vähene kontroll, pidev surve, vastuvõetamatu käitumine, austuse puudumine, muudatused, halb planeerimine ja vastuolulised juhendid.</p>  <p>   Stressi ennetamine on tervislike töökohtade eeltingimus ja Napo kirjeldab seda talle omase hea annuse huumoriga. Nagu kõikides varasemates seeriates, nii pöörab Napo ka siin tähelepanu töökoha ohtudele ja näitab, kuidas neid vähendada.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/et/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=et&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Vaata filmi „Napo… Kui stress streigib”</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/et<@#&>>Tervislike töökohtade kampaania „Vähem stressi”</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/et<@#&>>Veel Napo filme</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"cs";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo pomáhá „кdyž udeří stres“";"<p>   „Když udeří stres“ je nejnovější film o Napovi, který je možné použít jako neobvyklý nástroj sloužící ke zvyšování povědomí o psychosociálních rizicích na pracovišti, mezi která patří nadměrné nároky, nízká kontrola, trvalý tlak, nepřijatelné chování, nedostatek respektu, změny, špatné plánování a protiřečící si instrukce.</p>  <p>   Prevence stresu je pro zdravé pracoviště nezbytnost, což Napo ukazuje s notnou dávkou svého nenapodobitelného humoru. Stejně jako ve všech filmech celé řady Napo upozorňuje na nebezpečí na pracovišti a vede k zamyšlení nad možným zlepšením.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/cs/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=cs&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Podívejte se na snímek „Napo v …když udeří stres“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/cs<@#&>>Kampaň Zdravé pracoviště zvládne i stres</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/cs<@#&>>Další filmy o Napovi</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"fi";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo auttaa, kun stressi iskee.";"<p>   Stressiä käsittelevää uusinta Napo-filmiä voidaan käyttää mutkattomana apuvälineenä tietoisuuden lisäämiseksi työpaikan psykososiaalisista riskeistä, joita voivat olla ylisuuret vaatimukset, asioihin puuttumattomuus, jatkuva paine, sopimaton käytös, kunnioituksen puute, muutokset, huono suunnittelu ja ristiriitainen ohjeistus.</p>  <p>   Stressin ehkäiseminen on välttämätön edellytys työpaikan terveellisyyden kannalta. Napo kuvaa tätä jäljittelemättömällä huumorillaan. Elokuvasarjan muiden jaksojen tapaan Napo pyrkii kiinnittämään huomiota työpaikan vaaroihin ja samalla käynnistämään parannustoimia.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/fi/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=fi&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Katso Napon stressielokuva</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fi<@#&>>Terveellisten työpaikkojen stressinhallintakampanja</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/fi<@#&>>Lisää Napo-filmejä</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"pl";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo pomaga podczas „stresu w natarciu”";"<p>   „Stres w natarciu” jest najnowszym filmem Napo, który może być użyty jako niekonwencjonalne narzędzie do uświadamiania w zakresie zagrożeń psychospołecznych w miejscu pracy jak,np. wygórowanych wymagań, niskiego poziomu kontroli, nieustannego nacisku, nieakceptowalnego zachowania, braku szacunku, zmian, złego planowania i sprzecznych poleceń.</p>  <p>   Napo pokazuje w humorystyczny sposób, że do stworzenia zdrowego miejsca pracy, konieczne jest zapobieganie stresowi. Podobnie jak we wszystkich filmach z tej serii, Napo zwraca uwagę na zagrożenia w miejscu pracy i nakłania do zastanowienia się nad poprawą sytuacji.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/pl/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=pl&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Obejrzyj „Napo w …Stres w natarciu”</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pl<@#&>>Kampania zarządzania stresem w zdrowych miejscach pracy</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/pl<@#&>>Więcej filmów o Napo</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"lv";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo palīdz, <@#&>kad uzbrūk stress<@#&>";"<p>   <@#&>Kad uzbrūk stress<@#&> ir jaunākā Napo filma, kuru var izmantot kā nekonvencionālu instrumentu, lai sekmētu izpratni par psihosociāliem riskiem darbavietā, piemēram, pārmērīgas prasības, zema kontrole, nepārtraukts spiediens, nepieņemama uzvedība, cieņas trūkums, pārmaiņas, slikta plānošana un pretrunīgi norādījumi.</p>  <p>   Stresa novēršana ir obligāts nosacījums veselīgā darbavietā, un Napo to ilustrē ar labu neatkārtojama humora devu. Kā visās šīs sērijas filmās Napo pievērš uzmanību apdraudējumiem darbavietās un rosina pārdomas par uzlabojumiem.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/lv/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=lv&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Skatieties <@#&>Napo …kad uzbrūk stress<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lv<@#&>>kampaņa <@#&>Veselīgas darbavietas uzvar stresu<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/lv<@#&>>Citas Napo filmas</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"it";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo ti aiuta quando c'è <@#&>stress al lavoro<@#&>";"<p>   <@#&>Stress al lavoro<@#&> è il più recente filmato che vede Napo come protagonista. Può essere utile come strumento non convenzionale per sensibilizzare in merito ai rischi psicosociali sul posto di lavoro, ad esempio richieste eccessive, basso controllo, pressione costante, comportamenti inaccettabili, mancanza di rispetto, cambiamenti, pianificazione inefficace e istruzioni contraddittorie.</p>  <p>   La prevenzione dello stress è essenziale per garantire un ambiente di lavoro sano e Napo lo dimostra con una buona dose del suo inimitabile senso dell'umorismo. Come in tutti i filmati della serie, Napo pone al centro dell'attenzione i pericoli presenti sul posto di lavoro e stimola una riflessione per attuare miglioramenti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/it/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=it&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Guarda <@#&>Napo in …Stress al lavoro<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/it<@#&>>Campagna Insieme per la prevenzione e la gestione dello stress lavoro-correlato (Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/it<@#&>>Altri filmati di Napo</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"lt";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napas padeda <@#&>kai užklumpa stresas<@#&>";"<p>   „Kai užklumpa stresas“– yra naujausia Napo filmo serija, kurią galima naudoti kaip nestandartinę priemonę didinant informuotumą apie psichosocialinę riziką darbe, pavyzdžiui, per aukštus reikalavimus, neturėjimą galimybės kontroliuoti savo darbą, nuolatinę įtampą, netinkamą elgesį, pagarbos trūkumą, pokyčius, prastą veiklos planavimą ir prieštaringus nurodymus.</p>  <p>   Darbo vietoje, kurioje puoselėjamos sveikatai palankios sąlygos, būtina užkirsti kelią stresui ir Napas parodo tai su nepakartojamo humoro porcija. Kaip ir visose filmo serijose, Napas atkreipia dėmesį į pavojus darbo vietoje ir skatina pagalvoti, kaip galima pagerinti darbo sąlygas.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/lt/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=lt&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Žiūrėti filmą „Kai užklumpa stresas“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lt<@#&>>Saugių darbo vietų kampanija „Stresas yra valdomas“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/lt<@#&>>Daugiau Napo filmų</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"hu";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo segít „amikor elszakad a cérna<@#&>";"<p>   A legújabb Napo film, amelynek címe „Amikor elszakad a cérna<@#&>, nem konvencionális eszközként bevethető az olyan munkahelyi pszichoszociális kockázatokra való figyelemfelhívásra, mint a túlzott követelmények, a kis mértékű befolyás, az állandó nyomás, az elfogadhatatlan magatartás, a tisztelet hiánya, a változások, a rossz tervezés vagy az egymásnak ellentmondó utasítások.</p>  <p>   A stresszmegelőzés az egészséges munkahely alapfeltétele, és ezt Napo egy jó adag utánozhatatlan humorral mutatja be. A sorozat többi részéhez hasonlóan, Napo felhívja a figyelmet a munkahelyi veszélyekre és azok megoldására ösztönöz.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/hu/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=hu&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Napo új, „Amikor elszakad a cérna<@#&> című filmjének megtekintése</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/hu<@#&>>Egészséges munkahelyek - Kezeljük a stresszt kampány</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/hu<@#&>>További Napo filmek</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"pt";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"O Napo ajuda quando o stresse acontece";"<p>   O mais recente filme da série Napo, «Quando o stresse acontece» pode ser usado como ferramenta não convencional para sensibilizar para os riscos psicossociais no local de trabalho tais como sobrecarga de trabalho, falta de controlo sobre o trabalho, pressão constante, comportamento inaceitável, falta de respeito, mudanças, mau planeamento e instruções contraditórias.</p>  <p>   A prevenção do stresse é essencial para um local de trabalho saudável e é isso que o Napo, com uma boa dose do seu inimitável bom humor, deixa ilustrado. Como em todos os filmes da série, o Napo chama a atenção para os perigos presentes no local de trabalho e faz-nos refletir sobre as maneiras de melhorar as condições de segurança e saúde.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/pt/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=pt&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Ver o filme «Napo em ...Quando o stresse acontece»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pt<@#&>>«Gestão do stresse» no quadro da campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/pt<@#&>>Outros filmes da série «Napo»</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"de";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo hilft, „Stress lass nach“";"<p>   „Stress lass nach“ ist der Titel des neuesten Napo-Films, der als unkonventionelles Mittel zur Sensibilisierung für psychosoziale Risiken bei der Arbeit eingesetzt werden kann, wie überhöhte Anforderungen, geringe Kontrolle über die eigene Arbeit, ständiger Druck, inakzeptables Verhalten, Mangel an Respekt, Veränderung, schlechte Planung und widersprüchliche Anweisungen.</p>  <p>   Stressprävention ist ein Muss für gesunde Arbeitsplätze&nbsp;– Napo veranschaulicht dies mit einer großzügigen Prise seines charakteristischen Humors. Wie in allen Filmen der Serie lenkt Napo auch hier wieder die Aufmerksamkeit auf Gefahren bei der Arbeit und regt an, Überlegungen für Verbesserungen anzustellen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/de/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=de&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Napo in… „Stress lass nach“ ansehen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/de<@#&>>Kampagne „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze&nbsp;– den Stress managen“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/de<@#&>>Mehr Napo-Filme</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"fr";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo dans... «Stress au travail !»";"<p>   «Stress au travail !» est le dernier film Napo qui peut être utilisé en tant qu'outil non conventionnel de sensibilisation aux risques psychosociaux sur le lieu de travail, tels que des exigences excessives, une absence d'autonomie, une pression constante, un comportement inacceptable, un manque de respect, un changement, une mauvaise planification ou des instructions contradictoires.</p>  <p>   La prévention du stress est indispensable à un environnement de travail sain et c'est ce qu'illustre Napo grâce à une bonne dose de son humour inimitable. Comme dans tous les films de la série, Napo attire l'attention sur les dangers au travail et vise à susciter des réflexions en vue d'améliorations.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/fr/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=fr&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Voir «Napo dans ... Stress au travail !»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fr?set_language=fr<@#&>>La campagne «Les risques psychosociaux: mieux prévenir pour mieux travailler»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/fr?set_language=fr<@#&>>Plus de films Napo</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"es";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo ayuda «cuando estás estresado»";"<p>   «Napo en....cuando estás estresado» es el último vídeo protagonizado por Napo que puede utilizarse como una herramienta alternativa para sensibilizar sobre los riesgos psicosociales en el lugar de trabajo, como pueden ser unas exigencias excesivas, escaso control, presión constante, comportamiento inaceptable, falta de respeto, cambios, mala planificación e instrucciones contradictorias.</p>  <p>   Prevenir el estrés es indispensable para disfrutar de un lugar de trabajo saludable, tal y como ilustra Napo con una buena dosis de su humor inigualable. Como en todos los vídeos de la serie, Napo resalta los peligros del lugar de trabajo y nos inspira para poder mejorar.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/es/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=es&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Ver «Napo en...Cuando estás estresado»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/es<@#&>>Campaña «Trabajos saludables – Gestionemos el estrés»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/es<@#&>>Otros vídeos de Napo</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"sv";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Förebygg negativ stress med Napo";"<p>   <@#&>När stressen slår till<@#&> är den senaste filmen med den tecknade figuren Napo. Napo-filmerna är ett lättsamt och annorlunda hjälpmedel för att öka medvetenheten kring de psykosociala riskerna på arbetsplatsen, som bland annat uppkommer till följd av orimliga krav, brist på kontroll, ständig press, förkastliga beteendemönster, bristande respekt, förändringar, dålig planering och motsägelsefulla anvisningar.</p>  <p>   Med glimten i ögat och en rejäl dos humor visar Napo hur viktigt det är att förebygga stress för att kunna få till stånd en hälsosam arbetsplats. Liksom i övriga filmer i serien lyfter Napo fram de möjliga riskerna på arbetsplatsen och ger tips och idéer på förbättringsåtgärder.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sv/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=sv&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Se filmen ”Napo i: När stressen slår till”</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sv<@#&>>Kampanjen ”Friska arbetsplatser förebygger stress”</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sv<@#&>>Se andra Napo-filmer</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"nl";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo helpt 'als stress toeslaat'";"<p>   'Als stress toeslaat' is de nieuwste Napo-film. De film kan worden gebruikt als een nieuw en grappig instrument om mensen beter bewust te maken van psychosociale risico's op de werkplek, zoals excessieve eisen, weinig controle op het eigen werk, voortdurende druk, onaanvaardbaar gedrag, geen respect, veranderingen, een slechte planning en tegenstrijdige opdrachten.</p>  <p>   Stresspreventie is absoluut noodzakelijk voor een gezonde werkplek en Napo toont dit aan met een flinke dosis van zijn unieke humor. Zoals in alle andere films in deze reeks, legt Napo de vinger op gevaren op de werkplek en zorgt hij ervoor dat er over verbeteringen wordt nagedacht.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/nl/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=nl&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Kijk naar ‘Napo in …Als stress toeslaat’</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/nl<@#&>>Campagne Een gezonde werkplek over omgaan met stress</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/nl<@#&>>Meer Napo-films</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"sk";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo prichádza na pomoc „keď útočí stres“";"<p>   Keď útočí stres je názov najnovšieho filmu s postavičkou Napo, ktorý možno použiť ako neobvyklý nástroj na zvýšenie informovanosti o psychosociálnych rizikách na pracovisku, ako sú nadmerné nároky, slabá kontrola, trvalý tlak, neprijateľné správanie, nedostatok rešpektu, zmeny, zlé plánovanie a rozporuplné pokyny.</p>  <p>   Prevencia stresu je nevyhnutným predpokladom na vytvorenie zdravých pracovísk a postavička Napo na to poukazuje s dobrou dávkou neopakovateľného humoru. Tak, ako je tomu vo všetkých častiach série príbehov, hrdina Napo upriamuje pozornosť na nebezpečenstvá na pracovisku a podnecuje úvahy v záujme zlepšenia.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sk/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=sk&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Pozrieť video Napo vo filme…Keď útočí stres</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sk<@#&>>Kampaň Zdravé pracoviská: Bez stresu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sk<@#&>>Ďalšie filmy s postavičkou Napo</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"mt";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo jgħin 'meta jolqtok l-istress'";"<p>   'Meta jolqtok l-istress' huwa l-aħħar film ta' Napo li jista' jintuża bħala għodda mhux konvenzjonali biex titqajjem sensibilizzazzjoni dwar ir-riskji psikosoċjali fuq il-post tax-xogħol, bħal talbiet eċċessivi, kontroll limitat, pressjoni kostanti, mġiba mhux aċċettabbli, nuqqas ta' rispett, tibdil, ippjanar ħażin u struzzjonijiet kontradittorji.</p>  <p>   Il-prevenzjoni tal-istress hija ħtieġa għal post tax-xogħol b'saħħtu u Napo juri dan b'doża tajba tal-umoriżmu inimitabbli tiegħu. Bħall-films kollha fis-serje, Napo jiġbed l-attenzjoni lejn il-perikli fuq il-post tax-xogħol u jinstiga riflessjonijiet għal titjib.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/mt/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=mt&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Ara lil ‘Napo fi …Meta jolqtok l-istress’</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/mt<@#&>>Il-Kampanja tal-Postijiet tax-Xogħol li Jġibu 'l Quddiem is-Saħħa Jġestixxu l-Istress</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/mt<@#&>>Aktar films ta' Napo</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"ro";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo vine în ajutor „când apare stresul”";"<p>   „Când apare stresul” este cel mai recent film Napo care poate fi utilizat ca instrument neconvenţional pentru un grad mai mare de conştientizare a riscurilor psihosociale la locul de muncă, precum suprasolicitarea, controlul scăzut asupra muncii desfăşurate, presiunea constantă, comportamentul inacceptabil, lipsa de respect, schimbările, proasta planificare şi instrucţiunile contradictorii.</p>  <p>   Prevenirea stresului este indispensabilă unui loc de muncă sănătos, iar Napo ilustrează aceasta cu o doză bună din umorul său inimitabil. Ca toate fimele din serie, Napo atrage atenţia asupra pericolelor de la locul de muncă şi incită la reflecţii de îmbunătăţire.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/ro/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=ro&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Urmăriţi „Napo în acţiune ...Când apare stresul”</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/ro<@#&>>Campania Managementul stresului pentru locuri de muncă sănătoase </a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/ro<@#&>>Mai multe filme Napo</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"is";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napó hjálpar „þegar streitan dynur yfir“";"<p>   „Þegar streitan dynur yfir“ er nýjasta myndin um Napó, sem nota má sem óhefðbundið tól til þess að auka vitund um sálfélagslegar áhættur á vinnustaðnum, svo sem óhóflegar kröfur, litla stjórnun, stöðugt álag, ótæka hegðun, skort á virðingu, breytingar, slæma áætlunargerð og stríðandi leiðbeiningar.</p>  <p>   Streituforvarnir eru mjög mikilvægar fyrir heilbrigða vinnustaði og Napó sýnir fram á það með góðum skammti af óviðjafnanlegum húmor. Eins og í öllum myndunum í röðinni dregur Napó athyglina að hættum á vinnustöðum og hvetur til hugleiðinga um úrbætur.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/is/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=is&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Horfa á „Napó Þegar streitan dynur yfir“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/is<@#&>>Herferðin Góð vinnuvernd vinnur á streitu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/is<@#&>>Fleiri Napó myndir</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"da";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo hjælper, <@#&>når stressen rammer<@#&>";"<p>   <@#&>Når stressen rammer<@#&> er den seneste Napofilm, der kan anvendes som et utraditionelt værktøj til at øge bevidstheden om psykosociale risici på arbejdspladsen såsom for høje krav, ringe kontrol, konstant pres, uacceptabel adfærd, manglende respekt, forandringer, dårlig planlægning og modstridende instrukser.</p>  <p>   Forebyggelse af stress er afgørende for en sund arbejdsplads, hvilket Napo viser med en god dosis af sin helt egen humor. Som i de øvrige film i serien gør Napo opmærksom på farer på arbejdspladsen og giver stof til eftertanke med hensyn til forbedringer.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/da/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=da&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Se <@#&>Napo i … når stressen rammer<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/da<@#&>>Kampagnen <@#&>Gode arbejdspladser tager hånd om stress<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/da<@#&>>Flere Napofilm</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"el";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ο Napo σε βοηθάει <@#&>όταν το άγχος χτυπάει κόκκινο<@#&>";"<p>   <@#&>Όταν το άγχος χτυπάει κόκκινο<@#&> είναι ο τίτλος της τελευταίας ταινίας του Napo. Η ταινία αυτή μπορεί να χρησιμεύσει ως ένα μη συμβατικό εργαλείο για την ευαισθητοποίηση σχετικά με τους ψυχοκοινωνικούς κινδύνους στην εργασία όπως είναι, για παράδειγμα, οι υπερβολικές απαιτήσεις, η συνεχής πίεση, η απαράδεκτη συμπεριφορά, η έλλειψη σεβασμού, οι αλλαγές, ο κακός προγραμματισμός και οι αντιφατικές οδηγίες.</p>  <p>   Η πρόληψη του άγχους αποτελεί απαραίτητη προϋπόθεση για ένα υγιές εργασιακό περιβάλλον και ο Napo μάς το δείχνει με μια γερή δόση από το απαράμιλλο χιούμορ του. Όπως συμβαίνει σε όλες τις ταινίες της σειράς, ο Napo εφιστά την προσοχή στους κινδύνους που ελλοχεύουν στον χώρο εργασίας και δίνει το έναυσμα για προβληματισμό και βελτιώσεις.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/el/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=el&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Δείτε ‘Ο Napo …όταν το άγχος χτυπάει κόκκινο’</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/el<@#&>>Εκστρατεία για τη διαχείριση του άγχους σε ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώρους εργασίας</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/el<@#&>>Περισσότερες ταινίες του Napo</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"no";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo hjelper til <@#&>når stresset slår til<@#&>";"<p>   <@#&>Når stresset slår til<@#&> er den nyeste Napo-filmen, som kan benyttes som et utradisjonelt verktøy for å øke bevisstheten om psykososial risiko på arbeidsplassen, som for eksempel altfor krevende arbeidsoppgaver, liten kontroll, konstant press, uakseptabel atferd, manglende respekt, endringer, dårlig planlegging og motstridende instrukser.</p>  <p>   Å forebygge stress er helt nødvendig for et sunt og godt arbeidsmiljø. Napo illustrerer dette med en god porsjon særegen humor. Som i alle filmene i serien retter Napo oppmerksomheten mot farer på arbeidsplassen og får oss til å tenke gjennom hva som kan forbedres.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/no/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=no&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Se <@#&>Napo i... Når stresset slår til<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/no<@#&>><@#&>Gode arbeidsplasser forebygger stress<@#&>-kampanjen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/no<@#&>>Flere Napo-filmer</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"bg";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Напо помага, <@#&>когато стресът стачкува<@#&>";"<p>   Най-новият филм на Напо <@#&>Когато стресът стачкува<@#&> може да се използва като нетрадиционно средство за повишаване на осведомеността относно психосоциалните рискове на работното място, например прекомерни изисквания, слаб контрол, постоянен натиск, неприемливо поведение, липса на уважение, промени, лошо планиране и противоречиви указания.</p>  <p>   Превенцията на стреса е задължителна за здравословното работно място и Напо го показва с неподражаемото си чувство за хумор. Както във всички филми от поредицата, Напо насочва вниманието към опасностите на работното място и създава повод да се обмислят подобрения.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/bg/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=bg&amp;filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Гледайте Напо в… <@#&>Когато стресът стачкува<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/bg<@#&>>Кампания <@#&>Здравословни работни места<@#&> под надслов <@#&>Управлявай стреса<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/bg<@#&>>Повече за филмите на Напо</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"hr";"/en/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes";"published";"2014-05-14 10:05:03";"2014-07-25 10:42:17";"2014-05-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo pomaže <@#&>kada udari stres<@#&>";"<p>   <@#&>Na udaru stresa<@#&> najnoviji je film o Napu koji se može upotrebljavati kao nekonvencionalni alat za poboljšanje osviještenosti o psihosocijalnim rizicima na radu, kao što su prekomjerni zahtjevi, pomanjkanje nadzora, stalni pritisak, neprihvatljivo ponašanje, nedostatak poštovanja, promjene, loše planiranje i proturječne upute.</p>  <p>   Sprječavanje stresa neophodno je za zdrava radna mjesta, a Napo to objašnjava pomoću svog originalnog humora. U svim filmovima ove serije Napo skreće pažnju na opasnosti na radnom mjestu i potiče na razmišljanja o mogućim poboljšanjima.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/hr/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=hr&filmid=napo-019-when-stress-strikes<@#&>>Pogledajte film ‘Napo u …Na udaru stresa’</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/hr<@#&>>Kampanja upravljanja stresom za zdrava mjesta rada</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/en<@#&>>Više filmova o Napu</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/napo-helps-when-stress-strikes/when stress strikes.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/de-gestis-database-of-biomaterials";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-23 15:18:35";"2014-05-23 15:18:51";"2014-05-28 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"DE - GESTIS database of biomaterials";"<p>   The new database provides free access to OSH-related information on biomaterials, similar to the Hazardous Substances Data Bank GESTIS. The new database was developped in cooperation with the Professional Association on raw materials and chemical industry (BG RCI), with the Institute for Occupational Safety and Health of the German Social Accident Insurance and the German federal labour ministry.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.dguv.de/ifa/Gefahrstoffdatenbanken/GESTIS-Biostoffdatenbank/index.jsp<@#&>>More information</a></p>";"/en/news/de-gestis-database-of-biomaterials/IFA.gif";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/echa-factsheet-on-national-helpdesks";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-23 15:15:15";"2014-05-23 15:16:36";"2014-05-27 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"ECHA - Factsheet on national helpdesks";"<p>   The updated fact sheet explains what services national BPR, CLP and REACH helpdesks provide and how they can be contacted. "/en/news/european-neighbourhood-policy-project-in-georgia";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-27 17:40:48";"2014-05-27 17:43:21";"2014-05-27 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"European Neighbourhood Policy Project in Georgia";"<p>   On 28 and 29 April 2014, EU-OSHA representatives met with the Georgian Ministry of Labour, Health and Social Affairs in Tbilisi to discuss our cooperation as part of EU-OSHA’s ENP Project funded by the EU under the European Neighbourhood Policy.</p>  <p>   We discussed current developments in the area of safety and health at work in Georgia and presented information on the occupational health and safety system in the EU.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/european-neighbourhood-policy-project-in-georgia<@#&>>Read our blog entry.</a></p>";"/en/news/european-neighbourhood-policy-project-in-georgia/Georgia.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/preventing-work-cancers.-a-workplace-health-priority.-new-etui-publication";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-23 13:05:05";"2014-05-23 13:05:37";"2014-05-26 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Preventing work cancers. A workplace health priority. New ETUI publication";"<p>   Cancers are one of the main causes of death linked to working conditions in Europe. The political context is against effective prevention of long-term factors that do not put a direct cost on business.</p>";"<p>   This brochure from the European Trade Union institute takes a look at the history and causes of work-induced cancers and provides information about tools for collective prevention. It is aimed at trade unionists, scientists, public health practitioners and policy-makers.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.etui.org/en/Publications2/Guides/Preventing-work-cancers.-A-workplace-health-priority<@#&>>Download the brochure </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/workshop-on-carcinogens-and-work-related-cancer<@#&>>EU-OSHA workshop on work-related cancer</a></p>";"/en/news/preventing-work-cancers.-a-workplace-health-priority.-new-etui-publication/ETUI.gif";"";"dangerous_substances, legislation";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-commission-welcomes-council-adoption-of-posting-of-workers-enforcement-directive";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-23 15:21:06";"2014-05-23 15:22:16";"2014-05-26 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-Commission welcomes Council adoption of Posting of Workers Enforcement Directive";"<p>   The European Commission has welcomed the definitive adoption by the EU's Council of Ministers of new measures to better enforce EU rules on the posting of workers. The new Posting of Workers Enforcement Directive will safeguard respect for posted workers' rights in practice and strengthen the legal framework for service providers. Safeguards to protect the rights of posted workers and to prevent 'social dumping' are laid down in the 1996 <a href=<@#&>http://eur-lex.europa.eu/LexUriServ/LexUriServ.do?uri=CELEX:31996L0071:en:HTML<@#&>>Posted Workers Directive</a> (96/71/EC) that presents mandatory rules regarding the terms and conditions of employment to be applied to an employee posted to work in another Member State.</p>";"<p>   The new Enforcement Directive aims to<strong> ensure that these rules are better applied in practice</strong>, especially in some sectors such as construction and road haulage, where for example so-called 'letter box' companies (without any real economic activity in their 'home' country) have been using false 'posting' to circumvent national rules on social security and labour conditions, and <strong>improve the protection of posted workers' rights </strong>by preventing fraud, especially in subcontracting chains where posted workers' rights are sometimes not respected.</p>  <p>   Member States have to implement the new Enforcement Directive in their national legislation no later than two years and twenty days after its publication in the EU's Official Journal.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2066&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&>>For more information </a></p>";"/en/news/eu-commission-welcomes-council-adoption-of-posting-of-workers-enforcement-directive/EU.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-slic-guidance-on-the-interaction-between-reach-and-osh-legislation";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-23 13:02:15";"2014-05-23 13:02:31";"2014-05-23 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-SLIC guidance on the interaction between REACH and OSH legislation";"<p>   The Senior Labour Inspectors' Committee (SLIC) has&nbsp; approved this GUIDANCE for Labour Inspectors on the interaction of REACH Regulation (EC) No. 1907/2006), the Chemical Agents Directive (CAD) and the Carcinogens and Mutagens Directive (CMD).</p>  <p>   REACH and CAD/CMD all impose requirements on the use of hazardous chemicals in the workplace, and employers will now find themselves faced with two sets of duties. Although REACH and CAD/CMD should ultimately complement one another, their requirements overlap to some extent and this has the potential to give rise to inconsistencies in their application.</p>";"<p>   This document,&nbsp; prepared by the SLIC working group CHEMEX, is intended to provide EU Labour Inspectorates with an useful tool that help them on the practical enforcement by providing guidance on the requirements of REACH and the interfaces with the enforcement of requirements under the CAD and the CMD Directives.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en&amp;intPageId=685<@#&>>More information on SLIC</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-slic-guidance-on-the-interaction-between-reach-and-osh-legislation/EU.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances, legislation";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"New report looks at the cost of accidents and ill-health at work";"<p>   An EU-OSHA report reviews and analyses a selection of studies evaluating the costs of poor or non-existent safety and health at work.<br />   The report focuses on different types of cost – productivity, healthcare, quality of life, administration and insurance – that emerge as a consequence of poor occupational safety and health.<br />   It also includes recommendations on how these costs should be estimated in the future to best inform policy-makers.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Read the report: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (in English)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Read the </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Executive summary</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (in 8 more European languages)</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"nl";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nieuw verslag belicht de kosten van arbeidsongevallen en beroepsziekten";"<p>   Een nieuw EU-OSHA-verslag beoordeelt en analyseert via een selectie van onderzoeken de kosten van ontbrekende of ontoereikende veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk.<br />   Het verslag richt zich op de verschillende soorten kosten – productiviteit, gezondheidszorg, levenskwaliteit, administratieve verwerking en verzekeringen – die het gevolg zijn van een slechte veiligheids- en gezondheidssituatie op het werk.<br />   Het bevat ook aanbevelingen over hoe deze kosten in de toekomst geraamd moeten worden om beleidsmakers zo goed mogelijk te informeren.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lees het verslag: Raming van de kosten van arbeidsongevallen en beroepsziekten: een toetsing van methoden (in het Engels)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lees de </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>samenvatting</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (ook beschikbaar in 8 andere EU-talen)</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"no";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ny rapport ser på kostnadene ved ulykker og dårlig helse på arbeidsplassen";"<p>En EU-OSHA-rapport går gjennom og analyserer et utvalg studier som tar for seg kostnadene ved dårlig eller ikke-eksisterende HMS-arbeid på arbeidsplassen.<br /> Rapporten fokuserer på ulike typer kostnader – produktivitet, helsevern, livskvalitet, administrasjon og forsikring – som følger i kjølvannet av dårlig helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen.<br /> Rapporten inneholder også anbefalinger om hvordan slike kostnader bør beregnes i framtiden for å gi beslutningstakere et best mulig grunnlag for sine beslutninger.</p> <p>Les rapporten: Beregning av kostnadene ved ulykker og dårlig helse på arbeidsplassen: <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>En gjennomgang av metoder (på engelsk)<br /> </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Les </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>sammendraget</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (på ytterligere 8 europeiske språk)</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
