"/el/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"el";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Νέα έκθεση εξετάζει το κόστος των ατυχημάτων και ασθενειών στην εργασία";"<p>   Η έκθεση του EU-OSHA σκιαγραφεί και αναλύει μια σειρά επιλεγμένων μελετών που αξιολογούν το κόστος της κακής ή ανύπαρκτης ασφάλειας και υγείας στην εργασία.<br /> Η έκθεση εστιάζει στα διάφορα είδη κόστους – σε ό,τι αφορά την παραγωγικότητα, την υγειονομική περίθαλψη, την ποιότητα ζωής, τη διοίκηση και την ασφάλιση – τα οποία είναι αποτέλεσμα των άσχημων επιδόσεων στον τομέα της επαγγελματικής ασφάλειας και υγείας.<br /> Διατυπώνονται επίσης συστάσεις σχετικά με τον τρόπο εκτίμησης αυτού του κόστους στο μέλλον, με στόχο την ενημέρωση των υπευθύνων χάραξης πολιτικής.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την έκθεση: Εκτίμηση του κόστους των εργατικών ατυχημάτων και επαγγελματικών ασθενειών: επισκόπηση των μεθοδολογιών (στα αγγλικά)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>περίληψη</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (σε 8 επιπλέον ευρωπαϊκές γλώσσες)</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"sl";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Novo poročilo proučuje stroške nezgod in bolezni pri delu";"<p>   Poročilo agencije EU-OSHA obravnava in analizira sklop študij, v katerih so ocenjevali stroške slabega ali neobstoječega sistema varnosti in zdravja pri delu.<br /> Osredotoča se na različne vrste stroškov (produktivnost, zdravstvo, kakovost življenja, upravne stroške in zavarovanje), ki se pojavijo kot posledica slabega upravljanja varnosti in zdravja pri delu.<br /> Vsebuje tudi priporočila, kako je treba narediti oceno teh stroškov v prihodnosti, da bi bili o njih čim bolj obveščeni tudi nosilci odločanja.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Preberite poročilo: Ocena stroškov nezgod in bolezni pri delu: pregled metodologij (v angleščini)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Preberite </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>povzetek</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (v osmih drugih evropskih jezikih)</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"lt";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Naujoje ataskaitoje nagrinėjami darbuotojų nelaimingų atsitikimų ir sveikatos problemų kaštai";"<p>   EU-OSHA ataskaitoje apžvelgiami ir analizuojami tyrimai, kuriuose vertinama, kiek kainuoja nekokybiška ar neegzistuojanti darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos politika.<br />   Ataskaitoje daugiausia dėmesio skiriama įvairiems kaštams, būtent našumo, sveikatos priežiūros, gyvenimo kokybės, administraciniams ir draudimo, kurie yra tiesioginė prastos darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos politikos pasekmė.<br />   Joje taip pat pateikiamos rekomendacijos, kaip ateityje apskaičiuoti šiuos kaštus ir juos pateikti politikos formuotojams.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Skaityti ataskaitą „Darbuotojų nelaimingų atsitikimų ir sveikatos problemų kaštai“ Metodologijos apžvalga (anglų kalba)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Skaityti </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>santrauką</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (daugiau nei 8 Europos kalbomis)</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"is";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ný skýrsla fjallar um kostnað við slys og vanheilsu á vinnustöðum";"<p>   Skýrsla á vegum EU-OSHA fjallar um og greinir úrval af rannsóknum um kostnað við það þegar vinnuvernd er slæm eða alls engin.<br /> Skýrslan beinir sjónum sínum að mismunandi gerðum kostnaðar – afköstum, heilbrigðisþjónustu, lífsgæðum, stjórnsýslu og tryggingum – sem fellur til vegna lélegrar vinnuverndar.<br /> Hún inniheldur einnig ráðleggingar um hvernig leggja skuli mat á þennan kostnað í framtíðinni svo að stefnumótendur hafi sem bestar upplýsingar. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lesa skýrsluna: Mat á kostnaði af völdum slysa og vanheilsu á vinnustöðum: Umfjöllun um aðferðarfræði (á ensku)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lesa </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Stutt yfirlit</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (á 8 fleiri Evrópumálum)</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"pl";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nowy raport ukazuje koszt wypadków przy pracy i chorób zawodowych";"<p>   W raporcie opracowanym przez EU-OSHA opisany i analizowany jest wybór badań oceniających koszty słabych bezpieczeństwa i higieny w miejscu pracy lub ich braku.<br />   Skupiono się w nim na różnych rodzajach kosztów – w zakresie wydajności, opieki zdrowotnej, jakości życia, administracyjnych i ubezpieczeniowych, które są konsekwencją nieskutecznych bezpieczeństwa i higieny pracy.<br />   Uwzględniono w nim również zalecenia dotyczące szacowania tych kosztów w przyszłości, aby służyć lepszą pomocą osobom odpowiedzialnym za wyznaczanie kierunków polityki.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj raport: Oszacowanie kosztów wypadków przy pracy i chorób zawodowych: przegląd metodologii (w jęz. angielskim)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>streszczenie</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (w 8 innych językach europejskich)</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"et";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uues aruandes analüüsitakse tööõnnetuste ja kutsehaiguste kulusid";"<p>   EU-OSHA aruandes tutvustatakse ja analüüsitakse mitut uuringut, milles hinnatakse puuduliku või puuduva tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu kulusid.<br /> Aruanne käsitleb erinevaid kulusid (tootlikkus, tervishoid, elukvaliteet, haldus ja kindlustus), mis tulenevad tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu puudlikust juhtimisest.<br /> Selles esitatakse ka soovitused, kuidas neid kulusid tuleks hinnata, et tulevikus poliitikuid paremini teavitada.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Aruanne: Tööõnnetuste ja kutsehaiguste kulude hindamine: metodoloogiline ülevaade (inglise keeles)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Tutvu </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>kokkuvõttega</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (veel 8 Euroopa keeles)</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"lv";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Jaunā ziņojumā apskatītas darba vietā radušos nelaimes gadījumu un slimību izmaksas";"<p>   EU-OSHA ziņojumā aplūkoti un analizēti vairāki pētījumi, kuros novērtētas nepietiekamas vai neeksistējošas darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības izmaksas.<br /> Ziņojumā uzmanība tiek vērsta uz dažāda veida izmaksām – produktivitāte, veselības aprūpe, dzīves kvalitāte, administrācija un apdrošināšana – kas visas rodas nepietiekamas darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības rezultātā.<br /> Tajā ir iekļauti arī ieteikumi, kā nākotnē aprēķināt šīs izmaksas, lai atbilstoši informētu politikas veidotājus.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lasīt ziņojumu: Kā aprēķināt darba vietā radušos nelaimes gadījumu un slimību izmaksas: metodoloģiju pārskats (angļu valodā)</a><br /><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lasīt </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>kopsavilkumu</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>(papildus 8 Eiropas valodās</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"mt";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Rapport ġdid jagħti ħarsa lejn l-ispejjeż ta' aċċidenti u mard fuq il-post tax-xogħol";"<p>   Rapport tal-EU-OSHA jeżamina mill-ġdid u janalizza għażla ta' studji li jevalwaw l-ispejjeż ta' saħħa u sikurezza fqira jew ineżistenti fuq il-post tax-xogħol.<br /> Ir-rapport jiffoka fuq tipi differenti ta' spejjeż - il-produttività, il-kura tas-saħħa, il-kwalità tal-ħajja, l-amministrazzjoni u l-assigurazzjoni - li jirriżultaw bħala konsegwenza ta' saħħa u sikurezza okkupazzjonali fqira.<br /> Hu jinkludi wkoll rakkomandazzjonijiet dwar kif fil-futur għandha ssir stima ta' dawn l-ispejjeż sabiex dawk li jfasslu l-politika jkunu infurmati dwarhom bl-aħjar mod.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Aqra r-rapport: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (bl-Ingliż)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Aqra s-</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Sommarju Eżekuttiv</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (fi 8 lingwi Ewropej oħra)</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"sk";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Predmetom novej správy sú náklady súvisiace s pracovnými úrazmi a chorobami z povolania.";"<p>   Správa agentúry EU-OSHA obsahuje prehľad a analýzu výberu štúdií, v ktorých sa hodnotili náklady súvisiace so slabou alebo žiadnou bezpečnosťou a ochranou zdravia pri práci.<br /> Správa je zameraná na rôzny druhy nákladov (produktivita, zdravotná starostlivosť, kvalita života, správa a poistenie), ktoré vznikajú v dôsledku nízkej úrovne bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia pri práci.<br /> Takisto obsahuje odporúčania týkajúce sa toho, ako by sa takéto náklady mali v budúcnosti odhadovať s cieľom čo najlepšie informovať politických stratégov.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Správa: Odhad nákladov súvisiacich s úrazmi a chorobami pri práci: prehľad metodík (v angličtine)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>></a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Zhrnutie správy</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (v 8 ďalších európskych jazykoch)</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"ro";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un nou raport analizează costul accidentelor şi al problemelor de sănătate la locul de muncă";"<p>   Un raport al EU-OSHA examinează şi analizează o serie de studii care evaluează costurile sănătăţii şi securităţii, precare sau chiar inexistente, în muncă.<br /> Raportul vizează diferite tipuri de costuri: productivitate, asistenţă medicală, calitatea vieţii, administraţie şi asigurări, generate de condiţiile precare de sănătate şi securitate în muncă.<br /> El conţine, de asemenea, recomandări cu privire la modul în care aceste costuri ar trebui estimate în viitor pentru o mai bună informare a factorilor de decizie.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Citiţi raportul: Estimarea costului accidentelor şi al problemelor de sănătate la locul de muncă: Evaluarea metodologiilor (în engleză)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Citiţi </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Rezumatul</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (în alte 8 limbi europene)</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"it";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nuova relazione sui costi di infortuni e malattie";"<p>   Una relazione dell'EU-OSHA riprende ed esamina determinati studi sui costi da sostenere quando la sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro sono insufficienti o del tutto assenti.<br /> La relazione si sofferma sulle diverse tipologie di detti costi - legate a produttività, assistenza sanitaria, qualità della vita, amministrazione e assicurazioni - dovuti a situazioni di carenza in termini di sicurezza e salute sul lavoro.<br /> Vi si formulano inoltre raccomandazioni su come stimare tali costi in futuro, in modo da migliorare la qualità delle informazioni destinate ai responsabili delle politiche. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Leggi la relazione: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (La stima dei costi di infortuni e malattie sul lavoro: panoramica delle metodologie - in inglese)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Leggi la </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>sintesi</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (in altre otto lingue europee)</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"hu";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Az új jelentés a munkahelyi balesetek és betegségek költségeivel foglalkozik.";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA jelentés áttekint és elemez olyan válogatott tanumányokat, amelyek a nem kielégítő vagy hiányzó munkahelyi biztonsággal és -egészséggel foglalkoznak.<br />   A jelentés különféle költségekkel (termelékenységi, egészségügyi, életminőségi, ügyviteli és biztosítási költségek) foglalkozik amelyek a nem kielégítő munkahelyi biztonságnak és egészségnek tudhatók be.<br />   A jelentés továbbá javaslatokat tartalmaz arra vonatkozólag, hogy a jövőben a törvényhozók hogyan becsüljék fel az ilyen jellegű költségeket.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Olvassa el a jelentést: Munkahelyi balesetek és megbetegedések költségeinek elemzése: A módszertanok áttekintése (angolul)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Olvassa el </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>az összefoglalót</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (több mint nyolc európai nyelven)</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"de";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Neuer Bericht über Kosten von Unfällen und arbeitsbedingten Erkrankungen";"<p>   In einem EU-OSHA-Bericht werden ausgewählte Studien zur Bewertung der Kosten schlechter oder nicht vorhandener Sicherheits- und Gesundheitsschutzvorkehrungen bei der Arbeit untersucht und analysiert.<br /> Der Schwerpunkt des Berichts liegt auf verschiedenen Arten von Kosten (Produktivität, Gesundheitsversorgung, Lebensqualität, Verwaltung und Versicherung), die aufgrund schlechter Sicherheits- und Gesundheitsschutzbedingungen am Arbeitsplatz entstehen.<br /> Er enthält ferner Empfehlungen dazu, wie diese Kosten in Zukunft veranschlagt werden sollten, um politische Entscheidungsträger bestmöglich in Kenntnis zu setzen.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Zum Bericht „Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies“ (Englisch)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Zur </a> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Zusammenfassung</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (in 8 weiteren EU-Sprachen)</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"es";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un nuevo informe analiza el coste de los accidentes laborales y de los problemas de salud en el trabajo";"<p>   Un informe de la EU-OSHA recoge y analiza una serie de estudios en los que se evalúan los costes de la deficiencia o la falta de sistemas de seguridad y salud en el trabajo.<br />   El informe se centra en distintos tipos de costes relacionados con la productividad, la sanidad, la calidad de vida, la administración y los seguros, que resultan de una mala seguridad y salud en el trabajo.<br />   También incluye recomendaciones sobre cómo estos costes deberían estimarse en el futuro para informar mejor a los responsables políticos.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Leer el informe: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (Estimación del coste de los accidentes y de los problemas de salud en el trabajo: análisis de metodologías - en inglés)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Leer el </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>resumen ejecutivo</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (en 8 lenguas europeas más)</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"pt";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Novo relatório analisa o custo dos acidentes e problemas de saúde relacionados com o trabalho";"<p>   Um relatório da EU-OSHA apresenta uma revisão e análise de um conjunto selecionado de estudos que avaliam os custos decorrentes das condições de segurança e saúde no trabalho (SST) deficientes ou inexistentes.<br />   O relatório centra-se em diferentes categorias de custos (custos relacionados com produtividade, cuidados de saúde e qualidade de vida, custos administrativos e relativos a seguro) originados por condições de segurança e saúde no trabalho deficientes.<br />   Inclui igualmente recomendações sobre a forma como esses custos devem ser estimados no futuro para melhor informar os responsáveis pelas políticas.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Ler o relatório: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (em inglês) (Estimar o custos dos acidentes e problemas relacionados com o trabalho: uma revisão de metodologias)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Ler o </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Resumo Executivo</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (em 8 línguas da UE)</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"cs";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nová zpráva se zaměřuje na náklady související s úrazy a nemocností na pracovišti";"<p>   Zpráva agentury EU-OSHA posuzuje a analyzuje vybrané studie hodnotící náklady spojené s neexistencí nebo slabou úrovní bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci.<br /> Zpráva se zaměřuje na různé typy nákladů – týkající se produktivity, zdravotní péče, kvality života, administrativy a pojištění – vznikajících v důsledku nedostatečné úrovně bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví na pracovišti.<br /> Obsahuje také doporučení ohledně způsobů vyčíslování těchto nákladů v budoucnosti, aby měli tvůrci politik k dispozici co nejobjektivnější informace.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si zprávu Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (Vyčíslování nákladů spojených s úrazy a nemocností na pracovišti: přehled metodik, dostupná v angličtině)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Shrnutí</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (dostupné v 8 dalších evropských jazycích)</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"fr";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un nouveau rapport s'intéresse au coût des accidents et des problèmes de santé au travail";"<p>   Un rapport de l'EU-OSHA examine et analyse une sélection d'études évaluant les coûts dus à l'absence ou à l'inefficacité d'un système de santé et de sécurité au travail.<br />   Le rapport se concentre sur différents types de coûts - la productivité, les soins de santé, la qualité de vie, l'administration et l'assurance - qui sont engendrés du fait de mauvaises conditions de santé et de sécurité au travail.<br />   Il présente également des recommandations sur la manière dont ces coûts devraient être estimés à l'avenir afin de mieux informer les décideurs politiques.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lire le rapport intitulé: Estimation du coût des accidents et des problèmes de santé au travail: examen des méthodes utilisées (en anglais)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lire le </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>résumé</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (dans 8 autres langues européennes)</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"bg";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Нов доклад разглежда разходите за злополуки и влошено здраве на работното място";"<p>   Доклад на EU-OSHA разглежда и анализира няколко изследвания, оценяващи разходите, породени от лоши или липсващи условия на безопасност и здраве при работа.<br />  Докладът се фокусира върху различни видове разходи - за производителност, здравеопазване, качество на живот, администрация и застраховка - които възникват като следствие от лоша безопасност и здраве при работа.<br /> Той също включва препоръки за това как да се изчисляват разходите в бъдеще, за да се информират политиците по най-добрия начин.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Прочетете доклада: Изчисляване на разходите от злополуки и влошено здраве на работното място: Преглед на методиките (на английски език)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Прочетете </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Резюме</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (на още 8 европейски езика)</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"fi";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uudessa raportissa tarkastellaan työpaikkatapaturmien ja heikkotasoisen työterveyden kustannuksia";"<p>   EU-OSHAn raportissa tarkastellaan ja analysoidaan tutkimuksia, joissa on arvioitu heikosti hoidetun tai kokonaan laiminlyödyn työsuojelun kustannuksia.<br /> Raportissa keskitytään erityyppisiin kustannuksiin kuten tuottavuus, terveydenhuolto, elämänlaatu, hallinto ja vakuutukset, joihin kaikkiin huonosti hoidetulla työsuojelulla on vaikutuksia.<br /> Mukan on myös suosituksia siitä, miten näitä kustannuksia pitäisi arvioida tulevaisuudessa parhaan mahdollisen tiedon saamiseksi päätöksentekijöitä varten.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lue raportti: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (englanniksi)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Lue</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>yhteenveto</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (kahdeksalla muulla EU-kielellä)</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"hr";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Novi izvještaj s osvrtom na troškove nesreća i oboljenja na radu";"<p>   Izvještaj EU-OSHA-e pruža pregled i analizu niza studija procjene troškova zbog niske razine ili nepostojeće sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu.<br /> Izvještaj je usredotočen na različite vrste troškova (produktivnost, zdravstvenu skrb, kvalitetu života, troškove upravljanja i osiguranja) koji se javljaju kao posljedica niske razine sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu.<br /> Izvještaj također sadrži i preporuke za procjenu ovih troškova u budućnosti kako bi donositelji odluka bili bolje obaviješteni.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Pročitajte izvještaj: Procjena troškova nesreća i oboljenja na radu: Pregled metodologija (na engleskom jeziku)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Pročitajte</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>sažetak</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>(na 8 europskih jezika)</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"sv";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ny rapport om kostnaden för olyckor och ohälsa på arbetet";"<p>   I en ny rapport går EU-Osha igenom och analyserar en rad undersökningar som utvärderar kostnaderna av ohälsa och bristande eller obefintlig säkerhet på arbetet.<br /> I rapporten tittar man särskilt på följande typer av kostnader som uppkommer till följd av dålig arbetsmiljö: produktivitet, sjukvård, livskvalitet, administration och försäkring.<br /> I rapporten finns även rekommendationer om hur den här typen av kostnader i framtiden bör räknas ut för att kunna tjäna som rättvisande beslutsunderlag för beslutsfattarna.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Läs rapporten: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (på engelska)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Läs </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>en sammanfattning av rapporten</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (på åtta europeiska språk utöver engelska)</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"da";"/en/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work";"published";"2014-05-07 13:08:17";"2014-07-25 10:42:48";"2014-05-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ny rapport ser på omkostningerne ved ulykker og dårligt helbred på arbejdspladsen";"<p>   En rapport fra EU-OSHA gennemgår og analyserer udvalgte undersøgelser for at vurdere omkostningerne ved dårlig eller manglende sundhed og sikkerhed på arbejdspladsen.<br />   Rapporten fokuserer på forskellige typer omkostninger – produktivitet, sundhed, livskvalitet, administration og forsikring – som følger af dårlig sundhed og sikkerhed på arbejdspladsen.<br />   Den indeholder desuden anbefalinger om, hvordan omkostningerne bør vurderes fremover for at informere de politiske beslutningstagere bedst muligt.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/estimating-the-costs-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Læs rapporten: Estimating the cost of accidents and ill-health at work: A review of methodologies (på engelsk)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>Læs </a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>>sammendraget</a><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/publications/reports/executive-summary-estimating-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/view<@#&>> (på yderligere 8 europæiske sprog)</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/new-report-looks-at-the-cost-of-accidents-and-ill-health-at-work/ill health.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/working-together-for-success-eu-osha-annual-report-2013";"en";"";"private";"2014-05-19 13:38:32";"2014-07-25 10:49:34";"2014-05-19 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Working together for success: EU-OSHA’s annual report 2013";"<p>   In its latest annual report, EU-OSHA reports on a productive year in which it finalised its strategic programme for the next six years and brought its biggest ever Healthy Workplaces campaign to a close. The main findings of the third European Opinion Poll related to work-related stress and active ageing are illustrated in two infographics.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/working-together-for-success-eu-osha-annual-report-2013<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/corporate/2013full/view<@#&>>Read the full report in English</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/corporate/annual-report-2013-summary/view<@#&>>Summary in 25 languages</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/working-together-for-success-eu-osha-annual-report-2013/OSHA_infographics_04_7MAY_14_v05.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/de-atypical-employment-on-the-rise";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-16 14:17:57";"2014-05-16 14:18:31";"2014-05-16 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"DE - Atypical employment on the rise";"<p>   Changing World of Work <@#&> is the name of a brochure of the Federal Institute for Occupational Safety and Health ( BAuA) , which regularly provides the latest facts and figures on health and safety at work. The 86 -page booklet summarizes facts and figures on employment, occupational diseases , risk assessment or demographic change. It offers professionals the opportunity to obtain a quick overview of developments, trends and correlations. This year's focus is the topic <@#&> atypical employment <@#&>.</p>";"<p>   Тhe authors note that a significant increase in atypical employment since 1993 has been observed. With more than 41 million in 2012, the number of employed is at its highest level since 1993. However, around 7.9 million were in atypical employment, in marginal jobs , part-time work up to 20 hours a week , or temporary work.</p>  <p>   Part-time workers and part-timers with contracts of less than 20h/week are over-represented in &nbsp;“Trade, maintenance and automotive repair <@#&>, while in education it is rather temporary and part-timers.<br />   Part-time positions are more often occupied by female workers, while temporary work is more of a male domain.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.baua.de/dok/5046798<@#&>>Download the brochure <@#&> Changing World of Work - Issue 2014<@#&> can be downloaded in PDF format at (in German)</a></p>";"/en/news/de-atypical-employment-on-the-rise/Baua.gif";"";"gender";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"New online risk assessment tools published in Bulgaria";"<p>   The Bulgarian Labour Inspectorate announced that six Bulgarian interactive risk assessment (OiRA) tools have been developed and are now freely accessible online. The tools are intended to support small and micro enterprises in Bulgaria to assess their risks. The sectors covered by these tools are&nbsp; Construction, Forestry, Telecommunications, Public administration, and Education.</p>  <p>   The Bulgarian Labour Inspectorate is working on 24 more OiRA tools, which are now in their final development stage as part of a project financed by the European Social Fund.</p>  <p>   OiRA is a web platform developed and maintained by EU-OSHA that enables the creation of sectoral risk assessment tools in any language in a standardised way.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Learn more about OiRA</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"bg";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Нови онлайн инструменти за оценка на риска, публикувани в България";"<p>   Инспекцията по труда в България обяви, че са разработени шест български интерактивни инструмента за оценка на риска (OiRA), които вече са свободно достъпни онлайн. Инструментите имат за цел да подпомагат малките и микро предприятия в България за оценка на техния риск. Инструментите обхващат следните сектори  строителство, горско стопанство, телекомуникации, публична администрация и образование.</p> <p>   Инспекцията по труда в България работи по още 24 OiRA инструмента, които са в последния етап от разработването им като част от проект, финансиран от Европейския социален фонд.</p> <p>   OiRA е уеб платформа, разработена и поддържана от EU-OSHA, която позволява създаването на инструменти за оценка на риска по сектори на всеки език по стандартизиран начин.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Научете повече за OiRA</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"hr";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Objavljeni novi internetski alati procjene rizika u Bugarskoj";"<p>   Bugarski inspektorat rada objavio je da su 6 bugarskih interaktivnih alata za procjenu rizika (OiRA) besplatno dostupni na internetu. Alati su namijenjeni malim i mikropoduzećima u Bugarskoj kao pomoć pri procjeni rizika. Ovi alati obuhvaćaju sljedeće sektore  graditeljstvo, šumarstvo, telekomunikacije, javnu upravu i obrazovanje.</p> <p>   Bugarski inspektorat rada priprema još 24 interaktivna alata za procjenu rizika (OiRA) koji su u završnoj fazi razvoja u okviru projekta koji financira Europski socijalni fond.</p> <p>   OiRA je internetska platforma koju razvija i održava  EU-OSHA i koja omogućuje kreiranje standardiziranih alata za procjenu rizika u određenim sektorima na bilo kojem jeziku.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Saznajte više o OiRA-i</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"cs";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nové nástroje pro on-line hodnocení rizik zveřejněny v Bulharsku";"<p>   Bulharský inspektorát práce oznámil, že bylo vytvořeno šest nástrojů pro on-line interaktivní hodnocení rizik (OiRA) v bulharštině a že tyto nástroje jsou nyní bezplatně k dispozici na internetu. Účelem těchto nástrojů je podpořit malé podniky a mikropodniky v Bulharsku v rámci jejich úsilí o hodnocení rizik. Tyto nástroje jsou určeny pro odvětví  stavebnictví, lesnictví, telekomunikací, veřejné správy a vzdělávání.</p> <p>   Bulharský inspektorát práce připravuje v rámci projektu financovaného Evropským sociálním fondem dalších 24 nástrojů OiRA, které jsou v současné době v závěrečné fázi vývoje.</p> <p>   OiRA je webová platforma vyvinutá a spravovaná agenturou EU-OSHA, která umožňuje standardizovaným způsobem vytvářet odvětvové nástroje k hodnocení rizik v jakémkoli jazyce.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Více o OiRA</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"da";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Offentliggørelse af nye onlineværktøjer til arbejdspladsvurdering i Bulgarien";"<p>   Det bulgarske arbejdstilsyn meddeler, at der nu er udviklet seks bulgarske interaktive risikovurderingsværktøjer (OiRA), som er frit tilgængelige online. Værktøjerne skal hjælpe små og mellemstore virksomheder i Bulgarien med at vurdere deres risici. Værktøjerne dækker følgende områder:  Bygge- og anlægssektoren, skovbrug, telekommunikation, offentlig forvaltning og uddannelse.</p> <p>   Det bulgarske arbejdstilsyn arbejder på yderligere 24 OiRA-værktøjer, som nu er i afslutningsfasen som del af et projekt, der er finansieret af Den Europæiske Socialfond.</p> <p>   OiRA er en internetplatform, som EU-OSHA har udviklet og vedligeholder, hvor det er muligt at oprette sektorspecifikke risikovurderingsværktøjer på et hvilket som helst sprog på en standardiseret måde.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Læs mere om OiRA</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"nl";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nieuwe tools voor onlinerisicobeoordeling bekendgemaakt in Bulgarije";"<p>   De Bulgaarse arbeidsinspectie heeft bekendgemaakt dat de zes interactieve tools voor risicobeoordeling (OiRA-tools) die in Bulgarije ontwikkeld zijn, nu gratis online beschikbaar zijn.  Met deze tools moeten kleine en micro-ondernemingen in Bulgarije hun risico's gemakkelijker zelf kunnen beoordelen. Deze tools kunnen worden gebruikt in de volgende sectoren:  bouw, bosbouw, telecommunicatie, overheid en onderwijs. </p> <p>   In het kader van een door het Europees Sociaal Fonds gefinancierd project werkt de Bulgaarse arbeidsinspectie aan nog 24 andere OiRA-tools die nu in de eindfase van ontwikkeling zijn.</p> <p>   OiRA is een door EU-OSHA ontwikkeld en in stand gehouden webplatform dat het mogelijk maakt in elke taal op een gestandaardiseerde manier sectorale risicobeoordelingstools te creëren.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Lees meer over OiRA</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"et";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uued veebipõhised riskihindamisvahendid Bulgaarias";"<p>   Bulgaaria tööinspektsioon teatas, et Bulgaarias on välja töötatud kuus interaktiivset riskihindamisvahendit (OiRA), mis on veebis vabalt kättesaadavad. Vahendid loodi selleks, et abistada Bulgaaria väike- ja mikroettevõtteid riskihindamisel. Hõlmatud on  ehituse, metsanduse, side, riigihalduse ja hariduse valdkonnad.</p> <p>   Bulgaaria tööinspektsioon töötab Euroopa Sotsiaalfondi rahastatava projekti raames välja veel 24 uut OiRA veebivahendit, mis valmivad peatselt. </p> <p>   OiRA veebiplatvormi on välja töötanud ja seda hooldab EU-OSHA. See platvorm võimaldab luua mis tahes keeles ja valdkonnas standardseid riskihindamisvahendeid.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>OiRA lisateave</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"fi";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bulgariassa kehitettyjä uusia online-muotoisia riskinarviontityövälineitä";"<p>   Bulgarian työsuojelutarkastuslaitos ilmoittaa kehittäneensä kuusi vuorovaikutteista riskinarviointityövälinettä (OiRA), jotka ovat nyt vapaasti saatavissa online-muodossa. Työvälineiden tarkoituksena on tukea Bulgarian pien- ja mikroyrityksiä työsuojeluriskien arvioimisessa. Näiden työvälineiden kattamia aloja ovat  rakentaminen, metsätalous, televiestintä, julkishallinto ja opetus.</p> <p>   Bulgarian työsuojelutarkastulaitos on kehitellyt melkein valmiiksi 24 muutakin OiRA-työvälinettä osana Euroopan sosiaalirahaston rahoittamaa hanketta.</p> <p>   OiRA on EU-OSHAN kehittämä ja ylläpitämä verkkofoorum, jonka avulla voi on mahdollista kehittää alakohtaisia riskinarviointivälineitä kaikilla muilla kielillä vakiomuotoisesti.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Lisätietoja OiRAsta</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"fr";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Publication de nouveaux outils d'évaluation des risques en ligne en Bulgarie";"<p>   L'Inspection du travail bulgare a annoncé que six outils interactifs d'évaluation des risques (OiRA) bulgares avaient été élaborés et étaient désormais accessible en ligne gratuitement. Les outils visent à soutenir les petites et très petites entreprises en Bulgarie afin d'évaluer leurs risques. Les secteurs couverts par ces outils sont  la construction, la sylviculture, les télécommunications, l'administration publique et l'éducation.</p> <p>   L'inspection du travail bulgare travaille sur 24 outils OiRA supplémentaires qui en sont désormais au stade final de leur développement, dans le cadre d'un projet financé par le Fonds social européen.</p> <p>   L'OiRA est une plateforme web élaborée et mise à jour par l'EU-OSHA qui permet la création d'outils sectoriels d'évaluation des risques dans toutes les langues et sous une forme standardisée.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>En savoir plus sur l'OiRA</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"de";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Neue Online-Instrumente zur Gefährdungsbeurteilung in Bulgarien veröffentlicht";"<p>   Das bulgarische Arbeitsaufsichtsamt gab bekannt, dass sechs bulgarische Instrumente zur interaktiven Online-Gefährdungsbeurteilung (OiRA) entwickelt wurden, die jetzt kostenlos online zur Verfügung stehen. Die Instrumente sollen Klein- und Kleinstunternehmen in Bulgarien bei der Beurteilung ihrer Gefährdungen unterstützen. Die von den Instrumenten abgedeckten Wirtschaftszweige sind Bauwirtschaft, Forstwirtschaft, Telekommunikation, öffentliche Verwaltung und Bildungswesen.</p> <p>   Das bulgarische Arbeitsaufsichtsamt arbeitet im Rahmen eines vom Europäischen Sozialfonds finanzierten Projekts an 24 weiteren OiRA-Instrumenten, die sich mittlerweile in der letzten Entwicklungsphase befinden.</p> <p>   OiRA ist eine von EU-OSHA entwickelte und gepflegte Webplattform, mit der branchenbezogene Instrumente zur Gefährdungsbeurteilung standardisiert in einer beliebigen Sprache erstellt werden können.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Mehr über OiRA</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"el";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Δημοσίευση νέων επιγραμμικών εργαλείων εκτίμησης κινδύνων από τη Βουλγαρία";"<p>   Η βουλγαρική Επιθεώρηση Εργασίας ανακοίνωσε την ανάπτυξη και δωρεάν διάθεση στο διαδίκτυο έξι βουλγαρικών εργαλείων διαδραστικής εκτίμησης κινδύνων (OiRA). Τα εργαλεία παρέχονται για την υποστήριξη των μικρών και πολύ μικρών επιχειρήσεων στη Βουλγαρία, προκειμένου να εκτιμήσουν τους κινδύνων τους. Τα εργαλεία καλύπτουν τους κλάδους  των κατασκευών, της δασοκομίας, των τηλεπικοινωνιών, της δημόσιας διοίκησης και της εκπαίδευσης.</p> <p>   Στο πλαίσιο του έργου που χρηματοδοτείται από το Ευρωπαϊκό Κοινωνικό Ταμείο, η βουλγαρική Επιθεώρηση Εργασίας επεξεργάζεται 24 επιπλέον εργαλεία OiRA, τα οποία βρίσκονται πλέον στο τελικό στάδιο ανάπτυξης.</p> <p>   Το OiRA είναι μια διαδικτυακή πλατφόρμα την οποία ανέπτυξε και διατηρεί ο EU-OSHA και η οποία επιτρέπει τη δημιουργία κλαδικών εργαλείων εκτίμησης κινδύνων σε κάθε γλώσσα με τυποποιημένο τρόπο.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Μάθετε περισσότερα για το OiRA</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"hu";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Új online kockázatértékelési eszközök Bulgáriában";"<p>   A bolgár munkaügyi felügyelet bejelentette hogy hat bolgár interaktív kockázatértékelési (OiRA) eszközt fejlesztettek ki és tettek ingyenesen, online elérhetővé. Az eszközök feladata a bulgáriai kis- és mikrovállalkozások támogatása a kockázataik felbecsülése során. Az érintett szektorok az alábbiak:   építőipar, erdőgazdálkodás, telekommunikáció, közigazgatás és oktatásügy.</p> <p>   A bolgár munkaügyi felügyelet 24 további OiRA eszközön dolgozik, amelyek jelenleg az ESF finanszírozásában megvalósuló projekt részeként a fejlesztés végső állapotában vannak.</p> <p>   Az OiRA egy web felület, amelyet az EU-OSHA fejleszt és karbantart. Lehetővé teszi bármilyen nyelven, standard módon szektorspecifikus kockázatelemzési eszközök létrehozását.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Tudjon meg többet az OiRA-ról</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"is";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nýtt áhættumatstól á Netinu gefið út í Búlgaríu";"<p>   Búlgarska vinnueftirlitið tilkynnti að sex gagnvirk búlgörsk áhættumatstól (OiRA) hafi verið þróuð og megi nú finna ókeypis á Netinu.  Tólunum er ætlað að styðja við smá og örfyrirtæki í Búlgaríu við að leggja mat á áhættur sínar. Þeir geirar sem tólin ná til eru  byggingariðnaðurinn, skógarhögg, fjarskipti, opinber stjórnsýsla og fræðslustarf.</p> <p>   Búlgarska vinnueftirlitið vinnur að gerð 24 annarra OiRA tóla í verkefni sem fjármagnað er af  Félagsmálasjóði Evrópu og er gerð þeirra nú á lokastigum.</p> <p>   OiRa er vefkerfi, sem var þróað og er í umsjón EU-OSHA, og býður upp á gerð staðlaðra áhættumatstóla fyrir atvinnugreinar á hvaða tungumáli sem er.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Fræðast meira um OiRA</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"it";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bulgaria: pubblicati online nuovi strumenti di valutazione dei rischi";"<p>   L'ispettorato bulgaro del lavoro ha annunciato che sono stati messi a punto sei nuovi strumenti interattivi per la valutazione dei rischi (online interactive risk assessment - OiRA), che sono ora accessibili gratuitamente online. Tali strumenti sono pensati per assistere le piccole aziende e le microimprese bulgare nella valutazione dei rischi  nei settori  dell'edilizia, della silvicoltura, delle telecomunicazioni, della pubblica amministrazione e dell'istruzione.</p> <p>   L'ispettorato bulgaro del lavoro sta lavorando alla creazione di altri 24 strumenti OiRA, che si trovano ora nella fase di sviluppo finale, nell'ambito di un progetto finanziato dal Fondo sociale europeo.</p> <p>   L'OiRA è una piattaforma online, messa a punto e aggiornata dall'EU-OSHA, grazie alla quale è possibile creare strumenti di valutazione dei rischi, specifici per i vari settori, in qualsiasi lingua e in un formato standard.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Per saperne di più sull'OiRA</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"lv";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bulgārijā publicēti jauni tiešsaistes rīki riska novērtēšanai";"<p>   Bulgārijas Darba inspektorāts paziņoja, ka seši Bulgārijas interaktīvie riska novērtēšanas (OiRA) rīki ir izstrādāti un ir brīvi pieejami tiešsaistē.   Šie rīki ir paredzēti, lai palīdzētu Bulgārijas mazajiem un mikro uzņēmumiem novērtēt savus riskus. Šo rīku aptvertās nozares ir   būvniecība, mežsaimniecība, telekomunikācijas, valsts pārvalde un izglītība.</p> <p>   Bulgārijas Darba inspektorāts pašlaik strādā pie vēl 24 OiRA rīkiem, kuru izstrāde ir Eiropas Sociālā fonda finansētā projekta daļa, kas šobrīd tuvojas noslēgumam.</p> <p>   OiRA ir tīmekļa platforma, ko izstrādā un uztur EU-OSHA, lai jebkurā valodā standartizētā veidā nodrošinātu nozares riska novērtēšanas rīku izveides iespēju.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Uzziniet vairāk par OiRA.</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"lt";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bulgarijoje paskelbtos naujos internetinės rizikos vertinimo priemonės";"<p>   Bulgarijos darbo inspekcija pranešė, kad jau nemokamai prieinamos jos sukurtos šešios interaktyvios rizikos vertinimo (OiRa) priemonės. Šios priemonės turėtų padėti labai mažoms ir mažoms Bulgarijos įmonėms įvertinti darbo vietose kylančią riziką. Jos skirtos statybų, miškininkystės, telekomunikacijų, viešo administravimo ir švietimo sektoriams.</p> <p>   Bulgarijos darbo inspekcija baigia rengti dar 24 OiRa priemones. Šį projektas finansuojamas iš Europos socialinio fondo lėšų.</p> <p>   OiRA – tai EU-OSHA sukurta ir prižiūrima žiniatinklio platforma, kuria naudojantis galima sukurti standartizuotą bet kuriam sektoriui tinkančią rizikos vertinimo priemonę.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Išsamesnė informacija apie OiRA</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"mt";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Għodod onlajn ġodda għall-valutazzjoni tar-riskju ppubblikati fil-Bulgarija";"<p>   L-Ispettorat tax-Xogħol Bulgaru ħabbar li ġew żviluppati sitt għodod interattivi Bulgari għall-valutazzjoni tar-riskju (OiRA) u li issa dawn huma aċċessibbli liberament onlajn.  L-għodod huma maħsuba biex jgħinu lill-intrapriżi żgħar u lil dawk mikro fil-Bulgarija sabiex jivvalutaw ir-riskji tagħhom. Is-setturi koperti minn dawn l-għodod huma  il-Kostruzzjoni, il-Forestrija, it-Telekomunikazzjonijiet, l-Amministrazzjoni Pubblika, u l-Edukazzjoni.</p> <p>   L-Ispettorat tax-Xogħol Bulgaru qiegħed jaħdem fuq 24 għodda OiRa oħra, li bħalissa jinsabu fl-aħħar stadju tal-iżvilupp tagħhom bħala parti minn proġett iffinanzjat mill-Fond Soċjali Ewropew.</p> <p>   L-OiRA hija pjattaforma fuq l-internet żviluppata u miżmuma mill-EU-OSHA li tippermetti l-ħolqien ta' għodod settorjali għall-valutazzjoni tar-riskju fi kwalunkwe lingwa b'mod standardizzat.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Itgħallem aktar dwar l-OiRA</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"no";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nye nettbaserte risikovurderingsverktøyer publisert i Bulgaria";"<p>Det bulgarske arbeidstilsynet har meddelt at seks bulgarske risikovurderingsverktøyer (OiRA) nå er utviklet og gratis tilgjengelig på nettet. Formålet er at verktøyene skal hjelpe småbedrifter og mikroforetak i Bulgaria med å vurdere risiko på arbeidsplassen. Sektorene disse verktøyene gjelder, er bygg og anlegg, skogbruk, telekommunikasjon, offentlig forvaltning og utdanning.</p> <p>Det bulgarske arbeidstilsynet arbeider med ytterligere 24 OiRA-verktøyer, som nå er inne i sin siste utviklingsfase som en del av et prosjekt som finansieres av Det europeiske sosialfond.</p> <p>OiRA er en nettplattform som er utviklet og vedlikeholdes av EU-OSHA som gjør det mulig utvikle sektorvise risikovurderingsverktøyer på alle språk på en standardisert måte.</p> <p><a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Lær mer om OiRA</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"pl";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"W Bułgarii opublikowano nowe narzędzie on-line do oceny ryzyka";"<p>   Bułgarska Inspekcja Pracy ogłosiła, że opracowano sześć bułgarskich interaktywnych narzędzi oceny ryzyka (OiRA), które są już bezpłatnie dostępne on-line. Narzędzia te są przeznaczone do pomagania małym i mikroprzedsiębiorstwom w Bułgarii w ocenie ryzyka. Sektory objęte tymi narzędziami to  budownictwo, leśnictwo, telekomunikacja, administracja publiczna i edukacja.</p> <p>   Bułgarska Inspekcja Pracy pracuje nad 24 kolejnymi narzędziami tego rodzaju, które są obecnie w końcowej fazie rozwoju jako część projektu finansowanego z Europejskiego Funduszu Społecznego.</p> <p>   OiRA jest opracowaną i prowadzoną przez EU-OSHA platformą internetową, która umożliwia tworzenie w ustandaryzowany sposób sektorowych narzędzi oceny ryzyka w każdym języku.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Dowiedz się więcej o OiRA</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"pt";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Novas ferramentas de avaliação dos riscos publicadas na Bulgária";"<p>   A autoridade para as condições do trabalho da Bulgária anunciou o desenvolvimento de seis ferramentas interativas de avaliação de riscos (OiRA), já disponíveis online. As referidas ferramentas destinam-se a apoiar as pequenas e médias empresas búlgaras na condução de avaliações de risco. Os setores abrangidos pelas ferramentas são   a construção, a silvicultura, as telecomunicações, a administração pública e a educação.</p> <p>   A autoridade para as condições de trabalho da Bulgária está a trabalhar em mais 24 ferramentas OiRA, que se encontram em fase final de desenvolvimento no quadro de um projeto financiado pelo Fundo Social Europeu. </p> <p>   A OiRA  - plataforma interativa de avaliação dos riscos online - é uma platafaorma baseada na Web desenvolvida e mantida pela EU-OSHA, que permite a criação de ferramentas de avaliação dos riscos em formatos normalizados para setores específicos em qualquer língua.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Saber mais sobre a OiRA</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"ro";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Publicarea în Bulgaria de noi instrumente online de evaluare a riscurilor";"<p>   Inspectoratul de Muncă din Bulgaria a anunţat că au fost dezvoltate şase instrumente bulgare interactive de evaluare a riscurilor (OiRA), care sunt acum disponibile online, gratuit. Scopul instrumentelor este de a acorda asistenţă întreprinderilor mici şi microîntreprinderilor din Bulgaria pentru evaluarea propriilor riscuri. Sectoarele acoperite de aceste instrumente sunt  construcţiile, silvicultura, telecomunicaţiile, administraţia publică şi învăţământul.</p> <p>   Inspectoratul de Muncă din Bulgaria lucrează la alte 24 de instrumente OiRA, care se află acum în ultima fază de proiectare, ca parte a unui proiect finanţat de Fondul social european.</p> <p>   OiRA este o platformă web dezvoltată şi întreţinută de EU-OSHA, care permite crearea de instrumente sectoriale de evaluare a riscurilor în orice limbă, într-un mod standardizat.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Aflaţi mai multe despre OiRA</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"sk";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nové online nástroje na hodnotenie rizík k dispozícii v Bulharsku";"<p>   Bulharský inšpektorát práce oznámil, že bolo vytvorených šesť bulharských online interaktívnych nástrojov na hodnotenie rizík (OiRA), ktoré sú v súčasnosti bezplatne dostupné online. Účelom týchto nástrojov je pomáhať malým a stredným podnikom v Bulharsku pri hodnotení svojich rizík. Tieto nástroje sa týkajú odvetví stavebníctva, lesníctva, telekomunikácií, verejnej správy a vzdelávania.</p> <p>   Bulharský inšpektorát práce pracuje na 24 ďalších nástrojoch OiRA, ktoré sa v súčasnosti nachádzajú vo fáze dokončovania ako súčasť projektu financovaného Európskym sociálnym fondom.</p> <p>   OiRA je webová platforma vytvorená a spravovaná agentúrou EU-OSHA, pomocou ktorej možno štandardizovaným spôsobom vytvárať nástroje na hodnotenie odvetvových rizík v akomkoľvek jazyku.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Ďalšie informácie o OiRA</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"sl";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"V Bolgariji objavljena nova spletna orodja za oceno tveganja";"<p>   Bolgarski inšpektorat za delo je sporočil, da so razvili šest interaktivnih orodij za oceno tveganja (OiRA), ki so sedaj brezplačno na voljo na spletu. Orodja so namenjena malim in mikro podjetjem v Bolgariji kot pomoč pri izvedbi ocene njihovih tveganj.  Gospodarske panoge, ki so vključene v ta orodja, so gradbeništvo, gozdarstvo, telekomunikacije, javna uprava in šolstvo.</p> <p>   Bolgarski inšpektorat za delo pripravlja še 24 drugih orodij za oceno tveganja, ki so sedaj na zadnji stopnji razvoja kot del projekta, financiranega s sredstvi iz Evropskega socialnega sklada.</p> <p>   OiRA je spletno računalniško okolje, ki ga je razvila in ga vzdržuje agencija EU-OSHA ter ki omogoča oblikovanje standardiziranih orodij za oceno tveganja za posamezne sektorje v katerem koli jeziku.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Več informacij o orodju OiRA</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"es";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bulgaria lanza nuevas herramientas de evaluación de riesgos en línea";"<p>   La Inspección búlgara del trabajo ha hecho público el desarrollo de seis herramientas para la evaluación interactiva de riesgos (OiRA). El acceso a dichas herramientas en línea es gratuito. El objetivo que se persigue con las herramientas es ayudar a las microempresas búlgaras a evaluar sus riesgos. Los sectores cubiertos por estas herramientas son  la construcción, la silvicultura, las telecomunicaciones, la administración pública y la educación.</p> <p>   La Inspección búlgara del trabajo está trabajando en otras 24 herramientas OiRA que ya se encuentran en la fase final de su desarrollo como parte de un proyecto financiado por el Fondo Social Europeo.</p> <p>   OiRA es una plataforma web desarrollada y mantenida por la EU-OSHA que permite crear herramientas de evaluación de riesgos sectoriales en cualquier idioma de forma estandarizada.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Ampliar información sobre OiRA</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"sv";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria";"published";"2014-05-06 14:46:45";"2014-07-25 10:42:44";"2014-05-14 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nya webbverktyg för riskbedömning lanseras i Bulgarien";"<p>   Yrkesinspektionen i Bulgarien meddelar att de tagit fram sex nya webbverktyg för riskbedömning (OiRA) som nu finns tillgängliga på internet. De här verktygen har tagits fram för att hjälpa de bulgariska små- och mikroföretagen med sin riskbedömning. Verktygen är anpassade för företag inom branscherna  bygg, skogsbruk, telekommunikation, offentlig förvaltning och utbildning.</p> <p>   Yrkesinspektionen i Bulgarien står i begrepp att lansera ytterligare 24 OiRA-verktyg inom ramen för ett projekt som finansieras av Europeiska socialfonden.</p> <p>   OiRA är en webbaserad plattform som utvecklas och underhålls av EU-Osha och som gör det möjligt att ta fram branschanpassade verktyg för riskbedömning på alla språk och med ett standardiserat innehåll.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/about<@#&>>Läs mer om OiRA</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published-in-bulgaria/OiRA logo.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"en";"";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Welcoming the Italian EU Presidency";"<p>   From1 July 2014, Italy will hold the <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>European Presidency</a> for six months as the first country of a new troika: Italy, Latvia and Luxembourg. Italy will continue the aims of the Greek Presidency and will work to develop long-term future goals for the EU in areas of growth, employment and reform.<br />   Italy’s priorities for further integration and strengthing political union will be key in shaping the EU’s future. The Italian Presidency will run until 31 December 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Visit the Italian Presidency website</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"el";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Καλωσορίζοντας την ιταλική προεδρία της ΕΕ";"<p>   Από την 1η Ιουλίου 2014 και για έξι μήνες η Ιταλία θα ασκεί την <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Ευρωπαϊκή Προεδρία</a>. Η Ιταλία είναι η πρώτη από τις χώρες της νέας τρόικας η οποία αποτελείται από την Ιταλία, τη Λετονία και το Λουξεμβούργο. Η Ιταλία θα εξακολουθήσει να εργάζεται για την επίτευξη των στόχων της ελληνικής προεδρίας και παράλληλα θα καταβάλλει προσπάθειες για την ανάπτυξη  μακροπρόθεσμων μελλοντικών στόχων για την ΕΕ στους τομείς της ανάπτυξης, της απασχόλησης και της μεταρρύθμισης.<br /> Οι προτεραιότητες της Ιταλίας για περαιτέρω ολοκλήρωση και ενίσχυση της πολιτικής ένωσης θα διαδραματίσουν καθοριστικό ρόλο στη διαμόρφωση του μέλλοντος της ΕΕ. Η ιταλική προεδρία θα λήξει στις 31 Δεκεμβρίου 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Επισκεφτείτε την ιστοθέση της ιταλικής προεδρίας</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"bg";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Приветстваме италианското председателство на ЕС";"<p>   От 1 юли 2014 г. Италия ще поеме <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Европейското председателство</a> за шест месеца като първа страна от новата тройка: Италия, Латвия и Люксембург. Италия ще продължи целите на гръцкото председателство и ще положи усилия за разработване на дългосрочни бъдещи цели за ЕС в областта на растежа, заетостта и реформите.<br /> Приоритетите на Италия за задълбочаване на интеграцията и укрепване на политическия съюз ще бъдат важни фактори за изграждане на бъдещето на ЕС.  Италианското председателство ще продължи до 31 декември 2014 г.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Посетете интернет страницата на италианското председателство</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"cs";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vítáme italské předsednictví";"<p>   Od 1. července 2014 bude Itálie pro dobu 6 měsíců vykonávat funkci <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Evropského předsednictví</a>, a to jako první země nové trojky: Itálie, Lotyšsko a Lucembursko. Itálie bude pokračovat v plnění cílů řeckého předsednictví a bude pracovat na rozvoji dlouhodobých budoucích cílů pro EU v oblasti růstu, zaměstnanosti a reforem.<br /> Italské priority další integrace a posilování politické unie budou mít při vytváření budoucnosti EU klíčový význam. Italské předsednictví potrvá do 31. prosince 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Navštivte webové stránky italského předsednictví</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"da";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Velkommen til det italienske EU-formandskab";"<p>   Fra den 1. juli 2014 vil Italien som det første land i en ny trojka, der omfatter Italien, Letland og Luxembourg, have <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>EU-formandskabet</a> for en periode på seks måneder. Italien vil følge op på det græske formandskabs målsætninger og arbejde på at udvikle langsigtede fremtidsmål for EU på områderne for vækst, beskæftigelse og reformer.<br /> De af Italien prioriterede områder for yderligere integration og styrkelse af politisk samarbejde vil være afgørende for udformningen af EU's fremtid. Det italienske formandskab varer indtil den 31. december 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Besøg det italienske formandsskabs websted</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"de";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Begrüßung des italienischen EU-Ratsvorsitzes";"<p>   Am 1. Juli 2014 wird Italien den <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>EU-Ratsvorsitz</a> für sechs Monate übernehmen. Italien wird damit das erste Land des neuen Trios sein, das aus Italien, Lettland und Luxemburg bestehen wird.
