Italien wird die Zielsetzungen des griechischen Ratsvorsitzes weiterverfolgen und seinen Beitrag zur Entwicklung langfristiger Ziele für die Zukunft Europas in den Bereichen Wachstum, Beschäftigung und Reformen leisten.<br /> Die Prioritäten Italiens für den weiteren Ausbau des Binnenmarkts und die Stärkung der politischen Union werden eine wichtige Rolle bei der Zukunftsgestaltung der EU spielen. Der italienische Ratsvorsitz dauert bis zum 31. Dezember 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Besuchen Sie die Website des italienischen Ratsvorsitzes</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"it";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Benvenuto alla presidenza italiana dell'UE";"<p>   Dal 1° luglio 2014 l'Italia eserciterà la <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>presidenza europea</a> per sei mesi come primo di un nuovo trio di paesi: Italia, Lettonia e Lussemburgo. L'Italia porterà avanti le finalità della presidenza greca e continuerà ad adoperarsi per sviluppare obiettivi futuri di lungo periodo per l'UE nei settori della crescita, dell'occupazione e delle riforme.<br /> Le priorità italiane per l'ulteriore integrazione e rafforzamento dell'unione politica saranno fondamentali per configurare il futuro dell'UE. La presidenza italiana terminerà il 31 dicembre 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Visita la pagina web della presidenza italiana</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"sl";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Dobrodošlica italijanskemu predsedstvu EU";"<p>   Italija bo 1. julija 2014 za šest mesecev prevzela <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>predsedovanje Evropski uniji</a> kot prva v novi trojici držav, ki jo sestavljajo: Italija, Latvija in Luksemburg. Nadaljevala bo z uresničevanjem ciljev grškega predsedstva in si prizadevala za uresničitev dolgoročnih ciljev za prihodnost EU na področju rasti, zaposlovanja in reform.<br /> Prednostni nalogi Italije bosta nadaljnje vključevanje in krepitev politične unije, ki sta ključna pri oblikovanju prihodnosti  Evropske unije. Italijansko predsedovanje se bo zaključilo 31. decembra 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Obiščite spletno stran italijanskega predsedstva</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"ro";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bun venit preşedinţiei italiene a UE";"<p>   De la 1 iulie 2014, Italia va deţine <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>preşedinţia europeană</a> timp de şase luni ca prima ţară a unei noi troici: Italia, Letonia şi Luxemburg. Italia va continua obiectivele preşedinţiei greceşti şi va depune eforturi pentru dezvoltarea unor obiective de viitor, pe termen lung, ale UE în sectoarele creşterii, ocupării forţei de muncă şi reformei.<br /> Priorităţile Italiei pentru consolidarea integrării şi a uniunii politice vor fi esenţiale în conturarea viitorului UE. Italia va deţine preşedinţia până la 31 decembrie 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Vizitaţi site-ul preşedinţiei italiene</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"mt";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nilqgħu l-Presidenza Taljana tal-UE";"<p>   Mill-1 ta' Lulju 2014, l-Italja se jkollha l- <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Presidenza Ewropea</a> għal sitt xhur bħala l-ewwel pajjiż tat-trojka ġdida: l-Italja, il-Latvja u l-Lussemburgu. L-Italja se tkompli l-għanijiet tal-Presidenza Griega u se taħdem biex jiġu żviluppati miri futuri fit-tul għall-UE fl-oqsma tat-tkabbir, l-impjiegi u r-riforma.<br /> Il-prijoritajiet tal-Italja għal aktar integrazzjoni u t-tisħiħ tal-għaqda politika se jkunu ewlenin għat-tfassil tal-futur tal-UE. Il-Presidenza Taljana se ddum sal-31 ta' Diċembru 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Żur is-sit tal-PresidenzaTaljana</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"pl";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Przywitanie włoskiej prezydencji UE";"<p>   Od dnia 1 lipca 2014 r. Włochy będą <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>przewodniczyć UE</a> przez sześć miesięcy jako pierwsze państwo trójki: Włochy, Łotwa i Luksemburg. Włochy będą kontynuować cele greckiej prezydencji i zmierzać w kierunku osiągnięcia długoterminowych celów UE w obszarze wzrostu.<br /> Dążenie włoskiej prezydencji do dalszej integracji i wzmocnienia unii politycznej odegra kluczową rolę w kształtowaniu przyszłości UE. Włoska prezydencja będzie trwać do 31 grudnia 2014 r.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Odwiedź witrynę włoskiej prezydencji</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"nl";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Verwelkoming van het Italiaanse voorzitterschap van de EU";"<p>   Vanaf 1 juli 2014 zal Italië zes maanden lang het <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Europese voorzitterschap</a> waarnemen, als eerste land van een nieuwe troika: Italië, Letland en Luxemburg.  Italië zal de streefdoelen van het Griekse voorzitterschap voortzetten en werken aan langlopende Europese doelstellingen op het gebied van groei, werkgelegenheid en hervorming.<br /> Zijn prioriteiten van verdere integratie en versterking van de politieke unie zullen de sleutel vormen voor de toekomst van de EU. Het Italiaanse voorzitterschap loopt tot 31 december 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Bezoek de website van het Italiaanse voorzitterschap</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"lv";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sagaidot Itālijas prezidentūru ES";"<p>   No 2014. gada 1. jūlija Itālija būs <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Eiropas Savienības prezidējošā valsts</a> uz sešiem mēnešiem kā pirmā no prezidējošo valstu trijotnes: Itālija, Latvija un Luksemburga. Itālija turpinās prezidējošās valsts Grieķijas mērķu īstenošanu un strādās, lai nospraustu ES ilgtermiņa mērķus tādās jomā kā izaugsme, nodarbinātība un reformas.<br /> Itālijas prioritātes attiecībā uz politiskās savienības turpmāku integrāciju un stiprināšanu būs galvenās, kas veidos ES nākotni. Itālija būs prezidējošā valsts līdz 2014. gada 31. decembrim.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Apmeklējiet prezidentvalsts Itālijas tīmekļa vietni</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"no";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Velkommen til det italienske EU-formannskapet";"<p>Fra 1. juli 2014 vil Italia ha <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>EU-formannskapet</a> i seks måneder, som det første landet i den nye troikaen, Italia Latvia og Luxembourg. Italia vil videreføre målene fra det greske formannskapet og arbeide for å utvikle langsiktige mål for EU på områdene vekst, sysselsetting og reform.<br /> Italias prioritering av ytterligere integrasjon og styrking av den politiske enhet vil være sentral i utformingen av EUs framtid. Italia har formannskapet fram til 31. desember 2014.</p> <p><a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Gå inn på det italienske formannskapets nettsted</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"hu";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Üdvözöljük az EU olasz elnökségét";"<p>   2014. július 1-től, az új trojka első országaként Olaszország veszi át hat hónapra <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>az uniós elnökséget</a>. Az új trojka három országa: Olaszország, Lettország és Luxemburg. Olaszország folytatja a görög elnökség által felállított célok elérését, és az uniós növekedés, foglalkoztatás és a reformok terén a jövőben hosszú távú célokat határoz meg.<br /> Olaszország prioritásai - a további integráció és a politikai unió erősítése - kulcsfontosságúak lesznek az EU jövőjének alakításában. Az olasz elnökség 2014. december 31-ig tart.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Az olasz elnökség weboldalának megtekintése</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"hr";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Dobrodošlica talijanskom predsjedništvu EU-a";"<p>   Od 1. srpnja 2014. počinje šestomjesečno talijansko <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>predsjedništvo EU-a</a> kao prve zemlje nove trojke:  Italije, Latvije i Luksemburga. Italija će nastaviti s ciljevima grčkog predsjedništva i nastojat će razviti dugoročne buduće ciljeve za EU na području rasta, zaposlenosti i reforme.<br /> Prioriteti Italije za daljnju integraciju i jačanje političke unije imat će ključnu ulogu u oblikovanju budućnosti EU-a. Talijansko predsjedništvo trajat će do 31. prosinca 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Posjetite internetsku stranicu talijanskog predsjedništva</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"et";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tervitame eesistujariiki Itaaliat";"<p>   Alates 1. juulist 2014 on kuus kuud <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Euroopa Liidu eesistujariik</a> Itaalia – esimene uuest kolmikust, kuhu kuuluvad lisaks veel Läti ja Luksemburg. Itaalia jätkab eesistujariigi Kreeka suundumusi ja arendab ELi pikaajalisi tulevikueesmärke majanduskasvu, tööhõive ja uuenduste valdkonnas.<br /> Itaalia prioriteedid integratsiooni suurendamisel ja poliitilise liidu tugevdamisel on ELi tuleviku kujundamise keskmes. Itaalia eesistumine kestab kuni 31. detsembrini 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Eesistujariigi Itaalia veebileht</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"fr";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bienvenue à la présidence italienne de l'UE";"<p>   À compter du 1er juillet 2014, l'Italie assurera la <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>présidence européenne</a> pour une période de six mois, en tant que premier pays de la nouvelle troïka: Italie, Lettonie et Luxembourg. L'Italie poursuivra les mêmes objectifs que la présidence grecque et visera à développer des objectifs futurs à long terme pour l'UE dans les domaines de la croissance, de l'emploi et des réformes.<br /> Les priorités de l'Italie en matière de consolidation de l'intégration et de renforcement de l'union politique seront essentielles pour façonner l'avenir de l'UE. La présidence italienne prendra fin le 31 décembre 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Visiter le site web de la présidence italienne</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"es";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Comienza la Presidencia italiana del Consejo de la UE";"<p>   A partir del 1 de julio de 2014, Italia ostentará la <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Presidencia europea</a> durante seis meses como el primer país de una nueva troika compuesta por Italia, Letonia y Luxemburgo. Italia perseguirá los mismos propósitos que la Presidencia griega y trabajará para desarrollar objetivos futuros a largo plazo para la UE en materia de crecimiento, empleo y reforma.<br /> Las prioridades de Italia de una mayor integración y refuerzo de la unión política serán fundamentales para configurar el futuro de la UE. La Presidencia italiana finalizará el 31 de diciembre de 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Visitar el sitio web de la Presidencia italiana</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"fi";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Italian puheenjohtajuuden käynnistyminen";"<p>   Italia huolehtii 1. heinäkuuta 2014 alkaen <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Euroopan unionin puheenjohtajuudesta</a> kuuden kuukauden ajan yhtenä uuden troikan kolmesta maasta, jotka ovat Italia, Latvia ja Luxemburg. Italia jatkaa Kreikan puheenjohtajuuskauden tavoitteita EU:n pitkäaikaisten kasvu-, työllisyys- ja uudistamistavoitteiden kehittämiseksi.<br /> Italian prioriteetit integraation jatkamiseksi ja poliittisen unionin vahvistamiseksi ovat avainasemassa EU:n tulevaisuuden hahmottelemisessa. Italian puheenjohtajuuskausi jatkuu vuoden 2014 joulukuun loppuun.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Vieraile Italian puheenjohtajuussivustolla</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"is";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ítalska formennskan boðin velkomið";"<p>   Frá 1. júlí 2014 mun Ítalía fara með <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>formennskuna í ráðherraráði ESB</a> í sex mánuði sem fyrsta landið í nýju þríeyki: Ítalía, Lettland og Lúxemborg. Ítalía mun vinna áfram með markmið grísku formennskunnar og mun vinna að því að þróa langtímamarkmið fyrir Evrópusambandið á sviði vaxtar, atvinnumála og endurbóta.<br /> Forgangsmál Ítalíu fyrir frekari samþættingu og styrkingu á ríkjasambandinu er lykillinn að því að móta framtíð Evrópusambandsins.  Formennska Ítalíu er fram til 31. desember 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Fara á vefsíðu formennskuríkisins Ítalíu</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"pt";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Boas-vindas à Presidência italiana da UE";"<p>   A partir de 1 de julho de 2014, a Itália exerce a <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Presidência da UE</a> por um período de seis meses como primeiro dos países do novo Trio de Presidências constituído pela Itália, a Letónia e o Luxemburgo. A Itália dará continuidade aos objetivos da Presidência grega e trabalhará no sentido do desenvolvimento de objetivos futuros de longo prazo para a UE em áreas como o crescimento, o emprego e a reforma.<br /> As prioridades desta Presidência relativas a uma maior integração e ao reforço da união política serão elementos-chave para delinear o futuro da UE. A Itália assume a Presidência da UE até 31 de dezembro de 2014</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Visitar a página Web da Presidência italiana</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"sv";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Italien tar över ordförandeskapet";"<p>   Den 1 juli 2014 tar Italien över stafettpinnen från Grekland och inleder sitt <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>EU-ordförandeskap</a>.  Italien blir därmed först ut i den nya trojkan, som även består av Lettland och Luxemburg. Under sina sex månader som ordförandeland kommer Italien att jobba vidare med de mål Grekland ställt upp, men också utveckla nya långsiktiga framtida EU-mål på områdena tillväxt, sysselsättning och reformer.<br /> Italiens initiativ för fortsatt integration och för en starkare politisk union kommer att vara avgörande för hur EU ska se ut i framtiden.  Det italienska ordförandeskapet löper fram till den 31 december 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Besök det italienska ordförandeskapets webbplats</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"sk";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vítame talianske predsedníctvo";"<p>   Taliansko bude od 1. júla 2014 počas šiestich mesiacov vykonávať funkciu <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>predsedníctva EÚ</a>, a to ako prvá krajina novej trojky: Taliansko, Lotyšsko a Luxembursko. Bude pokračovať v napĺňaní cieľov gréckeho predsedníctva a bude sa usilovať o vypracovanie dlhodobých budúcich cieľov pre EÚ v oblasti rastu, zamestnanosti a reforiem.<br /> Priority Talianska zamerané na ďalšiu integráciu a posilnenie politickej únie budú mať kľúčový význam pre formovanie budúcnosti EÚ.  Talianske predsedníctvo bude trvať do 31. decembra 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.it2014.eu/<@#&>>Navštívte webovú stránku talianskeho predsedníctva</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency/IT Presidency.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"lt";"/en/teaser/welcoming-the-italian-eu-presidency";"private";"2014-05-13 16:00:24";"2014-07-25 10:49:14";"2014-05-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Laukiant Italijos pirmininkavimo ES Tarybai";"<p>   Nuo 2014 m. liepos 1 d. šešis mėnesius <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/italian-presidency<@#&>>Europos Sąjungos Tarybai pirmininkaus</a> Italija – pirmoji iš naujojo trejeto, kurį sudaro Italija, Latvija ir Liuksemburgas. Italija perims tikslus iš pirmininkaujančios Graikijos ir stengsis apibrėžti ilgalaikius ES tikslus augimo, užimtumo ir reformų srityse.<br /> Italijos teikiami prioritetai tolesnei integracijai ir politinės vienybės stiprinimui bus labai svarbūs kuriant ES ateitį. "/en/news/eu-baltic-sea-strategy-sfr-bsac-flagship-project";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-09 11:43:30";"2014-05-09 11:44:02";"2014-05-12 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU Baltic Sea Strategy: SFR-BSAC Flagship Project";"<p>   <@#&>To lay the groundwork to develop a plan to reduce the number of accidents in fisheries<@#&> is a project runing under the EU's Strategy for the Baltic Sea Region.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bsac.dk/ooizzCMS/DA/bsracflagshipproject<@#&>>Find more information and download the report.</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-baltic-sea-strategy-sfr-bsac-flagship-project/fishing.JPG";"";"fisheries, transport";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/the-praise-award-2014";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-09 11:07:07";"2014-05-09 11:16:46";"2014-05-09 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"The PRAISE Award 2014";"<p>   <strong>Promoting best practice in road safety at work</strong></p>  <p>   As part of the <a href=<@#&>http://etsc.eu/projects/praise/?utm_source=ETSC&amp;utm_campaign=e89b6fd595-2014_05_05_praiseaward_launch&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_term=0_3a7b55edbf-e89b6fd595-<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>PRAISE project</a>, ETSC presents annual awards in recognition of organisations that have made an outstanding commitment to improving work-related road safety.</p>";"<p>   The competition is divided into three separate categories according to the size and type of the applicant organisations: SME (Small-Medium Enterprise), large company and public authority. The winners will be chosen by an independent panel of experts appointed by ETSC. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://etsc.eu/projects/praise/praise-award-2014/?utm_source=ETSC&amp;utm_campaign=e89b6fd595-2014_05_05_praiseaward_launch&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_term=0_3a7b55edbf-e89b6fd595-<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Further information</a></p>";"/en/news/the-praise-award-2014/logo_praise_rgb-300x200.jpg";"";"road_transport";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/uk-updated-guidance-on-driving-for-work";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-07 17:54:18";"2014-05-07 17:54:27";"2014-05-09 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"UK - Updated guidance on driving for work";"<p>   Updated guidance from HSE is now available.&nbsp; The new leaflet applies to any employer with employees who drive, or ride a motorcycle or bicycle at work, as well as self-employed people. It also applies to those using their own vehicle for a work-related journey. It emphasises how to follow a ‘Plan, Do, Check, Act’ approach and shows examples of how this approach can be applied to work-related road safety.</p>";"<p>   Among the new recommendations are the need to ensure that the safest vehicles are made available.</p>  <p>   Read the leaflet: <a href=<@#&>http://www.hse.gov.uk/pubns/indg382.pdf<@#&>>http://www.hse.gov.uk/pubns/indg382.pdf</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/sector/road_transport<@#&>>EU-OSHA information on road transport and health and safety</a></p>";"/en/news/uk-updated-guidance-on-driving-for-work/HSE.gif";"";"accident_prevention, road_transport";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"lt";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014 m. gegužės 9 d. Prieš Europos Parlamento rinkimus paminėkime Europos dieną";"<p>   Likus kelioms savaitėms iki <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>2014 m. rinkimų į Europos Parlamentą </a> gegužės 9 d. švenčiame Europos dieną. Tai R. Šumano deklaracijos metinių ir istorinio Europos integracijos proceso pradžios diena.</p>  <p>   Šiais metais Europos darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos agentūros (EU-OSHA ) įnašas į Europos dienos minėjimą yra visoje ES vykdoma Sveikų darbo vietų kampanija, kurios tikslas - suteikti daugiau žinių apie streso ir psichosocialinės rizikos darbe veiksmingo valdymo svarbą.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Sužinokite daugiau apie Europos dieną</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Parsisiųskite 2014&nbsp;m. Europos dienos lankstinuką (ispaniškai)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lt/<@#&>>Kampanija „Saugiose darbo vietose stresas yra valdomas“ </a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"ro";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 mai 2014: Celebrarea Europei în ajunul alegerilor europene";"<p>   Cu doar câteva săptămâni înainte de <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>alegerile europene din 2014</a>, pe 9 mai sărbătorim ziua Europei. Această dată marchează aniversarea „declaraţiei Schuman” şi începutul istoric al integrării europene.</p>  <p>   Anul acesta, EU-OSHA contribuie la celebrarea Zilei Europei prin campania sa pentru locuri de muncă sigure şi sănătoase, aflată în plină desfăşurare, pe întreg teritoriul Europei, o campanie care sensibilizează publicul cu privire la importanţa gestionării eficiente a stresului şi a riscurilor psihosociale la locul de muncă.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Aflaţi mai multe despre Ziua Europei</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Descărcaţi broşura noastră despre Ziua Europei 2014 (în limba spaniolă)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/ro/<@#&>>Campania Managementul stresului pentru locuri de muncă sănătoase</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"pl";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 maja 2014 r.: Świętowanie Europy w przeddzień wyborów do Parlamentu Europejskiego";"<p>   Na kilka tygodni przed <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>wyborami do Parlamentu Europejskiego w 2014 r.</a>, świętujemy dzień Europy, 9 maja. Tego dnia przypada rocznica deklaracji Schumana i data historycznego rozpoczęcia integracji europejskiej.</p>  <p>   W tym roku wkład EU-OSHA w obchody dnia Europy będzie polegał na prowadzeniu na skalę europejską kampanii „Zdrowe i bezpieczne miejsce pracy”, uświadamiającej znaczenie skutecznego zarządzania stresem i zagrożeniami psychospołecznymi w miejscu pracy.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Dowiedz się więcej o Dniu Europy</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Pobierz ulotkę informacyjną o Dniu Europy w 2014 r. (w języku hiszpańskim)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pl/<@#&>>Kampania zarządzania stresem w zdrowych miejscach pracy</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"cs";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. května 2014: oslava Evropy v předvečer evropských voleb";"<p>   Pouze několik týdnů před <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/cs<@#&>>volbami do Evropského parlamentu v roce 2014</a> slavíme 9. května Den Evropy. V tento den si připomínáme výročí „Schumanovy deklarace“ a historické zahájení evropské integrace.</p>  <p>   Letos se agentura EU-OSHA podílí na oslavách Dne Evropy prostřednictvím své právě probíhající celoevropské kampaně Zdravé pracoviště, která si klade za cíl zvýšit povědomí o důležitosti účinného řízení stresu a psychosociálních rizik na pracovišti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_cs.htm<@#&>>Více informací o Dni Evropy</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Stáhněte si náš letáček ke Dni Evropy 2014 (ve španělštině)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/cs/<@#&>>Kampaň Zdravé pracoviště zvládne i stres</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"et";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. mai 2014: Euroopa päeva tähistamine vahetult enne Euroopa Parlamendi valimisi";"<p>   9. mail, vaid mõni nädal enne <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>Euroopa Parlamendi 2014. aasta valimisi</a>, tähistame Euroopa päeva. See on Schumani deklaratsiooni aastapäev ja Euroopa integratsiooni ajalooline algus.</p>  <p>   Käesoleval aastal panustab EU-OSHA Euroopa päeva pidustustesse oma praegu kestva üleeuroopalise tervislike töökohtade kampaaniaga, mille abil teadvustatakse stressi ja psühhosotsiaalsete riskide ennetamise tähtsust töökohal.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Euroopa päeva lisateave</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Laadige alla meie Euroopa päeva teabeleht (eesti keeles)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/et/<@#&>>Kampaania „Tervislikud töökohad – vähem stressi”</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"es";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 de mayo de 2014: Celebración de Europa en vísperas de las elecciones europeas";"<p>   Sólo unas semanas antes de las <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>elecciones europeas de 2014</a>, el 9 de mayo celebramos el Día de Europa. Esta fecha señala el aniversario de la 'Declaración Schuman' y el inicio histórico de la integración europea.</p>  <p>   Este año, EU-OSHA contribuye al Día de Europa por medio de su campaña europea 'Lugares de trabajo saludables', ya en marcha, destinada a sensibilizar sobre la importancia de la gestión eficaz del estrés y los riesgos psicosociales en el lugar de trabajo.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Conocer más sobre el Día de Europa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Descargue nuestro folleto sobre el Día de Europa 2014 (en español)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/es/<@#&>>Campaña <@#&>Trabajos Saludables: Gestionemos el estrés</a><@#&></p>";"";"/es/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 May 2014: Celebrating Europe on the eve of the European elections";"<p>   Only weeks ahead of the <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>2014 European elections</a>, we celebrate Europe Day 9th May. It marks the anniversary of the 'Schuman declaration' and the historical start of European integration.</p>  <p>   This year, EU-OSHA contributes to the Europe Day celebrations through its currently running Europe-wide Healthy Workplaces campaign that raises awareness on the importance of effectively managing stress and psychosocial risks at the workplace.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Know more about Europe Day</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Download our Europe Day 2014 leaflet (in Spanish)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress campaign</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"is";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. maí 2014: Fögnum Evrópu rétt fyrir Evrópukosningarnar";"<p>   Aðeins nokkrum vikum fyrir <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>kosningar til Evrópuþingsins 2014</a> fögnum við Evrópudeginum hinn 9. maí. Hann er til minnis um „Schuman yfirlýsinguna“ og sögulegt upphaf Evrópusamrunans.</p>  <p>   Í ár leggur EU-OSHA sitt af mörkunum til hátíðarhalda Evrópudagsins með núverandi Evrópuherferð sinni Vinnuvernd er allra hagur sem vekur athygli á mikilvægi skilvirkrar stjórnunar á streitu og sálfélagslegum áhættum á vinnustöðum.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Fræðast meira um Evrópudaginn</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Sækja bæklinginn okkar um Evrópudaginn 2014 (á spænsku)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/is/<@#&>>Herferðin Góð vinnuvernd vinnur á streitu</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"it";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 maggio 2014: Celebrazione dell'Europa alla vigilia delle elezioni europee";"<p>   A sole poche settimane dalle <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>elezioni europee 2014</a>, celebriamo la Festa dell'Europa del 9 maggio. Essa rappresenta l'anniversario della <@#&>dichiarazione di Schuman<@#&> e l'avvio storico dell'integrazione europea.</p>  <p>   Quest'anno, l'EU-OSHA contribuisce alle celebrazioni della Festa dell'Europa attraverso l'attuale campagna <@#&>Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri<@#&> in corso in tutta l'Europa e destinata a sensibilizzare circa l'importanza di una gestione efficace dello stress e dei rischi psicosociali sul luogo di lavoro.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Per saperne di più sulla Festa dell'Europa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Scarica il nostro pieghevole Festa dell'Europa 2014 (in spagnolo)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/it/<@#&>>Campagna sulla gestione dello stress <@#&>Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri<@#&></a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"pt";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 de maio de 2014: celebrar a Europa em vésperas de eleições europeias";"<p>   A poucas semanas das <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>eleições europeias de 2014</a>, celebra-se o Dia da Europa, 9 de maio, que marca o aniversário da «Declaração Schuman» e o início histórico da integração europeia.</p>  <p>   Este ano, a EU-OSHA contribui para as comemorações do Dia da Europa através da sua campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis que visa sensibilizar para a importância de uma gestão eficaz do stresse e dos riscos psicossociais no local de trabalho, a decorrer a nível europeu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Saiba mais sobre o Dia da Europa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Descarregue o folheto sobre o Dia da Europa 2014 (em espanhol)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pt/<@#&>>Campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"no";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. mai 2014: Europa feirer seg selv like før europaparlamentsvalget";"<p>   Bare uker før <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>europaparlamentsvalget 2014</a> feirer vi Europadagen 9. mai. Den markerer årsdagen for «Schuman-erklæringen» og det historiske startskuddet for europeisk integrasjon.</p>  <p>   EU-OSHA bidrar i år til Europadagen gjennom sin pågående europeiske kampanje Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø, som fokuserer på å øke bevisstheten omkring forebygging av stress og psykososial risiko på arbeidsplassen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Lær mer om Europadagen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Last ned heftet om Europadagen 2014 (på spansk)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/no/<@#&>><@#&>Gode arbeidsplasser forebygger stress<@#&>-kampanjen</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"lv";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014. gada 9. maijs: Eiropas svinēšana Eiropas vēlēšanu priekšvakarā";"<p>   Tikai dažas nedēļas pirms <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>2014. gada Eiropas vēlēšanām</a> mēs svinam 9.&nbsp;maiju – Eiropas dienu. Tā iezīmē Šūmaņa deklarācijas gadadienu un Eiropas integrācijas vēsturisko sākumu.</p>  <p>   Šogad EU-OSHA sniedz savu ieguldījumu Eiropas dienas svinībās, pašlaik izvēršot Eiropas mēroga Veselīgu darba vietu kampaņu, kas sekmē izpratni par efektīvas stresa un psihosociālo risku pārvaldības nozīmību darba vietā.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Uzzini vairāk par Eiropas dienu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Lejupielādē mūsu 2014. gada Eiropas dienas informatīvo lapu (spāņu valodā)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lv/<@#&>>Veselīgu darba vietu Stresa pārvaldības kampaņa</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"el";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 Μαΐου 2014: Εορτασμός της Ευρώπης την παραμονή των ευρωπαϊκών εκλογών";"<p>   Στις 9 Μαΐου, μόλις μερικές εβδομάδες πριν από <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>τις ευρωπαϊκές εκλογές 2014</a>, εορτάζουμε την Ημέρα της Ευρώπης. Η μέρα αυτή σηματοδοτεί την επέτειο της <@#&>Διακήρυξης Schuman<@#&> και την ιστορική έναρξη της ευρωπαϊκής ολοκλήρωσης.</p>  <p>   Τη φετινή χρονιά, ο EU-OSHA συμβάλλει στους εορτασμούς για την Ημέρα της Ευρώπης μέσω της πανευρωπαϊκής εκστρατείας που διοργανώνει για τους ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώρους εργασίας, η οποία έχει στόχο την ευαισθητοποίηση σχετικά με τη σημασία της αποτελεσματικής διαχείρισης του άγχους και των ψυχοκοινωνικών κινδύνων στον χώρο εργασίας.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Μάθετε περισσότερα για την Ημέρα της Ευρώπης</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Τηλεφορτώστε το ενημερωτικό μας φυλλάδιο για την Ημέρα της Ευρώπης 2014 (στα ισπανικά)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/el/<@#&>>Εκστρατεία για τη διαχείριση του άγχους σε ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώρους εργασίας</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"nl";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 mei 2014: Europa vieren aan de vooravond van de Europese verkiezingen";"<p>   Met nog slechts enkele weken te gaan tot de <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>Europese verkiezingen 2014</a>, vieren we op 9 mei Europadag. Op deze dag wordt de 'verklaring van Schuman' herdacht en daarmee het historische begin van de Europese integratie.</p>  <p>   EU-OSHA doet dit jaar mee aan de Europadag via de lopende Europabrede campagne voor gezonde werkplekken om bekendheid te geven aan het belang van effectief omgaan met stress en psychosociale risico's op het werk.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Meer informatie over Europadag</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Download onze folder over Europadag 2014 (in het Spaans)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/nl/<@#&>>Campagne Gezond werk is werk zonder stress</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"sv";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 maj 2014: Vi firar Europa inför EU-valet";"<p>   Bara några veckor före <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>2014 års val till Europaparlamentet</a> firar vi Europadagen den 9 maj. Det är årsdagen av Schumandeklarationen och det historiska startskottet för den europeiska integrationen.</p>  <p>   I år bidrar EU-Osha till firandet av Europadagen genom sin pågående Europaomfattande kampanj för ett hälsosamt arbetsliv, som sprider kunskapen om vikten av att effektivt förebygga stress och psykosociala risker på arbetsplatsen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Mer om Europadagen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Ladda ned vår broschyr om Europadagen 2014 (på spanska)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sv/<@#&>>Kampanjen Friska arbetsplatser förebygger stress</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"sk";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. máj 2014: oslavy Dňa Európy v predvečer európskych volieb";"<p>   Deň Európy, ktorý v kalendári pripadá na 9. máj, oslávime iba niekoľko týždňov pred <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>voľbami do Európskeho parlamentu v roku 2014</a>. Tento deň si pripomíname výročie Schumanovej deklarácie a historický začiatok európskej integrácie.</p>  <p>   Agentúra EU-OSHA sa tento rok zapája do osláv Dňa Európy prostredníctvom prebiehajúcej celoeurópskej kampane Zdravé pracoviská, ktorej cieľom je zvýšiť informovanosť o význame účinného riadenia stresu a psychosociálnych rizík pri práci.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Viac informácií o Dni Európy</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Prevziať náš leták ku Dňu Európy 2014 (v španielčine)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sk/<@#&>>Kampaň zdravé pracoviská bez stresu</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"mt";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 ta' Mejju 2014: Niċċelebraw l-Ewropa lejliet l-elezzjonijiet Ewropej";"<p>   Ġimgħat biss qabel l-<a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>Elezzjonijiet Ewropej tal-2014</a>, se niċċelebraw Jum l-Ewropa nhar id-9 ta' Mejju. Dan ifakkar l-anniversarju tad-'Dikjarazzjoni ta' Schuman' u l-bidu storiku tal-integrazzjoni Ewropea.</p>  <p>   Din is-sena, l-UE-OSHA se tikkontribwixxi għaċ-ċelebrazzjonijet ta' Jum l-Ewropa permezz tal-kampanja attwali Postijiet tax-Xogħol li Jġibu 'l Quddiem is-Saħħa li tqajjem kuxjenza fuq l-importanza effettiva tal-ġestjoni tal-istress u r-riskji psikosoċjali fuq il-post tax-xogħol.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Sir af aktar dwar Jum l-Ewropa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Niżżel il-fuljett ta' Jum l-Ewropa 2014 (bl-Ispanjol)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/mt/<@#&>>Il-Kampanja Inqas Stress għal Iktar Saħħa fuq ix-Xogħol</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"hr";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. svibnja 2014.: Proslava Dana Europe uoči europskih izbora";"<p>   9. svibnja proslavljamo Dan Europe, samo nekoliko tjedana prije <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>europskih izbora 2014.</a> Ovim se datumom obilježava obljetnica <@#&>Schumanove deklaracije<@#&> i povijesni početak europske integracije.</p>  <p>   Ove godine EU-OSHA doprinosi proslavi Dana Europe svojom tekućom kampanjom za zdrava radna mjesta diljem Europe kojom se podiže svijest o važnosti učinkovitog upravljanja stresom i psihološkim rizicima na radnom mjestu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Saznajte više o Danu Europe</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Preuzmite našu brošuru o Danu Europe 2014. (na španjolskom)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/hr/<@#&>>Kampanja za zdrava radna mjesta i upravljanje stresom</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"de";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. Mai 2014: Europa feiern am Vorabend der Europawahl";"<p>   Nur wenige Wochen vor der <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>Europawahl 2014</a> feiern wir am 9. Mai den Europatag. Er markiert den Jahrestag der „Schuman-Erklärung“ und den historischen Beginn der europäischen Integration.</p>  <p>   Der Beitrag der EU-OSHA zu den Feierlichkeiten zum Europatag besteht in diesem Jahr in ihrer derzeit laufenden europaweiten Kampagne „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“, mit der das Bewusstsein für die Bedeutung eines effektiven Managements von Stress und psychosozialen Risiken bei der Arbeit gestärkt werden soll.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Mehr über den Europatag</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Laden Sie unsere Broschüre zum Europatag 2014 herunter (in Deutsch)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/de/<@#&>>Kampagne „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze – den Stress managen“</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"da";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Den 9. maj 2014  fejres Europa lige inden valget til Europa-Parlamentet";"<p>   Kun uger før <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>valget til Europa-Parlamentet i 2014</a> fejrer vi Europa-dagen den 9. maj. Dagen markerer årsdagen for “Schumann-erklæringen” og det historiske startskud til den europæiske integration.</p>  <p>   I år bidrager EU-OSHA til Europa-dagen gennem sin igangværende europæiske arbejdsmiljøkampagne, som fokuserer på at øge bevidstheden om, forebyggelse af stress og psykosociale risici på arbejdspladsen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Læs mere om Europa-dagen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Download vores brochure om Europa-dagen 2014 (på spansk)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/da/<@#&>>Gode arbejdspladser tager hånd om stress</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"fr";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 mai 2014: célébration de l'Europe à la veille des élections européennes";"<p>   Quelques semaines seulement avant les <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>élections européennes 2014</a>, nous célébrons la Journée de l'Europe, le 9&nbsp;mai. Cette date marque l'anniversaire de la «déclaration Schuman» et le début historique de l'intégration européenne.</p>  <p>   Cette année, l'EU-OSHA apporte sa contribution aux manifestations organisées à l'occasion de la Journée de l'Europe par l'intermédiaire de la campagne «Lieux de travail sains» qu'elle mène actuellement sur l'ensemble du territoire européen afin de sensibiliser le public à l'importance que revêt une gestion efficace du stress et des risques psychosociaux sur le lieu de travail.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>En savoir plus sur la Journée de l'Europe</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Téléchargez notre brochure sur la Journée de l'Europe 2014 (en espagnol)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fr/<@#&>>Campagne sur les risques psychosociaux: mieux prévenir pour mieux travailler</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"bg";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 май 2014 г.: Празнуване на Европа в навечерието на изборите за Европейски парламент";"<p>   На 9 май, само няколко седмици преди <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>изборите за Европейски парламент през 2014 г.</a>, ние празнуваме Деня на Европа. На този ден се отбелязва годишнината от <@#&>Декларацията на Шуман<@#&> и началото на европейската интеграция.</p>  <p>   Тази година EU-OSHA допринася за празненствата по случай Деня на Европа чрез протичащата понастоящем общоевропейска кампания за здравословни работни места, която повишава осведомеността за значението на ефективното управление на стреса и психосоциалните рискове на работното място.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Научете повече за Деня на Европа</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Изтегляне на брошурата <@#&>Ден на Европа 2014<@#&> (на испански език)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/bg/<@#&>>Кампания <@#&>Здравословни работни места<@#&> на тема управление на стреса</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"sl";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9. maj 2014: praznovanje dneva Evrope na predvečer evropskih volitev";"<p>   9. maja, samo dva tedna pred <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>evropskimi volitvami 2014</a>, praznujemo dan Evrope. Na ta dan obeležujemo obletnico podpisa Schumanove deklaracije, ki pomeni zgodovinski začetek evropskega povezovanja.</p>  <p>   Letos bo agencija EU-OSHA k praznovanju prispevala s svojo vseevropsko kampanjo za zdravo delovno okolje, ki trenutno že poteka in s katero želi ozaveščati o pomenu učinkovitega obvladovanja stresa in psihosocialnih tveganj na delovnem mestu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Več o dnevu Evrope</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Prenesite si naš letak o dnevu Evrope 2014 (v španščini)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sl/<@#&>>Kampanja Obvladajmo stres za zdrava delovna mesta!</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"fi";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"9 May 2014: Euroopan juhla Eurooppa-vaalien kynnyksellä";"<p>   Vain parisen viikkoa ennen <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>vuoden 2014 Eurooppa-vaaleja</a> juhlimme Eurooppa-päivää 9. toukokuuta. Päivällä juhlistetaan Schumanin julistuksen vuosipäivää ja Euroopan yhdentymiskehityksen historiallista alkua.</p>  <p>   EU-OSHAn panos tämänvuotisen Eurooppa-päivän juhlistamisessa on viraston meneillään oleva Euroopan laajuinen Terveellinen työ-kampanja, jonka avulla lisätään tietoisuutta stressin ja psykososiaalisten riskien tehokkaan hallinnan tärkeydestä työpaikoilla.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Lisätietoja Eurooppa-päivästä</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>Lataa vuoden 2014 Eurooppa-päivän esite (espanjaksi)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fi/<@#&>>Terveellinen työ -stressinhallintakampanja</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"hu";"/en/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections";"published";"2014-04-24 12:19:43";"2014-07-25 11:41:17";"2014-05-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014. május 9.: Európa ünnepe az európai választások előtt";"<p>   Csupán néhány héttel a <a href=<@#&>http://www.elections2014.eu/en<@#&>>2014. évi európai választások</a> előtt, május 9-én ünnepeljük az Európa Napot. 1950-ben ezen a történelmi napon adta közzé Robert Schuman nyilatkozatát és vette kezdetét az európai integráció.</p>  <p>   Idén az EU-OSHA a jelenleg Európa-szerte folyó, Egészséges munkahelyek kampányával járul hozzá az Európa Naphoz. A kampány a munkahelyi stressz és pszichoszociális kockázatok hatékony kezelésének fontosságára hívja fel a figyelmet.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/about-eu/basic-information/symbols/europe-day/index_en.htm<@#&>>Bővebben az Európa Napról</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/leaflet-for-europe-day-celebration-in-bilbao-2014/view<@#&>>A 2014. évi Európa Nap (spanyol nyelvű) tájékoztatójának letöltése</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/hu/<@#&>>Egészséges munkahelyek - Kezeljük a stresszt! kampány</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/9-may-2014-celebrating-europe-on-the-eve-of-the-european-elections/EU flag.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-osha-announces-the-beta-launch-of-oshwiki";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-06 12:07:40";"2014-05-08 09:27:58";"2014-05-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA announces the Beta launch of OSHwiki";"<p>   OSHwiki is based on the wiki concept (see <a href=<@#&>http://www.wikipedia.org/<@#&>>Wikipedia</a>) of developing an online encyclopedia where accredited authors collaborate to create and share knowledge. A large variety of articles are already available on OSHwiki.</p>";"<p>   EU-OSHA launches this new and innovative way to network online with the OSH community <strong>in Beta</strong>, prior to the planned full launch in August at the XX World Congress on Safety and Health at Work in Frankfurt in order to:</p>  <ul>   <li>    Start creating a community within the OSHwiki environment</li>   <li>    Allow potential accredited authors to engage directly in and help us test the service</li>  </ul>  <p>   We encourage you <a href=<@#&>http://oshwiki.eu/wiki/File:Author_registration.pdf<@#&>>to become an OSHwiki accredited author</a> and promote your and your organisation's work within the community. You will be able to&nbsp; add to the body of OSH knowledge quickly and easily; edit content jointly with others in your network and create new content on topics that interest you. You can also help the OSH community in your area by sharing relevant OSHwiki articles within your organisation and peer network.</p>  <p>   We look forward to welcoming you on the <a href=<@#&>http://oshwiki.eu/wiki/Main_Page<@#&>>OSHwiki platform.</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-osha-announces-the-beta-launch-of-oshwiki/oshwiki.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/echa-201cchemical-safety-and-your-business201d-2013-a-leaflet-in-23-eu-languages";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-07 17:57:04";"2014-05-07 17:57:42";"2014-05-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"ECHA - “Chemical Safety and Your Business” – a leaflet in 23 EU languages";"<p>   Recent surveys and checks by inspectors show that many small companies using chemicals are still unaware of REACH and CLP or may think that the EU’s chemical law does not apply to their business. The leaflet <@#&>Chemical Safety and Your Business<@#&> can help such companies to discover what this is about and to make a start.</p>";"<p>   The leaflet uses simple language to introduce the key concepts of REACH and CLP and offers links for further information. It can be downloaded in each of the EU official languages from the respective version of ECHA’s SME web page.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://fceg.espsrv.com/f/tr.aspx/?&amp;x=pv&amp;6Uh&amp;h=pu1yy/.9aa=y/r/lh&amp;x=pv&amp;=:kjc1sr77&amp;x=pv&amp;629lhbe757jsi.9NCLM<@#&>>ECHA´s SME page</a></p>  <p>   EU-OSHA pages on <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds<@#&>>dangerous substances at work</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds/reach<@#&>>REACH</a> and <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds/clp-2013-classification-labelling-and-packaging-of-substances-and-mixtures<@#&>>CLP</a></p>";"/en/news/echa-201cchemical-safety-and-your-business201d-2013-a-leaflet-in-23-eu-languages/ECHA_logo_new.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances, legislation";"";"";"";""
"/sv/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open";"sv";"/en/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open";"published";"2014-05-05 12:44:04";"2014-05-06 13:10:32";"2014-05-07 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Healthy Workplaces Film Award 2014: Entries are now open";"<p>   EU-OSHA is supporting, for the sixth time, the Healthy Workplaces Film Award for the best documentary on work-related topics. The winning film will be selected during the International Leipzig Festival for Documentary and Animated Film, 27th October - 2rd November 2014.</p>";"<p>   The deadline to submit films is 15 May 2014 for films completed before 1 May 2014, and 10 July 2014 is the final entry deadline.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/hw_film_award_2014<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Film Award 2014</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.dok-leipzig.de/festival/festival-news/?lang=en&amp;<@#&>>DOK Leipzig Festival</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U&amp;list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&>>Watch trailers of the winners 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"/sv/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open/dok_festival_gross.png";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/de/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open";"de";"/en/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open";"published";"2014-05-05 12:44:04";"2014-05-06 13:10:32";"2014-05-07 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Filmpreis „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“ 2014: Einreichung von Filmen jetzt möglich";"<p>   Die EU-OSHA unterstützt zum sechsten Mal den Filmpreis „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“ für den besten Dokumentarfilm zu einem arbeitsbezogenen Thema. Der Gewinnerfilm wird im Rahmen des Internationalen Leipziger Festivals für Dokumentar- und Animationsfilm vom 27. Oktober bis 2. November 2014 ausgewählt. Einsendeschluss für Filme, die vor dem 1. Mai 2014 fertiggestellt werden, ist der 15. Mai 2014. Der endgültige Einsendeschluss ist der 10. Juli 2014.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/competitions/hw_film_award_2014<@#&>>Filmpreis „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“ 2014</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.dok-leipzig.de/festival/festival-news<@#&>>DOK Leipzig Festival</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U&amp;list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&>>Trailer der Gewinnerfilme 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 und 2013</a></p>";"/de/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open/dok_festival_gross.png";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/el/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open";"el";"/en/news/healthy-workplaces-film-award-2014-entries-are-now-open";"published";"2014-05-05 12:44:04";"2014-05-06 13:10:32";"2014-05-07 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Healthy Workplaces Film Award 2014: Entries are now open";"<p>   EU-OSHA is supporting, for the sixth time, the Healthy Workplaces Film Award for the best documentary on work-related topics. "/en/news/mutualia-premiara-las-fotografias-que-mejor-representen-los-valores-de-la-prevencion-de-riesgos-laborales";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-07 16:02:09";"2014-05-07 16:02:50";"2014-05-07 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Mutualia premiará las fotografías que mejor representen los valores de la Prevención de Riesgos Laborales";"<p>   El pasado 28 de abril, coincidiendo como siempre con una fecha tan señalada para la seguridad laboral como el día mundial de la seguridad y salud en el trabajo, se abrió el plazo para enviar fotografías al XI concurso de fotografía sobre Prevención de Riesgos Laborales organizado por Mutualia.</p>  <p>   El espíritu del concurso es destacar, a través de la fotografía los valores de la Prevención de Riesgos Laborales, en cualquiera de sus aspectos, mostrando situaciones de riesgo o buenas prácticas preventivas.</p>";"<p>   Dirigido a todas las personas, aficionados o profesionales que lo deseen, el objetivo final es concienciar contra la siniestralidad laboral y conseguir, entre todos, entornos de trabajo más seguros.</p>  <p>   Las bases del concurso se pueden consultar en: <a href=<@#&>http://www.mutualia.es<@#&>>www.mutualia.es</a></p>  <p>   El plazo para presentar las fotografías finaliza el 30 de mayo de 2014.</p>";"/en/news/mutualia-premiara-las-fotografias-que-mejor-representen-los-valores-de-la-prevencion-de-riesgos-laborales/1-Premio-x-premio-mutualia.jpg";"Fotografía ganadora 2014";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/australian-government-develops-national-road-safety-partnership-programme";"en";"";"published";"2014-05-07 17:49:44";"2014-05-07 17:51:29";"2014-05-07 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Australian government develops National Road Safety Partnership Programme";"<p>   In 2011, the National Transport Commission (NTC) began to engage with the Australian business sector about developing a collaborative program which would encourage more businesses to introduce these types of initiatives. The aim was to highlight the role that business sector -&nbsp; not only the general community and governments - can play in contributing to the National Road Safety Strategy 2011-2020 objective to reduce Australian road deaths and injuries by 30 per cent by 2020.</p>";"<p>   This consultation process revealed a desire from Australian businesses for a national collaborative program on road safety that draws on the strengths of existing programs and initiatives, whilst encouraging better practice, innovation and shared learning.</p>  <p>   A steering committee was established in June 2012, involving some of Australia’s leading businesses.&nbsp; It was heavily involved in the development of a strategy document released in June 2013.</p>  <p>   The National Road Safety Partnership Program will be launched 5 May as part of the Decade of Action for Road Safety Policy</p>  <p>   The programme recognises that promoting road safety is everyone’s responsibility and that the business sector has the ability and financial incentive to help reduce their bottom line through improved road safety initiatives.&nbsp; The National Road Safety Partnership Program offers a collaborative network for Australian organisations to build and implement effective road safety strategies in the workplace. The program is not a prescriptive approach but aims to complement existing safety legislation&nbsp; by providing access to a ‘knowledge bank’ from a diverse network of organisations to given them the resources to implement their own initiatives. The programme aims to provide the medium which will promote the collaboration and sharing of road safety knowledge, initiatives and risk management between businesses, government and researchers.</p>  <p>   Source: ROSPA</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.nrspp.org.au/pages/aboutus<@#&>>The National Road Safety Partnership Programme</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/sector/road_transport<@#&>>EU-OSHA information on road transport</a></p>";"/en/news/australian-government-develops-national-road-safety-partnership-programme/nrspp.gif";"";"accident_prevention, road_transport";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail offers enhanced content to 62 000 subscribers";"<p>   OSHmail, the monthly digital newsletter that delivers occupational safety and health news across Europe, arrives in May with an improved ‘look and feel’.</p>  <p>   It is now easier and quicker for the newsletter’s subscribers to scan the latest OSH news and filter out selected publications displayed on the Agency’s website.</p>  <p>   Not a subscriber yet?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Sign up for OSHmail</a> and <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>tell a friend.</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"no";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail tilbyr forbedret innhold til 62 000 abonnenter";"<p>   OSHmail, det månedlige elektroniske nyhetsbrevet med siste nytt om helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen fra hele Europa, kommer ut i mai med et helt nytt utseende.</p>  <p>   Nå blir det både enklere og raskere for abonnentene å få et kjapt overblikk over de siste HMS-nyhetene og filtrere ut utvalgte publikasjoner fra Arbeidsmiljøorganets nettsted.</p>  <p>   Fortsatt ikke abonnent?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Abonner på OSHmail</a> og <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>fortell en venn.</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"sl";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Glasilo OSHmail 62 000 naročnikom ponuja obogateno vsebino";"<p>   OSHmail, mesečno elektronsko glasilo, ki vsebuje novice s področja varnosti in zdravja pri delu v Evropi, bo maja dobilo novo, izboljšano podobo.</p>  <p>   Naročniki bodo odslej lažje in hitreje poiskali najnovejše informacije o varnosti in zdravju pri delu ter filtrirali izbrane publikacije, objavljene na spletni strani agencije.</p>  <p>   Še niste naročeni?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Naročite se na OSHmail</a> in <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>to priporočite tudi prijatelju.</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"sk";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Spravodajca OSHmail ponúka 62 000 predplatiteľom vylepšený obsah";"<p>   Májové číslo spravodajcu OSHmail, elektronického mesačníka, ktorý prináša správy o BOZP z celej Európy, prichádza s novým vzhľadom a formou.</p>  <p>   Odberatelia si teraz môžu ľahšie a rýchlejšie prezerať najnovšie správy z oblasti BOZP a filtrovať zvolené publikácie zobrazené na webových stránkach agentúry.</p>  <p>   Ešte stále nie ste odberateľom? <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Prihláste sa k odberu spravodajcu OSHmail</a> a <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>odporučte ho priateľovi.</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"sv";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nyhetsbrevet OSHmail ger 62 000 prenumeranter fördjupad information";"<p>   Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyråns e-nyhetsbrev OSHmail, som ger dig senaste arbetsmiljönytt från EU varje månad, får i maj en ny och förbättrad ”form och känsla”.</p>  <p>   Nu blir det lättare för nyhetsbrevets prenumeranter att snabbt ögna igenom de senaste arbetsmiljönyheterna och välja bland de publikationer som läggs ut på EU-Oshas webbplats.</p>  <p>   Vill du prenumerera?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Här kan du anmäla dig till OSHmail</a> och <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>tipsa en vän.</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"mt";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail toffri kontenut miżjud lil 62 000 membru";"<p>   L-OSHmail, il-fuljett mensili diġitali li jxandar aħbarjiet dwar is-sigurtà u s-saħħa fuq il-post tax-xogħol madwar l-Ewropa, jasal f'Mejju b'dehra u kontenut ta' livell ogħla.</p>  <p>   Issa huwa eħfef u aktar veloċi biex il-membri li jirċievu l-fuljett biex jiskennjaw l-aħħar aħbarjiet tal-OSH u jiffiltraw ċerti pubblikazzjonijiet murija fuq is-sit tal-Aġenzija.</p>  <p>   Għadek ma nktibtx biex tibda tirċievi l-fuljett?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Inkiteb għall-OSHmail</a> u <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>stieden ħabib.</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"pl";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail oferuje rozszerzoną treść 62 000 subskrybentom";"<p>   OSHmail, cyfrowy comiesięczny biuletyn BHP publikujący informacje o BHP w całej Europie, w maju pojawi się w odświeżonej formie.</p>  <p>   Teraz subskrybenci biuletynu będą mieli szybszy i łatwiejszy dostęp do najnowszych wiadomości BHP i w ten sposób będą mogli wybrać ulubione publikacje w witrynie Agencji.</p>  <p>   Czy dokonałeś już prenumeraty?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Zarejestruj się w OSHmail</a> i <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>powiadom o tym swoich znajomych.</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"lt";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail naujienlaiškyje, kurį užsisakė 62 000 prenumeratorių, rasite daugiau informacijos";"<p>   OSHmail, Kas mėnesį leidžiamas skaitmeninis naujienlaiškis, kuriame skelbiamos visos ES darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos naujienos, gegužės mėnesį pasirodys nauja išvaizda ir turiniu.</p>  <p>   Užsisakiusieji naujienlaiškį dabar galės lengviau ir greičiau peržvelgti paskutines darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos naujienas ir pasirinkti norimus agentūros interneto svetainėje pateikiamus straipsnius.</p>  <p>   Dar neužsisakėte? <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Užsisakyti OSHmail naujienlaiškį</a> ir <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>pranešti draugui.</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"lv";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail piedāvā paplašinātu saturu 62 000 abonentu";"<p>   OSHmail – ikmēneša digitālais biļetens, kas piedāvā ziņas par darba drošību un veselību Eiropā, ar uzlabotu noformējumu un saturu būs pieejams maijā.</p>  <p>   Tagad biļetena abonentiem ir vieglāk pārlaist skatu jaunākajām OSH ziņām un izvēlēties atsevišķas publikācijas, kas tiek piedāvātas aģentūras tīmekļa vietnē.</p>  <p>   &nbsp;Vēl neesat abonents? <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Abonējiet OSHmail</a> un <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>pastāstiet draugiem.</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
