"/pt/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"pt";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail propõe conteúdos melhorados a 62 000 subscritores";"<p>   O OSHmail, boletim mensal digital de divulgação de informação sobre questões de saúde e segurança em toda a Europa, chega com visual e convivialidade melhorados em maio.</p>  <p>   Os subscritores do boletim poderão passar em revista as últimas notícias de SST e excluir publicações apresentadas no site da Agência, com facilidade e rapidez acrescidas.</p>  <p>   Ainda não é subscritor?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Subscreva o OSHmail</a> e <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>proponha-o a um amigo.</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"ro";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail oferă şi mai multe informaţii pentru 62 000 de abonaţi";"<p>   OSHmail, buletinul informativ digital lunar care vă prezintă noutăţile din domeniul sănătăţii şi securităţii în muncă pe întreg teritoriul Europei, va avea o interfaţă grafică îmbunătăţită începând cu luna mai.</p>  <p>   Acum este mai uşor şi mai rapid pentru abonaţii buletinului informativ să citească ultimele noutăţi în domeniul SSM şi să filtreze publicaţiile selectate, afişate pe site-ul agenţiei.</p>  <p>   Nu v-aţi abonat încă?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Înregistraţi-vă în OSHmail</a> şi <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>spuneţi unui prieten.</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"fr";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail propose des contenus améliorés à 62 000 abonnés";"<p>   Une version améliorée en termes «d'aspect et de convivialité» d'OSHmail, la lettre d'information numérique mensuelle qui fournit des actualités sur la sécurité et la santé au travail dans l'ensemble de l'Europe, arrive en mai.</p> <p>   Il est désormais plus facile et plus rapide pour les abonnés à cette lettre d'information de parcourir les dernières actualités en matière de SST et de filtrer certaines publications affichées sur le site web de l'Agence.</p> <p>   Pas encore abonné?  <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/news/oshmail<@#&>>Inscrivez-vous à OSHmail</a> et <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/news/oshmail/sendto_form<@#&>>parlez-en à un ami.</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"de";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail bietet erweiterten Inhalt für 62 000 Abonnenten";"<p>   OSHmail, der monatliche elektronische Newsletter, der Nachrichten zu Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in ganz Europa liefert, erscheint im Mai in neuer Aufmachung.</p>  <p>   Es ist jetzt für die Abonnenten des Newsletters einfacher, die neuesten Nachrichten zu Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit zu scannen und ausgewählte Veröffentlichungen, die auf der Website der Agentur bereitgestellt werden, herauszufiltern.</p>  <p>   Sie sind noch kein Abonnent?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/news/oshmail/<@#&>>OSHmail abonnieren</a> und <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>mit einem Freund teilen</a>.</p>";"";"/de/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"fi";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail tarjoaa laajennettua sisältöään 62 000:lle tilaajalle";"<p>   Kuukausittain ilmestyvä digitaalinen uutiskirje OSHmail, joka tarjoaa työturvallisuutta ja työterveyttä koskevia uutisia eri puolilta Eurooppaa, ilmestyy toukokuussa asultaan uudistuneena.</p>  <p>   Uutiskirjeen tilaajien on nyt aiempaa helpompaa seurata viimeisimpiä työsuojelu-uutisia ja seuloa esiin haluamiaan julkaisuja viraston verkkosivustolta.</p>  <p>   Oletko jo tilaaja?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Kirjaudu OSHmailin saajaksi</a> ja <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>kerro kumppanille.</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"nl";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail biedt 62 000 abonnees meer materiaal";"<p>   OSHmail, de maandelijkse digitale nieuwsbrief met informatie over veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk in heel Eruopa, komt vanaf mei in een verbeterde opmaak.</p>  <p>   De abonnees op de nieuwsbrief kunnen nu gemakkelijker en sneller het laatste nieuws doornemen en geselecteerde publicaties van de website van het Agentschap uitfilteren.</p>  <p>   Nog geen abonnee? <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Meld u aan voor OSHmail</a> en <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>verstuur aan anderen.</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"hr";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail nudi poboljšani sadržaj  za 62 000 korisnika";"<p>   OSHmail, mjesečni digitalni bilten koji donosi novosti o sigurnosti i zdravlju na radu diljem Europe stiže u svibnju u poboljšanom obliku.</p>  <p>   Pretplatnicima se omogućuje lakše i brže pregledavanje najnovijih vijesti o sigurnosti i zdravlju na radu, kao i filtriranje odabranih publikacija prikazanih na internetskoj stranici Agencije.</p>  <p>   Još niste pretplatnik?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hr/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Prijavite se na OSHmail</a> i <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hr/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>obavijestite prijatelja.</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"hu";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Az OSHmail bővített tartalmat kínál 62 000 olvasónak";"<p>   Az európai munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségvédelmi híreket szolgáltató, havonta megjelenő OSHmail digitális hírlevél májusi száma megújult formában érkezik az olvasókhoz.</p>  <p>   Mostantól könnyebben és gyorsabban lehet a munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségvédelmi híreket végigfutni és az Ügynökség weboldalán megjelenő kiadványok között válogatni.</p>  <p>   Még nem előfizetője a hírlevélnek?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Iratkozzon fel az OSHmail hírlevélre</a> és <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>beszéljen róla barátainak.</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"is";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail býður upp á betra efni fyrir 62 000 áskrifendur";"<p>   OSHmail, mánaðarlega Netfréttabréfið, sem segir fréttir af vinnuverndarmálum um alla Evrópu, kemur út í maí með nýju útliti og áferð.</p>  <p>   Nú er auðveldara og fljótlegra fyrir áskrifendur fréttabréfsins að renna yfir nýjustu fréttir af vinnuverndarmálum og sía út valin rit sem birt eru á vefsíðu stofnunarinnar.</p>  <p>   Ertu ekki áskrifandi?&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/news/oshmail/<@#&>>skráðu þig fyrir OSHmail</a> og <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>segja vini</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"el";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Το δελτίο OSHmail παρέχεται με νέο βελτιωμένο περιεχόμενο σε 62.000 συνδρομητές";"<p>   Το OSHmail, το μηνιαίο ηλεκτρονικό ενημερωτικό δελτίο που παρέχει ειδήσεις για την επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία στην Ευρώπη, θα δημοσιεύεται από τον Μάιο σε βελτιωμένη και πιο εύχρηστη μορφή.</p>  <p>   Οι συνδρομητές του δελτίου μπορούν πλέον να ενημερώνονται ευκολότερα και ταχύτερα για τα τελευταία νέα της ΕΑΥ και να φιλτράρουν τις επιλεγμένες δημοσιεύσεις στον δικτυακό τόπο του Οργανισμού.</p>  <p>   Δεν είστε ακόμη συνδρομητής;&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Εγγραφείτε συνδρομητής στο OSHmail</a> και <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>ενημερώστε τους φίλους σας.</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"cs";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Zpravodaj OSHmail nabízí 62 000 odběratelů vylepšený obsah";"<p>   Květnové číslo zpravodaje OSHmail, elektronického měsíčníku, který přináší zprávy z oblasti BOZP z celé Evropy, přichází s novým vzhledem a formou.</p> <p>   Jeho odběratelé si mohou nyní snadněji a rychleji prohlížet nejnovější zprávy z oblasti BOZP a filtrovat vybrané publikace zobrazené na webových stránkách agentury.</p> <p>   Nepatříte dosud mezi odběratele?  <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Přihlaste se k odběru zpravodaje OSHmail</a> a <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>doporučte jej kamarádovi.</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"et";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail pakub oma 62 000 tellijale täiustatud sisu";"<p>   Igakuine digitaalne uudiskiri OSHmail, mis pakub tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu uudiseid kogu Euroopas, saab maikuust alates uue ilme.</p>  <p>   Nüüd on uudiskirja tellijatel varasemast lihtsam tutvuda tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu värskete uudistega ja filtreerida agentuuri veebilehel kuvatud valitud väljaandeid.</p>  <p>   Kas soovite tellida?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Tellige OSHmail</a> ja <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>rääkige ka sõbrale.</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"bg";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Бюлетинът OSHmail предлага на своите 62 000 абонати подобрено съдържание";"<p>   През май OSHmail, месечният електронен бюлетин с новини за безопасността и здравето при работа в Европа, ще излезе с подобрен изглед.</p>  <p>   Абонатите на бюлетина вече могат по-лесно и по-бързо да преглеждат последните новини относно БЗР и да филтрират подбрани публикации от уебсайта на Агенцията.</p>  <p>   Все още не сте абонат?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Абонирайте се за OSHmail</a> и <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>споделете с приятел.</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"it";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail offre contenuti avanzati a 62 000 abbonati";"<p>   OSHmail, il notiziario digitale mensile che parla di sicurezza e salute sul luogo di lavoro in tutta l'Europa, compare in maggio con una veste grafica migliorata.</p>  <p>   Per gli abbonati del notiziario è ora più facile e rapido scansionare le ultime notizie sulla SSL e filtrare le pubblicazioni selezionate visualizzate sul sito web dell'Agenzia.</p>  <p>   Non sei ancora abbonato? <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Abbonati a OSHmail</a> e <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>comunicalo a un amico.</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"es";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail ofrece mayor contenido a sus 62.000 suscriptores";"<p>   OSHmail, el boletín electrónico mensual que ofrece información sobre seguridad y salud en el trabajo (SST) en toda Europa, presenta en el mes de mayo un renovado y mejor aspecto.</p>  <p>   A partir de ahora, los suscriptores podrán buscar más fácilmente las noticias sobre SST y filtrar las publicaciones que más les interesen de la página web de la Agencia.</p>  <p>   ¿No es suscriptor aún?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Inscríbase en OSHmail</a> y <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>comuníqueselo a un amigo.</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"da";"/en/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers";"published";"2014-04-24 12:46:25";"2014-07-25 10:47:09";"2014-05-05 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"OSHmail tilbyder forbedret indhold til 62 000 abonnenter.";"<p>   OSHmail, det månedlige elektroniske nyhedsbrev med sidste nyt om arbejdsmiljø fra hele Europa, udkommer i maj i en ny og forbedret udgave.</p>  <p>   Det bliver nu lettere og hurtigere for nyhedsbrevets abonnenter at få et hurtigt overblik over de seneste nyheder og vælge blandt de publikationer, som lægges ud på Arbejdsmiljøagenturets websted.</p>  <p>   Er du endnu ikke abonnent?&nbsp; <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/news/oshmail/<@#&>>Abonnér på OSHmail</a> og <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/news/oshmail/sendto_form?utm_source=oshmail&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=oshmail-142<@#&>>fortæl det til en ven.</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/oshmail-offers-enhanced-content-to-62-000-subscribers/oshmail.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"World Day 2014: Safety and Health in the Use of Chemicals at Work";"<p>   28 April is the World Day for Safety and Health at Work and this year's theme is: “Safety and Health in the use of chemicals at work”. The impact of chemical exposures on workers' health is enormous and raising awareness is a key objective of this years’ World Day.</p>  <p>   Other relevant topics -&nbsp; such as restructuring, reconciliation of work and private life, decent working conditions outside the EU - are also discussed in a conference organised by the European Commission on 28 April in which EU-OSHA takes part. The conference aims at fostering a discussion on achieving a forward-looking approach to working conditions, aiming to ensure high levels of quality, safety and equity at work.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Read our blog entry</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=es&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Learn more about the Conference on Working Conditions</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds<@#&>>Access EU-OSHA large collection of information on the dangers of chemicals and the prevention of harm to workers</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"cs";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Světový den 2014: bezpečnost a ochrana zdraví při používání chemických látek v práci";"<p>   Na 28. dubna připadá Světový den bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci, jež se v letošním roce zaměří na téma „bezpečnost a ochrana zdraví při používání chemických látek v práci“. Expozice chemickým látkám má na zdraví pracovníků obrovský dopad a zvyšování povědomí o této problematice je hlavním cílem letošního světového dne.</p>  <p>   Evropská komise pořádá dne 28. dubna za účasti agentury EU-OSHA konferenci, v jejímž rámci zazní i další související témata –&nbsp; například restrukturalizace, sladění pracovního a soukromého života a důstojné pracovní podmínky v zemích mimo EU. Cílem této konference je podnítit diskusi vedoucí k dosažení odpovídající koncepce pracovních podmínek, která by se zaměřila na budoucnost a zajistila by vyšší úroveň kvality a bezpečnosti práce při zachování rovnosti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Přečtěte si náš článek na blogu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Více informací o konferenci zaměřené na pracovní podmínky</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/topics/ds<@#&>>Přístup k rozsáhlému souboru informací agentury EU-OSHA na téma nebezpečnost chemických látek a prevence poškození zdraví zaměstnanců</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"mt";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Jum Dinji 2014: Is-Sigurtà u s-Saħħa fl-Uża tas-Sustanzi Kimiċi fuq ix-Xogħol";"<p>   It-28 ta' April huwa l-Jum Dinji għas-Sigurtà u s-Saħħa fuq ix-Xogħol u t-tema ta' din is-sena hija: <@#&>Is-Sigurtà u s-Saħħa fl-uża tas-sustanzi kimiċi fuq ix-xogħol<@#&>. L-impatt tal-esponimeti tas-sustanzi kimiċi fuq is-saħħa tal-ħaddiema huwa kbir u t-tqajjim ta' sensibilizzazzjoni huwa objettiv ewlieni tal-Jum Dinji ta' din is-sena.</p>  <p>   Temi rilevanti oħra -&nbsp; bħar-ristrutturar, ir-rikonċiljazzjoni bejn ix-xogħol u l-ħajja privata, il-kondizzjonijiet diċenti tax-xogħol barra l-UE - huma diskussi wkoll f'konferenza organizzata mill-Kummissjoni Ewropea fit-28 ta' April li fiha se tieħu sehem l-UE-OSHA. L-għan tal-konferenza huwa li titrawwem diskussjoni dwar il-kisba ta' approċċ li jħares 'il quddiem għall-kondizzjonijiet ta' xogħol, bil-mira li jassigura livelli għolja ta' kwalità, sigurtà u ekwità fuq ix-xogħol.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Aqra l-blog tagħna</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Sir af aktar dwar il-Konferenza dwar il-Kondizzjonijiet tax-Xogħol</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/topics/ds<@#&>>Aċċess għall-kollezzjoni kbira tal-UE-OSHA ta' informazzjoni dwar il-perikli tas-sustanzi kimiċi u l-prevenzjoni mill-ħsara għall-ħaddiema</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"pt";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Dia Mundial 2014: Segurança e saúde na utilização de substâncias químicas no trabalho";"<p>   Em 28 de abril assinala-se o Dia Mundial da Segurança e Saúde no Trabalho, este ano dedicado ao tema «Segurança e saúde na utilização de substâncias químicas no trabalho». O impacto das exposições a substâncias químicas na saúde dos trabalhadores é enorme, pelo que a sensibilização é um objetivo fulcral do Dia Mundial deste ano.</p>  <p>   Outros temas pertinentes -&nbsp; como restruturação, equilíbrio entre a vida profissional e a vida privada, condições de trabalho dignas fora da UE - serão também discutidos numa conferência organizada pela Comissão Europeia em 28 de abril, que conta com a participação da EU-OSHA. A conferência visa promover o debate sobre uma abordagem prospetiva das condições de trabalho, no sentido de garantir níveis elevados de qualidade, segurança e equidade no trabalho.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Leia a nossa entrada no blog</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Mais informações relativas à Conferência sobre Condições de Trabalho</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/topics/ds<@#&>>Aceda ao extenso acervo de informação da EU-OSHA sobre os perigos das substâncias químicas e a prevenção de danos nos trabalhadores</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"bg";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Световен ден 2014 г.: Безопасност и здраве при употребата на химични вещества на работното място";"<p>   28 април е световният ден за безопасност и здраве при работа и темата тази година е: <@#&>Безопасност и здраве при употребата на химични вещества на работното място<@#&>. Въздействието от излагането на влиянието на химичните вещества върху здравето на работниците е голямо и повишаването на осведомеността е основна цел на тазгодишния Световен ден.</p>  <p>   Други важни теми -&nbsp; като преструктуриране, съвместяване на професионалния и личния живот, достойни условия на труд извън ЕС - също се обсъждат на конференцията, организирана от Европейската комисия на 28 април, в която Европейската агенция за безопасност и здраве при работа (EU-OSHA) участва. Конференцията има за цел да насърчи дискусия относно постигане на далновиден подход към условията на труд, за да се гарантира високо качество, безопасност и равнопоставеност на работното място.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Прочетете съобщението в нашия блог</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Научете повече за Конференцията относно условията на труд</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/topics/ds<@#&>>Достъп до подробната информация на EU-OSHA относно опасностите при работа с химични вещества и превенцията на увреждания при работниците</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/bg/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"nl";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Werelddag 2014: veiligheid en gezondheid bij gebruik van chemische stoffen op het werk";"<p>   28 april is de werelddag voor veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk. Dit jaar luidt het thema “Veiligheid en gezondheid bij gebruik van chemische stoffen op het werk”. De blootstelling van werknemers aan chemicaliën heeft een enorme invloed op hun gezondheid. Het vergroten van het bewustzijn hiervan is dit jaar de hoofddoelstelling van de werelddag.</p>  <p>   Tijdens de conferentie die de Europese Commissie op 28 april organiseert en waaraan ook EU-OSHA zal deelnemen, komen verder onderwerpen aan bod als herstructurering, het evenwicht tussen werk en privéleven, en fatsoenlijke arbeidsvoorwaarden buiten de EU. De conferentie is bedoeld om de discussie aan te zwengelen over hoe een toekomstgerichte aanpak van de arbeidsomstandigheden kan worden ontwikkeld die een hoog niveau van kwaliteit, veiligheid en gelijkheid op het werk garandeert.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Lees onze blogbijdrage</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Meer weten over de conferentie over arbeidsomstandigheden</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/topics/ds<@#&>>Toegang tot EU-OSHA's uitgebreide collectie aan informatie over de gevaren van chemicaliën en de preventie van schade voor werknemers</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"de";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Welttag 2014: Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Verwendung von Chemikalien bei der Arbeit";"<p>   Am 28.&nbsp;April findet der alljährliche Welttag für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz am Arbeitsplatz statt. Sein Thema lautet dieses Jahr: „Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Verwendung von Chemikalien bei der Arbeit“. Die Auswirkungen der Exposition gegenüber Chemikalien auf die Gesundheit von Arbeitern sind enorm und eine entsprechende Sensibilisierung ist ein vorrangiges Ziel des diesjährigen Welttags.</p>  <p>   Weitere wichtige Themen –&nbsp; wie z.&nbsp;B. Restrukturierung, Vereinbarkeit von Arbeit und Privatleben, angemessene Arbeitsbedingungen außerhalb der EU – werden ebenfalls auf einer von der Europäischen Kommission veranstalteten Konferenz am 28. April, an der die EU-OSHA teilnimmt, erörtert. Ziel der Konferenz ist die Förderung einer Diskussion über Wege zu einem proaktiven Ansatz in Bezug auf Arbeitsbedingungen, die Sicherstellung hoher Standards für Qualität, Sicherheit und Fairness bei der Arbeit.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Lesen Sie unseren Blog-Eintrag</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Erfahren Sie mehr zur Konferenz über die Arbeitsbedingungen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/topics/ds<@#&>>Greifen Sie auf eine umfangreiche Informationssammlung der EU-OSHA zu den Gefahren durch Chemikalien und die Verhinderung einer Gefährdung von Arbeitern zu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/de/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"da";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"International arbejdsmiljødag 2014: sikkerhed og sundhed i forbindelse med anvendelse af kemikalier på arbejdspladsen";"<p>   Den 28.&nbsp;april er den internationale arbejdsmiljødag, og dette års tema er sikkerhed og sundhed i forbindelse med anvendelse af kemikalier på arbejdspladsen. Eksponering for kemikalier har en meget stor indvirkning på arbejdstagernes sundhed, og en af hovedmålsætningerne for dette års internationale arbejdsmiljødag er at skabe øget bevidsthed om dette problem.</p>  <p>   Andre relevante emner -&nbsp; såsom omstrukturering, forening af arbejds- og familieliv og anstændige arbejdsvilkår uden for EU - bliver også drøftet på en konference tilrettelagt af Europa-Kommissionen den 28.&nbsp;april, hvor EU-OSHA deltager. Konferencen har til formål at fremme en debat om, hvordan man opnår en fremadrettet tilgang til arbejdsvilkår med henblik på at sikre et højt niveau af kvalitet, sikkerhed og rimelighed på arbejdspladsen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/acl_users/credentials_cookie_auth/require_login?came_from=https%3A//osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work&amp;set_language=da<@#&>>Læs vores blogindlæg</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Få flere oplysninger om konferencen om arbejdsvilkår</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/topics/ds<@#&>>Få adgang til EU-OSHA's omfattende samling af information om farerne ved kemikalier og forebyggelse af skader på arbejdstagere</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/da/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"lt";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014 m. pasaulinė diena. Sauga ir sveikata naudojant chemines medžiagas darbe";"<p>   Šių metų balandžio 28&nbsp;d. minimos pasaulinės darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos dienos tema&nbsp;– „Sauga ir sveikata naudojant chemines medžiagas darbe“. Cheminių medžiagų poveikis darbuotojų sveikatai&nbsp;– didžiulis, todėl šiais metais pasaulinę darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos dieną pagrindinis tikslas yra didinti žmonių informuotumą šiuo klausimu.</p>  <p>   Europos Komisijos balandžio 28&nbsp;d. organizuojamoje konferencijoje, kurioje dalyvauja EU-OSHA, aptariami ir kiti aktualūs klausimai, kaip antai&nbsp; restruktūrizacija, darbo ir asmeninio gyvenimo derinimas ir tinkamos darbo sąlygos už ES ribų. Konferencijos tikslas&nbsp;– paskatinti diskusijas apie tai, kaip įtvirtinti pažangų požiūrį į darbo sąlygas, kuriuo būtų siekiama užtikrinti aukštą kokybės, saugumo ir lygybės darbe lygį.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Skaityti įrašą mūsų tinklaraštyje</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Plačiau apie konferenciją darbo sąlygų tema</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/topics/ds<@#&>>EU-OSHA informacijos rinkinys apie cheminių medžiagų keliamus pavojus ir žalos darbuotojams prevenciją</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"sk";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Svetový deň 2014: bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri používaní chemických látok pri práci";"<p>   28. apríl je Svetovým dňom bezpečnosti a&nbsp;ochrany zdravia pri práci a jeho témou na tento rok je bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri používaní chemických látok pri práci. Expozícia chemickým látkam má nesmierny vplyv na zdravie zamestnancov, a preto je jedným z hlavných cieľov tohoročného Svetového dňa zvyšovanie povedomia o tomto probléme.</p>  <p>   Ďalšie súvisiace témy, ako sú reštrukturalizácia, zosúladenie pracovného a súkromného života, dôstojné pracovné podmienky mimo EÚ, sú tiež predmetom rokovaní na konferencii organizovanej Európskou komisiou, ktorá sa uskutoční 28. apríla a na ktorej sa zúčastní aj agentúra EU-OSHA. Táto konferencia je zameraná na posilnenie dialógu o vytvorení perspektívneho prístupu v oblasti pracovných podmienok, zameraného na dosiahnutie vysokej úrovne kvality, bezpečnosti a dôstojnosti pri práci.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Prečítajte si náš článok </a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Viac informácií o konferencii o pracovných podmienkach</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/topics/ds<@#&>>Prístup k veľkému súboru informácií agentúry EU-OSHA o nebezpečenstvách súvisiacich s chemickými látkami a o predchádzaní poškodeniu zdravia zamestnancov</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"pl";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Światowy Dzień 2014: Stosowanie chemikaliów w pracy przy zachowaniu zasad bezpieczeństwa i zdrowia";"<p>   28 kwietnia jest Światowym Dniem Bezpieczeństwa i Ochrony Zdrowia w Pracy, a tematem przewodnim w tym roku jest: „Zachowanie bezpieczeństwa i higieny w stosowaniu chemikaliów pracy”. Narażenie pracowników na chemikalia ma ogromny wpływ na ich zdrowie, a zwiększanie świadomości jest kpriorytetem tegorocznego Dnia Światowego.</p>  <p>   Inne istotne tematy -&nbsp; jak np. restrukturyzacja, godzenie życia zawodowego z prywatnym, przyzwoite warunki pracy poza UE - zostaną również poddane pod dyskusję podczas konferencji zorganizowanej przez Komisję Europejską w dniu 28 kwietnia br. z udziałem EU-OSHA. Konferencja ma zachęcić do dyskusji, której celem jest wypracowanie przyszłościowego podejścia do warunków pracy zapewniających wysoki poziom jakości, bezpieczeństwa i równości w pracy.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Przeczytaj wpis na naszym blogu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Dowiedz się więcej o konferencji na temat warunków pracy</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/topics/ds<@#&>>Uzyskaj dostęp do obszernego zbioru danych EU-OSHA na temat zagrożeń związanych z chemikaliami oraz o sposobach zapobiegania usczerbkom za zdrowiu pracowników</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"fr";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Journée mondiale 2014: la sécurité et la santé dans l'utilisation des produits chimiques au travail";"<p>   La Journée mondiale de la sécurité et de la santé au travail, célébrée le 28 avril, a cette année pour thème «la sécurité et la santé dans l'utilisation des produits chimiques au travail». Son objectif majeur est, cette année, est de faire prendre conscience du fait que les expositions aux produits chimiques ont un impact considérable sur la santé de travailleurs.</p>  <p>   D'autres questions essentielles -&nbsp; telles que l'anticipation et la gestion des restructurations, la conciliation de la vie professionnelle et de la vie privée, le respect de conditions de travail décentes hors de l'UE - seront également discutées dans le cadre d'une conférence organisée par la Commission européenne le 28 avril, à laquelle participera l'EU-OSHA. Cette conférence vise à stimuler l'ouverture d'un débat sur la définition d'une approche prospective de la question des conditions de travail, en vue de favoriser la mise en place d'un haut niveau de qualité, de sécurité et d'équité au travail.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Lire notre article de blog</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>En savoir plus sur la conférence sur les conditions de travail</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/topics/ds<@#&>>Accéder au vaste ensemble de données de l'EU-OSHA sur les dangers que posent les produits chimiques pour les travailleurs et la prévention des risques que ceux-ci encourent</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"sv";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Världsdagen för arbetsmiljö 2014: Säker och hälsosam användning av kemikalier i arbetslivet";"<p>   Den 28 april är det världsdagen för arbetsmiljö och årets tema är säker och hälsosam användning av kemikalier i arbetslivet. Exponeringen för kemikalier får mycket stora konsekvenser för arbetstagarnas hälsa. Det centrala för årets världsdag är att öka medvetenheten om detta.</p>  <p>   Andra ämnen av intresse, &nbsp; som omstrukturering, balans mellan arbete och privatliv och anständiga arbetsvillkor utan för EU, diskuteras också vid en konferens som EU-kommissionen anordnar den 28 april och som arbetsmiljöbyrån deltar i. Konferensen ska främja en diskussion om att skapa en framåtsyftande strategi för arbetsvillkor. Strategin ska garantera en hög grad av kvalitet, säkerhet och rättvisa i arbetslivet.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Läs vår bloggpost</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Läs mer om konferensen om arbetsvillkor</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/topics/ds<@#&>>Här finns vår stora samling av information om farorna med kemikalier och hur man förebygger arbetsskador</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"et";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ülemaailmne tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu päev 2014: tööohutus ja töötervishoid kemikaalide kasutamisel töökohas";"<p>   28.&nbsp;aprill on ülemaailmne tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu päev ning tänavune teema on „Tööohutus ja töötervishoid kemikaalide kasutamisel töökohas”. Kokkupuude kemikaalidega mõjutab oluliselt töötajate tervist ja selle teadvustamine on seekordse ülemaailmse päeva üks põhiteema.</p>  <p>   Ka muid teemasid –&nbsp;näiteks restruktureerimist, töö- ja eraelu sobitamist, inimväärseid töötingimusi väljaspool Euroopa Liitu – arutatakse 28. aprillil Euroopa Liidu korraldataval konverentsil, kus osaleb ka EU-OSHA. Konverentsi eesmärk on toetada arutelu, mis aitaks kujundada töötingimuste tulevikku vaatava käsitlemisviisi ning tagada töökohas hea kvaliteedi, ohutuse ja õiguslikkuse.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Blogikanne</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Töötingimuste konverents</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/topics/ds<@#&>>EU-OSHA teave kemikaaliohtude ja töötajate kaitse kohta</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"es";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Día mundial 2014: la seguridad y la salud en el uso de productos químicos en el trabajo";"<p>   El 28 de abril es el Día mundial de la seguridad y la salud en el trabajo, que este año se celebra bajo el lema: «la seguridad y la salud en el uso de productos químicos en el trabajo» El impacto que la exposición a las sustancias químicas tiene en la salud de los trabajadores es enorme y este año aumentar la sensibilización sobre este tema es un objetivo clave del día mundial.</p>  <p>   Otros aspectos importantes, como la reestructuración, la conciliación de la vida profesional y privada, unas condiciones laborales decentes fuera de la UE, también se analizan en la conferencia organizada por la Comisión Europea el 28 de abril y en la que la EU-OSHA participa. El objetivo de la conferencia es fomentar el debate para adoptar un enfoque orientado al futuro con respecto a las condiciones laborales y poder garantizar altos niveles de calidad, seguridad e igualdad en el trabajo.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Leer nuestra entrada en el blog</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=es&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Ampliar información en relación con la Conferencia sobre las condiciones laborales</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/topics/ds<@#&>>Acceder a la amplia colección de la EU-OSHA de información sobre los peligros de las sustancias químicas y la prevención de la salud de los trabajadores </a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/es/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"it";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Giornata mondiale 2014: Sicurezza e salute nell'utilizzazione di sostanze chimiche sul lavoro";"<p>   Il 28 aprile è la giornata mondiale per la sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro e il tema di quest'anno è: <@#&>Sicurezza e salute nell'utilizzazione di sostanze chimiche sul lavoro<@#&>. L'impatto dell'esposizione alle sostanze chimiche sulla salute del lavoratore è enorme e la sensibilizzazione è un obiettivo chiave della giornata mondiale di quest'anno.</p>  <p>   Altri temi importanti -&nbsp; quali la ristrutturazione, la riconciliazione del lavoro e della vita privata, le condizioni di lavoro decenti al di fuori dell'UE - sono anche oggetto di discussione in una conferenza organizzata dalla Commissione europea il 28 aprile alla quale partecipa l'EU-OSHA. La conferenza mira a stimolare una discussione in vista di conseguire un approccio lungimirante alle condizioni di lavoro, garantendo al contempo livelli elevati di qualità, sicurezza ed equità sul lavoro.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Leggete il nostro blog</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Per saperne di più sulla conferenza sulle condizioni di lavoro</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/topics/ds<@#&>>Accedete alla grande raccolta di informazioni dell'EU-OSHA sul pericolo costituito dalle sostanze chimiche e la prevenzione dei danni ai lavoratori</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"hu";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014-es világnap: Biztonság és egészségvédelem vegyi anyagok munkahelyi alkalmazásával kapcsolatban";"<p>   Minden évben április 28-án kerül sor a Munkahelyi Biztonság és Egészségvédelem Világnapjára, amelynek a témája idén: <@#&>Biztonság és egészségvédelem vegyi anyagok munkahelyi alkalmazásával kapcsolatban<@#&>. A vegyi expozíció dolgozók egészségére gyakorolt hatása óriási, így az idei világnap legjelentősebb célkitűzése az erre való figyelemfelhívás.</p>  <p>   Az Európai Bizottság által április 28-án megrendezésre kerülő, az EU-OSHA részvételével zajló konferencián más, kapcsolódó témákat is megvitatnak a résztvevők, -&nbsp; így a restrukturálás, a munkaidő és magánélet összeegyeztetése, megfelelő munkahelyi körülmények az EU-n kívül témaköre is szóba kerül. A konferencia célja a párbeszéd erősítése a munkakörülmények terén alkalmazott jövőbe tekintő megközelítés elérése érdekében, egyúttal magas szintű minőség, biztonság és egyenlő bánásmód biztosítására törekvéssel a munkahelyeken.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Olvassa el blogbejegyzésünket</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Bővebben a munkakörülményekről szóló konferenciáról</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/topics/ds<@#&>>Belépés az EU-OSHA vegyi anyagokhoz kapcsolódó veszélyekre és ártalommegelőzésre vonatkozó információgyűjteményébe</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"no";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Verdensdagen 2014: Helse og sikkerhet ved bruk av kjemikalier på arbeidsplassen";"<p>   Den 28. april er Verdens arbeidsmiljødag, og årets tema er: “Helse og sikkerhet ved bruk av kjemikalier på arbeidsplassen”. Konsekvensene av kjemikalieeksponering for arbeidstakernes helse er enorme, og det å skape bevissthet omkring dette er et viktig mål for årets verdensdag.</p>  <p>   Også andre relevante emner&nbsp;som omorganisering, balansen mellom arbeid og fritid og anstendige arbeidsvilkår utenfor EU, vil bli drøftet på et seminar som organiseres av Europakommisjonen 28. april, der EU-OSHA vil delta. Konferansen har som mål å skape debatt om hvordan man kan oppnå en framtidsrettet tilnærming til arbeidsvilkår som tar sikte på å sikre et høyt nivå av kvalitet, sikkerhet og likeverd på arbeidsplassen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Les vårt blogginnlegg</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Finn mer informasjon om konferansen om arbeidsvilkår</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/topics/ds<@#&>>Få tilgang til EU-OSHAs store samling av informasjon om farene ved kjemikalier og forebygging av skade på arbeidstakerne</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"is";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Alþjóðadagurinn 2014: Öryggi og heilbrigði við notkun kemískra efna á vinnustöðum";"<p>   28. apríl er alþjóðadagur vinnuverndar og þemað í ár er: „Öryggi og heilbrigði við notkun kemískra efna á vinnustöðum“. Áhrif kemískra váhrifa á heilbrigði starfsmanna eru gríðarleg og því er það meginmarkmið alþjóðadagsins í ár að auka vitund um málefnið.</p>  <p>   Önnur mikilvæg málefni -&nbsp; svo sem endurskipulagning, sameining vinnu og einkalífs, viðunandi vinnuaðstæður utan ESB - eru einnig rædd á ráðstefnu á vegum framkvæmdastjórnar Evrópusambandsins 28. apríl en EU-OSHA tekur þátt í henni. Markmið ráðstefnunnar er að örva umræður um að setja sér framtíðarnálgun varðandi vinnuaðstæður sem miðar að því að tryggja mikil gæði, öryggi og jafnræði á vinnustöðum.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Lesa bloggfærsluna okkar</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Fræðast meira um ráðstefnuna um vinnuaðstæður</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/topics/ds<@#&>>Fá aðgang að miklum upplýsingum EU-OSHA um hættur kemískra efna og fyrirbyggingu slysa á starfsmönnum</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"fi";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"World Day 2014: Työsuojelu ja kemikaalien käyttö";"<p>   28. huhtikuuta vietettävän maailman työsuojelupäivän teemana on tänä vuonna <@#&>Työsuojelu ja kemikaalien käyttö<@#&>. Kemikaaleille altistumisen vaikutus työntekijöiden terveyteen on valtava, ja tietoisuuden lisääminen siitä on tämänvuotisen teemapäivän tärkein tavoite.</p>  <p>   Myös muita asiaan liittyviä aiheita - kuten rakenneuudistus, työ- ja perhe-elämän yhteensovittaminen, työolojen asianmukaisuus EU:n ulkopuolella - käsitellään Euroopan komission 28. huhtikuuta järjestämässä konferenssissa, johon myös EU-OSHA osallistuu. Konferenssilla pyritään virittämään tulevaisuuteen suuntautuvaa keskustelua työoloista työpaikkojen laadun ja turvallisuuden sekä niiden toiminnan oikeellisuuden takaamiseksi.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Lue blogiamme.</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Hanki lisää tietoa työolokonferenssista</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/topics/ds<@#&>>Tutustu EU-OSHAn laajaan kemikaalien vaarallisuutta ja työntekijöiden vahingoittumisen ehkäisemistä käsittelevään tietokokoelmaan</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"sl";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Svetovni dan 2014: Varnost in zdravje pri uporabi kemikalij na delovnem mestu";"<p>   28.&nbsp;april je svetovni dan varnosti in zdravja pri delu, njegova letošnja tema pa je: „Varnost in zdravje pri uporabi kemikalij na delovnem mestu“. Vpliv izpostavljenosti kemikalijam na zdravje delavcev je zelo velik, zato je večja ozaveščenost ključni cilj letošnjega svetovnega dne.</p>  <p>   Druge pomembne teme -&nbsp; kot so restrukturiranje, ravnotežje med zasebnim in delovnim življenjem, spodobne delovne razmere zunaj EU - so prav tako obravnavane na konferenci, ki jo Evropska komisija organizira 28. aprila in pri kateri sodeluje tudi agencija EU-OSHA. Cilj konference je spodbuditi razpravo o tem, kako doseči v prihodnost usmerjen pristop k delovnim razmeram, katerega cilj je visoka raven kakovosti, varnosti in enakosti v delovnem okolju.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Preberite zapise v spletnem dnevniku</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Izvedite več o o konferenci o delovnih razmerah</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/topics/ds<@#&>>Dostopajte do obsežne zbirke informacij agencije EU-OSHA o nevarnostih, povezanih s kemikalijami in preprečevanju škode za delavce</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"el";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Παγκόσμια ημέρα 2014: Ασφάλεια και υγεία κατά τη χρήση χημικών προϊόντων στην εργασία";"<p>   Η 28η Απριλίου είναι η Παγκόσμια Ημέρα για την Ασφάλεια και την Υγεία στην Εργασία και το φετινό θέμα είναι: <@#&>Ασφάλεια και υγεία κατά τη χρήση χημικών προϊόντων στην εργασία<@#&>. Η επίδραση που έχει η έκθεση σε χημικά προϊόντα στην υγεία των εργαζομένων είναι τεράστια και η ευαισθητοποίηση του κοινού είναι πρωτεύων στόχος της εφετινής παγκόσμιας ημέρας.</p>  <p>   Επίσης, σε διάσκεψη που θα διοργανωθεί από την Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή στις 28 Απριλίου και στην οποία θα συμμετάσχει ο EU-OSHA, θα εξεταστούν και άλλα συναφή θέματα -&nbsp; όπως αναδιάρθρωση, συνδυασμός επαγγελματικής και προσωπικής ζωής, αξιοπρεπείς συνθήκες εργασίας εκτός ΕΕ. Η διάσκεψη στοχεύει στην παρότρυνση του διαλόγου, ούτως ώστε να υιοθετηθεί μια μακρόπνοη προσέγγιση στις εργασιακές σχέσεις, η οποία θα εξασφαλίζει υψηλό επίπεδο ποιότητας, ασφάλειας και ισότητας στην εργασία.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Διαβάστε το ιστολόγιό μας</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Μάθετε περισσότερα για τη διάσκεψη για τις εργασιακές σχέσεις</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/topics/ds<@#&>>Πρόσβαση σε μεγάλη συλλογή πληροφοριών του EU-OSHA σχετικά με τους κινδύνους που ενέχουν τα χημικά προϊόντα και την πρόληψη της βλάβης στους εργαζομένους</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/el/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"ro";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ziua mondială 2014: Sănătatea şi securitatea la utilizarea substanţelor chimice la locul de muncă";"<p>   Ziua mondială a sănătăţii şi securităţi la locul de muncă este sărbătorită la 28 aprilie, iar anul acesta tema evenimentului este „Sănătatea şi securitatea la utilizarea substanţelor chimice la locul de muncă”. Impactul expunerii la substanţe chimice asupra sănătăţii lucrătorilor este enorm, iar sensibilizarea publicului este obiectivul cheie al evenimentului din acest an.</p>  <p>   Alte subiecte relevante -&nbsp; precum restructurarea, concilierea dintre viaţa profesională şi cea privată, condiţii de muncă decente în afara UE - sunt, de asemenea, discutate în cadrul unei conferinţe organizate de Comisia Europeană în 28 aprilie, la care participă EU-OSHA. Conferinţa urmăreşte să promoveze o dezbatere despre abordarea de perspectivă a condiţiilor de muncă, pentru a asigura niveluri înalte de calitate, siguranţă şi egalitate în muncă.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Citiţi articolul de pe blogul nostru</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Aflaţi mai multe despre Conferinţa privind condiţiile de muncă</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/topics/ds<@#&>>Accesaţi vasta colecţie de informaţii a EU-OSHA cu privire la pericolele pe care le reprezintă substanţele chimice şi prevenirea impactului acestora asupra sănătăţii lucrătorilor</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"hr";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Svjetski dan 2014.: Sigurna i zdrava primjena kemikalija na radu";"<p>   Dan 28. travnja svjetski je dan sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu, a ovogodišnja tema je <@#&>sigurna i zdrava primjena kemikalija na radu<@#&>. Utjecaj koji izloženost kemikalijama ima na zdravlje radnika iznimno je velik te je podizanje svijesti o tome osnovni cilj ovogodišnjeg svjetskog dana.</p>  <p>   Druge važne teme -&nbsp; poput restrukturiranja, usklađivanja privatnog i profesionalnog života te primjerenih uvjeta rada izvan EU-a također su teme konferencije u organizaciji Europske komisije 28. travnja u kojoj sudjeluje EU-OSHA. Cilj je konferencije podržati raspravu o postizanju pristupa usmjerenog na budućnost u pogledu radnih uvjeta, kako bi se osigurala visoka razina kvalitete, sigurnosti i ravnopravnosti na radu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Pročitajte naš blog na tu temu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Saznajte više o Konferenciji o radnim uvjetima</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds<@#&>>Pregledajte veliki broj podataka EU-OSHA-e o opasnostima od kemikalija i sprječavanju štete za radnike</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"lv";"/en/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work";"published";"2014-04-14 15:20:55";"2014-07-25 10:49:55";"2014-04-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Pasaules diena 2014: Drošība un veselība, strādājot ar ķīmiskām vielām";"<p>   Šogad tēma ikgadējai Vispasaules Darba drošības un veselības dienai, kas notiek 28. aprīlī, ir: <@#&> Drošība un veselība, strādājot ar ķīmiskām vielām<@#&>. Darbinieku veselības pakļaušanai ķīmisko vielu iedarbībai ir milzu nozīme, un informēšana par to ir šī gada Pasaules dienas mērķis.</p>  <p>   Citas saistītās tēmas, piemēram, darba un privātās dzīves pārkārtošana un sabalansēšana, pienācīgi darba apstākļi ārpus ES ir darba kārtībā Eiropas Komisijas 28. aprīlī organizētajā konferencē, kurā piedalās EU-OSHA. Konferences mērķis ir sekmēt diskusiju par to, kā sasniegt uz nākotni orientētu pieeju darba apstākļu jomā, tiecoties pēc augstas kvalitātes, drošības un vienlīdzības darba vietā.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog<@#&>>Izlasiet rakstu mūsu tīmekļa dienasgrāmatā</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=88&amp;eventsId=979&amp;furtherEvents=yes<@#&>>Uzziniet vairāk par Darba apstākļu konferenci</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/topics/ds<@#&>>Piekļūstiet EU-OSHA plašajam informācijas apkopojumam par ķīmisko vielu bīstamību un darbinieku apdraudējuma novēršanu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/world-day-2014-safety-and-health-in-the-use-of-chemicals-at-work/OSH world day.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/working-conditions-new-survey-reveals-deterioration-and-wide-disparities-in-worker-satisfaction";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-25 12:37:22";"2014-04-25 13:00:00";"2014-04-25 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Working conditions: new survey reveals deterioration and wide disparities in worker satisfaction";"<p>   Stress clearly emerges as the most important perceived risk at work (for 53% of working respondents), according to a Eurobarometer survey, which looks at how the quality of work has been affected by the crisis.</p>  <p>   In addition, dissatisfaction regarding workload, pace of work and long working days (more than 13 hours) is more widespread than other issues such as lack of interest in the tasks or inadequate rest periods on a weekly or annual basis.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?langId=en&amp;catId=89&amp;newsId=2063&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&>>Read more</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en<@#&>>Visit the Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress Campaign website</a></p>";"/en/news/working-conditions-new-survey-reveals-deterioration-and-wide-disparities-in-worker-satisfaction/EU.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-updated-guidance-for-downstream-users-translated-into-22-eu-languages-now-available-on-the-echa-website";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-23 11:03:06";"2014-04-23 11:05:08";"2014-04-23 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU - Updated Guidance for downstream users translated into 22 EU languages now available on the ECHA website";"<p>   ECHA has published translations into 22 EU languages of the updated Guidance for downstream users.</p>  <p>   The Guidance was recently revised to take into account and implement the experience and best practice developed and established since the original version was drafted in 2008. In particular, the update addresses the need to provide more and up to date guidance on (i) the application of scaling when checking whether a downstream user's use of a substance is covered by the supplier's exposure scenario, and (ii) the communication of information on the safe use of mixtures.</p>";"<p>   The English version of the updated guidance had already been published immediately after finalisation of the consultation procedure in December 2013. The translations of the full updated guidance in the full range of EU official languages have now been published on the ECHA website.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://fceg.espsrv.com/f/tr.aspx/?&amp;x=pv&amp;6Uh&amp;h=pu1yy/.9aa=x_v/lh&amp;x=pv&amp;=:kjc1srjln577&amp;x=pv&amp;629lhbe757jsm76s:h9jjo&amp;l&amp;x=pv&amp;65e8720e5jd0aijr9j.93c90/de3e9780NCLM<@#&>>Guidance for downstream users</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://fceg.espsrv.com/f/tr.aspx/?&amp;x=pv&amp;6Uh&amp;h=pu1yy/.9aa=x_v/lh&amp;x=pv&amp;=:kjc1sr77&amp;x=pv&amp;629lhbe757js9b7lc7ckior1susssrvx_ob8qutrtyrvq5deihak6g-fdneie590ke9r&amp;bgr:h-06a7&amp;qe9m&amp;x=pv&amp;f-fdnsr0a4g98NCLM<@#&>>Consultation procedure on Guidance</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-updated-guidance-for-downstream-users-translated-into-22-eu-languages-now-available-on-the-echa-website/ECHA_logo_new.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances, legislation";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/cochrane-collaboration-extra-gloves-or-special-types-of-gloves-for-preventing-sharps-injuries-in-healthcare-workers";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-22 15:36:36";"2014-04-22 15:45:18";"2014-04-22 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Cochrane Collaboration: Extra gloves or special types of gloves for preventing sharps injuries in healthcare workers";"<p>   The Cochrane Collaboration recently published two important reviews of the evidence of effectiveness of two&nbsp; needle stick injury prevention strategies.</p>";"<p>   Healthcare workers can hurt themselves accidentally with needles or sharp instruments that have been used in patient care. This carries a small risk that the healthcare worker becomes infected with a viral disease such as hepatitis or HIV. Therefore it is important to prevent blood contact to prevent infection.</p>  <p>   Read the reviews:</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/14651858.CD009573.pub2/abstract<@#&>>Gloves, extra gloves or special types of gloves for preventing percutaneous exposure injuries in healthcare personnel</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/14651858.CD009170.pub2/abstract<@#&>>Blunt versus sharp suture needles for preventing percutaneous exposure incidents in surgical staff</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/14651858.CD009740.pub2/abstract<@#&>>Devices for preventing percutaneous exposure injuries caused by needles in healthcare personnel</a></p>";"/en/news/cochrane-collaboration-extra-gloves-or-special-types-of-gloves-for-preventing-sharps-injuries-in-healthcare-workers/cochrane.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances, health_care, healthcare";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"cs";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Evropské ceny za správnou praxi – výzva k předkládání nominací je nyní otevřená";"<p>   Agentura EU-OSHA vyhlásila 12. ročník Evropských cen za správnou praxi v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci. Na ceny lze nominovat evropské společnosti nebo organizace zavádějící na svých pracovištích opatření pro úspěšné zvládání stresu a psychosociálních rizik.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Přečtěte si tiskovou zprávu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Navštivte část věnovanou udílení cen za správnou praxi</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-cs.pdf<@#&>>Stáhněte si leták Správná praxe</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> na Twitteru</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"et";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Euroopa hea tava auhinnad – konkurss on nüüd avatud";"<p>   EU-OSHA algatas tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu Euroopa hea tava auhindade 12. konkursi. Konkursil oodatakse osalema Euroopa ettevõtjaid või organisatsioone, kes rakendavad töökohal edukalt stressi ja psühhosotsiaalsete riskide vähendamise meetmeid.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Lugege pressiteadet</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Külastage hea tava auhindade erijaotist</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-et.pdf<@#&>>Laadige alla hea tava teabeleht</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> Twitteris</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/et/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"es";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Galardones Europeos a las Buenas Prácticas: la convocatoria de candidaturas ya está abierta";"<p>   La EU-OSHA ha puesto en marcha la duodécima edición de los Galardones Europeos a las Buenas Prácticas en materia de seguridad y salud en el trabajo. Se aceptan candidaturas de empresas u organizaciones europeas que estén aplicando medidas para gestionar con eficacia el estrés y los riesgos psicosociales en sus lugares de trabajo.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Lea la nota de prensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Visite la sección dedicada a los Galardones Europeos a las Buenas Prácticas</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-es.pdf<@#&>>Descargue el folleto sobre los Galardones Europeos a las Buenas Prácticas</a><br />   Síganos en Twitter con <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/es/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"European Good Practice Awards – call for nominations now open";"<p>   EU-OSHA has launched the 12th edition of the European Good Practice Awards in occupational safety and health. The awards welcome applications from European companies or organisations who are implementing measures to successfully manage stress and psychosocial risks in their workplaces.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Visit the Good Practice Award dedicated section</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-en.pdf<@#&>>Download the Good Practice Flyer</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> on Twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"is";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Evrópuverðlaun fyrir góða starfshætti – nú er opið fyrir tilnefningar";"<p>   EU-OSHA heldur nú Evrópuverðlaunin fyrir góða starfshætti á sviði vinnuverndarmála í 12. sinn. Verðlaunin eru opin fyrir fyrirtæki og samtök í Evrópu sem gert hafa ráðstafanir með árangursríkum hætti til þess að hafa stjórn á streitu og sálfélagslegum áhættum á vinnustaðnum.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Lesa fréttatilkynninguna</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Fara á síðuna fyrir verðlaunin fyrir góða starfshætti</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-is.pdf<@#&>>Sækja bæklinginn um góða starfshætti</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> á Twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/is/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
