"/fr/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"fr";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Prix européens de bonnes pratiques - appel à candidatures ouvert";"<p>   L'EU-OSHA a donné le coup d'envoi de la 12e édition des Prix européens des bonnes pratiques en matière de sécurité et de santé au travail. Les prix récompensent des entreprises ou des organisations européennes qui contribuent de façon notable à la prévention du stress et des risques psychosociaux au travail.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Consultez le communiqué de presse</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Visitez la section consacrée aux Prix des bonnes pratiques</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-fr.pdf<@#&>>Téléchargez le dépliant sur les bonnes pratiques</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> sur Twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/fr/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"bg";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Европейски награди за добри практики — поканата за номинации е вече открита";"<p>   EU-OSHA стартира 12-тото издание на Европейските награди за добри практики в областта на безопасността и здравето при работа. Наградите приветстват заявления за кандидатстване от европейски предприятия или организации, които прилагат мерки за успешно управление на стреса и психосоциалните рискове на своите работни места.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Прочетете съобщението за пресата</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Посетете раздела, посветен на Наградите за добри практики</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-bg.pdf<@#&>>Изтеглете листовката „Добри практики“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> в Twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/bg/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"da";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Den europæiske prisuddelingfor god praksis – indkaldelse af ansøgninger nu åben";"<p>   EU-OSHA har lanceret den 12. udgave af den europæiske prisuddeling for god arbejdsmiljøpraksis. I forbindelse med prisuddelingen indhentes der ansøgninger fra europæiske virksomheder eller organisationer, der gennemfører foranstaltninger for en vellykket håndtering af stress og risikofaktorer i det psykiske arbejdsmiljø på deres arbejdspladser.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Læs pressemeddelelsen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Besøg det særlige afsnit om prisuddeling for god praksis</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-da.pdf<@#&>>Download God praksis-folderen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> på Twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/da/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"fi";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Euroopan hyvien käytäntöjen kilpailu – ilmoittautuminen nyt käynnissä";"<p>   Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusvirasto on käynnistänyt 12. kerran työturvallisuutta ja työterveyttä koskevan Euroopan hyvien käytäntöjen kilpailun. Kilpailuun toivotaan ehdotuksia eurooppalaisilta yrityksiltä tai järjestöiltä, jotka toteuttavat toimenpiteitä, joilla stressiä ja psykososiaalisia riskejä voi hallita työpaikoilla onnistuneesti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Lue lehdistötiedote</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Käy hyvien käytäntöjen kilpailun erityisosiossa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-fi.pdf<@#&>>Lataa hyvin käytäntöjen tiedote</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> Twitterissä</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/fi/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"hu";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Európai Helyes Gyakorlat Díj – Elindult a nevezés!";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA 12. alkalommal indította útjára a munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem terén meghirdetett Európai Helyes Gyakorlat Díjért folyó versenyt. A díjakra a munkahelyi stressz és pszichoszociális kockázatok sikeres kezelését lehetővé tevő intézkedéseket bevezető európai vállalatok és szervezetek pályázhatnak.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Sajtóközlemény</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>A Helyes Gyakorlat Díjjal foglalkozó rész</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-hu.pdf<@#&>>A helyes gyakorlatról szóló röplap letöltése</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> aTwitteren.</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"hr";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Europske nagrade dobre prakse – poziv za podnošenje kandidatura je otvoren";"<p>   EU-OSHA pokrenula je dvanaesto izdanje Europskih nagrada dobre prakse u sigurnosti i zdravlju na radu. Nagrade primaju prijave europskih poduzeća ili organizacija koje provode mjere za uspješno upravljanje stresom i psihosocijalnim rizicima na mjestima rada.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hr/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Pročitajte priopćenje za tisak</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hr/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Posjetite odgovarajući dio odjeljka Nagrada dobre prakse</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-hr.pdf<@#&>>Preuzmite letak o dobroj praksi</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> na Twitteru</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/hr/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"de";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Europäischer Wettbewerb für gute praktische Lösungen – Aufforderung zur Einreichung von Beiträgen jetzt offen";"<p>   Die EU-OSHA hat den zwölften Europäischen Wettbewerb für gute praktische Lösungen im Bereich Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit eingeleitet. Der Wettbewerb berücksichtigt Beiträge von europäischen Unternehmen oder Organisationen, die Maßnahmen zum erfolgreichen Management von Stress und psychosozialen Risiken bei der Arbeit umsetzen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Pressemitteilung lesen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Rubrik Europäischer Wettbewerb für gute praktische Lösungen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-de.pdf<@#&>>Download des Faltblatts „Gute praktische Lösungen“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> auf Twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/de/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"lt";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Europos geros praktikos apdovanojimai: paraiškas jau galima teikti";"<p>   EU-OSHA pradėjo 12-uosius Europos geros praktikos apdovanojimus, susijusius su darbuotojų sauga ir sveikata. Apdovanojimų konkurse paraiškų laukiama iš Europos įmonių ar organizacijų, kurios įgyvendina priemones, padedančias sėkmingai valdyti stresą ir psichosocialinę riziką darbo vietoje.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Skaityti spaudos pranešimą</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Apsilankykite specialioje geros praktikos apdovanojimų skiltyje</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-lt.pdf<@#&>>Atsisiųskite geros praktikos lankstinuką</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> „Twitter“ paskyroje</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/lt/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"ro";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Premiile europene pentru bune practici – lansarea apelului pentru nominalizări";"<p>   EU-OSHA a lansat cea de a 12-a ediție a Premiilor europene pentru bune practici în domeniul securității și sănătății în muncă. Acest concurs se adresează întreprinderilor sau organizațiilor europene care, prin măsurile puse în aplicare, reușesc să gestioneze stresul și riscurile psihosociale la locul de muncă.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Citiți comunicatul de presă</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Vizitați secțiunea dedicată Premiilor pentru bune practici</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-ro.pdf<@#&>>Descărcați broșura privind bunele practici</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> pe Twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/ro/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"sv";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Europeiska priset för goda praktiska lösningar – inbjudan att lämna in nomineringar är nu ute";"<p>   EU-Osha har nu inlett den tolfte omgången av tävlingen om Europeiska priset för goda praktiska lösningar. Vi välkomnar ansökningar från Europaomfattande företag eller organisationer som genomför åtgärder för att framgångsrikt förebygga stress och psykosociala risker på arbetsplatsen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Läs pressmeddelandet</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Besök den särskilda avdelningen för Europeiska priset för goda praktiska lösningar</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-sv.pdf<@#&>>Ladda ned foldern om goda praktiska lösningar</a><br />   Följ <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> på twitter</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sv/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"sk";"/en/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open";"published";"2014-04-03 14:51:07";"2014-07-25 14:25:03";"2014-04-18 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Európska cena za dobrú prax – výzva na predkladanie nominácií je už otvorená";"<p>   EU-OSHA odštartovala 12. ročník Európskej ceny za dobrú prax v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia na pracovisku. Do tejto súťaže môžu posielať žiadosti o účasť tie európske podniky alebo organizácie, ktoré prijali opatrenia na úspešné riadenie stresu a psychosociálnych rizík na svojich pracoviskách.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/press/press-releases/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-open-to-organisations-successfully-tackling-workplace-stress<@#&>>Tlačová správa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015<@#&>>Cena za dobrú prax</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/good-practice-award_2014-2015/gpa-flyer-sk.pdf<@#&>>Leták Dobrá prax</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/search?q=%23eumanagestress&amp;src=typd<@#&>>#EUmanagestress</a> na Twitteri</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sk/teaser/european-good-practice-awards-call-for-nominations-now-open/GPAwards.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"es";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA y OSALAN en una visita conjunta al Puerto de Bilbao";"<p>   Como parte de su cooperación regular, la EU-OSHA y el Instituto Vasco de Seguridad y Salud Laborales (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/s94-osalan/es/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) hicieron una visita conjunta al <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Puerto de Bilbao</a>, donde pudieron conocer de primera mano algunas buenas prácticas en prevención de riesgos laborales desarrolladas por el Puerto.</p>  <p>   Fue una oportunidad única para intercambiar experiencias y estrechar lazos, así como para saber más sobre las actividades y proyectos llevados a cabo por las tres organizaciones. La Directora de la EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presentó la campaña <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/es/<@#&>>“Trabajo Saludables: Gestionemos el estrés”</a>, recién estrenada en Bruselas a principios de abril.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Más información</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/es/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"nl";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"pt";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"is";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"it";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"no";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"lv";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"lt";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"el";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"cs";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"et";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"sl";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"hr";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"de";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"da";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"sv";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"sk";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port";"published";"2014-04-14 11:00:56";"2014-07-25 13:40:25";"2014-04-16 08:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA and OSALAN in a joint visit at the Bilbao Port";"<p>   As part of the regular cooperation between EU-OSHA and the Basque Institute for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>http://www.osalan.euskadi.net/<@#&>>OSALAN</a>) a joint visit to <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/index.jsp<@#&>>Bilbao Port</a> was organized to get to know first-hand some of the safety and health good practices implemented by the Port.</p>  <p>   This was a unique opportunity for exchange of knowledge and networking as well as introduction to different activities and projects carried out by the three organizations.</p>  <p>   Director of EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, presented the campaign <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress</a> officially launched in Brussels early April.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.bilbaoport.es/aPBW/web/es/noticias/hemeroteca/2014/agenciasalud.jsp<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/eu-osha-and-osalan-in-a-joint-visit-at-the-bilbao-port/visit to the port.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
