"/en/news/5th-eu-health-prize-for-journalists-winners-announced";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-11 15:16:58";"2014-04-11 15:24:41";"2014-04-11 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"5th EU Health Prize for Journalists: Winners announced";"<p>   The winners of the 5th EU Health Prize for Journalists were announced by Commissioner for Health Tonio Borg at an award ceremony in Brussels.</p>";"<p>   This year, the first prize was awarded to Henk Blanken (Netherlands) on Parkinson's disease.</p>  <p>   The second prize was awarded to Christiane Hawranek and Marco Maurer (Germany) for their article “The Patient Traffickers” on non-regulated medical care across borders.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   Finally, the third prize was awarded to Mette Dahlgaard (Denmark) for her article “Am I Killing Someone?” on a highly hereditary form of cancer.</p>  <p>   Read the <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/rapid/press-release_IP-14-411_en.htm<@#&>>press release</a> and visit the <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/health-eu/journalist_prize/2013/winners/index_en.htm<@#&>>winners’ page of the prize</a></p>";"/en/news/5th-eu-health-prize-for-journalists-winners-announced/P025454000102-989607.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/uk-tuc-the-health-and-safety-of-older-workers-guidance";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-11 12:14:46";"2014-04-11 12:15:19";"2014-04-11 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"UK, TUC: The health and safety of older workers - Guidance";"<p>   There is a higher proportion of older people in Britain now than at any time in recent history and it is likely to increase. We are also seeing changes in the number of older people in the workplace. This guidance will help workplace representatives accommodate for an aging workforce.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.tuc.org.uk/equality-issues/age-equality/workplace-issues/health-and-safety/health-and-safety-older-workers<@#&>>Read more</a></p>";"/en/news/uk-tuc-the-health-and-safety-of-older-workers-guidance/tuc_Logo.gif";"";"ageing, worker_participation";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/efsa-to-renew-its-scientific-committee-and-scientific-panels";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-11 12:44:41";"2014-04-11 12:57:23";"2014-04-11 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EFSA to renew its Scientific Committee and Scientific Panels";"<p>   On 9 April 2014, the European Food Safety Authority launched a call to renew membership of its Scientific Committee and eight of its ten Scientific Panels. The call is addressed to scientists who wish to be considered for membership of the Scientific Committee and the following Scientific Panels:</p>";"<ul>   <li>    Additives and products or substances used in animal feed (FEEDAP)</li>   <li>    Animal health and welfare (AHAW)</li>   <li>    Biological hazards (BIOHAZ)</li>   <li>    Contaminants in the food chain (CONTAM)</li>   <li>    Dietetic products, nutrition and allergies (NDA)</li>   <li>    Genetically modified organisms (GMO)</li>   <li>    Plant health (PLH)</li>   <li>    Plant protection products and their residues (PPR)</li>  </ul>  <p>   The current members of the Scientific Committee and the above-mentioned Scientific Panels are serving a three-year term of office that is due to expire in mid-2015. The new members will be appointed for the following three-year term starting in July 2015.</p>  <p>   To learn more, visit <a href=<@#&>http://www.efsa.europa.eu/en/scpanels/memberscall2011.htm?utm_source=newsletter&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_content=feature&amp;utm_campaign=20140409pr<@#&>>EFSA website</a>.</p>";"/en/news/efsa-to-renew-its-scientific-committee-and-scientific-panels/Efsa.gif";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-osha-will-be-active-at-the-xx-world-congress-in-frankfurt-germany-this-august";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-08 16:25:24";"2014-04-08 16:27:12";"2014-04-10 01:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA will be active at the XX World Congress in Frankfurt, Germany this August";"<p>   EU-OSHA will be very active at the XX World Congress on Safety and Health at Work in Frankfurt, Germany between 24 and 27 August, 2014. As well as holding its own symposium, EU-OSHA staff will be speakers in a number of other sessions, be on the EU-OSHA stand, and be participating in the International Media Festival for Prevention.</p>";"<p>   The EU-OSHA seminar entitled “Prevention of Psychosocial Risks” takes place on Tuesday 26 August at 1600. A fascinating mix of speakers is planned for this event, which complements the new two-year Agency <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Campaign</a> launched in April.<br />   <br />   To attend the World Congress, register at the <a href=<@#&>https://www.safety2014germany.com/<@#&>>Conference website</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-osha-will-be-active-at-the-xx-world-congress-in-frankfurt-germany-this-august/XX World Congress.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/healthy-workplaces-manage-stress-campaign-launch-watch-the-video";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-10 10:48:43";"2014-04-10 10:54:54";"2014-04-10 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Launching the <@#&>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress<@#&> Campaign: Watch the video";"<p>   See the opening remarks by Christa Sedlatschek, EU-OSHA Director at the official launch of the new Campaign <@#&>Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress<@#&>.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qTlhY72Vw34&amp;feature=youtu.be<@#&>>Watch the video.</a></p>";"/en/news/healthy-workplaces-manage-stress-campaign-launch-watch-the-video/campaign launch opr.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/healthy-workplaces-campaign-partnership-meeting-working-towards-a-common-goal";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-10 17:37:27";"2014-04-10 17:39:46";"2014-04-10 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Healthy Workplaces Campaign Partnership meeting: working towards a common goal";"<p>   European and international organisations and companies gathered on 8 April in Brussels to discuss how to get involved in the 2014-15 Campaign, and effectively manage stress and psychosocial risks in the workplace.</p>";"<p>   Leading European occupational safety and health experts showed inspiring presentations and studies, making a strong case for managing psychosocial risks and investing in health and safety in the workplaces. The new Official Campaign Partnership Offer was also presented, featuring new opportunities for learning-exchange, networking&nbsp; and sharing good practices.</p>  <p>   Join us in encouraging others to manage stress and psychosocial risks at work. Become a campaign partner!</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/become-an-official-campaign-partner/campaign-partnership-offer.pdf<@#&>>Get the 2014-15 Official Campaign Partnership Offer</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/euosha/impact-of-stress-and-psychosocial-risks-on-health-and-performance-evidence-at-the-organizational-level<@#&>>See a presentation of Prof. Siegrist: ‘Impact of stress and psychosocial risks on health and performance-Evidence at the organizational level’</a></p>";"/en/news/healthy-workplaces-campaign-partnership-meeting-working-towards-a-common-goal/1404083482_570.jpg";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"bg";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress — кампания на EU-OSHA призовава работодателите и работниците да преодолеят заедно стреса, свързан с работното място";"<p>   EU-OSHA стартира двугодишна кампания в цяла Европа: „Здравословни работни места — управлявай стреса!“.</p>  <p>   В речта си по време на откриването на кампанията в Брюксел Ласло Андор, комисар на ЕС в областта на заетостта, социалните въпроси и приобщаването и заместник-министъра на труда, социалната сигурност и социалното осигуряване на Гърция Василис Кегкероглу, представляващ председателството на Гърция в Съвета на ЕС, призоваха предприятията в Европа да признаят необходимостта от преодоляване на стреса, свързан с работното място. По този начин те ще защитават здравето на своите работници и производителността на своите организации.</p>  <p>   Криста Зедлачек, директор на EU-OSHA, обясни, че работодателите, работниците и техните представители заедно могат успешно да управляват и предотвратяват стреса и психосоциалните рискове, свързани с работното място, и че кампанията „Здравословни работни места“ има за цел да помогне на организациите да направят точно това.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Прочетете прессъобщението</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/bg/<@#&>>Посетете уебсайта на кампанията „Здравословни работни места“</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"hr";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – kampanja EU-OSHA-e poziva poslodavce i radnike da zajedno rješavaju stres povezan s radom";"<p>   EU-OSHA pokreće dvogodišnju europsku kampanju: „Upravljanje stresom za zdrava radna mjesta”.</p>  <p>   Govoreći na pokretanju kampanje u Bruxellesu, László Andor, povjerenik EU-a za zapošljavanje, socijalna pitanja i uključenost, te grčki zamjenik ministra rada, socijalne zaštite i skrbi Vasilis Kegkeroglou, koji je predstavljao grčko predsjedanje Vijećem EU-a, pozvali su europske tvrtke da prepoznaju potrebu bavljenja stresom povezanim s radom. Na taj će način zaštiti zdravlje svojih radnika i produktivnost svojih organizacija.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, direktorica EU-OSHA-e, objasnila je da zajedno poslodavci, radnici i njihovi zastupnici mogu uspješno upravljati i spriječiti stres povezan s radom i psihosocijalne rizike te da cilj kampanje za zdrava radna mjesta upravo i jest pomoći tvrtkama da to čine.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hr/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Pročitajte priopćenje za tisak</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/hr/<@#&>>Posjetite <i>web</i>-stranicu kampanje za zdrava mjesta rada</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"de";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – Kampagne der EU-OSHA fordert Arbeitgeber und Arbeitnehmer zur gemeinsamen Bekämpfung von arbeitsbedingtem Stress auf";"<p>   EU-OSHA startet die europaweite Kampagne „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze – den Stress managen“, die über zwei Jahre laufen wird.</p>  <p>   Beim Kampagnenstart in Brüssel riefen der Europäische Kommissar für Beschäftigung, Soziales und Integration László Andor sowie der griechische Vizeminister für Arbeit und Soziales Vasilis Kegkeroglou als Repräsentant des griechischen EU-Ratsvorsitzes die Unternehmen Europas dazu auf, die Notwendigkeit der Bekämpfung von arbeitsbedingtem Stress anzuerkennen. Dies diene dem Schutz der Gesundheit ihrer Arbeitnehmer wie auch der Produktivität der Unternehmen.</p>  <p>   Die Direktorin der EU-OSHA Dr. Christa Sedlatschek erklärte, dass Arbeitgeber und Arbeitnehmer gemeinsam erfolgreich arbeitsbedingten Stress und psychosoziale Risiken bewältigen und verhindern können. Die Kampagne „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“ unterstütze Unternehmen bei diesem Vorhaben.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Pressemitteilung</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/de/<@#&>>Website zur Kampagne „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"et";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – EU-OSHA kampaania kutsub tööandjaid ja töötajaid võitlema ühiselt tööstressi vastu";"<p>   EU-OSHA algatab kaheaastase üleeuroopalise kampaania „Tervislikud töökohad – vähem stressi”.</p>  <p>   Kampaania avasõnad ütlesid ELi tööhõive-, sotsiaal- ja sotsiaalse kaasatuse volinik László Andor, Kreeka töö-, sotsiaalkindlustuse ja heaolu aseminister Vasilis Kegkeroglou ELi eesistujamaa Kreeka esindajana ning EU-OSHA direktor Christa Sedlatschek, kes kutsusid Euroopa ettevõtjaid üles tunnistama vajadust võidelda tööstressiga. Sellega kaitseksid nad oma töötajate tervist ja organisatsiooni tootlikust.</p>  <p>   EU-OSHA direktor Christa Sedlatschek selgitas, et tööandjad, töötajad ja nende esindajad üheskoos saaksid tööstressi ja psühhosotsiaalseid riske edukalt vähendada ja ära hoida, ning et tervislike töökohtade kampaania aitab organisatsioonidel just seda teha.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Pressiteade</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/et/<@#&>>Tervislike töökohtade kampaania veebileht</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"es";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress: la campaña de la EU-OSHA pide a empresarios y trabajadores que aborden el estrés relacionado con el trabajo.";"<p>   La EU-OSHA lanza una campaña de ámbito europeo y dos años de duración: Trabajos saludables: «Gestionemos el estrés».</p>  <p>   En el lanzamiento de la campaña, que tuvo lugar en Bruselas, el Comisario de Empleo, Asuntos Sociales e Igualdad de Oportunidades de la UE, László Andor, y el Secretario de Estado griego de Trabajo, Seguridad Social y Bienestar, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, en representación de la Presidencia griega del Consejo de la Unión Europea, instaron a las empresas europeas a que reconozcan la necesidad de abordar la cuestión del estrés relacionado con el trabajo. Con ello protegerán la salud de sus trabajadores y la productividad de sus empresas.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, Directora de la EU-OSHA, explicó que con la colaboración de empresarios, trabajadores y representantes de estos se pueden gestionar y prevenir con éxito el estrés relacionado con el trabajo y los riesgos psicosociales, y añadió que el objetivo de la campaña Trabajos saludables es, precisamente, ayudar a las empresas a conseguirlo.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Lea el comunicado de prensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/es/<@#&>>Visite el sitio web de la campaña Trabajos saludables</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"nl";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – Campagne van EU-OSHA roept werkgevers en werknemers op om werkgerelateerde stress te lijf te gaan";"<p>   EU-OSHA start een twee jaar durende campagne in heel Europa: ‘Gezond werk is werk zonder stress!’.</p>  <p>   Tijdens de opening van de campagne in Brussel hebben László Andor, Europees commissaris van werkgelegenheid, sociale zaken en inclusie en Vasilis Kegkeroglou, de Griekse onderminister van arbeid, sociale zekerheid en welzijn als vertegenwoordiger van het Griekse voorzitterschap van de Raad van de Europese Unie, Europese bedrijven opgeroepen te erkennen dat werkgerelateerde stress moet worden aangepakt: dit is niet alleen goed voor de bescherming van de gezondheid van hun werknemers, maar ook voor de productiviteit van hun organisaties.</p>  <p>   De directeur van EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, lichtte toe dat werkgevers, werknemers en hun vertegenwoordigers er, mits zij gezamenlijk optrekken, in kunnen slagen werkgerelateerde stress en psychosociale risico's aan te pakken en te voorkomen, en dat dit precies is waar de campagne 'Een gezonde werkplek' organisaties bij wil helpen.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Lees het persbericht</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/nl/<@#&>>Bezoek de website van de campagne 'Een gezonde werkplek'</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"pl";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – apel do pracowników i pracodawców o podejmowanie wspólnych działań na rzecz zwalczania stresu związanego z pracą wystosowany w ramach kampanii EU-OSHA";"<p>   EU-OSHA rozpoczęła realizację dwuletniej ogólnoeuropejskiej kampanii „Stres w pracy? Nie, dziękuję!”.</p>  <p>   Podczas zorganizowanego w Brukseli wydarzenia inaugurującego kampanię europejski komisarz ds. zatrudnienia, spraw społecznych i zatrudnienia społecznego László Andor oraz zastępca ministra pracy i ochrony socjalnej Grecji Vasilis Kegkeroglou pełniący funkcję przedstawiciela greckiej prezydencji Rady UE wezwali przedsiębiorstwa w Europie do uznania konieczności zwalczania zjawiska stresu związanego z pracą. Podjęcie działań w tym zakresie umożliwi przedsiębiorstwom zapewnienie ochrony zdrowia pracowników oraz wydajności funkcjonowania organizacji.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, dyrektor EU-OSHA, wyjaśniła, że dzięki podejmowaniu wspólnych działań pracodawcy, pracownicy i ich przedstawiciele mogą skutecznie zarządzać stresem i zagrożeniami psychospołecznymi związanymi z pracą i zapobiegać ich występowaniu, a celem kampanii „Zdrowe i bezpieczne miejsce pracy” jest wspieranie organizacji w podejmowaniu działań w tym zakresie.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Zapoznaj się z komunikatem prasowym</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pl/<@#&>>Odwiedź stronę internetową kampanii „Zdrowe i bezpieczne miejsce pracy<@#&></a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"fr";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – la campagne de l'EU-OSHA invite les employeurs et les travailleurs à combattre le stress lié au travail";"<p>   L'EU-OSHA lance une campagne de deux ans à l'échelle européenne: «Les risques psychosociaux: mieux prévenir pour mieux travailler»</p>  <p>   Lors du lancement de la campagne à Bruxelles, László Andor, commissaire européen chargé de l'emploi, des affaires sociales et de l'inclusion, et Vasilis Kegkeroglou, vice-ministre grec à l'emploi, à la sécurité sociale et à la prévoyance représentant la présidence grecque du Conseil de l'Union européenne, ont invité les entreprises européennes à reconnaître la nécessité de combattre le stress lié au travail. De cette manière, elles protègeront la santé de leurs travailleurs et la productivité de leurs organisations.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, directrice de l'EU-OSHA, a expliqué qu'en unissant leurs forces, les employeurs, les travailleurs et leurs représentants peuvent gérer et combattre efficacement le stress lié au travail ainsi que les risques psychosociaux; elle a ajouté que la campagne «Lieux de travail sains» vise à aider les entreprises en ce sens.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Lire le communiqué de presse</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fr/<@#&>>Visiter le site web de la campagne «Lieux de travail sains»</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"hu";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – az EU-OSHA kampánya a munkával kapcsolatos stressz kezelésére szólítja fel a munkáltatókat és a munkavállalókat";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA egész Európára kiterjedő, két éves kampányt indít „Egészséges munkahelyek – Kezeljük a stresszt!” címmel.</p>  <p>   A brüsszeli kampányindító eseményen felszólaló Andor László, az Európai Unió foglalkoztatásért, szociális ügyekért és társadalmi befogadásért felelős biztosa és a görög elnökség képviseletében Vasilis Kegkeroglou görög munkaügyi, szociális biztonsági és jóléti miniszterhelyettes felszólította az európai vállalatokat, hogy ismerjék el a munkával kapcsolatos stressz kezelésének szükségességét. Ezáltal ugyanis nemcsak munkavállalóik egészségét, de a szervezet termelékenységét is óvják.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, az EU-OSHA igazgatója kifejtette, hogy a munkáltatók, a munkavállalók és azok képviselői együtt sikeresek lehetnek a munkával kapcsolatos stressz és pszichoszociális kockázatok kezelésében és megelőzésében, és hogy az „Egészséges munkahelyek” kampány pontosan ebben kíván segítséget nyújtani a különböző szervezeteknek.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Olvassa el a sajtóközleményt</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/hu/<@#&>>Látogasson el az „Egészséges munkahelyek” kampány weboldalára</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"fi";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusviraston kampanjassa kehotetaan työnantajia ja työntekijöitä torjumaan työperäistä stressiä.";"<p>   Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusvirasto käynnistää Euroopan laajuisen kaksivuotisen kampanjan: <@#&>Terveellinen työ – stressi hallinnassa<@#&>.</p>  <p>   Kampanjan avaustilaisuudessa Brysselissä puhuneet työllisyydestä, sosiaaliasioista ja osallisuudesta vastaava Euroopan komission jäsen László Andor ja Kreikan työ-, sosiaaliturva- ja hyvinvointiasioista vastaava varaministeri Vasilis Kegkeroglou, joka edusti Eurooppa-neuvoston puheenjohtajavaltiota Kreikkaa, kehottivat Euroopan yrityksiä tunnustamaan, että työperäistä stressiä on torjuttava. Siten ne voivat suojella työntekijöidensä terveyttä ja organisaationsa tuottavuutta.</p>  <p>   Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusviraston johtaja Christa Sedlatschek totesi, että työnantajat, työntekijät ja heidän edustajansa pystyvät yhdessä hallitsemaan ja ehkäisemään työperäistä stressiä ja psykososiaalisia riskejä ja että Terveellinen työ -kampanjassa pyritään auttamaan organisaatioita juuri siinä.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Lue lehdistötiedote</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Käy Terveellinen työ -kampanjan verkkosivustolla</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"pt";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – A campanha da EU-OSHA exorta empregadores e trabalhadores a enfrentar juntos o stresse relacionado com o trabalho";"<p>   A EU-OSHA procede ao lançamento de uma campanha de dois anos em toda a Europa: «Locais de trabalho saudáveis contribuem para a gestão do stresse».</p>  <p>   Ao discursarem no lançamento da campanha, em Bruxelas, László Andor, Comissário Europeu responsável pela pasta do Emprego, Assuntos Sociais e Inclusão, e Vasilis Kegkeroglou, em representação da Presidência grega do Conselho da UE, exortaram as empresas europeias a reconhecer a necessidade de fazer face ao stresse relacionado com o trabalho. Ao fazê-lo, estarão a proteger, quer a saúde dos seus trabalhadores, quer a produtividade das suas organizações.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, Diretora da EU-OSHA, explicou que, juntos, os empregadores e os trabalhadores e seus representantes podem gerir e prevenir com êxito o stresse relacionado com o trabalho e os riscos psicossociais. Explicou igualmente que a Campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis tem precisamente por objetivo ajudar as organizações nessa matéria.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Leia o comunicado de imprensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pt/<@#&>>Visite o sítio Web da Campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"no";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – EU-OSHA-kampanje oppmuntrer arbeidsgivere og arbeidstakere til å ta tak i arbeidsrelatert stress";"<p>   EU-OSHA lanserer en toårig europeisk kampanje: <@#&>Gode arbeidsplasser forebygger stress<@#&>.</p>  <p>   Under lanseringen av kampanjen i Brussel oppfordret EUs kommissær for sysselsetting, sosiale spørsmål og inkludering, László Andor, og Hellas' viseminister for arbeid, trygd og velferd, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, som representerte det greske formannskapet i EU, europeiske foretak til å erkjenne behovet for å ta tak i problemer knyttet til arbeidsrelatert stress. Ved å gjøre dette bidrar de både til å beskytte arbeidstakernes helse og til å forbedre organisasjonens produktivitet.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, EU-OSHAs direktør, forklarte at arbeidsgivere og arbeidstakere kan lykkes i å håndtere og forebygge arbeidsrelatert stress og psykososial risiko ved å arbeide sammen, og at den nye Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø-kampanjen tar sikte på å hjelpe organisasjoner med å få til nettopp dette.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Les pressemeldingen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/no/<@#&>>Besøk nettstedet for Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø-kampanjen</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"it";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – La campagna dell'EU-OSHA on invita i datori di lavoro e i lavoratori ad affrontare lo stress lavoro-correlato";"<p>   L'EU-OSHA lancia una campagna biennale a livello europeo: <@#&>Insieme per la prevenzione e la gestione dello stress lavoro correlato<@#&>.</p>  <p>   Nel suo intervento in occasione del lancio della campagna a Bruxelles, László Andor, commissario europeo per l'Occupazione, gli affari sociali e l'inclusione e il viceministro greco del Lavoro, della sicurezza sociale e del welfare Vasilis Kegkeroglou, in rappresentanza della Presidenza greca del Consiglio dell'Unione europea, hanno esortato le imprese europee a riconoscere la necessità di affrontare lo stress lavoro-correlato. In questo modo, tuteleranno la salute dei loro lavoratori e la produttività delle loro organizzazioni.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, direttrice dell'EU-OSHA, ha spiegato che insieme i datori di lavoro e i lavoratori possono gestire e prevenire con successo lo stress lavoro-correlato e i rischi psicosociali e che la campagna Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri mira ad aiutare le organizzazioni a fare proprio questo.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Leggi il comunicato stampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/it/<@#&>>Visita il sito dedicato alla campagna Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"cs";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – kampaň EU-OSHA vyzývá zaměstnavatele a pracovníky, aby zvládli stres při práci společně";"<p>   EU-OSHA zahajuje dvouletou celoevropskou kampaň: „Zdravé pracoviště zvládne i stres.“</p>  <p>   László Andor, komisař EU pro zaměstnanost, sociální věci a sociální začlenění, a náměstek řeckého ministra práce a sociálních věcí, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, zastupující řecké předsednictví Rady EU, kteří promluvili při zahájení kampaně v&nbsp;Bruselu, vyzvali evropské podniky, aby uznaly nutnost zvládnout stres při práci. Tak ochrání zdraví svých pracovníků a produktivitu svých organizací.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatscheková, ředitelka EU-OSHA, vysvětlila, že společně mohou zaměstnavatelé, pracovníci a jejich zástupci úspěšně řídit stres při práci a psychosociální rizika a předcházet jim a že cílem kampaně Zdravé pracoviště je s&nbsp;tím organizacím pomoci.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Přečíst tiskovou zprávu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/cs/<@#&>>Navštívit webovou stránku kampaně Zdravé pracoviště</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"lv";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress - EU-OSHA kampaņā darba devēji un darbinieki aicināti pārvarēt ar darbu saistītu stresu";"<p>   <em>EU-OSHA</em> sāk divu gadu ilgu Eiropas mēroga kampaņu “Veselīgas darba vietas uzvar stresu”.</p>  <p>   Kampaņas atklāšanas uzrunā Briselē ES nodarbinātības, sociālo lietu un iekļautības komisārs László Andor un Grieķijas nodarbinātības, sociālā nodrošinājuma un labklājības ministra vietnieks <em>Vasilis Kegkeroglou</em>, kas pārstāvēja Grieķiju&nbsp;— ES Padomes prezidentvalsti&nbsp;—, aicināja Eiropas uzņēmumus atzīt, ka jāpārvar ar darbu saistītais stress. Pārvarot stresu, tie aizsargās savu darbinieku veselību un saglabās organizācijas ražīgumu.</p>  <p>   <em>EU-OSHA</em> direktore Christa Sedlatschek paskaidroja, ka darba devēji, darbinieki un to pārstāvji kopā var veiksmīgi pārvarēt un novērst ar darbu saistīto stresu un psihosociālos riskus un ka drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu kampaņas mērķis ir palīdzēt organizācijām to izdarīt.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lv/<@#&>>Visit the Healthy Workplaces Campaign website</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"lt";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress: EU-OSHA kampanijoje darbdaviai ir darbuotojai raginami bendromis jėgomis spręsti streso darbe problemą.";"<p>   EU-OSHA pradeda dvejų metų trukmės kampaniją „Saugiose darbo vietose stresas yra valdomas“.</p>  <p>   Kalbėdami kampanijos pradžios renginyje už užimtumą, socialinius reikalus ir įtrauktį atsakingas Komisijos narys László Andor ir Graikijos darbo, socialinės apsaugos ir gerovės ministro pavaduotojas Vasilis Kegkeroglou, atstovaujantis ES Tarybai pirmininkaujančiai Graikijai, paragino Europos įmones pripažinti būtinybę spręsti streso darbe problemą. Spręsdamos šią problemą įmonės apsaugos savo darbuotojų sveikatą ir didins organizacijų našumą.</p>  <p>   EU-OSHA direktorė Christa Sedlatschek paaiškino, kad darbdaviai, darbuotojai ir jų atstovai bendromis jėgomis gali sėkmingai valdyti ir mažinti stresą ir psichosocialinę riziką darbe, ir kad Saugių darbo vietų kampanija skirta padėti organizacijoms siekti būtent šio tikslo.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Skaityti spaudos pranešimą</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lt/<@#&>>Apsilankyti Saugių darbo vietų kampanijos svetainėje</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – EU-OSHA campaign calls on employers and workers to tackle work-related stress";"<p>   EU-OSHA launches a two year Europe-wide campaign: ‘Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress’.</p>  <p>   Speaking at the campaign launch in Brussels, László Andor, EU Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion and Greek Deputy Minister for Labour, Social Security and Welfare, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, representing the Greek EU Council Presidency, called on Europe’s enterprises to recognise the need to tackle work-related stress. By doing so, they will be protecting their workers’ health and their organisations’ productivity.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, EU-OSHA Director explained that together employers, workers and their representatives can successfully manage and prevent work-related stress and psychosocial risks; and that the Healthy Workplaces Campaign aims to help organisations do just that.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-2013-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/<@#&>>Visit the Healthy Workplaces Campaign website</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"is";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – herferð EU-OSHA hvetur atvinnurekendur og starfsmenn til þess að takast á við vinnutengdra streitu";"<p>   EU-OSHA hleypir tveggja ára Evrópuherferð af stokkunum: „Góð vinnuvernd vinnur á streitu.“</p>  <p>   László Andor, framkvæmdastjóri ESB fyrir atvinnu-, félagsmál og aðlögun og gríski aðstoðarráðherrann fyrir atvinnu-, almannatryggingar- og velferðarmál, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, sem var fulltrúi grísku formennskunnar í ráðherraráði Evrópusambandsins, töluðu við upphaf herferðarinnar í Brussel og hvöttu fyrirtæki í Evrópu til þess að viðurkenna þörfina á því að takast á við vinnutengda streitu. Með því að gera slíkt munu þau verja heilbrigði starfsmanna og framleiðni fyrirtækjanna.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, framkvæmdastjóri EU-OSHA, útskýrði að í sameiningu geta atvinnurekendur, starfsmenn og fulltrúar þeirra tekist með á við með góðum árangri og komið í veg fyrir streitu og sálfélagslegar áhættur; og að herferðin Vinnuvernd er allra hagur miði að því að hjálpa fyrirtækjum að gera einmitt það.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Lesa fréttatilkynninguna</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/is/<@#&>>Fara á heimasíðu herferðarinnar Vinnuvernd er allra hagur</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"ro";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – Campania organizată de EU-OSHA invită angajatorii și lucrătorii să conlucreze la combaterea stresului la locul de muncă";"<p>   EU-OSHA lansează o campanie la nivel european care se va derula pe parcursul a doi ani: „Managementul stresului pentru locuri de muncă sănătoase”</p>  <p>   La lansarea campaniei, care a avut loc la Bruxelles, László Andor, comisarul UE pentru ocuparea forței de muncă, afaceri sociale și incluziune și ministrul-adjunct al muncii, securității și protecției sociale din Grecia, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, reprezentând președinția greacă a Consiliului Uniunii Europene, au solicitat întreprinderilor europene să conștientizeze necesitatea de a combate stresul la locul de muncă. În acest fel, ele vor acționa pentru protejarea sănătății lucrătorilor și îmbunătățirea productivității organizației.</p>  <p>   Directorul EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, a afirmat că angajatorii și lucrătorii pot conlucra cu succes în scopul gestionării și prevenirii stresului la locul de muncă și a riscurilor psihosociale; și că obiectivul campaniei pentru locuri de muncă sigure și sănătoase este de a ajuta companiile să realizeze acest lucru.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Citiți comunicatul de presă</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/ro/<@#&>>Vizitați site-ul campaniei pentru locuri de muncă sigure și sănătoase</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"el";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress - η εκστρατεία του EU-OSHA καλεί εργοδότες και εργαζόμενους να αντιμετωπίσουν το εργασιακό άγχος";"<p>   Ο EU-OSHA ξεκινά μια διετή πανευρωπαϊκή εκστρατεία με τίτλο «Διαχείριση του άγχους σε Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας».</p>  <p>   Μιλώντας κατά την έναρξη της εκστρατείας στις Βρυξέλλες, ο ευρωπαίος επίτροπος για θέματα απασχόλησης, κοινωνικών υποθέσεων και ένταξης, László Andor, και ο έλληνας υφυπουργός εργασίας, κοινωνικής ασφάλισης και πρόνοιας, Βασίλης Κεγκέρογλου, ο οποίος εκπροσωπεί την ελληνική προεδρία του Συμβουλίου της ΕΕ, κάλεσαν τις ευρωπαϊκές επιχειρήσεις να αναγνωρίσουν την ανάγκη αντιμετώπισης του εργασιακού άγχους. Με αυτόν τον τρόπο θα προστατεύουν την υγεία των εργαζομένων και την παραγωγικότητα των επιχειρήσεών τους.</p>  <p>   Η Christa Sedlatschek, διευθύντρια του EU-OSHA, επισήμανε ότι εργοδότες, εργαζόμενοι και οι εκπρόσωποί τους μπορούν να συνεργαστούν για την επιτυχή διαχείριση και πρόληψη του εργασιακού άγχους και των ψυχοκοινωνικών κινδύνων και ότι στόχος της εκστρατείας για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας είναι να βοηθήσει τους οργανισμούς και τις επιχειρήσεις προς αυτήν ακριβώς την κατεύθυνση.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Διαβάστε το δελτίο Τύπου</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/el/<@#&>>Επισκεφτείτε τον δικτυακό τόπο της εκστρατείας για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"da";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – EU-OSHA-kampagne opfordrer arbejdsgivere og arbejdstagere til at tage hånd om arbejdsrelateret stress";"<p>   EU-OSHA lancerer en to-årig kampagne, der omfatter hele Europa: <@#&>Gode arbejdspladser tager hånd om stress<@#&>.</p>  <p>   Under deres taler tale ved lanceringen af kampagnen opfordrede László Andor, EU-kommissær for beskæftigelse, sociale anliggender og inklusion, og den græske viceminister for beskæftigelse, social sikring og velfærd, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, der repræsenterer det græske EU-rådsformandskab, Europas virksomheder til at anerkende behovet for at tage hånd om arbejdsrelateret stress. Derigennem vil de komme til at beskytte deres medarbejderes sundhed og deres organisationers produktivitet.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, EU-OSHA's direktør, forklarede, at arbejdsgivere og arbejdstagere sammen kan lykkes med at tage hånd om og forebygge arbejdsrelateret stress og psykosociale risici; og at arbejdsmiljøkampagnen har til sigte at bistå virksomheder med at gøre netop dette.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Læs pressemeddelelsen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/da/<@#&>>Besøg arbejdsmiljøkampagnens websted</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"sv";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – EU-Oshas kampanj uppmanar arbetsgivare och arbetstagare att förebygga arbetsrelaterad stress";"<p>   EU-Osha inleder nu den tvååriga europeiska kampanjen ”Friska arbetsplatser förebygger stress”.</p>  <p>   Vid startskottet för kampanjen i Bryssel talade László Andor, EU:s kommissionsledamot med ansvar för sysselsättning, socialpolitik och inkludering, och Vasilis Kegkeroglou, grekisk biträdande minister för arbetsmarknad, social trygghet och välfärd och företrädare för det grekiska ordförandeskapet i rådet. De uppmanade de europeiska företagen att erkänna behovet av att förebygga arbetsrelaterad stress. De kan på så sätt värna om sina arbetstagares hälsa och organisationernas produktivitet.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, EU-Oshas direktör, förklarade att tillsammans kan arbetsgivare, arbetstagare och deras företrädare hantera och förebygga arbetsrelaterad stress och psykosociala risker och att ”Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv”-kampanjen är tänkt att hjälpa organisationer att klara just detta.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Läs pressmeddelandet</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sv/<@#&>>Gå till webbplatsen för kampanjen ”Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv”</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"sk";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – Kampaň agentúry EU-OSHA vyzýva zamestnávateľov a zamestnancov, aby riešili problémy týkajúce sa pracovného stresu";"<p>   Agentúra EU-OSHA spúšťa dvojročnú celoeurópsku kampaň s názvom Zdravé pracoviská bez stresu.</p>  <p>   László Andor, komisár EÚ pre zamestnanosť, sociálne veci a začlenenie, a grécky námestník ministra pre prácu, sociálne zabezpečenie a zdravie Vasilis Kegkeroglou, ktorý zastupuje grécke predsedníctvo Rady EÚ, v rámci svojho príhovoru pri príležitosti spustenia kampane v Bruseli vyzvali európske podniky, aby uznali potrebu riešenia pracovného stresu. Budú tak chrániť zdravie svojich zamestnancov a produktivitu svojej organizácie.</p>  <p>   Riaditeľka agentúry EU-OSHA Christa Sedlatscheková vysvetlila, že zamestnávatelia, zamestnanci a ich zástupcovia môžu spolu úspešne riešiť pracovný stres a psychosociálne riziká a predchádzať im, a že cieľom kampane Zdravé pracoviská je poskytnúť organizáciám v tejto súvislosti pomoc.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Prečítajte si tlačovú správu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sk/<@#&>>Navštívte internetovú stránku kampane Zdravé pracoviská</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"mt";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress - il-kampanja tal-UE-OSHA tistieden lil min iħaddem u lill-ħaddiema biex jindirizzaw l-istress relatat max-xogħol";"<p>   UE-OSHA tibda kampanja madwar l-Ewropa mifruxa fuq sentejn: “Inqas Stress għal Aktar Saħħa Fuq ix-Xogħol.”</p>  <p>   Fid-diskors tagħhom matul il-ftuħ fi Brussell, László Andor, il-Kummissarju Ewropew għall-Impjiegi, l-Affarijiet Soċjali u l-Inklużjoni u d-Deputat Ministru Grieg għax-Xogħol, is-Sigurtà Soċjali u l-Welfare, Vasilis Kegkeroglou, li rrappreżenta l-Presidenza Griega tal-Kunsill tal-UE, stiednu lill-intrapriżi tal-Ewropa sabiex jagħrfu l-ħtieġa li jiġi kkontrollat l-istress relatat max-xogħol. Meta jagħmlu dan, huma jkunu qed jipproteġu s-saħħa tal-ħaddiema tagħhom u l-produttività tal-organizzazzjonijiet tagħhom.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, id-Direttur tal-UE-OSHA spjegat li min iħaddem, il-ħaddiema u r-rappreżentanti tagħhom flimkien jistgħu jimmaniġġjaw u jipprevjenu b’suċċess l-istress relatat max-xogħol u r-riskji psikosoċjali; u li l-Kampanja “Postijiet tax-Xogħol li Jġibu ’l Quddiem is-Saħħa” għandha l-għan li tgħin lil organizzazzjonijiet biex jagħmlu proprju dan.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Aqra l-istqarrija għall-istampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/mt/<@#&>>Żur il-websajt tal-Kampanja “Postijiet tax-Xogħol li Jġibu ’l Quddiem is-Saħħa”</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"sl";"/en/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress";"published";"2014-03-24 15:23:57";"2014-07-25 14:17:22";"2014-04-07 12:30:00";"dimitrovan";"#EUmanagestress – Kampanja agencije EU-OSHA poziva delodajalce in delavce k obvladovanju stresa, povezanega z delom";"<p>   Agencija EU-OSHA začenja dvoletno vseevropsko kampanjo: „Obvladajmo stres za zdrava delovna mesta“.</p>  <p>   Evropski komisar za zaposlovanje, socialne zadeve in vključevanje László Andor in grški namestnik ministra za delo, socialno varnost in blaginjo Vasilis Kegkeroglou kot predstavnik grškega predsedstva Sveta EU sta v svojih govorih ob začetku kampanje pozvala evropska podjetja, naj priznajo potrebo po obvladovanju stresa, povezanega z delom. S tem bodo zaščitila zdravje svojih delavcev in produktivnost svojih organizacij.</p>  <p>   Christa Sedlatschek, direktorica agencije EU-OSHA, je pojasnila, da lahko delodajalci, delavci in njihovi predstavniki s skupnimi močmi uspešno obvladujejo in preprečujejo stres, povezan z delom, in psihosocialna tveganja ter da je kampanja za zdravo delovno okolje namenjena prav temu, da bi organizacijam pomagala pri tem.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/press/press-releases/work-related-stress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-it-together<@#&>>Preberite sporočilo za javnost</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sl/<@#&>>Obiščite spletno stran kampanje za zdravo delovno okolje</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/eumanagestress-eu-osha-campaign-calls-on-employers-and-workers-to-tackle-work-related-stress/manage stress.JPG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/usa-new-topic-page-promotes-healthy-aging";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-07 09:50:39";"2014-04-07 09:50:55";"2014-04-07 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"USA, New Topic Page Promotes Healthy Aging";"<p>   The National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health (NIOSH) recently released a new topic page that offers a worker-focused perspective on health and safety and chronic disease issues related to aging. This is one of the first NIOSH topic pages to co-align with the existing Total Worker HealthTM webpage.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cdc.gov/niosh/updates/upd-04-01-14.html<@#&>>Read more.</a></p>";"/en/news/usa-new-topic-page-promotes-healthy-aging/CDC.png";"";"ageing, whp";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/follow-live-the-official-launch-of-the-healthy-workplaces-manage-stress-campaign";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-07 12:36:10";"2014-04-07 12:38:42";"2014-04-07 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Follow live the official launch of the Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress Campaign";"<p>   Warming up the engines: 2014-15 Healthy Workplaces Manage Stress Campaign live at 12:30 #EUmanagestress</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/ebs/live.cfm?page=1<@#&>>Watch it here</a></p>";"/en/news/follow-live-the-official-launch-of-the-healthy-workplaces-manage-stress-campaign/hwc.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-first-interactive-nano-platform-on-201esafe-handling-of-nanomaterials";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-04 11:16:37";"2014-04-04 11:26:33";"2014-04-05 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-First interactive Nano-Platform on „Safe Handling of Nanomaterials“ published";"<p>   The German Social Accident Insurance (DGUV) has recently launched the Nano-Platform “Safe handling of Nanomaterials”.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   The Nano-Platform offers up-to-date information on occupational health and safety and novel, interactive E-Learning-Tools, so-called “Nanoramas”. “Nanoramas”, a lexical blend of “Nano” and “Panorama”, are new E-Learning tools in which the user enters a virtual space and moves around in it. By completing the “Nanoramas”, users learn which nanomaterials and nano-products are used in their respective trade. On the other hand, the “Nanoramas” allow users to assess the occupational exposure to nanomaterials and to identify necessary protective measures when handling the materials.</p>";"<p>   The Nano-Platform is the first interactive platform addressing issues regarding nano-specific occupational health and safety. It aims to enhance knowledge not only among prevention professionals but also among workers with little knowledge on nanotechnologies. Currently, the platform is only available in German.</p>  <p>   The <a href=<@#&>http://nano.dguv.de/nanorama/bgbau/<@#&>>“Nanorama Construction”</a> is the first module available. It offers insights into the use and applications of nanomaterials in the construction industry. It will be joined by the “Nanorama Chemistry” and the “Nanorama Wood and Metal”, which will present the safe handling of nanomaterials in a chemical laboratory and an automotive workshop, respectively. Thanks to its modular design, the platform can be expanded with “Nanorama”-modules on any given sector or trade.</p>  <p>   Source: Innovation Society, St. Gallen</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://nano.dguv.de/<@#&>>Learn more</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/nanomaterials<@#&>>EU-OSHA information about nanomaterials at work</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"/en/news/eu-first-interactive-nano-platform-on-201esafe-handling-of-nanomaterials/logo-dguv.gif";"";"dangerous_substances, nanotechnology";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/belgium-sets-up-a-register-of-nanomaterials";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-04 10:47:10";"2014-04-04 10:49:16";"2014-04-04 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Belgium sets up a register of nanomaterials";"<p>   On proposal of the Minister of Social Affairs and Public Health Laurette Onkelinx , the Council of Ministers agreed on the Royal Decree on the placing on the market of substances manufactured in the nanoparticle state, to address the&nbsp; potential impact of a growing number of products containing nanomaterials on public health and the health of workers. Indeed , because of their size, nanomaterials can have specific ( eco) toxicological properties yet little known.</p>";"<p>   The draft royal decree prepared in consultation with the Ministers of Economy , Employment and Environment, provides for the setting up a national register of nanomaterials , linked to the registration of substances and mixtures containing such substances by those who put these products on the market, to ensure the traceability of these nanoparticles .</p>  <p>   The implementation of this register should :</p>  <ul>   <li>    allow health authorities to act without wasting time, if a nanomaterial proved dangerous ,</li>   <li>    and to transmit relevant information to the authorities responsible for the safety of workers, so that they can take precautions .</li>  </ul>  <p>   The registry will be operational from 1 January 2016 , the date of registration of substances , registration of mixtures will be mandatory from 1 January 2017.</p>  <p>   After France , Belgium becomes the second country in the European Union to adopt specific regulations governing the placing on the market of nanomaterials.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.presscenter.org/fr/pressrelease/20140208/la-belgique-met-en-place-un-registre-des-nanomateriaux<@#&>>Read more</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/nanomaterials<@#&>>EU-OSHA information on managing nanomaterials in the workplace</a></p>";"/en/news/belgium-sets-up-a-register-of-nanomaterials/nano.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances, legislation, nanotechnology";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/european-neighbourhood-policy-project";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-03 15:55:31";"2014-04-03 15:56:22";"2014-04-03 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"European Neighbourhood Policy Project";"<p>   Since February 2014, EU-OSHA has been working on a project funded under the European Neighbourhood Policy (ENP).</p>  <p>   The project will run until January 2016 and aims to involve ENP partner countries in the work of the Agency by establishing a single contact point in each country to provide a platform for sharing information with the local safety and health network.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/european-neighbourhood-policy-project<@#&>>Read our blog entry.</a></p>";"/en/news/european-neighbourhood-policy-project/Yerevan Republic Square.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-echa-adopts-substance-evaluation-plan-for-2014-2016";"en";"";"published";"2014-04-01 12:12:01";"2014-04-01 12:13:43";"2014-04-02 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU - ECHA adopts substance evaluation plan for 2014 - 2016";"<p>   The Community rolling action plan (CoRAP) for 2014-2016 is available on ECHA website. The update contains 120 substances that will be reviewed by 21 Member States under the substance evaluation process of REACH.</p>";"<p>   CoRAP now includes 53 newly selected substances and 67 substances from the update published last year.</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://echa.europa.eu/view-article/-/journal_content/title/echa-adopts-substance-evaluation-plan-for-2014-2016<@#&>>Read the press release</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://echa.europa.eu/documents/10162/13628/corap_list_2014-2016_en.pdf<@#&>>Download the Community rolling action plan (CoRAP) update covering years 2014, 2015 and 2016</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds/reach<@#&>>EU-OSHA information on the links between OSH and REACH</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"/en/news/eu-echa-adopts-substance-evaluation-plan-for-2014-2016/ECHA_logo_new.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/singapore-wsh-conference-2014-201cintegrating-safety-and-health-towards-a-holistic-approach";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-10 14:48:34";"2014-04-01 11:43:57";"2014-04-01 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Singapore WSH Conference 2014: “Integrating safety and health: Towards a holistic approach”";"<p>   A Workplace Safety and Health (WSH) Conference will take place on 7 and 8 May 2014 in Singapore and will bring together 700 WSH professionals, business leaders and government officials to learn about latest trends and developments impacting WSH and its practice.</p>";"<p>   The event aims to highlight the importance of adopting a holistic approach towards managing both safety and health risks in the workplace.</p>  <p>   Dr Christa Sedlatschek, Director of EU-OSHA, will contribute to the conference as a moderator of a round table discussion on the topic of ‘Pervasive Leadership in Safety and Health – Everyone has a role’.</p>  <p>   Debuting in 2010, the Singapore WSH Conference was established as a premier platform for WSH stakeholders across the region.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/events/the-singapore-wsh-conference-2014<@#&>>Learn more about the conference</a></p>";"/en/news/singapore-wsh-conference-2014-201cintegrating-safety-and-health-towards-a-holistic-approach/WSHC logo 2014-01.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"et";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"es";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"La inauguración de las nuevas instalaciones y la firma de un Acuerdo de Sede marcan un día histórico para EU-OSHA";"<p>   En su discurso de inauguración de la nueva sede de la Agencia, en el barrio bilbaíno de Miribilla, el Comisario de Empleo, Asuntos Sociales e Inclusión, László Andor, ha anunciado que la Comisión Europea publicará en breve el tan esperado marco estratégico de la UE sobre Seguridad y Salud en el Trabajo.</p>  <p>   En el segundo acontecimiento histórico del día, el Subsecretario de Empleo y Seguridad Social, Pedro Llorente, y la Directora de EU-OSHA, Dra. Christa Sedlatschek, firmaron un Acuerdo de Sede entre el Reino de España y la Unión Europea.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Lea el comunicado de prensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>Vea fotografías del acto</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Vea el vídeo</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"nl";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"fr";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"bg";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"hr";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"pt";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"no";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"lv";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"lt";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
