"/fi/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"fi";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"is";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"it";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-19 14:25:01";"2014-07-25 15:51:02";"2014-03-31 15:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Inauguration of new premises and signature of Seat Agreement mark historic day for EU-OSHA";"<p>   Speaking at the inauguration of the brand new premises in the Miribilla area of Bilbao, the European Commissioner for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, László Andor announced that the European Commission would shortly publish its much-awaited EU Strategic Framework on Health and Safety at Work.</p>  <p>   In the second historic development of the day, the Spanish Deputy Secretary for Employment and Social Security, Pedro Llorente and EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek signed a Seat Agreement between the Kingdom of Spain and the European Union.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/european-commissioner-andor-inaugurates-new-eu-osha-premises-on-the-same-day-as-spanish-minister-banez-signs-a-seat-agreement-with-the-eu-on-behalf-of-the-kingdom-of-spain<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157642948528615/<@#&>>See photos of the event</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/avservices/video/player.cfm?ref=I088026<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/inauguration-new-premises-signature-seat-agreement/seat_agreement (Medium).JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-meps-say-yes-to-safer-lorries";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-31 09:47:00";"2014-03-31 09:47:18";"2014-03-31 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU - MEPs say yes to safer lorries";"<p>   The European Parliament's transport committee has voted overwhelmingly in support of proposals to improve the safety of heavy goods vehicles.</p>";"<p>   The revised rules on lorry dimensions will allow for cabs with improved visibility, especially important for the safety of pedestrians and cyclists in urban areas.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.etsc.eu/document.php?articleId=1124<@#&>>Read more.</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-meps-say-yes-to-safer-lorries/ETSC.gif";"";"road_transport";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/e-capacit8-training-project-on-health-and-ageing-for-occupational-health-professionals";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-24 17:08:40";"2014-03-24 17:08:55";"2014-03-25 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"E-capacit8  - Training project on health and ageing for occupational health professionals";"<p>   E-capacit8 is co-funded by the Health Programme of the European Union. It is concerned with meeting the need for extracurricular training for occupational health professionals (OHPs) on health and ageing.</p>";"<p>   The project ‘Strengthening occupational health professionals' capacities to improve the health of the ageing workforces’ is developing context-specific educational materials and an e-learning platform. The project is in its second year where engagement of stakeholders, workshops and feedback are part of the development process. National workshops take place in 13 countries September 2014. Find out more about the workshops and other ways to participate in the project by visiting the website.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://e-capacit8.eu/<@#&>>Read more.</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"/en/news/e-capacit8-training-project-on-health-and-ageing-for-occupational-health-professionals/Ecapacito.png";"";"ageing, whp";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"el";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Ο προσδιορισμός των προτεραιοτήτων για την έρευνα προωθεί τους στόχους της στρατηγικής «Ευρώπη 2020»";"<p>   Ο Ευρωπαϊκός Οργανισμός για την Ασφάλεια και την Υγεία στην Εργασία (EU-OSHA) όρισε προτεραιότητες σχετικά με τέσσερα βασικά θεματικά πεδία για την έρευνα στον τομέα της επαγγελματικής ασφάλειας και υγείας (ΕΑΥ) τα επόμενα χρόνια: (1) δημογραφική αλλαγή· (2) παγκοσμιοποίηση και μεταβαλλόμενος κόσμος της εργασίας· (3) ασφαλείς νέες τεχνολογίες· και (4) νέα ή αυξανόμενη επαγγελματική έκθεση σε χημικούς και βιολογικούς παράγοντες. Οι προτεραιότητες περιγράφονται αναλυτικά σε σχετική έκθεση, στην οποία καταδεικνύονται οι τρόποι με τους οποίους η έρευνα στον τομέα της ΕΑΥ μπορεί να συμβάλλει στην επίτευξη των στόχων που έχουν τεθεί στο πλαίσιο της στρατηγικής «Ευρώπη 2020» και του προγράμματος πλαισίου «Ορίζοντας 2020» για έξυπνη, βιώσιμη και χωρίς αποκλεισμούς ανάπτυξη.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Διαβάστε το δελτίο Τύπου</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την πλήρη έκθεση (στα αγγλικά)</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Identification of research priorities contributes to Europe 2020 goals";"<p>   EU-OSHA has identified priorities around four key theme areas for occupational safety and health (OSH) research in the coming years: (1) demographic change; (2) globalisation and the changing world of work; (3) safe new technologies; and (4) new or increasing occupational exposure to chemical and biological agents. The priorities, detailed in a report, emphasises how OSH research can contribute to achieving the targets set by the Europe 2020 strategy and Horizon 2020 programme for smart, sustainable and inclusive growth.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Read the full report (in English)</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"fr";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"La définition de priorités de recherche contribue à la réalisation des objectifs d'Europe 2020";"<p>   L'EU-OSHA a défini des priorités touchant à quatre&nbsp;domaines clés pour la recherche en matière de sécurité et de santé au travail (SST) au cours des prochaines années: (1) évolution démographique, (2) mondialisation et évolution du monde du travail, (3) nouvelles technologies sûres et (4) expositions nouvelles ou croissantes à des agents chimiques et biologiques sur les lieux de travail. Ces priorités, détaillées dans un rapport, mettent l'accent sur la façon dont la recherche dans le domaine de la santé et de la sécurité au travail peut contribuer à la réalisation des objectifs définis dans la stratégie Europe&nbsp;2020 et le programme Horizon&nbsp;2020 pour une croissance intelligente, durable et inclusive.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Lire le communiqué de presse</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Lire le rapport complet (en anglais)</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"bg";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Определянето на приоритетите за изследванията допринася за постигане на целите на „Европа 2020“";"<p>   ЕU-OSHA определи приоритетите за изследванията на безопасността и здравето при работа през следващите години в четири основни тематични области: 1) демографски промени; 2) глобализацията и променящата се сфера на труда; 3) безопасните нови технологии; и 4) новата или нарастваща експозиция на химични и биологични агенти на работното място. Изложени подробно в доклад, приоритетите подчертават как изследванията в областта на БЗР могат да допринесат за постигане на целевите показатели, определени от стратегията „Европа 2020“ и програмата „Хоризонт 2020“ за интелигентен, устойчив и приобщаващ растеж.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Прочетете съобщението за медиите</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Прочетете пълния текст на доклада (на английски език)</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"hr";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Prepoznavanje istraživačkih prioriteta pridonosi ciljevima strategije Europa 2020.";"<p>   EU-OSHA prepoznala je prioritete istraživanja o sigurnosti i zdravlju na radu u nadolazećim godinama u vidu četiriju ključnih tematskih područja: (1) demografske promjene, (2) globalizacija i izmijenjeni svijet rada, (3) sigurne nove tehnologije i (4) nove ili sve veće izloženosti kemijskim i biološkim agensima na radnom mjestu. Uspostavom ovih prioriteta, koji su detaljno objašnjeni u izvješću, stavlja se naglasak na to kako istraživanje o sigurnosti i zdravlju na radu može pridonijeti ostvarenju ciljeva koji su uspostavljeni strategijom Europa 2020. i programom Obzor 2020. za pametan, održiv i uključiv razvoj.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hr/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Pročitajte priopćenje za javnost</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Pročitajte cijelo izvješće (na engleskom jeziku)</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"lt";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Aiškūs darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos mokslinių tyrimų prioritetai padeda siekti strategijos „Europa 2020“ tikslų";"<p>   EU-OSHA nustatė artimiausių metų prioritetus, atsižvelgdama į keturias pagrindines temines sritis, susijusias su darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos (DSS) moksliniais tyrimais: 1) demografiniai pokyčiai; 2) globalizacija ir kintantis darbo pasaulis; 3) saugios naujosios technologijos; ir 4) naujas arba didėjantis cheminių ir biologinių medžiagų poveikis darbe. Aptariant ataskaitoje išsamiai aprašytus prioritetus, atkreipiamas dėmesys į tai, kaip DSS moksliniai tyrimai gali padėti siekti strategijoje „Europa&nbsp;2020“ ir pažangaus, tvaraus ir integracinio augimo programoje „Horizontas&nbsp;2020“ nustatytų tikslų.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Skaityti spaudos pranešimą</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Skaityti visą ataskaitą (anglų k.)</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"ro";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Identificarea priorităţilor de cercetare contribuie la realizarea obiectivelor Europa 2020";"<p>   EU-OSHA a identificat priorităţi în jurul a patru arii tematice cheie de cercetare în domeniul sănătăţii şi securităţii în muncă (SSM) pentru anii care urmează: (1) schimbările demografice; (2) globalizarea şi schimbările de pe piaţa muncii; (3) siguranţa noilor tehnologii şi (4) expunerea profesională nouă sau crescută la agenţi chimici şi biologici. Priorităţile, care sunt detaliate într-un raport, subliniază modul în care cercetarea SSM poate contribui la realizarea obiectivelor stabilite în cadrul strategiei Europa 2020 şi al programului Orizont 2020 pentru o creştere inteligentă, durabilă şi favorabilă incluziunii.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Citiţi comunicatul de presă</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Citiţi raportul integral (în engleză)</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"pl";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Wyznaczenie priorytetów w zakresie badań naukowych przyczynia się do realizacji celów wyznaczonych w strategii „Europa 2020”";"<p>   EU-OSHA wyznaczyła priorytety związane z czterema kluczowymi obszarami tematycznymi w dziedzinie badań naukowych nad bezpieczeństwem i higieną pracy (BHP) w nadchodzących latach: 1) zmiany demograficzne; 2) globalizacja i zmiany zachodzące na rynku pracy; 3) bezpieczne nowe technologie; oraz 4) nowe lub nasilające się sytuacje związane z narażeniem na oddziaływanie czynników chemicznych i biologicznych w miejscu pracy. W opisie priorytetów przedstawionych w sprawozdaniu wskazano, w jaki sposób badania naukowe w dziedzinie BHP mogą przyczynić się do osiągnięcia celów w zakresie inteligentnego, trwałego wzrostu gospodarczego sprzyjającego włączeniu społecznemu wyznaczonych w strategii „Europa 2020” i programie „Horyzont 2020”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Zapoznaj się z treścią informacji prasowej</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Zapoznaj się z treścią całego sprawozdania (w języku angielskim)</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"is";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Greining forgangsatriða við rannsóknir hjálpar til við að ná markmiðum stefnunnar Evrópa 2020";"<p>   EU-OSHA hefur greint forgangsatriði fyrir fjögur lykilsvið fyrir vinnuverndarrannsóknir á næstu árum: (1) lýðfræðilegar breytingar; (2) hnattvæðing og breytingar á vinnuumhverfinu; (3) ný örugg tækni; og (4) ný eða aukin váhrif af völdum kemískra og líffræðilegra efna.  Forgangsatriðin, sem lýst er ítarlega í skýrslu, leggja áherslu á hvernig vinnuverndarrannsóknir geta stuðlað að því að ná þeim markmiðum sem Evrópustefnan 2020 og áætlunin Horizon 2020 hefur markað fyrir hugvitsamlegan og sjálfbæran vöxt fyrir alla. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Lesa fréttatilkynninguna (á ensku)</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Lesa alla skýrsluna (á ensku)</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"it";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Individuare le priorità di ricerca contribuisce agli obiettivi di Europa 2020";"<p>   L'EU-OSHA ha individuato priorità inerenti a quattro aree tematiche fondamentali per la ricerca in materia di sicurezza e salute sul lavoro (SSL) nei prossimi anni: (1) cambiamento demografico; (2) globalizzazione e cambiamenti nel mondo lavorativo; (3) nuove tecnologie sicure; e (4) nuova o maggiore esposizione professionale ad agenti chimici e biologici. Le priorità, descritte in modo particolareggiato in una relazione, pongono in risalto come la ricerca nell'ambito della SSL può contribuire al conseguimento degli obiettivi stabiliti dalla strategia Europa 2020 e dal programma Orizzonte 2020 per una crescita intelligente, sostenibile e inclusiva.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/press/press-releases/identification-of-occup  ational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-202  0-goals<@#&>>Leggi il comunicato stampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupati  onal-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Leggi la relazione completa (in inglese)</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"cs";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Určení priorit výzkumu přispívá k cílům strategie Evropa 2020";"<p>   Agentura EU-OSHA určila priority ve čtyřech klíčových tematických oblastech pro výzkum na poli bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci (dále jen „BOZP“) v&nbsp;nadcházejících letech: 1) demografické změny, 2) globalizace a měnící se svět práce, 3) bezpečné nové technologie a 4) nové nebo rostoucí expozice chemickým a biologickým činitelům na pracovišti. Priority podrobně rozepsané ve zprávě poukazují na to, jak může výzkum v&nbsp;oblasti BOZP přispět k&nbsp;dosažení cílů inteligentního a udržitelného růstu podporujícího začlenění stanovených strategií Evropa 2020 a programem Horizont 2020.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Přečtěte si tiskovou zprávu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si celou zprávu (v&nbsp;angličtině)</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"de";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Ermittlung von Forschungsprioritäten trägt zum Erreichen der Ziele von Europa 2020 bei";"<p>   Die EU-OSHA hat Prioritäten für die Forschung auf dem Gebiet Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in den kommenden Jahren in den folgenden vier&nbsp;Kernbereichen ermittelt: 1) demografischer Wandel, 2) Globalisierung und Arbeitswelt im Wandel, 3) sichere neue Technologien und 4) neue oder zunehmende arbeitsbedingte Exposition gegenüber chemischen und biologischen Agenzien. Aus den in einem Bericht umfassend beschriebenen Prioritäten geht hervor, wie die Forschung auf dem Gebiet Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit dazu beitragen kann, die Ziele der Strategie Europa 2020 und des Programms Horizont 2020 zu erreichen, mit denen ein intelligentes, nachhaltiges und integratives Wachstum angestrebt wird.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Pressemitteilung lesen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Vollständigen Bericht lesen (in Englisch)</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"da";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Identifikation af forskningsprioriteter bidrager til målene for Europa 2020";"<p>   EU-OSHA har identificeret prioriteter vedrørende fire centrale temaområder for arbejdsmiljøforskningen i de kommende år: (1) demografiske ændringer, (2) globalisering og de ændrede vilkår på arbejdsmarkedet, (3) sikre nye teknologier, og (4) ny eller stigende eksponering på arbejdspladsen for kemiske og biologiske agenser. Prioriteterne, der er nærmere beskrevet i en rapport, sætter fokus på, hvordan målene for Europa 2020-strategien og Horisont 2020-programmet for intelligent, bæredygtig og inklusiv vækst kan nås.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Læs pressemeddelelsen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Læs rapporten i sin helhed (på engelsk)</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"fi";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Tutkimuksen painopisteiden määrittäminen edistää Eurooppa 2020 -strategian tavoitteiden saavuttamista";"<p>   Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusvirasto (EU-OSHA) on määrittänyt painopisteet neljän työterveyttä ja työturvallisuutta koskevan keskeisen aihealueen tutkimukselle tulevina vuosina: 1) väestörakenteen muutos 2) globalisaatio ja muuttuva työelämä, 3) turvalliset uudet teknologiat ja 4) uusi tai lisääntyvä työperäinen altistuminen kemiallisille ja biologisille aineille. Näissä raportissa esitettävissä painopisteissä keskitytään siihen, miten työterveys- ja työturvallisuustutkimuksella voidaan edistää Eurooppa 2020 -strategiassa ja älykästä, kestävää ja osallistavaa kasvua koskevassa Horisontti 2020 -puiteohjelmassa asetettuja tavoitteita.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Lue lehdistötiedote</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Lue koko raportti (englanniksi)</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"et";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Uuringu prioriteetide määratlemine aitab kaasa Euroopa 2020 eesmärkide saavutamisele";"<p>   EU-OSHA on määratlenud nelja põhiteemavaldkonnaga seotud prioriteedid lähiaastatel elluviidava tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu (TTH) uuringu jaoks: (1) demograafilised muutused, (2) üleilmastumine ja tööturu muutumine, (3) ohutud uued tehnoloogiad ning (4) uus või suurenev tööalane kokkupuude keemiliste ja bioloogiliste mõjuritega. Aruandes üksikasjalikult kirjeldatud prioriteetide puhul rõhutatakse, kuidas töötervishoiu ja tööohutuse uuring võib aidata saavutada Euroopa 2020. aasta strateegia ja programmiga „Horisont 2020” seatud eesmärke aruka, jätkusuutliku ja kaasava majanduskasvu tagamisel.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Lugege pressiteadet</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Lugege aruande tervikteksti (inglise keeles)</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"es";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"La identificación de prioridades para la investigación contribuye a los objetivos de Europa 2020";"<p>   La EU-OSHA ha identificado prioridades en cuatro ámbitos temáticos fundamentales para la investigación sobre seguridad y salud en el trabajo (SST) en los próximos años: (1) cambio demográfico; (2) la globalización y el mundo laboral cambiante; (3) SST y nuevas tecnologías; y (4) la creciente exposición a agentes químicos y biológicos en el trabajo. Las prioridades, descritas en un informe, ponen de relieve la contribución que la investigación sobre SST puede realizar al logro de los objetivos establecidos en la estrategia Europa 2020 y el programa Horizonte 2020 para un crecimiento inteligente, sostenible e integrador.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Lea el comunicado de prensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Lea el informe completo (en inglés)</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"nl";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Vaststellen onderzoeksprioriteiten draagt bij aan verwezenlijking Europa 2020-doelstellingen";"<p>   EU-OSHA heeft voor het onderzoek naar veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk (OSH) in de komende jaren prioriteiten vastgesteld rond vier kernthema's: (1) demografische verandering; (2) globalisering en de veranderende wereld van het werk; (3) veilige nieuwe technologieën; en (4) nieuwe of toenemende beroepsmatige blootstelling aan chemische en biologische agentia. De prioriteiten, die in een verslag worden uiteengezet, onderstrepen hoe onderzoek op het gebied van OSH kan bijdragen aan de verwezenlijking van de doelen van de Europa 2020-strategie en het Horizon 2020-programma voor slimme, duurzame en inclusieve groei.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Lees het persbericht</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Lees het volledige verslag (in het Engels)</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"pt";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"A identificação das prioridades da investigação contribui para os objetivos da estratégia Europa 2020";"<p>   A EU-OSHA identificou prioridades em torno de quatro áreas temáticas centrais para a investigação no domínio da segurança e saúde no trabalho (SST) nos próximos anos: 1) a evolução demográfica; 2) a globalização e a evolução das condições laborais; 3) as novas tecnologias seguras; e 4) a nova ou crescente exposição profissional a agentes químicos e biológicos. As prioridades são descritas circunstanciadamente num relatório que põe em evidência a forma como a investigação no domínio da SST pode contribuir para atingir os objetivos estabelecidos na estratégia Europa 2020 e no programa Horizonte 2020 para um crescimento inteligente, sustentável e inclusivo.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Leia o comunicado de imprensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Leia o relatório completo (em inglês)</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"no";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Identifisering av forskningsprioriteter bidrar til oppnåelsen av målene i Europa 2020-strategien";"<p>   EU-OSHA har identifisert fire tematiske områder som HMS-forskningen bør fokusere på de kommende årene: 1) demografiske endringer, 2) globalisering og endringer i arbeidslivet, 3) sikre nye teknologier samt 4) ny eller økende eksponering for kjemiske og biologiske agenser. Prioriteringene, som beskrives i en rapport, bygger på en refleksjon om hvordan HMS-forskning kan bidra til oppnåelse av målene som ble satt i Europa 2020-strategien og Horizon 2020-programmet for smart, bærekraftig og inkluderende vekst.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Les pressemeldingen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Les hele rapporten (på engelsk)</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"lv";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Pētniecības prioritāšu noteikšana veicina “Eiropa 2020” mērķu sasniegšanu";"<p>   <i>EU-OSHA</i> ir noteikusi turpmāko gadu prioritātes četrās galvenajās tematiskajās jomās darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības (DDVA) pētniecībā: 1) demogrāfiskās pārmaiņas; 2) globalizācija un mainīgā darba dzīve; 3) drošas jaunās tehnoloģijas un 4) jauna vai pieaugoša ķīmisko vielu un bioloģisko aģentu iedarbība darbavietā. Prioritātēs, kas ziņojumā izklāstītas sīkāk, uzsvērts, kā DDVA pētniecība var veicināt stratēģijā “Eiropa 2020” un programmā “Apvārsnis 2020” noteikto mērķu sasniegšanu gudrai, ilgtspējīgai un integrējošai izaugsmei.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Lasīt paziņojumu presei</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Lasīt visu ziņojumu (angļu valodā)</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"hu";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"A kutatási prioritások azonosítása elősegíti az Európa 2020 stratégia célkitűzéseinek megvalósulását";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA négy fő téma köré csoportosította a munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem területén a következő években végzendő kutatás prioritásait: (1) demográfiai változás; (2) globalizáció és a munka változó világa; (3) biztonságos új technológiák; és (4) a vegyi és biológiai anyagokkal szembeni új keletű vagy fokozódó munkahelyi expozíció. A prioritások – amelyeket egy jelentés részletesen ismertet – kiemelik, miként segítheti elő a munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségvédelmi kutatás az intelligens, fenntartható és inkluzív növekedésről szóló Európa 2020 stratégia és Horizont 2020 program célkitűzéseinek megvalósulását.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Olvassa el a sajtóközleményt</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Olvassa el a teljes jelentést (angol nyelven)</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"sv";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Fastställande av forskningsprioriteringar bidrar till Europa 2020-målen.";"<p>   EU-Osha har angett prioriteringar för fyra centrala temaområden för de närmaste årens arbetsmiljöforskning: 1) demografiska förändringar, 2) globalisering och förändringar i arbetslivet, 3) ny säker teknik, 4) ny eller ökad exponering för kemiska och biologiska ämnen i arbetsmiljön. Prioriteringarna har beskrivits i en rapport och lyfter fram hur arbetsmiljöforskning kan bidra till att uppnå de mål som anges i Europa 2020-strategin och programmet Horisont 2020 för smart och hållbar tillväxt för alla.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Läs pressmeddelandet</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Läs hela rapporten (på engelska)</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"sk";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Určenie priorít v oblasti výskumu priespieva k dosiahnutiu cieľov stratégie Európa 2020";"<p>   Agentúra EU-OSHA určila na nadchádzajúce roky priority v štyroch kľúčových tematických oblastiach výskumu týkajúcich sa bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia (BOZP): (1) demografická zmena; (2) globalizácia a meniaci sa svet práce; (3) bezpečné nové technológie a (4) nová alebo rastúca expozícia chemickým a biologickým látkam na pracovisku. Tieto priority, ktorými sa správa podrobne zaoberá, zdôrazňujú, akým spôsobom môže výskum BOZP prispieť k dosiahnutiu cieľov stanovených v stratégii Európa 2020 a programe Horizont 2020 na inteligentný, udržateľný a inkluzívny rast.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Prečítať tlačovú správu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Prečítať úplné znenie správy (v angličtine)</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"mt";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"L-identifikazzjoni ta’ prijoritajiet ta’ riċerka tikkontribwixxi għall-miri ta’ Ewropa 2020";"<p>   L-EU-OSHA identifikat prijoritajiet abbażi ta’ erba’ oqsma tematiċi ewlenin għal riċerka dwar saħħa u sigurtà okkupazzjonali (OSH) fis-snin li ġejjin: (1) tibdil demografiku; (2) globalizzazzjoni u d-dinja tax-xogħol li qed tinbidel; (3) teknoloġiji sikuri u ġodda; u (4) esponiment okkupazzjonali ġdid jew li qed jiżdied għal aġenti kimiċi u bijoloġiċi. Il-prijoritajiet, dettaljati f’rapport, jenfasizzaw kif ir-riċerka dwar l-OSH tista’ tikkontribwixxi biex jinkisbu l-miri stabbiliti mill-istrateġija Ewropa&nbsp;2020 u mill-programm Orizzont&nbsp;2020 għal tkabbir intelliġenti, sostenibbli u inklussiv.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Aqra l-istqarrija għall-istampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Aqra r-rapport sħiħ (bl-Ingliż)</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"sl";"/en/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals";"published";"2014-03-14 15:10:23";"2014-07-25 15:50:06";"2014-03-24 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Opredelitev prednostnih nalog na področju raziskav prispeva k ciljem strategije Evropa 2020";"<p>   Agencija EU-OSHA je prednostne naloge raziskav varnosti in zdravja pri delu v prihodnjih letih opredelila za štiri ključna tematska področja: (1) demografske spremembe, (2) globalizacijo in spreminjajoče se delovno okolje, (3) varne nove tehnologije in (4) novo ali naraščajočo izpostavljenost kemičnim in biološkim dejavnikom na delovnem mestu. V poročilu so podrobno pojasnjene prednostne naloge, ki poudarjajo, kako lahko raziskave varnosti in zdravja pri delu prispevajo k doseganju ciljev strategije Evropa&nbsp;2020 in programa Obzorje&nbsp;2020 za pametno, trajnostno in vključujočo rast.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/press/press-releases/identification-of-occupational-safety-and-health-research-priorities-will-help-europe-reach-its-2020-goals<@#&>>Preberite sporočilo za javnost</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/priorities-for-occupational-safety-and-health-research-in-europe-2013-2020/view<@#&>>Preberite celotno poročilo (v angleščini)</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/identification-of-research-priorities-contributes-to-europe-2020-goals/research_priorities.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"bg";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Как да се справяте с нови и нововъзникващи рискове за здравето и безопасността на <@#&>зелените<@#&> работни места?";"<p>   В бързо развиващия се сектор на зелените работни места е възможно да настъпят нови и нововъзникващи рискове. Затова през ноември 2013 г. в Билбао проведохме семинар на нашата мрежа от национални органи за здравето и безопасността при работа. Обсъдиха се начини за справяне с новите и нововъзникващите рискове, набелязани в прогнозното проучване на EU-OSHA, и начини за създаване на по-безопасни и по-здравословни зелени работни места в бъдеще.</p>  <p>   Информация относно планирането и взимането на решения за зелените работни места, предназначена за европейските органи, разработващи политики, професионални организации и работодатели, е предоставена в <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>обобщение на семинарите</a>.</p>  <p>   Семинарът се основава на констатациите от двугодишно прогнозно проучване, възложено от EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Прочетете всички констатации от проучването в прогнозния доклад (на английски език)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Повече информация за безопасността и здравето при <@#&>зелените<@#&> работни места</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/hr/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"hr";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kako se suočiti s novim i budućim rizicima po sigurnost i zdravlje na zelenim radnim mjestima?";"<p>   U brzorastućem sektoru zelenih radnih mjesta vjerojatno će se pojaviti neki novi rizici. Zbog toga smo u studenome 2013. održali radionicu u Bilbaou na kojoj su sudjelovali predstavnici nacionalnih nadležnih tijela za sigurnost i zdravlje na radnom mjestu. Rasprava je bila usredotočena na načine suočavanja s novim i budućim rizicima koje je utvrdila EU-OSHA u svojoj prognostičkoj studiji i stvaranja sigurnijih i zdravijih zelenih radnih mjesta za budućnost.</p>  <p>   U <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>sažetom izvještaju o radionici</a> iznesene su informacije o planiranju i odlučivanju u području zelenih radnih mjesta namijenjene europskim tvorcima politika, sindikatima i poslodavcima.</p>  <p>   Radionica se temeljila na rezultatima dvogodišnje prognostičke studije koju je naručila EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Pročitajte u cijelosti rezultate studije u prognostičkom izvještaju (na engleskom)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hr/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Više informacija o sigurnosti i zdravlju na zelenim radnim mjestima</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/de/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"de";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Wie soll man mit neuen und aufkommenden Risiken für Sicherheit und Gesundheit an grünen Arbeitsplätzen umgehen?";"<p>   In der stark expandierenden Branche der grünen Arbeitsplätze ist die Entstehung neuer und aufkommender Risiken wahrscheinlich. Aus diesem Grund veranstalteten wir im November 2013 in Bilbao einen Workshop mit unserem Netzwerk nationaler Behörden für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz. Schwerpunkte der Diskussion waren der Umgang mit den in der Vorausschau der EU-OSHA ermittelten neuen und aufkommenden Risiken sowie Wege zur Schaffung sicherer und gesünderer grüner Arbeitsplätze in der Zukunft.</p>  <p>   Eine <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Zusammenfassung des Workshops</a> bietet europäischen Entscheidungsträgern, Gewerkschaften und Arbeitgebern Informationen über die Planung und Entscheidungsfindung an grünen Arbeitsplätzen.</p>  <p>   Der Workshop basierte auf den Ergebnissen einer Zweijahresvorausschau, die von der EU-OSHA in Auftrag gegeben wurde.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Vollständige Ergebnisse der Vorausschau im Studienbericht lesen (Englisch)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Weitere Informationen über Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz an grünen Arbeitsplätzen auf einen Blick</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/el/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"el";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Τρόποι αντιμετώπισης των νέων και αναδυόμενων κινδύνων για την ασφάλεια και την υγεία στις πράσινες θέσεις εργασίας";"<p>   Στον ταχέως αναπτυσσόμενο κλάδο των πράσινων θέσεων εργασίας, είναι πιθανό να εμφανιστούν νέοι και αναδυόμενοι κίνδυνοι. Γι' αυτόν ακριβώς τον λόγο, τον Νοέμβριο του 2013 ο Οργανισμός διοργάνωσε από κοινού με το δίκτυο εθνικών αρχών ένα εργαστήριο για την επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία στο Μπιλμπάο. Οι συζητήσεις επικεντρώθηκαν στους τρόπους αντιμετώπισης των νέων και αναδυόμενων κινδύνων που εντοπίστηκαν στο πλαίσιο της μελέτης πρόβλεψης που διενήργησε ο EU-OSHA και στους τρόπους διαμόρφωσης πιο ασφαλών και υγιών πράσινων θέσεων εργασίας για το μέλλον.</p>  <p>   Η <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>περίληψη του εργαστηρίου</a> παρέχει πληροφορίες σχετικά με τον σχεδιασμό και τη λήψη αποφάσεων στον τομέα των πράσινων θέσεων εργασίας που απευθύνονται στους ευρωπαίους υπευθύνους χάραξης πολιτικής, τις συνδικαλιστικές οργανώσεις και τους εργοδότες.</p>  <p>   Το εργαστήριο βασίστηκε στα πορίσματα μιας διετούς μελέτης πρόβλεψης που είχε αναθέσει ο EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε τα πλήρη πορίσματα της μελέτης στην έκθεση πρόβλεψης (στα αγγλικά)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Περισσότερες πληροφορίες σχετικά με την ΕΑΥ στις πράσινες θέσεις εργασίας με μια ματιά</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"How to address new and emerging safety and health risks in green jobs?";"<p>   In the rapidly expanding sector of green jobs, new and emerging risks are likely to develop. That’s why we held a workshop in November 2013 in Bilbao with our network of national authorities on occupational safety and health. The debate was focused on how to address the new and emerging risks identified in EU-OSHA’s foresight study and how to create safer and healthier green jobs for the future.</p>  <p>   A <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>summary of the workshop</a> offers information on planning and decision-making in green jobs aimed at European policymakers, trade unions and employers.</p>  <p>   The workshop was based on the findings of a two-year foresight study commissioned by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Read the full findings of the study in the foresight report (in English)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>More information on OSH in green jobs at a glance</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/is/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"is";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hvernig á að takast á við nýjar og aðsteðjandi heilbrigðishættur í grænum störfum?";"<p>   Í hinum ört stækkandi geira sem græn störf eru, má gera ráð fyrir að nýjar og aðsteðjandi hættur munu þróast í framtíðinni. Þetta er ástæðan fyrir því að við héldum vinnustofu í nóvember 2013 í Bilbao með samstarfsaðilum okkar sem bera ábyrgð á vinnuverndarmálum í landi sínu. Umræðan snerist um hvernig takast skuli á við nýjar og aðsteðjandi hættur sem greindar hafa verið í framsýnisrannsókn EU-OSHA og hvernig megi skapa öruggari og heilbrigðari græn störf í framtíðinni.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Samantekt á niðurstöðum vinnustofunnar</a> veitir upplýsingar varðandi skipulag og ákvarðanatöku í græna starfsgeiranum sem ætluð eru stjórnmálamönnum í Evrópu, verkalýðsfélögum og atvinnuveitendum.</p>  <p>   Vinnustofan var byggð á niðurstöðum tveggja ára framsýnisrannsókn sem EU-OSHA lét gera.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Lesið allar niðurstöður rannsóknarinnar í framsýniskýrslunni (á ensku)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Frekari upplýsingar varðandi vinnuvernd í stuttu máli</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/ro/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"ro";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Cum să abordaţi riscurile noi şi emergente pentru sănătate şi securitate la locurile de muncă ecologice?";"<p>   În sectorul locurilor de muncă ecologice, aflat în plină expansiune, pot apărea riscuri noi şi emergente. Din acest motiv, în noiembrie 2013, am organizat la Bilbao un atelier împreună cu reţeaua noastră de autorităţi naţionale în domeniul sănătăţii şi securităţii în muncă. Dezbaterile au vizat modul de abordare a riscurilor noi şi emergente identificate de studiul prospectiv al EU-OSHA şi crearea în viitor de locuri de muncă ecologice mai sigure şi mai sănătoase.</p>  <p>   Un <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>rezumat al atelierului</a> furnizează informaţii despre procesele de planificare şi luare de decizii în ceea ce priveşte locurile de muncă ecologice care vizează factorii de decizie, sindicatele şi angajatorii din Europa.</p>  <p>   Atelierul s-a bazat pe concluziile unui studiu prospectiv de doi ani comandat de EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Citiţi toate concluziile în raportul studiului prospectiv (în engleză)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Mai multe informaţii despre SSM privind locurile de muncă ecologice pe scurt</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/pl/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"pl";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Jak zapobiec nowym zagrożeniom związanym z bezpieczeństwem i higieną pracy w „zielonych” miejscach pracy?";"<p>   W szybko rosnącym sektorze „zielonych” miejsc pracy możliwy jest rozwój nowych zagrożeń. Dlatego też w listopadzie 2013 r. zorganizowaliśmy w Bilbao warsztaty z udziałem przedstawicieli naszej sieci organów krajowych zajmujących się BHP. Dyskusja toczyła się wokół tematu zapobiegania nowym zagrożeniom wymienionym w badaniu prognostycznym EU-OSHA oraz stwarzania w przyszłości bezpieczniejszych i zdrowszych „zielonych” miejsc pracy.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Streszczenie warsztatów</a> zawiera informacje na temat planowania i podejmowania decyzji w „zielonych” miejscach pracy skierowane do europejskich decydentów, związków zawodowych i pracodawców.</p>  <p>   Warsztaty oparto na wnioskach z dwuletniego badania prognostycznego zleconego przez EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj pełne wnioski z badania w sprawozdaniu z prognozami (w języku angielskim)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Więcej informacji na temat BHP w „zielonych” miejscach pracy w skrócie</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/fr/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"fr";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Quelle réponse apporter aux risques émergents pour la santé et la sécurité dans les emplois verts?";"<p>   Il est probable que de nouveaux risques émergeront dans le secteur en croissance rapide des emplois verts. C'est la raison pour laquelle nous avons organisé un atelier à Bilbao, en novembre 2013, avec notre réseau d'autorités nationales, concernant la santé et la sécurité dans le cadre professionnel. Le débat a été consacré aux mesures à adopter pour remédier aux risques nouveaux mis en évidence dans l'étude prospective de EU-OSHA et les stratégies à adopter pour créer des emplois verts plus sains et plus sûrs dans l'avenir.</p>  <p>   Une <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>synthèse de l'atelier</a> présente des informations sur la planification et la prise de décision dans les emplois verts à l'intention des décideurs politiques, des organisations syndicales et des employeurs.</p>  <p>   L'atelier était basé sur les conclusions d'une étude prospective d'une durée de deux ans réalisée sur la base d'une commande de EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Prenez connaissance des conclusions de l'étude dans le rapport de prospective (en anglais)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Présentation synoptique d'informations complémentaires sur la sécurité et la santé au travail</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/sv/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"sv";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hur ska vi möta de nya och framväxande arbetsmiljöriskerna inom gröna jobb?";"<p>   I den snabbt expanderande sektorn för gröna jobb kommer det sannolikt att utvecklas nya, i dag okända, risker. Därför genomförde vi en workshop med vårt nätverk av nationella arbetsmiljömyndigheter i Bilbao i november 2013. Diskussionen inriktades på hur vi ska möta de nya och framväxande riskerna som beskrevs i EU-Oshas framtidsstudie om hur man skapar säkrare och hälsosammare gröna jobb i framtiden.</p>  <p>   I en <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>sammanfattning av workshopen</a> hittar du information om planering och beslutsfattande i samband med gröna jobb. Informationen riktar sig till europeiska beslutsfattare, fackföreningar och anställda.</p>  <p>   Workshopen grundades på resultaten från en tvåårig framtidsstudie som beställts av EU-Osha.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Läs samtliga resultat från studien i framtidsrapporten (på engelska).</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Mer koncentrerad information om arbetsmiljöfrågor i samband med gröna jobb.</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/sk/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"sk";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ako riešiť nové a vznikajúce riziká týkajúce sa bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia v oblasti zelených pracovných miest?";"<p>   V rýchlo sa rozrastajúcom odvetví zelených pracovných miest je pravdepodobné, že sa objavia nové a vznikajúce riziká. Preto sme v novembri 2013 v Bilbau usporiadali pracovný seminár so zástupcami siete vnútroštátnych orgánov venovaný bezpečnosti a ochrane zdravia pri práci. Diskusia bola zameraná na spôsoby riešenia nových a vznikajúcich rizík, ktoré sa určili v prognostickej štúdii agentúry EU-OSHA, a tiež na spôsoby vytvárania bezpečnejších a zdravších zelených pracovných miest do budúcnosti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Zhrnutie pracovného seminára</a> poskytuje informácie o plánovaní a rozhodovaní v oblasti zelených pracovných miest, ktoré sú určené európskym tvorcom politík, odborovým zväzom a zamestnancom.</p>  <p>   Tento pracovný seminár vychádzal z poznatkov získaných počas dvojročnej prognostickej štúdie, ktorú si objednala agentúra EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Prečítať si podrobné informácie o poznatkoch zo štúdie v prognostickej správe (v angličtine)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Ďalšie informácie o bezpečnosti a ochrane zdravia v oblasti zelených pracovných miest v skratke</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/mt/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"mt";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kif għandhom jiġu indirizzati riskji ġodda u emerġenti dwar is-sigurtà u s-saħħa f'impjiegi ekoloġiċi?";"<p>   Fis-settur tal-impjiegi ekoloġiċi li qed jespandi malajr, x'aktarx li jiżviluppaw riskji ġodda u emerġenti. Għal dan il-għan, f'Novembru 2013 f'Bilbao, organizzajna workshop dwar is-sigurtà u s-saħħa fuq il-post tax-xogħol flimkien man-netwerk tagħna ta' awtoritajiet nazzjonali. Id-dibattitu ffoka dwar kif għandhom jiġu indirizzati riskji ġodda u emerġenti identifikati fi studju ta' previżjoni tal-UE-OSHA u dwar kif għandhom jinħolqu impjiegi ekoloġiċi aktar siguri u inqas perikolużi fil-ġejjieni.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Summarju tal-workshop</a> joffri informazzjoni dwar l-ippjanar u t-teħid ta' deċiżjonijiet f'impjiegi ekoloġiċi mmirata lejn persuni li jfasslu l-politika, it-trejdunjins u l-impjegaturi Ewropej.</p>  <p>   Il-workshop kien ibbażat fuq is-sejbiet studju ta' previżjoni ta' sentejn ikkummissjonat mill-UE-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Aqra s-sejbiet sħaħ tal-istudju fir-rapport ta' previżjoni  (bil-Malti)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Aktar informazzjoni mad-daqqa t'għajn dwar l-OSH rigward impjiegi ekoloġiċi </a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/it/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"it";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Come far fronte a nuovi rischi emergenti per salute e sicurezza nei lavori verdi?";"<p>   Nel settore a rapida espansione dei lavori verdi, è probabile che emergano rischi di nuova natura. Per questo motivo nel novembre 2013 abbiamo organizzato a Bilbao un seminario sulla salute e la sicurezza sul lavoro in collaborazione con la nostra rete di autorità nazionali. Il dibattito si è concentrato sulle modalità di intervento nei confronti dei nuovi rischi emergenti enucleati dallo studio di previsione condotto dall'EU-OSHA, nonché sulle possibilità di creazione di lavori verdi più salubri e sicuri nel futuro.</p>  <p>   Una <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>sintesi del seminario</a> offre informazioni relative alla pianificazione e al processo decisionale concernente i lavori verdi indirizzato ai responsabili politici a livello europeo, ai sindacati e ai datori di lavoro.</p>  <p>   Il seminario si basava sugli esiti di uno studio di previsione svoltosi nell'arco di due anni commissionato dall'EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Leggi tutti gli esiti dello studio nel rapporto di previsione (in inglese)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Prospetto informativo su salute e sicurezza per i lavori verdi</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/cs/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"cs";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Jak se vypořádat s novými a vznikajícími riziky ohrožujícími bezpečnost a zdraví při práci na zelených pracovních místech?";"<p>   Lze předpokládat, že v rychle se rozvíjející oblasti zelených pracovních míst se začnou objevovat nová a vznikající rizika. Proto jsme v listopadu 2013 uspořádali v Bilbau seminář za účasti zástupců naší sítě vnitrostátních orgánů pověřených bezpečností a ochranou zdraví při práci. Diskuse se zaměřily na možné způsoby řešení nových a vznikajících rizik popsaných v prognostické studii agentury EU-OSHA a způsoby vytváření bezpečnějších a zdravějších zelených pracovních míst v budoucnosti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Shrnutí semináře</a> přináší informace o plánování a rozhodovacích postupech v oblasti zelených pracovních míst, které jsou určeny evropským politickým činitelům, odborovým organizacím a zaměstnavatelům.</p>  <p>   Obsahově seminář vycházel ze zjištění dvouleté prognostické studie, jejímž zadavatelem byla agentura EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si zjištění vyplývající ze studie v prognostické zprávě (v angličtině)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Orientační přehled dalších informací o BOZP v oblasti zelených pracovních míst</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/et/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"et";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kuidas ennetada uusi tervise- ja ohutusriske rohelistel töökohtadel?";"<p>   Roheliste töökohtade kiire arengu tõttu võivad selles sektoris tekkida uued riskid. Sel põhjusel korraldasime novembris 2013 Bilbaos riiklike asutuste võrgustiku kaasabil tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu seminari. Seminaril arutleti peamiselt selle üle, kuidas ennetada EU-OSHA prognoosiuuringus kindlakstehtud uusi riske ja kuidas luua tulevikus ohutumaid ja tervislikumaid rohelisi töökohti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Seminari kokkuvõte</a> pakub Euroopa poliitikutele, ametiühingutele ja tööandjatele teavet roheliste töökohtadega seotud planeerimis- ja otsustusprotsessi kohta.</p>  <p>   Seminar põhines EU-OSHA tellitud kaheaastase prognoosiuuringu tulemustel.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Prognoosiuuringu lõplikud tulemused (inglise keeles)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Roheliste töökohtade tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu lisateave</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/no/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"no";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hvordan bør vi håndtere nye og framvoksende HMS-risikoer forbundet med grønne jobber?";"<p>   Grønne jobber er en sektor i hurtig vekst der det er sannsynlig at det vil oppstå nye og framvoksende risikoer. Derfor arrangerte vi i Bilbao i november 2013 et seminar med vårt nettverk av nasjonale arbeidsmiljømyndigheter. Debatten fokuserte på hvordan vi bør håndtere de nye og framvoksende risikoene som ble identifisert i EU-OSHAs framsynsprosjekt, og på hvordan vi kan skape sikrere og mer helsefremmende grønne jobber for fremtiden.</p>  <p>   I <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>sammendraget fra seminaret</a> kan europeiske politikere, fagforeninger og arbeidsgivere finne informasjon om planlegging og beslutningstaking knyttet til grønne jobber.</p>  <p>   Seminaret var basert på funnene fra et toårig framsynsprosjekt bestilt av EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Les om alle funnene i framsynsrapporten (på engelsk)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Mer informasjon om HMS i grønne jobber</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/lv/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"lv";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kā novērst jaunus un nākotnes veselības un drošības riskus ekoloģiskajās darba vietās?";"<p>   Sagaidāms, ka strauji augošajā ekoloģisko darba vietu sektorā parādīsies jauni riska veidi. Tādēļ 2013. gada novembrī Bilbao mēs kopā ar valsts darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības tīklu organizējām darbsemināru. Apspriedēs galvenā uzmanība tika pievērsta jautājumam, kā novērst jaunus un nākotnes riskus, kuri ir konstatēti EU-OSHA prognožu pētījumā, un kā nākotnē izveidot drošākas un veselībai labvēlīgākas ekoloģiskās darba vietas.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Darbsemināra kopsavilkumā</a> ir sniegta informācija Eiropas politikas veidotājiem, arodbiedrībām un darba devējiem par plānošanu un lēmumu pieņemšanu attiecībā uz ekoloģiskajām darba vietām.</p>  <p>   Darbsemināra pamatā bija EU-OSHA pasūtītā divu gadu prognožu pētījuma secinājumi.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/foresight-on-new-and-emerging-risks-associated-with-new-technologies-by-2020-workshop-for-eu-focal-points/view<@#&>>Iepazīstieties ar visiem pētījuma secinājumiem prognožu ziņojumā (angļu valodā)</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/topics/green-jobs<@#&>>Plašāka informācija par drošību un veselības aizsardzību (DDVA) ekoloģiskajās darba vietās kopsavilkumā</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs/green jobs.jpg";"";"noValueSelected";"";"noValueSelected";"";""
"/lt/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"lt";"/en/teaser/how-to-address-new-and-emerging-safety-and-health-risks-in-green-jobs";"published";"2014-03-06 12:01:05";"2014-07-25 15:48:17";"2014-03-17 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ką daryti su naujais ir kylančiais pavojais darbuotojų saugai ir sveikatai ekologiškose darbo vietose?";"<p>   Sparčiai augančiame ekologiškų darbo vietų sektoriuje gali kilti naujų pavojų. Todėl 2013&nbsp;m. lapkričio mėn. Bilbao mieste drauge su savo nacionalinių profesinės saugos ir sveikatos tarnybų tinklo narėmis surengėme seminarą šia tema.
