"/pt/teaser/have-your-say";"pt";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Diga de sua justiça!";"<p>   A Agência Europeia para a Segurança e a Saúde no Trabalho (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) está a levar a cabo um inquérito para obter opiniões a respeito das suas atividades e dos resultados alcançados. Ajude-nos a fazê-lo, preenchendo um breve questionário, o que não levará mais de 15 minutos. O inquérito está a ser realizado para a EU-OSHA por parte do instituto de pesquisa do Reino Unido, o Institute for Employment Studies (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   O inquérito pode ser preenchido em todos os idiomas oficiais da UE, bem como em islandês e norueguês. Dê-nos a conhecer a sua opinião a respeito das nossas campanhas, publicações, site e divulgação de informações.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Clique aqui para começar.</a></p>  <p>   Muito obrigado!</p>";"";"/pt/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/have-your-say";"no";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"La din stemme bli hørt!";"<p>   Det europeiske arbeidsmiljøorganet (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) utfører en undersøkelse for å få tilbakemeldinger om sine aktiviteter og resultatene som er oppnådd. Vi ber deg hjelpe oss med dette ved å fylle ut et kort spørreskjema som ikke vil ta mer enn 15 minutter av tiden din. Undersøkelsen utføres for EU-OSHA av det britiske forskningsinstituttet Institute for Employment Studies (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Undersøkelsen kan fylles ut på alle offisielle EU-språk samt Islandsk og Norsk. Fortell oss hva du mener om våre kampanjer, publikasjoner, nettsted og informasjonsformidling.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Klikk her for å starte.</a></p>  <p>   Mange takk!</p>";"";"/no/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/have-your-say";"lv";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Izsakiet savu viedokli!";"<p>   Eiropas Darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības aģentūra (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) veic aptauju, lai noskaidrotu Jūsu viedokli par tās aktivitātēm un sasniegtajiem rezultātiem. Lūdzu palīdziet mums to izdarīt, aizpildot nelielu aptauju, kas neprasīs vairāk kā 15 minūtes Jūsu laika. Aptauju EU-OSHA&nbsp; vajadzībām veic Lielbritānijas Nodarbinātības izpētes institūts (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Aptauju iespējams aizpildīt visās oficiālajās ES valodās, kā arī islandiešu un norvēģu valodā. Lūdzu, pastāstiet mums, kāds ir Jūsu viedoklis par mūsu kampaņām, publikācijām, mājas lapu un pieejamo informāciju.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Spiediet šeit, lai sāktu aptauju.</a></p>  <p>   Paldies!</p>";"";"/lv/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/have-your-say";"lt";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tarkite savo žodį!";"<p>   Europos saugos ir sveikatos darbe agentūra (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) atlieka apklausą, norėdama gauti atsiliepimų apie savo veiklą ir pasiektus rezultatus. Padėkite mums tai padaryti užpildydami trumpą klausimyną – tai užtruks ne daugiau kaip 15 minučių. EU-OSHA užsakymu apklausą atlieka JK tyrimų institucija „Užimtumo studijų institutas“ (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Apklausos klausimyną galima pildyti visomis oficialiosiomis ES bei islandų ir norvegų kalbomis. Pasakykite, ką galvojate apie mūsų kampanijas, leidinius, svetainę ir informacijos platinimą.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Norėdami pradėti, spauskite čia.</a></p>  <p>   Dėkojame!</p>";"";"/lt/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Last reminder: Have your say!";"<p>   The European Agency for Safety and Health at Work (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) is conducting a survey to obtain feedback on its activities and the results achieved. Please help us to do this by completing this short questionnaire, which will take you no more than 15 minutes. The survey is being carried out for EU-OSHA by the UK research institute, the Institute for Employment Studies (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   The survey can be completed in all official EU languages as well as Icelandic and Norwegian. Please tell us what you think about our campaigns, publications, website and information dissemination.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Click here to begin.</a></p>  <p>   Thank you!</p>";"";"/en/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/have-your-say";"is";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Láttu heyra í þér!";"<p>   Evrópska vinnuverndarstofnunin (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) stendur nú fyrir könnun til að heyra hvað fólki finnist um aðgerðir hennar og frammistöðu. Vinsamlega aðstoðaðu okkur við þetta með því að svara stuttum spurningalista, sem tekur í mesta lagi 15 mínútur. Framkvæmdaraðili könnunarinnar er breska rannsóknarstofnunin Institute for Employment Studies (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Hægt er að svara könnuninni á öllum opinberum tungumálum innan ESB auk íslensku og norsku. Vinsamlega láttu okkur vita hvað þér finnst um herferðir okkar, útgáfu, vefsíður og upplýsingamiðlun.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Smelltu hér til að byrja.</a></p>  <p>   Þakka þér fyrir!</p>";"";"/is/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/have-your-say";"el";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Πείτε τη γνώμη σας!";"<p>   Ο Ευρωπαϊκός Οργανισμός για την Ασφάλεια και την Υγεία στην Εργασία (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) διεξάγει μία έρευνα για τη συλλογή σχολίων σχετικά με τις δραστηριότητές του και τα αποτελέσματα που έχει επιτύχει. Παρακαλούμε βοηθήστε μας συμπληρώνοντας ένα σύντομο ερωτηματολόγιο, το οποίο δεν θα σας πάρει περισσότερο από 15 λεπτά. Η έρευνα διεξάγεται για τον EU-OSHA από το Ινστιτούτο Ερευνών του Ηνωμένου Βασιλείου, το Ινστιτούτο Επαγγελματικών Σπουδών (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Το ερωτηματολόγιο μπορεί να συμπληρωθεί σε όλες τις επίσημες γλώσσες της ΕΕ καθώς και στα Ισλανδικά και τα Νορβηγικά. Παρακαλούμε πείτε μας τη γνώμη σας σχετικά με τις εκστρατείες μας, τις εκδόσεις μας, τον ιστότοπό μας και τη διάδοση των πληροφοριών μας.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Κάντε κλικ εδώ για να ξεκινήσετε.</a></p>  <p>   Ευχαριστούμε!</p>";"";"/el/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/have-your-say";"sl";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Povejte svoje mnenje!";"<p>   Evropska agencija za varnost in zdravje pri delu (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) izvaja anketo za pridobitev povratnih informacij o svojih dejavnostih in doseženih rezultatih. Pomagajte nam, tako da izpolnite kratek vprašalnik, ki vam ne bo vzel več kot 15 minut vašega časa. Anketo za EU-OSHA izvaja britanski raziskovalni Inštitut za raziskave zaposlovanja (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Anketo je mogoče izpolniti v vseh uradnih jezikih EU ter v islandščini in norveščini. Delite z nami svoje mnenje o naših kampanjah, publikacijah, spletni strani in širjenju informacij.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Za začetek kliknite tukaj.</a></p>  <p>   Hvala!</p>";"";"/sl/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/have-your-say";"sv";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Låt din röst bli hörd!";"<p>   Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyrån (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) har inlett en undersökning för att få synpunkter på verksamheten och de resultat som uppnåtts. Hjälp oss att göra detta genom att fylla i en kort enkät som inte tar dig mer än 15 minuter. Undersökningen genomförs för EU-OSHA av det brittiska forskningsinstitutet, Institutet för arbetsmarknadsstudier (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Enkäten kan fyllas i på alla officiella EU-språk samt isländska och norska. Tala om för oss vad du tycker om våra kampanjer, publikationer, vår hemsida och informationsspridning.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Klicka här för att börja.</a></p>  <p>   Tack!</p>";"";"/sv/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/have-your-say";"sk";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vyjadrite svoj názor!";"<p>   Európska agentúra pre bezpečnosť a&nbsp;ochranu zdravia pri&nbsp;práci (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) spúšťa prieskum, ktorého cieľom je získanie spätnej väzby o&nbsp;svojich aktivitách a&nbsp;dosiahnutých výsledkoch. Z&nbsp;tohto dôvodu Vás oslovujeme a&nbsp;žiadame o&nbsp;vyplnenie krátkeho dotazníka, ktorý Vám nebude trvať viac ako 15 minút. Tento prieskum uskutočňuje Britský inštitút pre výskum, Inštitút pre štúdium zamestnanosti (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>) na žiadosť agentúry EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Prieskum je možné vyplniť vo všetkých úradných jazykoch EU a&nbsp;tiež v&nbsp;islandčine a&nbsp;nórčine. Prosím, povedzte nám, čo si myslíte o&nbsp;našich kampaniach, publikáciách, webovej stránke a&nbsp;šírení informácií.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Ak chcete začať, kliknite sem.</a></p>  <p>   Ďakujeme!</p>";"";"/sk/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/have-your-say";"mt";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Għid tiegħek!";"<p>   L-Aġenzija Ewropea għas-Saħħa u s-Sigurtà fuq il-Post tax-Xogħol (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) qed tagħmel stħarriġ biex tikseb kummenti dwar l-attivitajiet tagħha u r-riżultati miksuba. Jekk jogħġbok għinna nagħmlu dan billi timla kwestjonarju qasir, li se jeħodlok&nbsp; mhux aktar minn 15-il minuta. L-istħarriġ qed jitwettaq għall-UE-OSHA mill-istitut tar-riċerka tar-Renju Unit, l-Istitut għall-Istudji dwar l-Impjiegi (Institute for Employment Studies) (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   L-istħarriġ jista’ jsir fil-lingwi uffiċjali kollha tal-UE kif ukoll fil-lingwa Iżlandiża u Norveġiża. Jekk jogħġbok għidilna x’taħseb dwar il-kampanji, il-pubblikazzjonijiet, u s-sit elettroniku tagħna, u dwar kif inqassmu l-informazzjoni.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Ikklikkja hawnhekk biex tibda.</a></p>  <p>   Grazzi!</p>";"";"/mt/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/have-your-say";"hu";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Mondja el a véleményét!";"<p>   Az Európai Munkahelyi Biztonsági és Egészségvédelmi Ügynökség (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) felmérést végez, mert szeretne visszajelzést kapni tevékenységeiről és az elért eredményekről. Kérjük, egy rövid kérdőív kitöltésével segítsen nekünk – ez legfeljebb 15 percet vesz igénybe. A felmérést az EU-OSHA megbízásából az Egyesült Királyságban található Institute for Employment Studies kutatóintézet végzi. (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   A kérdőívet az EU bármely hivatalos nyelvén, valamint izlandi és norvég nyelven is kitöltheti. Kérjük, mondja el, mit gondol a kampányainkról, kiadványainkról, weblapunkról, és arról, ahogyan információkat közlünk.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>A kezdéshez kattintson ide.</a></p>  <p>   Köszönjük!</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/have-your-say";"fi";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kerro mielipiteesi.";"<p>   Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusvirasto (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) tekee haastattelututkimusta, jonka avulla on tarkoitus saada palautetta viraston toiminnasta ja saavutetuista tuloksista. Auta meitä tutkimuksessamme täyttämällä lyhyt kyselylomake, johon vastaamiseen kuluu korkeintaan 15 minuuttia. Haastattelututkimuksen EU-OSHAlle tekee Yhdistyneessä kuningaskunnassa toimiva tutkimuslaitos nimeltään the Institute for Employment Studies (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Kyselytutkimukseen voi vastata kaikilla virallisilla EU:n kielillä sekä islannin ja norjan kielillä. Kerro meille mitä mieltä olet kampanjoistamme, julkaisuistamme, www-sivustostamme ja tiedonvälityksestämme.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Aloita napsauttamalla tästä.</a></p>  <p>   Kiitos!</p>";"";"/fi/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/have-your-say";"da";"/en/teaser/have-your-say";"published";"2014-02-04 11:07:50";"2014-07-25 15:16:59";"2014-03-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Lad os høre din mening!";"<p>   Arbejdsmiljøagenturet (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da<@#&>>EU-OSHA</a>) er ved at foretage en undersøgelse for at få feedback på deres aktiviteter og de opnåede resultater. Hjælp os hermed ved at udfylde et kort spørgeskema, der ikke vil tage dig mere end 15 minutter. Undersøgelsen udføres for EU-OSHA af det engelske forskningsinstitut Institute for Employment Studies (<a href=<@#&>http://www.employment-studies.co.uk/main/index.php<@#&>>IES</a>).</p>  <p>   Undersøgelsen kan besvares på alle officielle EU-sprog såvel som på islandsk og norsk. Fortæl os, hvad du mener om vores kampagner, publikationer, website og vidensformidling.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=139325906650<@#&>>Klik her for at begynde</a></p>  <p>   Tak!</p>";"";"/da/teaser/have-your-say/survey.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/long-term-trends-of-work-accidents-and-occupational-diseases-in-belgium-2013-eurogip-overview";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-10 16:43:55";"2014-03-10 16:44:54";"2014-03-10 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Long-term trends of work accidents and occupational diseases in Belgium – EUROGIP overview";"<p>   The EUROGIP overview presents figures on work-related injuries in the private sector for which the Belgian insurance system for work accidents&nbsp; and occupational diseases is dual. Occupational and commuting accidents are covered by the Fonds des accidents du travail (FAT) (occupational accidents fund) and occupational diseases by&nbsp; the Fonds des maladies professionelles (FMP) (Occupational diseases fund) Statistics cover time trends in occupational accidents and diseases and detailed figures on compensation.&nbsp; The figures were compiled from the <a href=<@#&>http://www.fmp-fbz.fgov.be/web/pdfdocs/Publicaties/FR/Rapport%20Annuel%20FMP%202012.pdf<@#&>>Funds´ 2012 annual report.</a></p>";"<p>   Overall work accidents (with more than a day absence from work) have been about halved since 1985, while the number of commuting accidents stayed about the same. However, for fatal accidents, similar decreases are observed for both categories.</p>  <p>   Regarding long-term absences from work due to accidents, the decreases are not so marked, and the health care sector stands out as a sector where long absences have rather increased.<br />   At the end of 2012 a little more than 54,000 work incapacities due to diseases were compensated and the annual costs&nbsp; were 281 million Eur.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.eurogip.fr/images/documents/3639/Eurogip_92F.pdf<@#&>>Read the report (in FR) </a></p>";"/en/news/long-term-trends-of-work-accidents-and-occupational-diseases-in-belgium-2013-eurogip-overview/Eurogip.gif";"";"statistics, accident_prevention";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"el";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"ρόνια Πολλά σε όλες τις εργαζόμενες γυναίκες για την Παγκόσμια Ημέρα  της Γυναίκας!";"<p>   Αποκαλούμενη αρχικά Παγκόσμια Ημέρα της εργαζόμενης γυναίκας, η 8η Μαρτίου γιορτάζεται εδώ και περισσότερα από 100 χρόνια προς αναγνώριση του ρόλου των γυναικών και της συνεισφοράς τους στην κοινωνία.</p>  <p>   Οι γυναίκες αποτελούν το 45% του απασχολούμενου πληθυσμού στην Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση. Εξακολουθούν, ωστόσο, να υπάρχουν πάρα πολλοί χώροι εργασίας που έχουν σχεδιαστεί επάνω στο πρότυπο ενός τυπικού άνδρα εργαζόμενου.</p>  <p>   Χρειάζεται, επομένως, η υιοθέτηση μιας προσέγγισης ευαίσθητης στα ζητήματα των δύο φύλων στον τομέα της ασφάλειας και της υγείας στην εργασία, με στόχο τη διασφάλιση ασφαλέστερου, υγιεινότερου και παραγωγικότερου εργασιακού βίου για τις γυναίκες.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Διαβάστε την έκθεση του Οργανισμού: «New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work» (Νέοι κίνδυνοι και τάσεις στον τομέα της ασφάλειας και της υγείας των γυναικών στην εργασία).</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την περίληψη</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/el/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Περισσότερες πληροφορίες σχετικά με την υγεία των γυναικών στην εργασία.</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"da";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Glædelig international kvindedag til alle arbejdende kvinder!";"<p>   Den 8. marts blev oprindelig kaldt den internationale arbejderkvindedag og har været fejret i mere end 100 år som en anerkendelse af kvindernes rolle og deres bidrag til samfundet. Kvinderne udgør 45 % af arbejdsstyrken i Den Europæiske Union. Men alt for mange arbejdspladser udformes stadig med en typisk mandlig arbejdstager in mente. Der er behov for en 'kønsspecifik' indfaldsvinkel til arbejdsmiljøet for at gøre kvinders arbejdsliv mere sundt, sikkert og produktivt.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Læs agenturets rapport: 'Nye risici og tendenser inden for kvinders arbejdsmiljø'.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Læs sammendraget</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/da/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Læs mere om kvinder og arbejdsmiljø.</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"sv";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Vi önskar alla arbetande kvinnor en trevlig internationell kvinnodag";"<p>   Ursprungligen kallades 8 mars för internationella arbetarkvinnornas dag och den har firats i mer än 100 år som ett erkännande av kvinnors roll och deras bidrag till samhället. Kvinnorna utgör 45 procent av arbetskraften i EU. Men fortfarande är alltför många arbetsplatser utformade med tanke på en typisk manlig arbetstagare. Ett genusmedvetet sätt krävs i arbetet med arbetsmiljöfrågor för att göra kvinnors arbetsliv hälsosammare, säkrare och produktivare.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Läs arbetsmiljöbyråns rapport: <@#&>New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work<@#&> (Nya risker och trender i kvinnors arbetsmiljö).</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Läs sammanfattningen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sv/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Läs mer om Kvinnor och arbetsmiljö.</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"sk";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Všetkým pracujúcim ženám blahoželáme k Medzinárodnému dňu žien!";"<p>   Pôvodne pod názvom Medzinárodný deň pracujúcich žien sa 8. marec oslavuje už viac ako 100 rokov ako uznanie úlohy a príspevku žien v našej spoločnosti. Ženy tvoria 45% zamestnanej populácie v Európskej únii. Veľa pracovných miest je však ešte stále nastavených na mužských zamestnancov. V rámci bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia pri práci je preto potrebné zaviesť prístup podľa príslušnosti k pohlaviu, aby sa život žien pri práci stal zdravší, bezpečnejší a produktívnejší.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Správa agentúry s názvom Nové riziká a trendy v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia žien pri práci.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Prečítajte si súhrn</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sk/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Ďalšie informácie o ženách a ochrane zdravia pri práci</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"mt";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Awguri lin-nisa ħaddiema kollha fil-Jum Internazzjonali tan-Nisa!";"<p>   It-8 ta’ Marzu, li oriġinarjament kien jissejjaħ il-Jum Internazzjonali tan-Nisa Ħaddiema, ilu jiġi ċċelebrat aktar minn 100 sena biex jirrikonoxxi r-rwol tan-nisa u l-kontributi tagħhom lis-soċjetà. In-nisa jammontaw għal 45% tal-popolazzjoni impjegata fl-Unjoni Ewropea. Iżda għad hemm wisq postijiet tax-xogħol li huma mfasslin bil-ħsieb ta’ ħaddiem tipiku maskili. Huwa meħtieġ approċċ aktar ‘sensittiv għall-ġeneru’ għas-saħħa u s-sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol biex il-ħajja fuq il-post tax-xogħol għan-nisa tkun aktar ħielsa mill-periklu, sigura u aktar produttiva.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Aqra r-rapport tal-Aġenzija: 'Riskji u xejriet ġodda fis-sigurtà u s-saħħa tan-nisa fuq il-post tax-xogħol'.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Aqra s-sommarju</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/mt/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Aqra aktar dwar in-Nisa u s-saħħa fuq il-post tax-xogħol.</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"sl";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Čestitke vsem delovnim ženskam ob mednarodnem dnevu žena!";"<p>   8. marec, ki se je prvotno imenoval mednarodni dan delovnih žena, že več kot 100 let praznujemo v počastitev pomembne vloge žensk in njihovega prispevka v družbi. Ženske predstavljajo 45 % vseh zaposlenih ljudi v Evropski uniji, a je vseeno preveč delovnih mest zasnovanih izključno za delavce moškega spola. Zato je pri obravnavanju varnosti in zdravja pri delu potreben pristop enakopravnosti spolov, da bo poklicno življenje žensk bolj zdravo, varnejše in bolj produktivno.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sl/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Preberite več o ženskah in zdravju pri delu.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Preberite poročilo agencije: „Nova tveganja in usmeritve pri varnosti in zdravju žensk na delovnem mestu“</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"de";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Allen arbeitenden Frauen einen schönen Weltfrauentag!";"<p>   Der 8. Mai wird seit mehr als 100 Jahren als Weltfrauentag (ursprünglich: Internationaler Tag der arbeitenden Frauen) gefeiert, um die Rolle der Frauen und ihren Beitrag zur Gesellschaft anzuerkennen. Frauen machen 45 % der Erwerbsbevölkerung in der Europäischen Union aus. Allerdings gibt es immer noch zu viele Arbeitsplätze, bei deren Gestaltung von typischen männlichen Arbeitnehmern ausgegangen wird. Im Hinblick auf Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit bedarf es somit eines „geschlechtersensiblen“ Ansatzes, um das Leben von Frauen gesünder, sicherer und produktiver zu machen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Bericht der Agentur: Neue Risiken und Entwicklungen im Bereich Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz von Frauen bei der Arbeit</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Lesen Sie die Zusammenfassung</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/de/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lesen Sie mehr zum Thema Frauen und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"hu";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Boldog nőnapot kívánunk minden dolgozó nőnek!";"<p>   A március 8-i Nemzetközi Nőnapon már több mint 100 éve ünneplik a nők társadalmi szerepét és részvételét. Az Európai Unió aktív foglalkoztatott lakosságának 45%-a nő. Ennek ellenére még így is túl sok az olyan munkahely, amelyeket a férfi dolgozókat szem előtt tartva alakítanak ki. A munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem társadalmi nemeket érzékenyebben kezelő megközelítésére van szükség ahhoz, hogy a nők munkával töltött életszakasza egészségesebbé, biztonságosabbá és termelékenyebbé válhasson.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Olvassa el az „Új kockázatok és tendenciák a nők munkahelyi biztonsága és egészségvédelme terén” című ügynökségi jelentést (New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Összefoglalás</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/hu/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Bővebben: Nők és munkahelyi egészségvédelem</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"fi";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Hyvää kansainvälistä naistenpäivää kaikille työtä tekeville naisille!";"<p>   Naistenpäivää vietetään 8. maaliskuuta. Alun perin sitä kutsuttiin kansainväliseksi työläisnaisten päiväksi. Naistenpäivää on juhlittu yli 100 vuotta tunnustuksena naisten roolista ja panoksesta yhteiskunnassa. EU-maiden työssä käyvästä väestöstä 45 prosenttia on naisia. Silti liian monet työpaikat on suunniteltu tyypillistä miestyöntekijää silmällä pitäen. Sukupuolisensitiivistä työsuojelua tarvitaan naisten työelämän muuttamiseksi terveellisemmäksi, turvallisemmaksi ja tuottavammaksi.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lue viraston raportti naisten työterveyteen ja -turvallisuuteen vaikuttavista uusista riskeistä ja suuntauksista.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Lue yhteenveto</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/fi/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lue lisää naisista ja työterveydestä.</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"no";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Gratulerer med den internasjonale kvinnedagen, alle arbeidende kvinner!";"<p>   I over 100 år har 8. mars, som opprinnelig ble kalt Den internasjonale dagen for arbeidende kvinner, blitt markert for å anerkjenne kvinners rolle i og bidrag til samfunnet. Kvinner utgjør 45 % av den arbeidende befolkningen i EU. Likevel er mange arbeidsplasser fremdeles utformet med den typiske mannlige arbeidstakeren for øye. Det trengs en <@#&>kjønnssensitiv<@#&> tilnærming til helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen for å sikre kvinner et sunnere, sikrere og mer produktivt arbeidsliv.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Les rapporten: <@#&>Nye HMS-risikoer og -trender for kvinner på arbeidsplassen<@#&></a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Les sammendraget</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/no/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Les mer om kvinner og helse på arbeidsplassen</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"lv";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Daudz laimes Starptautiskajā sieviešu dienā visām strādājošajām sievietēm!";"<p>   Sākumā par Starptautisko strādājošo sieviešu dienu dēvētie svētki – 8. marts – tiek svinēti jau vairāk nekā 100 gadus, tādējādi novērtējot sieviešu lomu un viņu ieguldījumu sabiedrībā. Eiropas Savienībā sievietes veido 45 % no kopējā nodarbināto skaita. Taču vēl joprojām darbavietas parasti tiek radītas darba ņēmējiem – vīriešiem. Lai padarītu sieviešu darba dzīvi veselīgāku, drošāku un ražīgāku, jautājumos saistībā ar veselību un drošību darba vietā ir nepieciešama dzimumu līdztiesības pieeja.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lasiet aģentūras ziņojumu: '<@#&>Jaunie riska veidi un tendences saistībā ar sieviešu drošību un veselību darba vietā<@#&></a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Lasīt kopsavilkumu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/lv/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lasiet vairāk par sievietēm un viņu veselību darba vietā.</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"lt";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Sveikiname visas dirbančias moteris Tarptautinės moters dienos proga!";"<p>   Jau daugiau kaip 100 metų kovo 8-ąją, iš pradžių vadintą Tarptautine dirbančių moterų diena, švenčiama moters diena, kuria pripažįstamas moters vaidmuo ir indėlis visuomenės gyvenime. 45 proc. visų dirbančiųjų Europos Sąjungoje sudaro moterys. Vis dėlto dar daug darbo vietų kuriama turint galvoje tipiško darbuotojo vyro poreikius. Kad moterys galėtų dirbti sveikesnėmis ir saugesnėmis sąlygomis, ir jų darbas būtų našesnis, darbuotojų sveikatos ir saugos klausimus būtina spręsti atsižvelgiant į lyčių aspektus.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Skaityti agentūros ataskaitą „Nauji rizikos veiksniai ir tendencijos dirbančių moterų saugos ir sveikatos srityje“.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Skaitykite santrauką</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/lt/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Plačiau apie moteris ir sveikatą darbe.</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"en";"";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Happy International Women’s Day to all working women!";"<p>   Originally called International Working Women's Day, 8th of March has been celebrated for more than 100 years to recognise the role of women and their contributions to society.<br />   Women make up 45% of the employed population in the European Union. But still too many workplaces are designed with a typical male worker in mind.<br />   A 'gender sensitive' approach to health and safety at work is needed to make the working lives of women healthier, safe and more productive.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&>>Read the Agency report: 'New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work'.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Read the summary</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/en/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Read more about Women and health at work.</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"is";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Óskum öllum vinnandi konum gleðilegan alþjóðlegan kvennadag!";"<p>   Upphaflega var dagurinn nefndur Alþjóðlegi verkakvennadagurinn en 8. mars hefur verið fagnað í meira 100 ár í því skyni að viðurkenna hlutverk kvenna og framlag þeirra til samfélagsins. Konur eru 45% allra vinnandi handa í Evrópusambandinu. En enn eru of margir vinnustaðir hannaðir með venjulegan karlkyns starfsmann í huga. Þörf er á nálgun, sem beinist að mismunandi eiginleikum kynjanna, þegar kemur að vinnuverndarmálum til þess að gera líf kvenna í vinnunni heilbrigðara, öruggara og afkastameira.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lesa skýrslu stofnunarinnar: „Nýjar hættur og stefnur í vinnuverndarmálum kvenna“.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Lesa samantektina</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/is/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Fræðast meira um konur og heilbrigði á vinnustöðum.</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"it";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Felice giornata internazionale della donna a tutte le donne lavoratrici!";"<p>   Inizialmente denominata Giornata internazionale delle donne lavoratrici, l’8 marzo è stato celebrato per oltre 100 anni per riconoscere il ruolo delle donne e i loro contributi alla società. Le donne rappresentano il 45% della popolazione attiva dell’Unione europea. Pur tuttavia, troppi posti di lavoro sono delineati avendo il tipico lavoratore maschio in mente. Un approccio 'sensibile al genere' alla salute e la sicurezza è necessario per rendere le vite lavorative delle donne più sane, più sicure e più produttive.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Leggete la relazione dell’Agenzia: 'New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work'.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Leggi la sintesi</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/it/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Maggiori informazioni sulle donne e la salute sul lavoro.</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"pl";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Wszystkiego najlepszego z okazji Dnia Kobiet dla wszystkich pracujących pań!";"<p>   8 marca, początkowo nazywany Międzynarodowym Dniem Kobiet Pracujących, obchodzi się od ponad stu lat, aby wyrazić uznanie dla roli kobiet i ich wkładu do społeczeństwa. Kobiety stanowią 45% ogółu zatrudnionych w Unii Europejskiej, jednak zbyt wiele miejsc pracy wciąż powstaje z myślą o typowych pracownikach płci męskiej. Podejście do BHP uwzględniające kwestię płci jest niezbędne, aby życie zawodowe kobiet było zdrowsze, bezpieczniejsze i wydajniejsze.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Sprawozdanie Agencji: Nowe zagrożenia i tendencje dotyczące bezpieczeństwia i zdrowia kobiet w pracy</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj podsumowanie</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pl/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Więcej informacji o kobietach i zdrowiu w pracy</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"fr";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Heureuse Journée internationale des femmes à toutes les femmes au travail!";"<p>   Initialement appelée Journée internationale des femmes au travail, cette journée du 8 mars est célébrée depuis plus de 100 ans en reconnaissance du rôle des femmes et de leur contribution à la société. Les femmes représentent 45% de la population active au sein de l’Union européenne, mais il n’en reste pas moins que, trop souvent encore, les lieux de travail sont conçus d’un point de vue typiquement masculin. Il faut donc recourir à une approche de la sécurité et de la santé sur le lieu de travail «tenant compte du genre» pour que la vie professionnelle des femmes soit plus sûre, plus saine et plus productive.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lire le rapport de l'Agence: 'New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work' [Nouveaux risques et nouvelles tendances de la sécurité et de la santé des femmes dans le cadre professionnel].</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Lire le résumé</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/fr/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>En savoir plus sur les femmes et la santé dans le cadre professionnel.</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"bg";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Поздравяваме всички работещи жени с Международния ден на жената!";"<p>   Наречен първоначално Международен ден на трудещите се жени, 8 март се празнува от повече от век като ден за признание на ролята на жените и техния принос за обществото. Жените съставляват 45% от заетото население в Европейския съюз. Твърде много работни места обаче все още са организирани според особеностите на мъжете. За да бъде трудовият живот на жената по-здравословен, по-безопасен и по-продуктивен, е необходим подход към безопасността и здравето, който е съобразен с въпросите на пола.</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Прочетете доклада на Агенцията: „Нови рискове и тенденции в безопасността и здравето на работещите жени“</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Прочетете резюмето</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/bg/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Прочетете повече за жените и здравето при работа</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

But still too many workplaces are designed with a typical male worker in mind.<br />   A 'gender sensitive' approach to health and safety at work is needed to make the working lives of women healthier, safe and more productive.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&>>Read the Agency report: 'New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work'.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Read the summary</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Read more about Women and health at work.</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"es";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"¡Feliz Día Internacional de la Mujer a todas las trabajadoras!";"<p>   Originalmente denominado Día Internacional de la Mujer Trabajadora, el 8 de marzo se celebra desde hace más de cien años en reconocimiento del papel de la mujer y de su contribución a la sociedad.</p>  <p>   Las mujeres constituyen el 45% por de la población empleada en la Unión Europea, y sin embargo todavía son muchos los lugares de trabajo que se diseñan teniendo en mente un trabajador varón típico. Es preciso un enfoque de la seguridad y la salud ‘sensible al género’ para que la vida laboral de las mujeres trabajadoras sea más sana, segura y productiva.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lea el informe de la Agencia: 'New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work' (en ingles; ‘Nuevos riesgos y tendencias en la seguridad y la salud de la mujer en el trabajo).</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Lea el resumen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/es/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Otras lecturas sobre la mujer y la salud en el trabajo.</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"nl";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Een fijne internationale vrouwendag voor alle werkende vrouwen!";"<p>   Oorspronkelijk werd 8 maart de internationale dag van de werkende vrouw genoemd. De dag wordt al ruim 100 jaar gevierd als erkenning van de rol van vrouwen en haar bijdrage aan de maatschappij. Het aandeel vrouwen in de beroepsbevolking in de EU bedraagt 45%. “Maar teveel werkplekken worden nog steeds ontworpen met de typische mannelijke arbeidskracht in gedachten”. Er bestaat behoefte aan een ‘gendergevoelige’ benadering van gezondheid en veiligheid op het werk om het arbeidsleven van vrouwen gezonder, veiliger en productiever te maken.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lees het verslag van het Agentschap over nieuwe risico’s en trends op het gebied van veiligheid en gezondheid van vrouwen op het werk.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Lees de samenvatting</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/nl/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lees meer over vrouwen en gezondheid op het werk.</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"cs";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Šťastný Mezinárodní den žen všem pracujícím ženám!";"<p>   Úlohu a přínos žen v naší společnosti si dne 8. března připomínáme již více než 100 let, původně pod názvem Mezinárodní den pracujících žen. Ženy tvoří 45 % zaměstnané populace v Evropské unii. Stále však existuje příliš mnoho pracovišť, při jejichž navrhování se myslelo jen na typického mužského pracovníka. V rámci bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci je zapotřebí zaujmout přístup, který zohledňuje rovnost žen a mužů, aby byl pracovní život žen zdravější, bezpečnější a produktivnější.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Přečtěte si zprávu agentury: „New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work“ (Nová rizika a trendy v bezpečnosti a ochraně zdraví žen při práci).</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si shrnutí</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/cs/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Přečtěte si více na téma Ženy a ochrana zdraví při práci</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"et";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Head rahvusvahelist naistepäeva kõigile töötavatele naistele!";"<p>   Naistepäeva 8. märtsi, mille algne nimetus oli „kogu maailma töötavate naiste päev”, on tähistatud juba üle 100 aasta, et tunnustada naiste rolli ja panust ühiskonnaelus. Naised moodustavad Euroopa Liidu töötajatest 45%, kuid paljud töökohad on sisse seatud tüüpilist meestöötajat silmas pidades. Sellepärast tuleks tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu juhtimisel võtta arvesse sugudevahelisi erinevusi, et tagada naistele tervislikumad ja ohutumad töötingimused ning suurendada nende tootlikkust.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>OSHA aruanne „Naistöötajate tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu uued riskid ja suundumused<@#&></a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Kokkuvõte</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/et/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lisateave naiste töötervishoiu kohta</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"pt";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"A todas as mulheres trabalhadores um Feliz Dia Internacional da Mulher!";"<p>   Inicialmente denominado Dia Internacional da Mulher Trabalhadora, o dia 8 de março é celebrado há mais de 100 anos em reconhecimento do papel desempenhado pelas mulheres e do respetivo contributo para a sociedade. As mulheres constituem 45% da população ativa da União Europeia. No entanto, são ainda demasiados os locais de trabalho configurados tendo em mente o trabalhador masculino convencional. Torna-se necessário adotar uma abordagem à saúde e segurança no trabalho que tenha em conta a dimensão do género, por forma a tornar mais saudável, segura e produtiva a vida profissional das mulheres.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Ler o relatório da Agência: “New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work” (novos riscos e tendências em matéria de segurança e saúde das mulheres no trabalho).</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Ler o resumo</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pt/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Ler mais sobre as Mulheres e a saúde no trabalho.</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"ro";"/en/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women";"published";"2012-02-24 09:55:15";"2014-07-25 15:11:15";"2014-03-07 02:00:00";"tijero";"Cu ocazia Zilei internaţionale a femeii, adresăm felicitări tuturor femeilor active!";"<p>   Numită iniţial Ziua internaţională a femeilor din câmpul muncii, 8 Martie se sărbătoreşte de peste 100 de ani pentru a cinsti rolul femeilor şi contribuţiile lor la societate. Deşi femeile reprezintă 45% din populaţia activă a Uniunii Europene, multe locuri de muncă sunt încă concepute ca pentru un model tipic de lucrător masculin. Este necesară o abordare sensibilă la perspectiva de gen a SSM pentru ca femeile să aibă o viaţa profesională mai sănătoasă, mai sigură şi mai productivă.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work/view<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Citiţi raportul agenţiei: Noi riscuri şi tendinţe în securitatea şi sănătatea femeilor la locul de muncă</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-new-risks-trends-osh-women/view<@#&>>Citiţi rezumatul</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/ro/priority_groups/gender<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Citiţi mai multe despre femei şi sănătatea la locul de muncă.</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/happy-international-women-day-to-all-working-women/woman day (Medium).jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-partnership-meeting-managing-stress-makes-sound-business-sense";"en";"";"deleted";"2014-03-05 15:38:32";"2014-07-25 15:30:21";"2014-03-05 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Healthy Workplaces Campaign Partnership meeting: Managing stress makes sound business sense";"<p>   With less than a month to go before the official launch of the new Healthy Workplaces Campaign, EU-OSHA is calling at international and European organisations and companies to join the 2014-15 HWC Partnership meeting, which takes place on 8th of April in Brussels.</p>  <p>   The event will see the contributions of leading European businesses, workers’ and employers’ organizations, and the interventions of European occupational safety and health experts. During the meeting the new Official Campaign Partnership Offer will be presented, featuring new opportunities for Partners such as the new dedicated OCP Good Practice Award at European level, and more networking and learning- exchange opportunities, such as the Benchmarking initiatives.</p>  <p>   European and international organisations and companies are invited to join a forum of leading public and private organisations to discuss and share how to get involved in the 2014-15 Campaign, and effectively manage stress and psychosocial risks in the workplace.</p>  <p>   Contact us to register to the meeting.<br />   2014-15 Official Campaign Partnership Offer<br />   Learn more about the Healthy Workplaces Campaigns</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-partnership-meeting-managing-stress-makes-sound-business-sense/HWC 2014-2015.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/new-international-guidelines-for-safe-load-securing-in-road-transport";"en";"";"published";"2014-03-31 09:53:32";"2014-03-31 09:53:47";"2014-03-01 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"New international guidelines for safe load securing in road transport";"<p>   The International Road Transport Union (IRU) has published International Guidelines on Safe Load Securing for Road Transport to promote safe practices for the transport of goods by road.</p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.iru.org/cms-filesystem-action/mix-publications/SafeLoadSecuring8th.pdf<@#&>>Download the IRU’s International Guidelines on Safe Load Securing</a></p>";"/en/news/new-international-guidelines-for-safe-load-securing-in-road-transport/ETSC.gif";"";"road_transport";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-adoption-of-measures-to-better-protect-workers-from-risks-linked-to-exposure-to-chemicals-at-the-workplace-clp";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-24 15:33:24";"2014-02-24 15:44:07";"2014-02-24 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU - Adoption of measures to better protect workers from risks linked to exposure to chemicals at the workplace - CLP";"<p>   The European Commission has welcomed the definitive adoption today by the EU's Council of Ministers of measures to better protect workers from risks linked to exposure to chemicals at the workplace.</p>  <p>   The new Directive amends five existing EU health and safety Directives on protection of workers from exposure to harmful chemicals to align them with the latest rules on classification, labelling and packaging of chemicals (Regulation (EC) 1272/2008). Member States now have until 1 June 2015 to implement the new Directive in their national legislation.</p>";"<p>   Every day millions of EU workers are potentially exposed to hazardous chemicals in a wide range of employment sectors including manufacturing and service industries, agriculture, health care and education.</p>  <p>   The new rules will ensure that the requirements of the five Directives, which protect workers when using chemicals, are brought in line with the recently introduced new rules for the supply of chemicals. Manufacturers and suppliers of chemical substances and mixtures will have to provide harmonised labelling information on hazard classification, alerting the user to the presence of hazardous chemicals, the need to avoid exposure and the associated risks. Employers use this information when carrying out workplace risk assessments. This allows employers to put in place appropriate risk management measures to protect workers' health and safety, such as process enclosure, ventilation systems and the use of personal protective equipment.</p>  <p>   To assist employers and workers in managing the practical implications of the new system for chemical packaging and labelling, the Commission has published some <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?pager.offset=0&amp;catId=148&amp;langId=en&amp;furtherPubs=yes&amp;pager.offset=10&amp;catId=148&amp;langId=en&amp;furtherPubs=yes&amp;catId=148&amp;langId=en&amp;furtherPubs=yes<@#&>>guidance materials</a>, available, free of charge.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://europa.eu/rapid/press-release_IP-14-178_en.htm?locale=en<@#&>>More information</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds/clp-classification-labelling-and-packaging-of-substances-and-mixtures<@#&>>EU-OSHA pages on CLP</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/faqs?category=dangerous_substances&amp;subcategory=dangerous_substances::clp_reach<@#&>>FAQs on REACH and CLP</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/en/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=en&amp;filmid=napo-012-danger-chemicals<@#&>>Napo in …. Danger: Chemicals!</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-adoption-of-measures-to-better-protect-workers-from-risks-linked-to-exposure-to-chemicals-at-the-workplace-clp/EU.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"New online risk assessment tools published";"<p>   In the last months, several new tools have been published in OiRA. This takes the total number of online interactive risk assessment (OiRA) tools available to 15. The new tools cover different sectors including hairdressing, catering and private security. They have been developed in several countries including Belgium, Spain, Lithuania and Greece and by EU social partners.</p>  <p>   This is one step forward on the way to putting OiRA at the centre of strategies for risk prevention. Around another 50 more tools are currently under development.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Read our blog entry</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Visit the OiRA website</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"risk_assessment";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"lv";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Publicētie jaunie rīki tiešsaistes interaktīvam riska novērtējumam";"<p>   Pēdējo mēnešu laikā OiRA platforma ir publicējusi vairākus jaunus rīkus. Līdz ar to pavisam ir pieejami 15 rīki tiešsaistes interaktīvam riska novērtējumam. Jaunie rīki attiecas uz dažādām nozarēm, tostarp friziermākslu, ēdināšanu un personīgo drošību. Šie rīki ir izstrādāti vairākās valstīs, tostarp Beļģijā, Spānijā, Lietuvā un Grieķijā, kā arī tos ir izstrādājuši ES sociālie partneri.</p> <p>   Tas ir viens solis uz priekšu, uzskatot OiRA platformu kā centrālo stratēģiju riska novēršanai. Šobrīd tiek izstrādāti vēl apmēram 50 citi rīki.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Izlasiet rakstu mūsu tīmekļa dienasgrāmatā</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Apmeklējiet OiRA tīmekļa vietni</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"el";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Νέα επιγραμμικά εργαλεία εκτίμησης κινδύνου";"<p>   Τους τελευταίους μήνες, το OiRA έθεσε σε λειτουργία μια σειρά νέων εργαλείων, τα οποία ανέρχονται πλέον σε 15 συνολικά εργαλεία επιγραμμικής διαδραστικής εκτίμησης κινδύνων (OiRA). Τα νέα εργαλεία καλύπτουν διάφορους κλάδους όπως κομμωτική, τροφοδοσία και ιδιωτική αστυνομία. Αναπτύχθηκαν από πολλές χώρες, συμπεριλαμβανομένων του Βελγίου, της Ισπανίας, της Λιθουανίας και της Ελλάδας, καθώς και από τους κοινωνικούς εταίρους της ΕΕ.</p> <p>   Συνιστούν ένα ακόμη βήμα προόδου για την τοποθέτηση του OiRA στο επίκεντρο των στρατηγικών πρόληψης κινδύνων. Περίπου 50 ακόμη εργαλεία βρίσκονται στο στάδιο της ανάπτυξης.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Διαβάστε το ιστολόγιό μας</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Επισκεφθείτε τον δικτυακό τόπο του OiRA</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"fi";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Tarjolla uusia riskinarviointityövälineitä";"<p>   OiRAssa on julkaistu viime kuukausien aikana useita uusia työvälineitä. Online-muotoisia vuorovaikutteisia riskinarviointityövälineitä (OiRA) on tällä hetkellä käytössä yhteensä 15. Uusia työvälineitä ovat saaneet mm. kampaamoala, ateriapalvelut sekä ja yksityiset turvallisuuspalvelut. Niitä ovat kehittäneet useat eri maat, mm. Belgia, Espanja, Liettua ja Kreikka, sekä eri työmarkkinaosapuolet EU:ssa.</p> <p>   Näin on jälleen otettu yksi askel, joka vahvistaa OiRAn asemaa riskien ehkäisemisen strategisena keskuksena. Kehitteillä on samanaikaisesti vielä noin 50 muuta työvälinettä.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Lue blogia</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Tutustu OiRAn verkkosivustoon</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"sl";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Objavljena nova spletna orodja za oceno tveganja";"<p>   V preteklih mesecih je bilo v okviru spletnega interaktivnega orodja za oceno tveganja (OiRA) objavljenih več orodij. Tako jih je zdaj na voljo 15. Zajemajo različna področja, vključno s frizerstvom, gostinstvom in zasebnim varovanjem. Razvilo jih je več držav, med drugim Belgija, Španija, Litva in Grčija, ter socialni partnerji EU.</p> <p>   Tako je bil narejen nadaljnji korak k postavitvi orodja OiRA v središče strategij za preprečevanje tveganj. Petdeset novih orodij je še na stopnji razvoja.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Preberite si sestavek o tem v našem spletnem dnevniku</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Obišite spletno stran orodja OiRA</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"pl";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Opublikowano nowe narzędzie on-line do oceny ryzyka";"<p>   W ciągu ostatnich miesięcy w OiRA opublikowano kilka nowych narzędzi. W sumie dostępna liczba interaktywnych narzędzi (OiRA) wzrosła do 15. Nowe narzędzia obejmują różne sektory, w tym fryzjerstwo, gastronomię i prywatną ochronę. Narzędzia opracowywano w kilku państwach, w tym w Belgii, Hiszpanii, Grecji i na Litwie oraz we współpracy z partnerami społecznymi UE.</p> <p>   Stanowi to krok naprzód w kierunku umieszczenia OiRA w centrum strategii zapobiegania ryzyku. Obecnie trwają prace nad kolejnymi 50 narzędziami.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Przeczytaj nasz wpis na blogu</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Odwiedź portal OiRA </a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"is";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Nýtt áhættumatstól á Netinu gefið út";"<p>   Í síðasta mánuði voru fjölmörg ný tól gefin út í OiRA. Með þessu er heildarfjöldi áhættumatstóla á Netinu (OiRA) í boði orðinn 15. Nýju tólin ná til mismunandi geira, meðal annars hársnyrtingu, veisluþjónustu og einkarekinna öryggisfyrirtækja.  Þau voru búin til í mörgum löndum, meðal annars Belgíu, Spáni, Litháen og Grikklandi og af aðilum vinnumarkaðarins í ESB.</p> <p>   Þetta er eitt skrefið í átt til þess að gera OiRA að þungamiðju áætlanagerða fyrir áhættuforvarnir.  Um 50 önnur tól eru í bígerð eins og er. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Lesa bloggfærsluna okkar</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Fara á vefsíðu OiRA</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"cs";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Nové nástroje pro on-line hodnocení rizik zveřejněny";"<p>   V posledních měsících bylo v rámci platformy OiRA zpřístupněno několik nových nástrojů.  Tím se celkový počet dostupných nástrojů pro on-line interaktivní hodnocení rizik (OiRA) zvýšil na 15. Nové nástroje pokrývají různá odvětví, včetně odvětví kadeřnictví, stravovacích služeb a soukromých bezpečnostních služeb. Na vývoji těchto nástrojů se podílelo několik zemí, mimo jiné Belgie, Španělsko, Litva a Řecko, a také sociální partneři EU.</p> <p>   Jedná se o další krok k upevnění stěžejní pozice platformy OiRA v rámci strategií pro prevenci rizik. Ve stadiu vývoje je momentálně zhruba 50 dalších nástrojů.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Přečtěte si článek na našem blogu</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Navštivte webové stránky platformy OiRA</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"da";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Offentliggørelse af nye onlineværktøjer til arbejdspladsvurdering";"<p>   Der er de seneste måneder blevet offentliggjort flere nye værktøjer i OiRA, hvilket bringer det samlede antal tilgængelige onlineværktøjer til interaktiv arbejdspladsvurdering op på 15. De nye værktøjer dækker forskellige sektorer, herunder frisører, cateringvirksomheder og private sikkerhedsfirmaer. De er udviklet i flere forskellige lande, bl.a. Belgien, Spanien, Litauen og Grækenland, samt af arbejdsmarkedets parter i EU.</p> <p>   Dette er et skridt nærmere målet om at gøre OiRA til et centralt element i virksomhedernes strategier til risikoforebyggelse. Ca. 50 andre værktøjer er for øjeblikket under udvikling.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Læs vores blogindlæg</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Besøg OiRA-webstedet</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"sv";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Nya webbverktyg för riskbedömning offentliggjorda";"<p>   Flera nya verktyg har offentliggjorts på webbplattformen OiRA de senaste månaderna. Det betyder att det nu finns totalt 15 interaktiva webbverktyg för riskbedömning (OiRA). De nya verktygen täcker in olika branscher, bland annat frisörbranschen, cateringbranschen och den privata säkerhetsbranschen. Verktygen har utvecklats i flera länder, däribland Belgien, Spanien, Litauen och Grekland, och av EU:s arbetsmarknadsparter.</p> <p>   Det här är ett steg framåt i arbetet med att sätta OiRA i centrum för strategierna för att förebygga risker. Ytterligare omkring 50 verktyg håller nu på att tas fram.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Läs vårt blogginlägg</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Besök webbplatsen för OiRA</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"nl";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Nieuwe tools voor onlinerisicobeoordeling";"<p>   In de afgelopen maanden zijn er diverse nieuwe tools op het OiRA-webplatform gepubliceerd. Daarmee komt het totale aantal tools voor interactieve onlinerisicobeoordeling (OiRA) op vijftien. De nieuwe tools betreffen verschillende sectoren - bijvoorbeeld kapsalons, catering en particuliere beveiliging. Ze zijn onder meer in België, Spanje, Litouwen en Griekenland en door de Europese sociale partners ontwikkeld.</p> <p>   Dit brengt EU-OSHA weer een stap dichter bij het doel om van OiRA het centrale platform voor risicopreventiestrategieën te maken. Momenteel wordt gewerkt aan nog eens vijftig tools.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Lees onze blog</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Ga naar de OiRA-website</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"mt";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Għodod ġodda ta' valutazzjoni tar-riskju ppubblikati online";"<p>   Fl-aħħar xhur, diversi għodod ġodda ġew ippubblikati f'OiRA. B'kollox dan iżid in-numru totali ta' għodod disponibbli ta' valutazzjoni ta' riskju interattiva online (OiRA) għal 15. L-għodod il-ġodda jkopru setturi differenti inkluż parrukkiera, forniment tal-ikel u sigurtà privata. Dawn ġew żviluppati f'diversi pajjiżi inkluż il-Belġju, Spanja, il-Litwanja u l-Greċja u l-imsieħba soċjali tal-UE.</p> <p>   Dan hu pass 'il quddiem biex OiRA titpoġġa fiċ-ċentru ta' strateġiji għall-prevenzjoni tar-riskju. Madwar 50 għodod oħra bħalissa qegħdin jiġu żviluppati.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Aqra d-daħla tal-blogg tagħna</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Żur il-websajt tal-OiRA </a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"et";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Uued veebipõhised riskihindamise vahendid";"<p>   Viimastel kuudel on avaldatud mitu uut OiRA vahendit. Nüüd on veebipõhiseid interaktiivseid riskihindamisvahendeid (OiRA) kokku 15. Uued vahendid käsitlevad eri valdkondi, näiteks juuksuritööd, toitlustamist ja turvateenuseid. Vahendid on välja töötatud mitmes riigis, sh Belgias, Hispaanias, Leedus ja Kreekas, samuti Euroopa Liidu sotsiaalpartnerite osalusel.</p> <p>   OiRA vahendite osatähtsus riskiennetamisstrateegiates suureneb üha. Väljatöötamisel on veel ligikaudu 50 vahendit.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Blogikanne</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>OiRA veebileht</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"sk";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Uverejnenie nových online nástrojov na hodnotenie rizík";"<p>   V uplynulých mesiacoch bolo v rámci projektu OiRA uverejnených niekoľko nových nástrojov. Tým sa celkový počet dostupných online interaktívnych nástrojov na hodnotenie rizík (OiRA) zvýšil na 15. Tieto nové nástroje sa týkajú rôznych odvetví vrátane kaderníckych, stravovacích a súkromných bezpečnostných služieb. Boli vyvinuté v niekoľkých krajinách vrátane Belgicka, Španielska, Litvy a Grécka, ako aj sociálnymi partnermi EÚ.</p> <p>   Je to ďalší krok vpred na ceste k tomu, aby sa projekt OiRA stal stredobodom stratégií v oblasti prevencie rizík. V súčasnosti sa vo fáze vývoja nachádza približne ďalších 50 nástrojov.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Prečítajte si náš blogový príspevok</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Navštívte webovú stránku OiRA</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"pt";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Publicadas novas ferramentas de avaliação dos riscos";"<p>   Nos últimos meses, foram publicadas várias novas ferramentas na plataforma interativa de avaliação dos riscos em linha (OiRA), elevando para 15 o número total de ferramentas agora disponíveis na OiRA. As novas ferramentas abrangem vários setores como os cabeleireiros, a restauração e a segurança privada e  foram desenvolvidas em vários países, nomeadamente na Bélgica, Espanha, Lituânia e Grécia, e por parceiros sociais na UE.</p> <p>   Trata-se de mais um passo para colocar a OiRA no centro das estratégias de prevenção de riscos. Cerca de 50 outras ferramentas estão atualmente em desenvolvimento.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Leia a entrada do nosso blogue</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Visite o sítio Web da OiRA</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"no";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Nye nettbaserte risikovurderingsverktøyer publisert";"<p>   I løpet av de siste månedene er flere nye verktøyer blitt publisert i OiRA. Dermed er det totale antallet tilgjengelige nettbaserte interaktive risikovurderingsverktøyer (OiRA) oppe i 15. De nye verktøyene dekker ulike bransjer som frisør, hotell/restaurant og vekterbransjen. De er utviklet i flere land, deriblant Belgia, Spania, Litauen og Hellas og av partene i arbeidslivet i EU.</p> <p>   Dette er ett skritt på veien i arbeidet med å plassere OiRA i sentrum av strategiene for risikoforebygging. For tiden er nærmere 50 nye verktøyer under utvikling.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Les vårt blogginnlegg</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Besøk OiRAs nettsted</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"lt";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Pristatomos naujos internetinės rizikos vertinimo priemonės";"<p>   Per pastaruosius mėnesius OiRA interneto svetainėje paskelbta keletas naujų priemonių.  Šiuo metu iš viso veikia 15 interaktyvių internetinių rizikos vertinimo priemonių (OiRA). Naujosios priemonės skirtos įvairių sektorių bendrovėms – kirpykloms, viešojo maitinimo ir privačios apsaugos įmonėms.  Jas kūrė ES socialiniai partneriai keliose valstybėse – Belgijoje, Ispanijoje, Lietuvoje ir Graikijoje. </p> <p>   Tai dar vienas žingsnis pirmyn siekiant, kad OiRA taptų kertine rizikos prevencijos strategijos dalimi.
