Šiuo metu kuriama dar maždaug 50 priemonių.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Skaitykite mūsų tinklaraščio straipsnį</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Apsilankykite OiRA interneto svetainėje</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"it";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Pubblicati nuovi strumenti online di valutazione del rischio";"<p>   Negli ultimi mesi, diversi nuovi strumenti sono stati pubblicati su OiRA. Ciò porta a 15 il numero complessivo di strumenti interattivi per la valutazione del rischio (online interactive risk assessment- OiRA) disponibili online. I nuovi strumenti riguardano diversi settori tra cui quello degli acconciatori, del catering e della sicurezza privata. Sono stati sviluppati in vari Paesi compresi Belgio, Spagna, Lituania e Grecia, nonché da parti sociali dell'UE.</p> <p>   Questo rappresenta un progresso nell'ambito del progetto che vede l'OiRA al centro di strategie per la prevenzione del rischio. Attualmente circa altri 50 strumenti sono in fase di sviluppo.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Leggi il post sul nostro blog</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Visita il sito web dell'OiRA</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"hr";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Objavljeni novi alati procjene rizika";"<p>   Tijekom proteklih nekoliko mjeseci u OiRA-i je objavljeno nekoliko novih alata. Time se ukupni broj alata interaktivne procjene rizika na internetu (OiRA) popeo na 15. Novi alati obuhvaćaju različite sektore, uključujući frizerske usluge, dostavu gotove hrane i privatnu zaštitu. Osmišljeni su u nekoliko zemalja uključujući Belgiju, Španjolsku, Litvu i Grčku, pri čemu su sudjelovali i socijalni partneri EU-a.</p> <p>   Time je napravljen još jedan korak naprijed u postupku kojim OiRA-e postaje osnova strategija suzbijanja rizika. Razvija se dodatnih pedesetak alata.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Pročitajte novosti na našem blogu</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Posjetite portal OiRA-e</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"ro";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Publicarea de noi instrumente online de evaluare a riscurilor";"<p>   Pe parcursul ultimelor luni, au fost publicate mai multe instrumente noi prin intermediul OiRA. Astfel numărul total de instrumente online interactive de evaluare a riscurilor (OiRA) puse la dispoziţie se ridică la 15. Noile instrumente acoperă diferite sectoare inclusiv servicii de coafură, catering şi securitate privată. Ele au fost dezvoltate în mai multe ţări inclusiv în Belgia, Spania, Lituania şi Grecia şi de parteneri sociali ai UE.</p> <p>   Este un pas înainte în plasarea OiRA în centrul strategiilor pentru prevenirea riscurilor. Aproximativ 50 de instrumente suplimentare sunt în prezent în curs de dezvoltare.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Citiţi articolul nostru de blog</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Vizitaţi site-ul OiRA</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"fr";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Publication de nouveaux outils d'évaluation des risques en ligne";"<p>   Au cours de ces derniers mois, plusieurs nouveaux outils ont été publiés sur l'OiRA, ce qui porte à 15 le nombre total d'outils interactifs d'évaluation des risques en ligne. Les nouveaux outils couvrent différents secteurs, y compris la coiffure, la restauration et la sécurité privée. Ils ont été élaborés dans plusieurs pays, notamment la Belgique, l'Espagne, la Lituanie et la Grèce, et par les partenaires sociaux de l'UE.</p> <p>   Cette publication constitue un pas en avant vers la réalisation de l'objectif visant à mettre l'OiRA au cœur des stratégies de prévention des risques. Environ 50 nouveaux outils sont actuellement en cours de développement.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Lire notre article de blog</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Consulter le site web de l'OiRA</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"bg";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Публикувани са нови онлайн инструменти за оценка на риска";"<p>   През последните месеци в OiRA бяха публикувани няколко нови инструмента.  Това прави общо 15 интерактивни онлайн инструменти за оценка на риска, които са на разположение. Новите инструменти обхващат различни сектори, включително фризьорство, кетъринг и частна охранителна дейност. Разработени са от социалните партньори на ЕС в няколко страни, включително Белгия, Испания, Литва и Гърция.</p> <p>   Това е още една стъпка напред към поставянето на OiRA в центъра на стратегиите за превенция на риска. Около 50 други инструмента са в процес на разработване.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Прочетете статии от нашия блог</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Посетете уебсайта на OiRA</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"de";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Neue Online-Tools zur Gefährdungsbeurteilung veröffentlicht";"<p>   In den vergangenen Monaten wurde im OiRA (online interactive risk assessment) eine Reihe neuer Tools veröffentlicht. Damit erhöht sich die Anzahl der OiRA-Tools auf insgesamt 15. Die neuen Tools decken verschieden Berufsfelder wie Frisör, Catering und private Sicherheitsdienstleistungen ab und wurden in mehreren Ländern, darunter Belgien, Spanien, Litauen und Griechenland, sowie von den EU-Sozialpartnern entwickelt.</p> <p>   Damit ist ein weiterer Schritt getan, um OiRA ins Zentrum der Strategien zur Gefährdungsprävention zu rücken. Derzeit werden etwa 50 weitere Tools entwickelt.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Zu unserem Blog</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Zur OiRA-Website</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"hu";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Új online kockázatértékelési eszközök";"<p>   Az elmúlt hónapokban az OiRA alkalmazáson belül több új eszközt tettek közé. Ezekkel együtt az online kockázatértékelési (OiRA) eszközök száma 15-re nőtt. Az új eszközök több ágazatra, köztük a fodrászatra, felszolgálásra és személyi biztonsági szolgálatra vonatkoznak. Az eszközöket több országban, köztük Belgiumban, Spanyolországban, Litvániában és Görögországban fejlesztették ki, többek között az EU szociális partnereinek közreműködésével.</p> <p>   Az újdonságok segítenek az OiRA-t a kockázatmegelőzési stratégiák középpontjába helyezni. Jelenleg kb. 50 további hasonló eszköz van fejlesztés alatt.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Olvassa el blogbejegyzésünket!</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Látogasson el az OiRA weboldalára!</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"es";"/en/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published";"published";"2014-02-10 10:59:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:42";"2014-02-20 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Publicación de nuevas herramientas de evaluación de riesgos en línea";"<p>   En los últimos meses se han implementado varias herramientas en la web de OiRA. Con esto, el número total de herramientas de evaluación interactiva de riesgos en línea (OiRA) asciende a 15. Las nuevas herramientas abarcan distintos sectores como el de la peluquería, la restauración (catering) y la seguridad privada. Las herramientas se han elaborado en distintos países (incluida Bélgica, España, Lituania y Grecia) y por distintos interlocutores sociales de la UE.</p> <p>   Esta implementación supone un avance en el objetivo de hacer que OiRA sea el centro de las estrategias para la prevención de riesgos. En la actualidad hay unas 50 herramientas en fase de elaboración.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/putting-oira-at-the-centre-of-risk-prevention-strategies<@#&>>Leer la entrada de nuestro blog</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.oiraproject.eu/<@#&>>Entrar en la web de OiRA</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/new-online-risk-assessment-tools-published/OiRA.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/france-launches-updated-plan-in-fight-against-cancer";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-14 11:12:46";"2014-02-14 11:13:05";"2014-02-17 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"France launches updated plan in fight against cancer";"<p>   France has just launched its 2014-2019 national plan against cancer, placing the emphasis on prevention and screening and on addressing social imbalances in healthcare.</p>";"<p>   The plan is harmonised with the national plan on health at work and explicitely addresses occupational cancer and its prevention, as well as outlining specific measures related to rehabilitation and back to work strategies. Measures cover wider issues such workplace training and development of workers affected by cancer, to prevent downgrading and social exclusion of workers, targeted information to workers affected by cancer and workplace adaptation. It foresees for example a biannual specific assessment including an interview of employers with affected workers in order to design workplace measures and to promote workplace integration and personal development by training and capacitation.</p>  <p>   A 2012 EU-OSHA Workshop on occupational cancer and carcinogens highlighted the vulnerability opf workers affected by cancer, especially when they are affected by occupational cancer.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.social-sante.gouv.fr/IMG/pdf/2014-02-03_Plan_cancer.pdf<@#&>>Download the document </a></p>";"/en/news/france-launches-updated-plan-in-fight-against-cancer/Afssets.gif";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-2013-echa-updated-guidance-on-the-compilation-of-safety-data-sheets-translated-into-22-eu-languages-and-published-on-the-echa-website";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-13 16:43:19";"2014-02-13 16:44:31";"2014-02-14 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU – ECHA Updated Guidance on the compilation of safety data sheets translated into 22 EU languages and published on the ECHA website";"<p>   ECHA has published translations into 22 EU languages of the updated Guidance on the compilation of safety data sheets (SDSs).</p>";"<p>   The Guidance was recently amended by updating and including into an Appendix information on extending the SDS which was previously contained in Part G of the Guidance on Information Requirements and Chemical Safety Assessment. The English version of the updated guidance had already been published immediately after finalisation of the consultation procedure in December 2013. The translations of the full updated guidance in the full range of EU official languages have now been published on the ECHA website.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.echa.europa.eu/web/guest/guidance-documents/guidance-on-reach<@#&>>For more information </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/faqs?category=dangerous_substances&amp;subcategory=dangerous_substances::clp_reach EU-OSHA Web section on REACH: https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/ds/reach<@#&>>EU-OSHA FAQs on REACH, CLP and OSH (in 22 languages)</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-2013-echa-updated-guidance-on-the-compilation-of-safety-data-sheets-translated-into-22-eu-languages-and-published-on-the-echa-website/ECHA_logo_new.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances, legislation";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/guidance-for-competence-in-tower-crane-examinations";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-14 15:37:07";"2014-02-14 15:38:40";"2014-02-14 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Guidance for competence in tower crane examinations";"<p>   Guidance has been developed by a tripartite working group with representation from employees, employers and governments.&nbsp;<span style=<@#&>line-height: 1.5em;<@#&>>The purpose of this guidance is to advise on appropriate minimum standards to ensure the&nbsp;</span><span style=<@#&>line-height: 1.5em;<@#&>>competence (and impartiality) of persons carrying-out periodic and assembly examinations&nbsp;</span><span style=<@#&>line-height: 1.5em;<@#&>>of tower and mobile cranes.</span></p>";"<p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/guidance-for-competence-in-tower-crane-examinations<@#&>>Read our blog entry.</a></p>";"/en/news/guidance-for-competence-in-tower-crane-examinations/new guidance.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"en";"";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Occupational safety and health in the hairdressing sector";"<p>   The hairdressing sector in Europe employs more than one million people in some 400,000 hairdressing salons with 350 million potential customers.</p>  <p>   A new report describes the risks faced by hairdressers and the protection that is available to them, including a Framework Agreement negotiated at EU level by social partners, which aims to set minimum standards for the approach to safety and health within this sector across Europe.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Read the report</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"it";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sicurezza e salute sul lavoro nel settore dell’acconciatura";"<p>   Il settore dell'acconciatura dà lavoro a oltre un milione di persone in circa 400 000 saloni che contano 350 milioni di potenziali clienti.</p> <p>   I rischi per gli acconciatori e le misure di protezione cui questi possono fare ricorso sono descritti in una nuova relazione contenente anche un accordo quadro, concluso dalle parti sociali a livello di UE, inteso a definire norme minime in base alle quali affrontare le problematiche della sicurezza e della salute nell'ambito di tale settore in Europa.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Leggi la relazione</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"ro";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sănătatea şi securitatea în muncă în sectorul serviciilor de coafură";"<p>   În Europa, sectorul serviciilor de coafură angajează mai mult de un milion de persoane, în aproximativ 400 000 de saloane de coafură, cu 350 de milioane de clienţi potenţiali.</p> <p>   Un raport nou descrie riscurile cu care se confruntă coaforii şi protecţia care este disponibilă pentru aceştia, inclusiv acordul-cadru negociat de partenerii sociali la nivelul UE, care vizează stabilirea de standarde minime pentru abordarea securităţii şi a sănătăţii în acest sector în întreaga Europă. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Citiţi raportul</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"lv";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Darba drošība un arodveselības aizsardzība friziera profesijā";"<p>   Friziera profesijā Eiropā ir nodarbināti vairāk nekā miljons darbinieku aptuveni 400 000 frizētavās, kuru potenciālie klienti ir 350 miljoni cilveku.</p> <p>   Jaunajā paziņojumā ir aprakstīti riski, ar kuriem saskaras frizieri, un tiem pieejamā aizsardzība, tostarp ES līmenī ar sociālajiem partneriem apspriestais Pamatnolīgums, kura mērķis ir noteikt minimālos standartus attiecībā uz drošību un veselības aizsardzību šajā nozarē visā Eiropā.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Lasīt ziņojumu</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"lt";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kirpyklų darbuotojų sauga ir sveikata";"<p>   Europoje veikia maždaug 400 000 kirpyklų, kuriose dirba daugiau nei milijonas žmonių ir lankosi 350 mln. klientų.</p> <p>   Naujoje ataskaitoje aprašoma kirpėjams kylanti rizika ir prieinamos apsaugos priemonės, taip pat pristatomas socialinių partnerių ES lygmeniu suderintas bendrasis susitarimas, kuriuo siekiama Europoje nustatyti minimalius šio sektoriaus saugos ir sveikatos standartus.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Ataskaita</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"mt";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Is-saħħa u s-sigurtà okkupazzjonali fis-settur tal-parrukkerija";"<p>   Is-settur tal-parrukkerija fl-Ewropa jimpjega aktar minn miljun ruħ f'madwar 400,000 ħanut tal-parrukkiera bi 350 miljun klijent potenzjali.</p> <p>   Rapport ġdid jiddeskrivi r-riskji li jaffaċċaw il-parrukkiera u l-ħarsien li hemm disponibbli għalihom, inkluż Ftehim Qafas negozjat fil-livell tal-UE mill-imsieħba soċjali, li għandu l-għan jistabbilixxi standards minimi għall-approċċ tas-saħħa u s-sigurtà f'dan is-settur mal-Ewropa kollha. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Aqra r-rapport</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"da";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Arbejdsmiljø i frisørsektoren";"<p>   Frisørsektoren i Europa beskæftiger over 1 mio. personer fordelt på ca. 400 000 frisørsaloner med 350 mio. potentielle kunder.</p> <p>   I en ny rapport beskrives de risici, frisørerne udsættes for, samt hvilke beskyttelsesforanstaltninger de har adgang til, herunder en rammeaftale forhandlet på EU-plan af arbejdsmarkedets parter med henblik på at fastsætte minimumsstandarder for sikkerhed og sundhed inden for denne sektor i hele Europa.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Læs rapporten</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"sv";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Arbetsmiljön i frisörbranschen";"<p>   Frisörbranschen i Europa har över en miljon anställda vid omkring 400 000 frisersalonger med ett kundunderlag på 350 miljoner människor.</p> <p>   I en ny rapport beskrivs de risker som frisörerna utsätts för och vilket skydd de har tillgång till. Bland annat finns ett ramavtal som arbetsmarknadspartnerna förhandlat fram på EU-nivå och som syftar till att fastställa miniminormer för arbetsmiljö som ska tillämpas i denna bransch i hela Europa.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Läs rapporten</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"hr";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sigurnost i zdravlje na radu u sektoru frizerskih usluga";"<p>   U sektoru frizerskih usluga u Europi zaposleno je više od milijun osoba u oko 400 000 frizerskih salona, a ima oko 350 milijuna potencijalnih klijenata.</p> <p>   U novom izvještaju opisuju se opasnosti kojima su izloženi frizeri te oblici zaštite koji im stoje na raspolaganju, uključujući i Okvirni sporazum koji su na razini EU-a postigli socijalni partneri, a kojim se žele utvrditi minimalni standardi sigurnosti i zdravlja unutar te djelatnosti na području cijele Europe.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Pročitajte izvještaj</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"et";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tööohutus ja töötervishoid juuksuriteenuste sektoris";"<p>   Euroopas töötab ligikaudu 400 000 juuksurisalongis üle miljoni inimese, kes teenindavad 350 miljonit potentsiaalset klienti.</p> <p>   Uues aruandes kirjeldatakse juuksuritöö riske ja olemasolevaid kaitsemeetmeid, sealhulgas sotsiaalpartnerite Euroopa tasandi raamkokkulepet, millega soovitakse kehtestada juuksurite tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu miinimumnõuded Euroopas. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Aruanne</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"bg";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Безопасност и здраве при работа в сектора на фризьорските услуги";"<p>   В сектора на фризьорските услуги в Европа са заети повече от 1 милион души, като това обхваща около 400 000 фризьорски салона и 350 милиона потенциални клиенти.</p> <p>   Рисковете за фризьорите и възможностите за защита са разгледани в нов доклад, включително рамково споразумение, сключено от социалните партньори на равнище ЕС, което има за цел да определи минимални стандарти за безопасност и здраве в този сектор в Европа. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Прочетете доклада</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"es";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"La seguridad y la salud en el trabajo en el sector de la peluquería";"<p>   El sector de la peluquería en Europa emplea a más de un millón de personas en aproximadamente 400.000 peluquerías con 350 millones de clientes potenciales.</p>  <p>   En un nuevo informe se describen los riesgos a los que se exponen los peluqueros y la protección que tienen a su disposición, incluido un Acuerdo marco a escala de la UE negociado por los interlocutores sociales que tiene por objeto establecer unas normas mínimas en materia de seguridad y salud en dicho sector en Europa.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Leer el informe</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"de";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz in der Friseurbranche";"<p>   In der Friseurbranche in Europa sind über eine Million Menschen in ca. 400 000 Friseursalons beschäftigt, die 350 Millionen potenzielle Kunden haben.</p> <p>   In einem neuen Bericht wird beschrieben, welchen Risiken Friseure ausgesetzt sind und welche Schutzmaßnahmen Ihnen zur Verfügung stehen. Zu diesen Maßnahmen zählen u. a. eine Rahmenvereinbarung, die auf europäischer Ebene von den Sozialpartnern ausgehandelt wurde und darauf abzielt, Mindeststandards für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in diesem Sektor in ganz Europa festzulegen.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Zum Bericht</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"nl";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Veiligheid en gezondheid voor kappers";"<p>   In de Europese kapperssector werken meer dan een miljoen mensen in zo'n 400 000 kapsalons voor 350 miljoen potentiële klanten.</p> <p>   Een nieuw rapport bespreekt de risico's waarmee kappers te maken krijgen en de bescherming die hun ter beschikking staat, waaronder een kaderovereenkomst die door de sociale partners op EU-niveau werd gesloten. Daarin wordt gestreefd naar een reeks minimumnormen ten behoeve van de veiligheid en gezondheid in deze sector in heel Europa.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Lees het rapport</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"fr";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Santé et sécurité professionnelles dans le secteur de la coiffure";"<p>   En Europe, le secteur de la coiffure emploie plus d'un million de personnes dans environ 400 000 salons disposant d'un potentiel de 350 millions de consommateurs. </p> <p>   Un nouveau rapport décrit les risques auxquels sont confrontés les coiffeurs et la protection dont ils disposent, y compris un accord cadre négocié par les partenaires sociaux à l'échelle de l'Union européenne, qui vise à établir des normes minimales concernant l'approche de la santé et de la sécurité dans ce secteur dans toute l'Europe. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Lisez le rapport</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"sk";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri práci v odvetví kaderníctva";"<p>   V Európe je v odvetví kaderníctva zamestnaných viac ako jeden milión ľudí, ktorí pracujú približne v 400 000 kaderníctvach a majú 350 miliónov potenciálnych zákazníkov.</p> <p>   V novej správe sa opisujú riziká, ktorým sú vystavení kaderníci a kaderníčky, ako aj dostupná ochrana pre nich, vrátane rámcovej dohody, o ktorej sociálni partneri rokovali na úrovni EÚ. Jej cieľom je stanoviť minimálne normy pre prístup k bezpečnosti a ochrane zdravia pri práci v tomto odvetví na území celej Európy.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Prečítať správu</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"el";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Η επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία στον κλάδο της κομμωτικής";"<p>   Στον κλάδο της κομμωτικής στην Ευρώπη απασχολούνται περισσότερο από ένα εκατομμύριο άτομα σε περίπου 400 000 κομμωτήρια, με 350 εκατομμύρια δυνητικούς πελάτες.</p> <p>   Μια νέα έκθεση περιγράφει τους κινδύνους που αντιμετωπίζουν οι κομμωτές και την προστασία που τους παρέχεται. Γίνεται μεταξύ άλλων αναφορά στη συμφωνία-πλαίσιο που συζητούν σε επίπεδο ΕΕ οι κοινωνικοί εταίροι με στόχο τον καθορισμό ελάχιστων προτύπων για την προσέγγιση των πολιτικών που ακολουθούνται σε θέματα ασφάλειας και υγείας στον εν λόγω κλάδο σε ολόκληρη την Ευρώπη.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την έκθεση</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"is";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vinnuvernd í hárgreiðslugreininni";"<p>   Hárgreiðslugreinin í Evrópu veitir yfir milljón manns störf á um 400.000 hárgreiðslustofum með um 350 milljón væntanlega viðskiptavini.</p> <p>   Ný skýrsla lýsir áhættunum, sem hárgreiðslufólk býr við, og þeim vörnum í boði, þar á meðal rammasamkomulagi, sem samið var um á vettvangi Evrópusambandsins, af aðilum vinnumarkaðarins, sem miðar að því að gera lágmarksstaðla vegna öryggis- og heilbrigðismála í greininni í Evrópu. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Lesa skýrsluna</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"cs";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bezpečnost a ochrana zdraví při práci v odvětví kadeřnictví";"<p>   V Evropě zaměstnává odvětví kadeřnictví více než milion osob v přibližně 400 000 kadeřnictvích a nabízí služby přibližně 350 milionům potenciálních zákazníků.</p> <p>   Nová zpráva popisuje rizika, kterým jsou vystaveni kadeřníci, a ochranu, kterou mají k dispozici, včetně rámcové dohody sjednané na úrovni EU sociálními partnery. Cílem této dohody je stanovit minimální standardy v rámci bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci v tomto odvětví v celé Evropě.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si zprávu</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"hu";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem a fodrászati ágazatban";"<p>   A fodrászati ágazat Európában több mint egymillió alkalmazottat foglalkoztat a 350 millió potenciális vendéget fogadó mintegy 400 000 fodrászszalonban.</p> <p>   Egy új jelentés ismertetei azokat a kockázatokat, amelyeknek a fodrászok ki vannak téve, valamint a számukra elérhető védelmet, ide értve azt az uniós szinten a szociális pertenerek által kialakított keretmegállapodást, amelynek célja, hogy Európa-szerte  minimumszabványokat állapítson meg az ezen ágazaton belüli biztonsági és egészségvédelmi megközelítéssel kapcsolatban.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Olvassa el a jelentést!</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"fi";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Työsuojelu kampaamoalalla";"<p>   Kampaamoala työllistää Euroopassa yli miljoona henkilöä noin 400 000:ssa kampaamossa, joiden asiakasmäärän on arvioitu olevan 350 miljoonaa.</p> <p>   Uudessa raportissa kuvaillaan kampaajiin kohdistuvia riskejä ja erilaisia keinoja niiltä suojautumiseksi. Yhtenä keinona esitellään työmarkkinaospuolten tekemää EU:n kattavaa puitesopimusta, jonka avulla on tarkoitus tarkoitus antaa Euroopan kattavat kampaamoalan työsuojelun vähimmäisvaatimukset.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Lue raportti</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"no";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Arbeidstakernes helse og sikkerhet i frisørbransjen";"<p>   Frisørbransjen i Europa sysselsetter over én million mennesker i nærmere 400 000 frisørsalonger med et kundegrunnlag på over 350 millioner mennesker.</p> <p>   En ny rapport beskriver risikoene frisørene utsettes for, og hvilket vern som er tilgjengelig for dem, herunder en rammeavtale framforhandlet på EU-nivå av partene i arbeidslivet, som fastsetter minstestandarder for helse og sikkerhet i denne bransjen i hele Europa.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Les rapporten</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"pl";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bezpieczeństwo i zdrowie w pracy w sektorze fryzjerskim";"<p>   Sektor fryzjerski w Europie zatrudnia ponad milion osób w około 400 000 salonach fryzjerskich mających 350 milionów potencjalnych klientów.</p> <p>   W nowym raporcie opisane są zagrożenia, na jakie narażeni są fryzjerzy, oraz dostępna dla nich ochrona, w tym umowa ramowa wynegocjowana na poziomie UE przez partnerów społecznych, której celem jest określenie minimalnych standardów dotyczących podejścia do bezpieczeństwa i zdrowia w tym sektorze w Europie.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj raport</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"sl";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Varnost in zdravje pri delu na področju frizerstva";"<p>   V evropskem frizerskem sektorju je v okoli 400 000 frizerskih salonih zaposlenih več kot milijon ljudi, ki zagotavljajo storitve skupno 350 milijonom strank.</p> <p>   V novem poročilu so opisana tveganja, s katerimi se srečujejo frizerji, in zaščitni ukrepi, ki jih imajo na voljo, vključno z okvirnim sporazumom, ki so ga na ravni EU izpogajali socialni partnerji in katerega namen je določiti minimalne standarde za zagotovitev varnosti in zdravja pri delu v tej panogi po vsej Evropi.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Preberite poročilo</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"pt";"/en/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector";"published";"2014-01-31 13:12:59";"2014-07-25 10:46:52";"2014-02-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"A saúde e segurança no trabalho no setor dos cabeleireiros";"<p>   O setor dos cabeleireiros emprega mais de um milhão de pessoas em cerca de 400 000 de salões e conta com 350 milhões de clientes potenciais.</p> <p>   Um novo relatório descreve os riscos com que se deparam os cabeleireiros e a proteção que lhes é disponibilizada, nomeadamente um acordo-quadro negociado ao nível da UE por parceiros sociais, que visa definir normas mínimas para a abordagem à saúde e segurança neste setor em toda a Europa.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/literature_reviews/occupational-health-and-safety-in-the-hairdressing-sector/view<@#&>>Ler o relatório</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-hairdressing-sector/hairdressing.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/ecta-releases-best-practice-guidelines";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-13 14:47:48";"2014-02-13 14:56:42";"2014-02-13 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"ECTA releases Best Practice Guidelines on Safety in Chemical Logistics Supply Chain";"<p>   The European Chemical Transport Association (ECTA) has published Best Practice Guidelines 2013 for Safe Driving, Un/Loading, Rotary Valve in the Chemical Logistics Supply Chain.</p>";"<p>   ECTA was an Official Campaign Partner campaign partner of EU-OSHA in its Healthy Workplaces campaign 2012-2013, and remains committed to reducing risks and hazards in the workplace.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.ecta.com/publications/best-practices-guidelines.aspx<@#&>>Download the guidelines.</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"/en/news/ecta-releases-best-practice-guidelines/ECTA.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/de-ausschreibung-gesamtevaluierung-der-gemeinsamen-deutschen-arbeitsschutzstrategie";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-12 15:27:16";"2014-02-12 15:27:37";"2014-02-12 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"DE - Ausschreibung Gesamtevaluierung der Gemeinsamen Deutschen Arbeitsschutzstrategie";"<p>   <@#&>Durchführung der Dach-Evaluation der laufenden zweiten Periode der Gemeinsamen Deutschen Arbeitsschutzstrategie (GDA) 2013 bis 2018<@#&></p>  <p>   Offenes Verfahren gemäß 3 EG Abs. 1 VOL/A<br />   Ausschreibende Stelle ist die Bundesanstalt für Arbeitsschutz und Arbeitsmedizin (BAuA), Gruppe Z 2, - Haushalt, Beschaffung und Abrechnung - Friedrich-Henkel-Weg 1 – 25, 44149 Dortmund</p>  <p>   Kontakt:Marion Eudenbach, E-Mail: eudenbach.marion@baua.bund.de<br />   Letzter Termin für den Abruf der Vergabeunterlagen: 19.03.2014</p>  <p>   Angebots-Abgabetermin: 20.03.2014, 09.00 Uhr<br />   Näheres entnehmen Sie bitte den Vergabeunterlagen. <a href=<@#&>http://www.baua.de/de/Ueber-die-BAuA/Ausschreibungen-Stellenangebote/Beschaffungsmassnahmen/GDA/GDA_content.html<@#&>>Informationen auf der BAuA Webseite</a></p>";"<p>   Art und Umfang der Leistung sowie den Ort der Leistungserbringung:<br />   Der Auftrag umfasst die Gesamtevaluierung der Gemeinsamen Deutschen Arbeitsschutzstrategie.</p>  <p>   Die Leistung wird in zwei Losen ausgeschrieben:</p>  <p>   LOS I beinhaltet die Vorbereitung, Durchführung und Basisauswertung einer repräsentativen Betriebs- und Beschäftigtenbefragung (CATI-Befragung).</p>  <p>   LOS II umfasst die Gesamtkoordination der Dachevaluation. Dazu gehören die Erarbeitung eines Durchführungskonzeptes, die wissenschaftliche Auswertung der im Rahmen von LOS I erhobenen</p>  <p>   Daten, eine Online-Befragung des Aufsichtspersonals, eine qualitative Befragung von Kooperationspartnern der GDA sowie die Zwischen- und Endberichterstattung.</p>  <p>   Über den Zuschlag entscheidet pro Los das wirtschaftlichste Angebot in Bezug auf die Kriterien, die in den Vergabeunterlagen aufgeführt sind.</p>  <p>   Informationen zur Eignungsprüfung, zur Leistungsbeschreibung und zu weiteren Einzelheiten des Verfahrens entnehmen Sie bitte den Vergabeunterlagen.</p>  <p>   Die Vergabeunterlagen können schriftlich - vorzugsweise per E-Mail - bei der Vergabestelle der Bundesanstalt für Arbeitsschutz und Arbeitsmedizin&nbsp; abgerufen werden.</p>  <p>   Die Auftragsbekanntmachung zu dieser Ausschreibung wurde am 03.02.2014 unter der ID-Nr. 2014 - 015701 im Supplement zum Amtsblatt der Europäischen Union veröffentlicht.</p>";"/en/news/de-ausschreibung-gesamtevaluierung-der-gemeinsamen-deutschen-arbeitsschutzstrategie/Baua.gif";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/non-binding-guidance-to-ensure-a-minimum-standard-of-competence-of-persons-who-carry-out-periodic-and-assembly-examinations-of-tower-and-mobile-cranes";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-04 09:48:47";"2014-02-04 09:49:16";"2014-02-10 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Non-binding guidance to ensure a minimum standard of competence of persons who carry out periodic and assembly examinations of tower and mobile cranes";"<p>   The guidance has been published by the Senior Labour Inspectors’ Committee (SLIC) in English, French, and German. The purpose of this guidance is to advise on appropriate minimum standards to ensure the competence (and impartiality) of persons carrying-out periodic and assembly examinations of, in particular, tower and mobile cranes.</p>";"<p>   It may have information relevant to the examination of smaller cranes, but does not specifically address them. It also details a management framework which can be used by organisations to ensure and demonstrate the competence of persons undertaking examinations.</p>  <p>   It also refers to the competence requirements of trainers/assessors but does not deal with them in detail.</p>  <p>   It is anticipated that such will assist the mutual recognition of competence and the free movement of services, provided by competent examiners of tower and mobile cranes, across the EU.</p>  <p>   Visit the <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en&amp;intPageId=685<@#&>>SLIC website </a>and&nbsp; access to the <a href=<@#&>https://circabc.europa.eu/faces/jsp/extension/wai/navigation/container.jsp<@#&>>guidance.</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://circabc.europa.eu/faces/jsp/extension/wai/navigation/container.jsp<@#&>>More documents relating to SLIC</a></p>";"/en/news/non-binding-guidance-to-ensure-a-minimum-standard-of-competence-of-persons-who-carry-out-periodic-and-assembly-examinations-of-tower-and-mobile-cranes/circabc.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/global-framework-safety-health-and-security-for-work-related-international-travel-and-assignments";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-04 09:42:04";"2014-02-04 09:42:29";"2014-02-10 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Global Framework: Safety, health and security for work-related international travel and assignments";"<p>   The Global Framework: Safety, health and security for work-related international travel and assignments was released by the International SOS Foundation following a Meeting of International Experts held last year. It was developed as a result of considerable growth of international business travel and travel related to work due to globalisation, new markets and the need for services.</p>";"<p>   The framework guides an organisation in identifying threats and hazards, and managing risks to the safety, health and security of those travelling for their work or on international assignment. It leads an organisation through setting up a travel and assignment safety, health and security policy integrated within its existing policy structure.</p>  <p>   The framework sets out measures to formulate an organisation’s travel risk and emergency management system, proposing key roles and responsibilities as well as developing competencies through training and education.</p>  <p>   The publication is accessible through the <a href=<@#&>http://www.internationalsosfoundation.org/<@#&>>International SOS Foundation website </a></p>";"/en/news/global-framework-safety-health-and-security-for-work-related-international-travel-and-assignments/SOS Foundation.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"en";"";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"‘Safer and healthier work at any age’ conference materials available online";"<p>   A conference focusing on occupational safety and health of older workers took place in December in the European Parliament.</p>  <p>   The event was organized in the context of a European Parliament`s pilot project, being carried out by EU-OSHA at the request of the European Commission, that aims to improve knowledge of current policies and programmes, stimulate exchange of best practices and further investigate the ways to improve health and safety for older workers.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Access proceedings of the conference “Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce”</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Learn more about the European Parliament pilot project on health and safety of older workers</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"no";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materiell til konferansen om sikrere og sunnere arbeidsplasser uansett alder (Safer and healthier work at any age) er nå tilgjengelig på nett";"<p>   En konferanse med fokus på eldre arbeidstakeres sikkerhet og helse på arbeidsplassen gikk av stabelen i desember i Europaparlamentet.</p>  <p>   Arrangementet ble organisert innenfor rammen av Europaparlamentets pilotprosjekt, som gjennomføres av EU-OSHA på anmodning fra Europakommisjonen, og målet er å forbedre kunnskapen om gjeldende retningslinjer og programmer, stimulere til utveksling av beste praksis og ytterligere undersøke hvordan helsen og sikkerheten for eldre arbeidstakere kan forbedres.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Få tilgang til innleggene på konferansen om sikrere og sunnere arbeidsplasser uansett alder – helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen i lys av en aldrende arbeidsstyrke (Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lær mer om Europaparlamentets pilotprosjekt om eldre arbeidstakeres helse og sikkerhet</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/no/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"is";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nú má nálgast efni frá ráðstefnunni „Öruggari og heilbrigðari vinna á öllum aldri“ á Netinu";"<p>   Ráðstefna um vinnuverndarmál eldri launþega fór fram í desember í Evrópuþinginu.</p>  <p>   Viðburðurinn var haldinn í tengslum við tilraunaverkefni Evrópuþingsins, framkvæmt af hálfu EU-OSHA að ósk framkvæmdastjórnar Evrópusambandsins, sem miðar að því að bæta þekkingu á núverandi stefnu og áætlunum, örva miðlun á góðum starfsháttum og rannsaka betur leiðir til þess að bæta heilbrigði og öryggi eldri launþega.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Nálgast fundargerð ráðstefnunnar „Öruggari og heilbrigðari vinna á öllum aldri – vinnuvernd meðal eldri launþega“</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Fræðast meira um tilraunaverkefni Evrópuþingsins um heilbrigði og öryggi eldri launþega</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/is/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"lt";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Internete paskelbta konferencijos „Saugesnės ir sveikesnės darbo vietos bet kokio amžiaus darbuotojams“ medžiaga";"<p>   Gruodžio mėnesį Europos Parlamente surengta konferencija, kurioje daugiausia dėmesio skirta vyresnio amžiaus darbuotojų saugai ir sveikatai.</p>  <p>   Šis renginys surengtas vykdant Europos Parlamento bandomąjį projektą, kurį Europos Komisija užsakymu atlieka Europos darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos agentūra (EU-OSHA). Šiuo projektu siekiama pateikti daugiau informacijos apie dabartines politikos kryptis ir programas, skatinti keistis geriausia praktika ir toliau ieškoti būdų, kaip pagerinti vyresnio amžiaus darbuotojų saugą ir sveikatą.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Konferencijos „Saugesnės ir sveikesnės darbo vietos bet kurio amžiaus darbuotojams – senėjančios darbo jėgos sauga ir sveikata“ pranešimai</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Daugiau informacijos apie Europos Parlamento bandomąjį projektą vyresnio amžiaus darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos tema</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/lt/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"it";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Disponibili online gli atti della conferenza <@#&>Lavoro più sicuro e più salutare a qualsiasi età<@#&>";"<p>   Una conferenza dedicata alla sicurezza e alla salute sul lavoro dei lavoratori più anziani si è svolta a dicembre presso il Parlamento europeo.</p>  <p>   L'evento è stato organizzato nell'ambito di un progetto pilota del Parlamento europeo, realizzato dall'EU-OSHA su richiesta della Commissione Europea, che è finalizzato a migliorare le conoscenze sulle politiche e sui programmi in vigore, stimolare lo scambio delle migliori prassi ed esaminare altri modi possibili per migliorare la salute e la sicurezza dei lavoratori più anziani.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Accedi agli atti della conferenza <@#&>Lavoro più sicuro e più salutare a qualsiasi età – sicurezza e salute sul lavoro (SSL) nel contesto di una forza lavoro in età avanzata<@#&></a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Scopri di più sul progetto pilota del Parlamento europeo relativo alla salute e alla sicurezza dei lavoratori più anziani</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/it/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"fi";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Turvallisempaa ja terveellisempää työtä kaikenikäisille -konferenssin asiakirjat saatavilla verkosta";"<p>   Euroopan parlamentissa järjestettiin joulukuussa konferenssi, jonka aiheena oli ikääntyneiden työntekijöiden työsuojelu.</p>  <p>   Tilaisuus järjestettiin osana Euroopan parlamentin pilottihanketta, jonka toteuttajana on Euroopan komission pyynnöstä EU-OSHA. Hankkeen tarkoituksena on lisätä tietoa nykyisistä toimintalinjoista ja ohjelmista, kannustaa parhaiden käytäntöjen vaihtamiseen ja lisätutkimukseen, jonka avulla voidaan edistää ikääntyneiden työntekijöiden terveyttä ja turvallisuutta työpaikoilla.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>“Turvallisempaa ja terveellisempää työtä kaikenikäisille – työsuojelu työvoiman ikääntyessä” -konferenssin asiakirjat</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lisätietoa Euroopan parlamentin ikääntyneiden työntekijöiden työsuojelua koskevasta pilottihankeesta</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/fi/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"hu";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Online elérhetők a „Biztonságosabb és egészségesebb munkahelyet minden korosztálynak” című konferencia anyagai";"<p>   Az Európai Parlament az idősebb munkavállalók munkahelyi egészségével és biztonságával foglalkozó konferenciát tartott decemberben.</p>  <p>   A rendezvényre az Európai Parlament kísérleti projektjének a keretében került sor. A projekt megvalósítását az Európai Bizottság felkérésre az EU-OSHA végzi. A projekt célja, hogy növelje az aktuális szakpolitikák és programok ismertségét, ösztönözze a legjobb gyakorlatok egymás közötti megosztását és tovább vizsgálja, hogyan javítható az idősebb munkavállalók egészsége és biztonsága.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>A „Biztonságosabb és egészségesebb munkahelyet minden korosztálynak – Munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem (OSH) az idősödő munkaerő tükrében” című konferencia eseményeinek megtekintése</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Bővebben az Európai Parlamentnek az idősebb munkavállalók munkahelyi egészségével és biztonságával foglalkozó kísérleti projektjéről</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"nl";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bijdragen van de conferentie ‘Safer and healthier work at any age’ nu online beschikbaar";"<p>   In december vond in het Europees Parlement een conferentie plaats over de veiligheid en gezondheid van oudere werknemers.</p>  <p>   Het evenement was georganiseerd in het kader van een pilotproject van het Europees Parlement dat op verzoek van de Europese Commissie door EU-OSHA wordt uitgevoerd. Doel van dat project is de kennis over bestaande beleidslijnen en programma's te vergroten, de uitwisseling van goede praktijken te stimuleren en verder te zoeken naar manieren om de veiligheid en gezondheid van oudere werknemers te verbeteren.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Lees de bijdragen van de conferentie “Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce” (Veiliger en gezonder werken op elke leeftijd – veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk tegen de achtergrond van een vergrijzende beroepsbevolking)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Meer informatie over het pilotproject van het Europees Parlement met betrekking tot de veiligheid en gezondheid van oudere werknemers</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/nl/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"ro";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materialele conferinţei „Munca în condiții mai bune de securitate și sănătate la orice vârstă“ sunt disponibile online";"<p>   În decembrie a avut loc la Parlamentul European o conferinţă pe tema securităţii şi sănătăţii ocupaţionale a lucrătorilor vârstnici.</p>  <p>   Evenimentul a fost organizat în cadrul proiectului pilot al Parlamentului European şi desfăşurat de EU-OSHA la cererea Comisiei Europene. Proiectul urmăreşte să îmbunătăţească cunoaşterea politicilor şi programelor actuale, să stimuleze schimbul de bune practici şi să cerceteze în continuare modalităţile de îmbunătăţire a sănătăţii şi securităţii lucrătorilor vârstnici.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Accesaţi lucrările conferinţei „Munca în condiții mai bune de securitate și sănătate la orice vârstă – securitatea și sănătatea în muncă (SSM) în contextul îmbătrânirii populației active”</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Mai multe informaţii despre proiectul pilot al Parlamentului European privind sănătatea şi securitatea lucrătorilor vârstnici</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/ro/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"lv";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Konferences <@#&>Drošāks un veselīgāks darbs jebkurā vecumā<@#&> materiāli ir pieejami tiešsaistē";"<p>   Decembrī Eiropas Parlamentā notika konference, kurā uzmanība tika pievērsta vecāka gadagājuma darba ņēmēju darba drošībai un veselības aizsardzībai.</p>  <p>   Pasākums tika organizēts saistībā ar Eiropas Parlamenta izmēģinājuma projektu, to īstenoja EU-OSHA pēc Eiropas Komisija pieprasījuma, un tā uzdevums ir uzlabot zināšanas par pašreizējo politiku un projektiem, veicināt labas prakses piemēru apmaiņu un turpināt meklēt veidus kā uzlabot vecāka gadagajuma darba ņēmēju veselības aizsardzību un darba drošību.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Piekļuve konferences <@#&>Drošāks un veselībai nekaitīgāks darbs jebkurā vecumā — darba drošība un veselības aizsardzība (DDVA) novecojoša darbaspēka kontekstā<@#&> materiāliem</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Uzziniet vairāk par Eiropas Parlamenta izmēginājuma projektu par vecāka gadagājuma darba ņēmēju veselības aizsardzību un darba drošību</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/lv/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"fr";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Les documents de la conférence «Safer and healthier work at any age» (Travailler dans des conditions plus sûres et plus saines à tout âge) sont disponibles en ligne.";"<p>   Une conférence portant sur la sécurité et la santé au travail des travailleurs âgés s'est tenue au Parlement européen en décembre.</p>  <p>   La manifestation était organisée dans le cadre d'un projet pilote du Parlement européen mené par l'EU-OSHA à la demande de la Commission européenne, lequel a pour objectif d'améliorer les connaissances au sujet des politiques et programmes actuels, de stimuler l'échange de meilleures pratiques et d'examiner plus en détail les moyens d'améliorer la santé et la sécurité des travailleurs âgés.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Accéder aux actes de la conférence «Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce» [Travailler dans des conditions plus sûres et plus saines à tout âge: la sécurité et la santé au travail (SST) dans le contexte d'une population active vieillissante]</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>En savoir plus sur le projet pilote du Parlement européen concernant la santé et la sécurité des travailleurs âgés</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/fr/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"bg";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Материалите от конференцията „По-безопасна и по-здравословна работа на всяка възраст“ вече са публикувани онлайн";"<p>   През декември в Европейския парламент се проведе конференция за безопасността и здравето на по-възрастните работници.</p>  <p>   Събитието беше организирано в контекста на пилотния проект на Европейския парламент, изпълнен от EU-OSHA по искане на Европейската комисия, който има за цел да подобри познанията за съществуващите политики и програми, да насърчи обмена на най-добри практики и още по-задълбочено да разгледа начините за подобряване на здравето и безопасността на по-възрастните работници.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Достъп до материалите от конференцията „По-безопасна и по-здравословна работа на всяка възраст“ — безопасност и здраве при работа (БЗР) в контекста на застаряването на работната сила“</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Научете повече за пилотния проект на Европейския парламент за здравето и безопасността на по-възрастните работници</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/bg/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"cs";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materiály z konference „Bezpečnější a zdravější práce v každém věku“ jsou k dispozici on-line";"<p>   V prosinci se v Evropském parlamentu konala konference zaměřená na bezpečnost a ochranu zdraví starších pracovníků při práci.</p>  <p>   Konference byla uspořádána v rámci pilotního projektu Evropského parlamentu, který na žádost Evropské komise zajišťuje agentura EU-OSHA. Cílem projektu je zlepšit znalosti o současných politikách a programech, podněcovat výměnu osvědčených postupů a dále zkoumat možnosti zlepšení ochrany zdraví a bezpečnosti starších pracovníků.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Materiály z konference„ Bezpečnější a zdravější práce v každém věku – bezpečnost a ochrana zdraví při práci (BOZP) v kontextu stárnoucí pracovní síly“</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Více informací o pilotním projektu Evropského parlamentu týkajícím se bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví starších pracovníků</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"et";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Konverentsi „Ohutum ja tervislikum töö sõltumata east” materjalid nüüd veebis";"<p>   Detsembris toimus Euroopa Parlamendis eakate töötajate tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu teemaline konverents.</p>  <p>   Üritus korraldati Euroopa Parlamendi pilootprojekti raames, mida juhib Euroopa Komisjoni palvel EU-OSHA ning mille eesmärk on tutvustada käimasolevaid poliitikaalgatusi ja programme, ergutada parimate tavade vahetust ning otsida uusi viise eakate töötajate tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu parandamiseks.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Konverentsi „Ohutum ja tervislikum töö sõltumata east – tööohutus ja -tervishoid vananeva tööjõu kontekstis” materjalid</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Euroopa Parlamendi eakate töötajate töötervishoiu ja -ohutuse katseprojekti lisateave</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/et/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"da";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materialer fra konferencen <@#&>Safer and healthier work at any age<@#&> tilgængelige online";"<p>   I december blev der afholdt en konference i Europa-Parlamentet, som fokuserede på arbejdsmiljø blandt ældre arbejdstagere.</p>  <p>   Begivenheden var arrangeret som led i Europa-Parlamentets pilotprojekt, der gennemføres af EU-OSHA efter anmodning fra Europa-Kommissionen, og som har til formål at skabe øget bevidsthed om de nuværende politikker og programmer, stimulere udveksling af bedste praksis og yderligere undersøge, hvordan arbejdsmiljøet blandt ældre arbejdstagere kan forbedres.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Se materialerne fra konferencen “Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce”</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Læs mere om Europa-Parlamentets pilotprojekt om arbejdsmiljø blandt ældre arbejdstagere</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/da/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"sv";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Konferensmaterial för <@#&>Säkra och hälsosamma arbetsplatser för alla åldrar<@#&> finns nu på internet";"<p>   En konferens om äldre arbetstagares arbetsmiljö gick av stapeln i Europaparlamentet i december.</p>  <p>   Evenemanget organiserades inom ramen för Europaparlamentets pilotprojekt som arbetsmiljöbyrån utför på Europeiska kommissionens begäran. Projektet har som mål att förbättra kunskapen om nuvarande policyer och program, att stimulera utbyte av bästa praxis och att ytterligare undersöka på vilka sätt äldre arbetstagares arbetsmiljö kan förbättras.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Här finns protokollet från konferensen <@#&>Säkra och hälsosamma arbetsplatser för alla åldrar – arbetsmiljö i samband med en åldrande arbetskraft<@#&></a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Ta reda på mer om Europaparlamentets pilotprojekt om äldre arbetstagares arbetsmiljö</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sv/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"pt";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Disponíveis online os materiais da conferência «Trabalho mais seguro e saudável em qualquer idade»";"<p>   Uma conferência sobre a segurança e saúde ocupacionais dos trabalhadores idosos realizou-se em dezembro no Parlamento Europeu.</p>  <p>   O evento foi organizado no contexto de um projeto-piloto do Parlamento Europeu, que está a ser implementado pela EU-OSHA a pedido da Comissão Europeia, que visa melhorar o conhecimento das políticas e dos programais atuais, fomentar o intercâmbio de boas práticas e analisar formas de melhorar a saúde e segurança dos trabalhadores mais velhos.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Aceder à ata da conferência «Trabalho mais seguro e saudável em qualquer idade – segurança e saúde no trabalho (SST) no contexto do envelhecimento da população ativa»</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Mais informações sobre o projeto-piloto do Parlamento Europeu para a segurança e saúde dos trabalhadores idosos</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/pt/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"mt";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Il-materjal tal-konferenza 'Xogħol aktar sigur u b'saħħtu f'kull età’ disponibbli onlajn";"<p>   Konferenza li tiffoka fuq is-sigurtà u s-saħħa fuq il-post tax-xogħol ta' ħaddiema aktar imdaħħla fl-età saret f'Diċembru, fil-Parlament Ewropew.</p>  <p>   L-avveniment kien organizzat fil-kuntest ta' proġett pilota tal-Parlament Ewropew, li twettaq mill-EU-OSHA fuq talba tal-KE, bil-għan li jtejjeb l-għarfien ta' politiki u programmi attwali, jistimula skambji tal-aqwa prattiki u jkompli jinvestiga l-modi biex jitjiebu s-saħħa u s-sigurtà għal ħaddiema aktar imdaħħla fl-età .</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Aċċessa l-proċeduri tal-konferenza “Xogħol aktar sigur u b'saħħtu f'kull età – is-sigurtà u s-saħħa fuq il-post tax-xogħol (OSH) fil-kuntest ta' forza tax-xogħol li qiegħda tixjieħ”</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Tgħallem aktar dwar il-proġett pilota tal-Parlament Ewropew dwar is-saħħa u s-sigurtà ta' ħaddiema aktar imdaħħla fl-età</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/mt/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"es";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Los materiales de la conferencia <@#&>Trabajo más seguro y saludable a cualquier edad<@#&>, están disponibles en línea";"<p>   El pasado mes de diciembre se celebró en el Parlamento Europeo una conferencia centrada en la seguridad y la salud en el trabajo de los trabajadores de más edad.</p>  <p>   El evento fue organizado en el marco de un proyecto piloto del Parlamento Europeo, desarrollado por EU-OSHA a instancias de la Comisión Europea, que tiene por objeto mejorar los conocimientos sobre las políticas y los programas actuales, estimular el intercambio de buenas prácticas y seguir investigando vías que permitan mejorar la seguridad y la salud de los trabajadores de más edad.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Acceder a las actas de la conferencia “Trabajo más seguro y saludable a cualquier edad – seguridad y salud en el trabajo (OSH) en el marco del envejecimiento de la población activa.”</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Ampliar información sobre el proyecto piloto del Parlamento Europeo relativo a la seguridad y la salud de los trabajadores de más edad</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/es/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"sk";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materiály z konferencie s názvom Bezpečnejšia a zdravšia práca v každom veku sú dostupné online";"<p>   V Európskom parlamente sa v decembri uskutočnila konferencia zameraná na bezpečnosť a ochranu zdravia starších zamestnancov pri práci.</p>  <p>   Toto podujatie sa zorganizovalo v rámci pilotného projektu Európskeho parlamentu, ktorý na žiadosť Európskej komisie realizuje agentúra EU-OSHA. Cieľom projektu je zlepšiť znalosti o súčasných politikách a programoch, podnecovať výmenu osvedčených postupov a ďalej skúmať možnosti na zlepšovanie ochrany zdravia a bezpečnosti starších zamestnancov.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Správy z konferencie s názvom Bezpečnejšia a zdravšia práca v každom veku – bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri práci (BOZP) v súvislosti so starnúcou pracovnou silou</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Prečítajte si viac o pilotnom projekte Európskeho parlamentu v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia starších zamestnancov</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sk/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
