"/el/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"el";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Το υλικό του συνεδρίου ‘Safer and healthier work at any age’ (<@#&>Μεγαλύτερη ασφάλεια και υγεία στην εργασία σε κάθε ηλικία<@#&>) είναι διαθέσιμο επιιγραμμικά";"<p>   Τον Δεκέμβριο πραγματοποιήθηκε στο Ευρωπαϊκό Κοινοβούλιο συνέδριο σχετικά με την υγεία και την ασφάλεια των εργαζομένων μεγαλύτερης ηλικίας.</p>  <p>   Η εκδήλωση διοργανώθηκε στο πλαίσιο ενός πιλοτικού σχεδίου του Ευρωπαϊκού Κοινοβουλίου, το οποίο υλοποιήθηκε από τον EU-OSHA κατόπιν αιτήματος της Ευρωπαϊκής Επιτροπής, με σκοπό να διευρύνει τις γνώσεις μας σχετικά με τις τρέχουσες πολιτικές και προγράμματα, να ενθαρρύνει την ανταλλαγή βέλτιστων πρακτικών και να διερευνήσει περαιτέρω τους τρόπους βελτίωσης της υγείας και της ασφάλειας των εργαζομένων μεγαλύτερης ηλικίας.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Πρόσβαση στα πρακτικά του συνεδρίου “Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce” (“Μεγαλύτερη ασφάλεια και υγεία στην εργασία σε κάθε ηλικία - επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία (ΕΑΥ) στο πλαίσιο του γηράσκοντος εργατικού δυναμικού”)</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Περισσότερες πληροφορίες για το πιλοτικό σχέδιο του Ευρωπαϊκού Κοινοβουλίου σχετικά με την υγεία και ασφάλεια των εργαζομένων μεγαλύτερης ηλικίας</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/el/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"sl";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Gradivo konference na temo <@#&>Varnejše in bolj zdravo delo pri vseh starostih<@#&> sedaj na voljo na spletu";"<p>   Decembra je v Evropskem parlamentu potekala konferenca, katere osrednja tema sta bila varnost in zdravje pri delu za starejše delavce.</p>  <p>   Dogodek je bil organiziran v okviru pilotnega projekta Evropskega parlamenta, ki ga na pobudo Evropske komisije izvaja agencija EU-OSHA in katerega cilj je poglobiti znanje o obstoječih politikah in programih, spodbuditi izmenjavo najboljših praks in nadalje proučiti možnosti za izboljšanje varnosti in zdravja starejših delavcev.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Oglejte si gradivo konference „Varnejše in bolj zdravo delo pri vseh starostih – varnost in zdravje pri delu glede na staranje delovne sile“</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Preberite si več o pilotnem projektu Evropskega parlamenta o varnosti in zdravju starejših delavcev</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sl/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"hr";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materijali s konferencije na temu <@#&>Sigurniji i zdraviji na radu u svakoj starosnoj dobi<@#&> sada dostupni na Internetu";"<p>   Konferencija na temu zdravlje i sigurnost starijih radnika na radnom mjestu održana je u prosincu u Europskom parlamentu.</p> <p>   U okviru pilot-projekta Europskog parlamenta, na zahtjev Europske komisije, taj je događaj organizirala EU-OSHA želeći upoznati javnost s aktualnim politikama i programima, potaknuti razmjenu dobrih praksa i otkriti nove mogućnosti kako poboljšati zdravlje i sigurnost starijih radnika.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Pristupite materijalima konferencije <@#&>Sigurniji i zdraviji na radu u svakoj starosnoj dobi - zdravlje i sigurnost na radu (OSH) s obzirom na sve stariju prosječnu dob radne snage</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Saznajte više o pilot-projektu Europskog parlamenta o zdravlju i sigurnosti starijih radnika</a><br />  </p>";"";"/hr/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"pl";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materiały z konferencji „Bezpieczniejsze i zdrowsze warunki pracy dla osób w każdym wieku” są dostępne w internecie";"<p>   Konferencja poświęcona zdrowiu i bezpieczeństwu w miejscu pracy dla pracowników w starszym wieku odbyła się w grudniu w Parlamencie Europejskim.</p>  <p>   Konferencję zorganizowano w związku z pilotażowym projektem Parlamentu Europejskiego, prowadzonym przez EU-OSHA na prośbę Komisji, którego celem jest poprawa wiedzy na temat bieżącej polityki i programów, stymulowanie wymiany najlepszych praktyk i szukanie dalszych sposobów na poprawę zdrowia i bepieczeństwa pracowników w starszym wieku.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Dostęp do materiałów na temat konferencji „Bezpieczniejsze i zdrowsze warunki pracy w każdym wieku – bezpieczeństwo i higiena pracy (BHP) w kontekście starzejącej się siły roboczej”</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Dowiedz się więcej o pilotażowym projekcie Parlamentu Europejskiego dotyczącym zdrowia i bezpieczeństwa pracowników w starszym wieku</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/pl/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"de";"/en/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online";"published";"2014-01-31 13:02:36";"2014-07-25 10:48:11";"2014-02-06 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Materialien zur Konferenz „Sicherere und gesündere Arbeitsplätze in jedem Alter“ online verfügbar";"<p>   Im Dezember fand im Europäischen Parlament eine Konferenz mit dem Schwerpunkt Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz älterer Arbeitnehmer statt.</p>  <p>   Die Veranstaltung wurde im Rahmen eines Pilotprojekts des Europäischen Parlaments organisiert, das die EU-OSHA auf Ersuchen der Europäischen Kommission durchführt. Dieses Projekt zielt darauf ab, die Kenntnis derzeitiger Strategien und Programme zu verbessern, den Austausch bewährter Praktiken anzuregen und die Untersuchung von Methoden zur Verbesserung des Gesundheitsschutzes und der Sicherheit älterer Arbeitnehmer weiter voranzutreiben.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age<@#&>>Tagungsbericht zur Konferenz „Sicherere und gesündere Arbeitsplätze in jedem Alter – Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit (OSH) im Kontext einer alternden Belegschaft“</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Mehr über das Pilotprojekt „Sicherere und gesündere Arbeitsplätze in jedem Alter“ des Europäischen Parlaments</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/de/teaser/safer-and-healthier-work-at-any-age-conference-materials-available-online/old worker.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-slic-campaign-launched-prevention-of-work-accidents-due-to-slips-and-trips-2014";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-03 15:55:33";"2014-02-03 15:56:44";"2014-02-05 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU- SLIC Campaign launched - Prevention of Work Accidents due to Slips and Trips 2014";"<p>   The Senior Labour Inspectors Committee (SLIC) Campaign for the Prevention of Work Accidents due to Slips and Trips on the Same Level 2014 was launched on January 29. This is an inspection and information campaign targeted at employers and employees. Within the framework of the information campaign, educational interactive software will be developed depicting situations where slips and trips are possible, along with the solutions to prevent them. A campaign calendar for 2015 and a poster will also be prepared.</p>  <p>   Slips, trips and falls are the biggest cause of accidents in all economic sectors, from heavy manufacturing to office work. The relative importance of such cases among all work accidents is 24%.</p>  <p>   They are also the most frequent cause of accidents among women at work (<a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/news/new-risks-and-trends-in-the-safety-and-health-of-women-at-work<@#&>>New risks and trends in the safety and health of women at work</a>, EU-OSHA 2013).<br />   The relative importance of work accidents due to falls on the same level is the largest in manufacturing – with a relative importance of 24% in transport and storage, 15% in construction, and in 14% in trade.</p>  <p>   Falls on the same level are the most frequent cause of work accidents primarily for elderly people. Of all work accidents, falls on the same level account for 27% among people aged 45-54, 33% among people aged 55-64, and is as high as 45% among people who are 65 or older.</p>  <p>   Slips and trips may have serious consequences, resulting in severe injuries such as broken bones or concussion. Thirty-five per cent of cases of incapacity for work last for at least one month.<br />   According to the Health &amp; Safety Laboratory, UK, falls from height were the most common cause of fatalities (31%) and slips and trips were the most common cause of major injuries to employees (RIDDOR)</p>  <p>   Slips, trips and falls were responsible for more than half of all major accidents (56%) and almost a third of over seven day (31%) absences.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://ti.ee/index.php?page=1785&amp;<@#&>>For more information </a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/en/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Prevent slips and trips with NAPO</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/topics/accident_prevention<@#&>>EU-OSHA accident prevention pages</a></p>";"";"/en/news/eu-slic-campaign-launched-prevention-of-work-accidents-due-to-slips-and-trips-2014/Slips Napo.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-working-conditions-time-for-member-states-to-implement-the-ilo-domestic-workers-convention";"en";"";"published";"2014-01-31 12:09:23";"2014-01-31 12:10:03";"2014-02-04 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU - Working conditions: time for Member States to implement the ILO domestic workers convention";"<p>   Working conditions: time for Member States to implement the ILO domestic workers convention</p>  <p>   The European Commission welcomes the adoption by the EU's Council of Ministers of a Decision authorising Member States to ratify the International Labour Organisation (ILO) Convention concerning fair and decent work for domestic workers (<a href=<@#&>http://www.ilo.org/dyn/normlex/en/f?p=NORMLEXPUB:12100:0::NO::P12100_ILO_CODE:C189<@#&>>Convention No. 189</a>).<br />   The Decision was <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=89&amp;langId=en&amp;newsId=1851&amp;furtherNews=yes<@#&>>proposed by the Commission in March 2013</a>, and endorsed by the European Parliament.</p>";"<p>   To implement the 2011 ILO Domestic Workers Convention, ratifying States will have to make sure that domestic workers:</p>  <ul>   <li>    receive equal treatment with other workers as regards compensation and benefits, for example in the case of maternity</li>   <li>    are informed of the terms and details of their employment</li>   <li>    are protected against discrimination</li>   <li>    are offered decent living conditions</li>   <li>    have easy access to complaint mechanisms</li>  </ul>  <p>   Finally, the Convention also sets out rules regarding foreign recruitment.</p>  <p>   EU legislation, such as Directives on health and safety, workers' rights, gender equality, trafficking and asylum, already addresses some aspects covered by the ILO Convention. The provisions of the Convention share the same approach as this legislation and are broadly consistent.<br />   On many issues, EU law is more protective than the Convention. However, the Convention is more precise than EU law on the coverage of domestic workers by legislation and in other particular aspects of domestic work.</p>";"/en/news/eu-working-conditions-time-for-member-states-to-implement-the-ilo-domestic-workers-convention/ilo2.gif";"";"migrant_workers, legislation, young_people";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eurogip-discussions-2014-encouraging-companies-to-prevent-osh-risks-2013-what-works";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-28 19:52:07";"2014-02-28 19:52:21";"2014-02-03 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EUROGIP Discussions 2014: encouraging companies to prevent OSH risks – what works?";"<p>   EUROGIP’s next conference in its ‘Discussions’ series will take place in Paris on 20 March 2014. The main focus will be on exploring successful initiatives, devices and sytems from across Europe that encourage companies to improve health and safety at work and to reduce occupational injuries.</p>";"<p>   EUROGIP Discussions aim to promote the exchange of information and good practices among participants on issues related to work-related risk prevention at European level.</p>  <p>   Download the programme of EUROGIP Discussions 2014 in <a href=<@#&>https://webmail.osha.europa.eu/owa/redir.aspx?C=gCu1DxkroEmp7t7_Gc3OUSDX8yBMCNFIq4KYxkIhERiUqytFywGFFNAvgB33WOBIR86FqUnH1io.&amp;URL=http%3a%2f%2feurogip.fr%2fimages%2fDebats%2fDebatsEurogip2014prog3_E.pdf<@#&>>English</a> and <a href=<@#&>https://webmail.osha.europa.eu/owa/redir.aspx?C=gCu1DxkroEmp7t7_Gc3OUSDX8yBMCNFIq4KYxkIhERiUqytFywGFFNAvgB33WOBIR86FqUnH1io.&amp;URL=http%3a%2f%2feurogip.fr%2fimages%2fdocuments%2f3558%2fDebatsEurogip2014prog.pdf<@#&>>French</a>.</p>";"/en/news/eurogip-discussions-2014-encouraging-companies-to-prevent-osh-risks-2013-what-works/EUROGIP.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/eu-new-information-requested-for-the-proposed-restriction-on-1-methyl-2-pyrrolidone-nmp";"en";"";"published";"2014-01-31 10:38:14";"2014-01-31 12:13:13";"2014-02-03 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU - New information requested for the proposed restriction on 1-methyl-2-pyrrolidone (NMP)";"<p>   The European Chemical Agency´s Committee for Socio-economic Analysis (SEAC) is requesting additional information from stakeholders to assist with its opinion development for the 1-methyl-2-pyrrolidone (NMP) restriction proposal.</p>";"<p>   A specific question has been added to the currently running public consultation, namely asking for suggestions for adjustment of the restriction proposal that would ensure risk reduction at a smaller cost. Comments on these and other aspects of the proposed restriction are expected by 18 March 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://echa.europa.eu/restrictions-under-consideration/-/substance/4506/search/+/term<@#&>>More information</a></p>";"/en/news/eu-new-information-requested-for-the-proposed-restriction-on-1-methyl-2-pyrrolidone-nmp/ECHA_logo_new.jpg";"";"dangerous_substances, legislation";"";"";"";""
"/en/news/agreement-signed-between-eu-osha-and-the-university-of-deusto-in-bilbao";"en";"";"published";"2014-02-03 16:56:00";"2014-02-03 18:16:23";"2014-02-03 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Agreement signed between EU-OSHA and the University of Deusto in Bilbao";"<p>   A cooperation agreement between EU-OSHA and the University of Deusto will allow graduate students from the Faculty of Law to conduct practical training in the agency.</p>";"<p>   The agreement was signed by EU-OSHA Director Dr Christa Sedlatschek and the Dean of the Faculty of Law of the University of Deusto in Bilbao, José Luis Ávila.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/deusto/sets/72157640352924263<@#&>>See photos from the event (CC University of Deusto)</a></p>";"/en/news/agreement-signed-between-eu-osha-and-the-university-of-deusto-in-bilbao/cooperation agreement.PNG";"CC University of Deusto";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"el";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"EP President visits EU-OSHA";"<p>   European Parliament President Martin Schulz paid an official visit to the premises of EU-OSHA in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Mr Schulz was welcomed by the Director Christa Sedlatschek, met the agency staff and was able to learn first-hand about the main projects and activities currently developed by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Speaking after the visit, Mr Schulz commented:&nbsp; “Europe must be judged not only on its capacity to create new jobs, but also on its capacity to improve the quality, safety and health of the jobs which already exist. The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"es";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"dimitrovan";"El Presidente del Parlamento Europeo visita EU-OSHA";"<p>   El presidente del Parlamento Europeo, Martin Schulz, hizo una visita oficial a las oficinas de la Agencia Europea para la Seguridad y Salud en el Trabajo (EU-OSHA) en Bilbao.</p>  <p>   El presidente fue recibido por la directora de EU-OSHA, Christa Sedlatschek, se reunió con el personal y pudo conocer de primera mano los principales proyectos y actividades actualmente desarrollados por EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Durante su visita, el presidente Schulz declaró: <@#&>Europa debe ser juzgada no sólo por su capacidad para crear nuevos puestos de trabajo, sino también por su capacidad para mejorar la calidad, la seguridad y la salud de los puestos de trabajo ya existentes. La labor de la Agencia Europea para la Seguridad y la Salud en el Trabajo es crucial en este sentido. Al informar, investigar y debatir sobre seguridad y salud en el trabajo, la Agencia asegura el liderazgo de Europa en la mejora de la vida de los trabajadores y en contribuir a la economía en general <@#&>.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>Ver fotos de la visita del presidente Schulz a EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"nl";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"EP President visits EU-OSHA";"<p>   European Parliament President Martin Schulz paid an official visit to the premises of EU-OSHA in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Mr Schulz was welcomed by the Director Christa Sedlatschek, met the agency staff and was able to learn first-hand about the main projects and activities currently developed by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Speaking after the visit, Mr Schulz commented:&nbsp; “Europe must be judged not only on its capacity to create new jobs, but also on its capacity to improve the quality, safety and health of the jobs which already exist. The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"en";"";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"dimitrovan";"EP President visits EU-OSHA";"<p>   European Parliament President Martin Schulz paid an official visit to the premises of EU-OSHA in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Mr Schulz was welcomed by the Director Christa Sedlatschek, met the agency staff and was able to learn first-hand about the main projects and activities currently developed by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Speaking after the visit, Mr Schulz commented:&nbsp; “Europe must be judged not only on its capacity to create new jobs, but also on its capacity to improve the quality, safety and health of the jobs which already exist. The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"is";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"EP President visits EU-OSHA";"<p>   European Parliament President Martin Schulz paid an official visit to the premises of EU-OSHA in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Mr Schulz was welcomed by the Director Christa Sedlatschek, met the agency staff and was able to learn first-hand about the main projects and activities currently developed by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Speaking after the visit, Mr Schulz commented:&nbsp; “Europe must be judged not only on its capacity to create new jobs, but also on its capacity to improve the quality, safety and health of the jobs which already exist. The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"no";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"EP President visits EU-OSHA";"<p>   European Parliament President Martin Schulz paid an official visit to the premises of EU-OSHA in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Mr Schulz was welcomed by the Director Christa Sedlatschek, met the agency staff and was able to learn first-hand about the main projects and activities currently developed by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Speaking after the visit, Mr Schulz commented:&nbsp; “Europe must be judged not only on its capacity to create new jobs, but also on its capacity to improve the quality, safety and health of the jobs which already exist. The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/hr/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"hr";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"EP President visits EU-OSHA";"<p>   European Parliament President Martin Schulz paid an official visit to the premises of EU-OSHA in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Mr Schulz was welcomed by the Director Christa Sedlatschek, met the agency staff and was able to learn first-hand about the main projects and activities currently developed by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Speaking after the visit, Mr Schulz commented:&nbsp; “Europe must be judged not only on its capacity to create new jobs, but also on its capacity to improve the quality, safety and health of the jobs which already exist. "/de/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"de";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-Parlamentspräsident besucht die EU-OSHA";"<p>   Der Präsident des Europäischen Parlaments, Martin Schulz, war heute zu einem offiziellen Besuch bei der EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Nach Begrüßung durch die Agenturdirektorin Christa Sedlatschek traf er die EU-OSHA Mitarbeiter und konnte sich von den wichtigsten aktuellen Projekten und Aktivitäten ein Bild machen.</p>  <p>   Nach dem Besuch kommentierte Herr Schulz: <@#&>Europa sollte nicht nur nach der Fähigkeit, neue Arbeitsplätze zu schaffen, beurteilt werden, sondern dahingehend, die Qualität, Sicherheit und Gesundheit der existierenden Jobs zu verbessern. Die Arbeit der Europäischen Agentur für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz am Arbeitsplatz ist in dieser Hinsicht von entscheidender Bedeutung. Die Agentur informiert, beobachtet und regt Debatten im Bereich Arbeitsschutz an und sichert somit Europas Führungsrolle bei der Verbesserung der Lebens- und Arbeitsbedingungen und leistet daher einen Beitrag zur Wirtschaft insgesamt.“</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>Fotos vom Besuch des von EU-Parlamentspräsidenten Schulz bei der EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"da";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"EP President visits EU-OSHA";"<p>   European Parliament President Martin Schulz paid an official visit to the premises of EU-OSHA in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Mr Schulz was welcomed by the Director Christa Sedlatschek, met the agency staff and was able to learn first-hand about the main projects and activities currently developed by EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   Speaking after the visit, Mr Schulz commented:&nbsp; “Europe must be judged not only on its capacity to create new jobs, but also on its capacity to improve the quality, safety and health of the jobs which already exist. The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"fr";"/en/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha";"published";"2014-01-30 11:49:11";"2014-07-25 13:34:24";"2014-01-31 17:30:00";"dimitrovan";"Le Président du Parlement européen en visite à l’Agence européenne pour la sécurité et la santé au travail (EU-OSHA)";"<p>   Martin Schulz, le Président du Parlement européen, était en visite officielle dans le nouveau siège de l'EU-OSHA à Bilbao.</p>  <p>   Le Président du Parlement européen accueilli par la Directrice de l’Agence a rencontré le personnel et pris connaissance des principaux projets et activités en cours à l’EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   A la fin de sa visite Mr Schulz a déclaré : « L’Europe ne doit pas seulement être jugée sur sa capacité à créer de nouveaux emplois, mais aussi sur sa capacité à améliorer la qualité, la santé et la sécurité des emplois existants. Le travail de l’Agence européenne pour la sécurité et la santé au travail est crucial à cet égard. Avec l’information qu’elle diffuse, les recherches qu’elle entreprend et les débats qu’elle anime sur le thème de la santé et de la sécurité au travail, l’Agence est capitale en Europe pour contribuer à l’amélioration de la vie des travailleurs et de l’économie en général ».</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>Photographies de la visite du Président Schulz a l’EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

The work of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work is crucial in this respect. By informing, monitoring and debating health and safety at work, the agency ensures Europe's lead in improving workers' lives and contributing to the economy at large”.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157640354654535/<@#&>>See photos from the visit of President Schulz to EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/ep-president-visits-eu-osha/EP-president.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/en/news/international-media-festival-for-prevention-closing-date-for-entries-extended-to-28.02.2014";"en";"";"published";"2014-01-31 10:31:09";"2014-01-31 10:31:31";"2014-01-31 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"International Media Festival for Prevention: closing date for entries extended to 28.02.2014";"<p>   <br />   The International Media Festival for Prevention is linked to the XX World Congress on Safety and Health at Work 2014, Frankfurt 24-27 August 2014. Eligible for entry are media consisting of moving images on safety and health at work: films, web clips, Web TV, mobisodes, animation, fiction, documentary, TV spots, interactive media, apps and web sites produced from January 2010.</p>";"<p>   The closing date has been extended to 28 February 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>Learn more about the Festival</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"/en/news/international-media-festival-for-prevention-closing-date-for-entries-extended-to-28.02.2014/file.php";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"cs";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Podoba průzkumu ESENER se v roce 2014 bude odvíjet od nových poznatků výzkumu";"<p>   Dvě nové publikace vyhodnocují účinnost otázek položených v rámci Průzkumu podniků na téma nových a vznikajících rizik (ESENER) provedeného v roce 2009. Výzkum pomocí rozhovorů s původními respondenty zjišťoval, jak respondenti chápali otázky položené v rámci průzkumu a jak na ně odpovídali.</p> <p>   Zprávy obsahují doporučení ohledně změn v rámci formulování a struktury otázek průzkumu, aby se zabránilo špatnému pochopení otázek a zvýšila spolehlivost výsledků. Zjištění se promítají do struktury a přípravy průzkumu ESENER v roce 2014.</p> <p>   Přečtěte si <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>hlavní zjištění</a> a <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>souhrnné zprávy</a> „kvalitativního následného hodnocení průzkumu ESENER“<br /> Podívejte se na související <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikace</a><br /> Seznamte se blíže s průzkumem ESENER pomocí našeho <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>krátkého videa</a><br />  </p>";"";"/cs/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"ro";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un nou studiu ghidează modul de concepere a sondajului ESENER din 2014";"<p>   Două noi publicaţii evaluează eficacitatea întrebărilor din cadrul Sondajului european în rândul întreprinderilor privind riscurile noi şi emergente (ESENER). Studiul a cuprins interviuri cu respondenţii de la primul sondaj pentru a afla cum au înţeles şi au răspuns la întrebările sondajului.</p> <p>   Rapoartele includ recomandări pentru modificarea sau restructurarea întrebărilor sondajului pentru a evita neînţelegerile şi a îmbunătăţi fiabilitatea rezultatelor. Concluziile studiului sunt luate în considerare la modul de concepere şi elaborare a sondajului ESENER din 2014.</p> <p>   Citiţi <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>concluziile de fond</a> şi <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>rapoartele generale</a> ale „Qualitative post-test evaluation of ESENER” (Evaluarea calităţii sondajului ESENER ulterior testării)<br /> Consultaţi alte <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publicaţii</a> relevante<br /> Aflaţi mai multe despre sondajul ESENER din <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>scurtul material video</a> pregătit de noi<br />  </p>";"";"/ro/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"de";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Aktualisierung der ESENER-Erhebung 2014 auf der Grundlage neuer Untersuchungen";"<p>   Zwei neue Veröffentlichungen bewerten die Wirksamkeit des Fragenkatalogs in der Unternehmensumfrage über neue und aufkommende Risiken (ESENER) von 2009. Im Rahmen der Untersuchungen wurden Teilnehmer dieser Umfrage dazu befragt, wie sie die Erhebungsfragen verstanden haben und bei der Beantwortung vorgegangen sind.</p> <p>   Der Bericht enthält Vorschläge für die Änderung und Neugliederung der Erhebungsfragen, damit Missverständnisse vermieden und Ergebnisse verlässlicher werden. Auf der Grundlage dieser Untersuchungergebnisse wird die ESENER-Erhebung für 2014 gestaltet und entwickelt. </p> <p>   Lesen Sie die <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>wesentlichen Ergebnisse</a> der Post-Test-Bewertung in Bezug auf die Qualität von ESENER und den <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>Überblicksbericht</a><br /> Stöbern Sie in ähnlichen <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>Veröffentlichungen</a><br /> Erfahren Sie mehr über ESENER in unserem <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>Kurzvideo</a><br />  </p>";"";"/de/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"fr";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Actualisation de l'enquête ESENER sur la base de nouvelles études";"<p>   Deux nouvelles publications évaluent la pertinence des questions posées dans le cadre de l'enquête ESENER 2009 (Enquête européenne des entreprises sur les risques nouveaux et émergents). Elles incluent notamment des entretiens avec des personnes interrogées lors de l'enquête, afin de savoir comment celles-ci avaient compris les questions qui leur avaient été posées et y avaient répondu.</p> <p>   Ces études comprennent des recommandations visant à modifier ou reformuler certaines questions en vue d'éviter des erreurs d'interprétation et d'améliorer la fiabilité des résultats obtenus. Leurs conclusions alimenteront la conception et la formulation de l'enquête ESENER 2014.</p> <p>   Lire  les <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>principales conclusions</a> et les <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>rapports récapitulatifs</a> de l'évaluation post-test qualitative de l'enquête ESENER<br /> Consulter les <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publications</a> associées <br /> En savoir plus sur l'enquête ESENER grâce à notre <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>brève vidéo</a><br />  </p>";"";"/fr/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"is";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ný hönnun á rannsóknarleiðbeiningum ESENER könnunarinnar";"<p>   Tvö ný rit leggja mat á skilvirkni spurninganna sem lagðar voru fyrir í Fyrirtækjakönnuninni um nýjar og aðsteðjandi hættur (ESENER) árið 2009. Rannsóknin fólst meðal annars í viðtölum við upphaflega viðmælendur til þess að fræðast um hvernig þeir skildu og svöruðu spurningum könnunarinnar. </p> <p>   Skýrslan inniheldur tilmæli um úrbætur eða enduruppbyggingu á spurningum könnunarinnar til þess að koma í veg fyrir misskilning og auka áreiðanleika niðurstaðnanna.  Niðurstöðurnar verða notaðar við hönnun og þróun á ESENER könnuninni fyrir árið 2014.</p> <p>   Lesa ‘Eigindlega eftir-könnunarmatið á ESENER’ <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>efnislegar niðurstöður</a> og <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>yfirlitsskýrslur</a><br /> Skoða tengd <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>rit</a><br /> Fræðast meira um ESENER í <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>stuttu myndbandi</a><br />  </p>";"";"/is/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"it";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Concezione delle nuove guide sulla ricerca dell'inchiesta ESENER 2014";"<p>   Due nuove pubblicazioni valutano l'efficacia dei quesiti posti nel corso dell'indagine tra le aziende sui rischi nuovi ed emergenti (ESENER) effettuata nel 2009. La ricerca ha comportato colloqui con i diretti interessati, per comprendere come interpretavano i quesiti dell'indagine e come vi rispondevano.</p> <p>   Le relazioni comprendono raccomandazioni per modificare o strutturare in modo diverso i quesiti dell'indagine per evitare incomprensioni e migliorare l'affidabilità dei risultati. Le risultanze contribuiranno alla concezione e allo sviluppo dell'indagine ESENER 2014.</p> <p>   Leggi le <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>conclusioni sostanziali</a> della valutazione qualitativa a posteriori di ESENER e le <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>relazioni di sintesi</a><br /> Consulta le <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>pubblicazioni</a> correlate <br /> Per maggiori informazioni su ESENER rimandiamo al nostro <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>breve video</a><br />  </p>";"";"/it/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"hu";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Új kutatás határozza meg a 2014. évi ESENER felmérés felépítését";"<p>   Két új kiadvány értékeli a 2009. évi Új és újonnan felmerülő kockázatokról szóló európai vállalati felmérésben (ESENER) feltett kérdések hatékonyságát.  A kutatás keretében a felmérésre válaszolókat arról kérdezték, hogyan értelmezték a kérdéseket és miként válaszoltak rájuk.</p> <p>   A jelentések javaslatokat tartalmaznak a felmérés kérdéseinek módosítására vagy átstrukturálására, hogy így a félreértések elkerülhetők legyenek és az eredmények megbízhatósága javuljon.   A kutatás eredményei alapján dolgozzák ki a 2014. évi ESENER felmérést.</p> <p>   Tekintse meg az ESENER felmérés utólagos minőségi értékelésének <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>megalapozott eredményeit</a> és az <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>áttekintő jelentéseket</a><br /> Böngésszen a kapcsolódó <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>kiadványok</a> között<br /> Tudjon meg többet az ESENER felmérésről <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>rövid videónkból</a><br />  </p>";"";"/hu/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"lt";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Naujo dizaino 2014 m. ESENER (Europos įmonių apklausos apie naują ir atsirandančią riziką) tyrimų vadovas";"<p>   Dviejuose naujuose leidiniuose vertinamas 2009 m. Europos įmonių apklausoje apie naują ir atsirandančią riziką (ESENER) užduotų klausimų veiksmingumas. Tyrime buvo apklausiami pirminėje apklausoje dalyvavę respondentai siekiant sužinoti, kaip jie suprato ir atsakė į apklausos klausimus.</p> <p>   Ataskaitose pateikiamos rekomendacijos, kaip pataisyti ar pakeisti apklausos klausimus siekiant išvengti nesusipratimų ir gauti patikimesnius rezultatus. Išvadomis vadovaujamasi kuriant ir rengiant 2014 m. ESENER apklausą.</p> <p>   Skaitykite „Kokybinio vertinimo pasibaigus ESENER apklausai“  <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>esmines išvadas</a> ir <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>apžvalgos ataskaitas</a><br /> Susipažinkite su susijusiais <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>leidiniais</a><br /> Daugiau informacijos apie ESENER rasite <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>trumpame vaizdo įraše</a><br />  </p>";"";"/lt/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"nl";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nieuw onderzoek leidt tot nieuwe vormgeving van de Esener-enquête 2014";"<p>   In twee nieuwe publicaties is de doelmatigheid geëvalueerd van de vragen die gesteld zijn in de Europese enquête over nieuwe en opkomende risico's (Esener) van 2009. Het onderzoek bestond onder andere uit gesprekken met de oorspronkelijke respondenten om erachter te komen hoe zij de enquêtevragen hadden geïnterpreteerd en hoe zij deze hadden beantwoord.</p> <p>   In de bijbehorende verslagen staan aanbevelingen voor het aanpassen of herstructureren van de enquêtevragen om misverstanden te vermijden en de betrouwbaarheid van de resultaten te verbeteren. De bevindingen zijn toegepast in de opzet en de ontwikkeling van de Esener-enquête 2014.</p> <p>   Lees de <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>substantiële bevindingen</a> en de <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>overzichtsverslagen</a> van de ‘Kwalitatieve Esener-testevaluatie’<br /> Doorzoek verwante <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publicaties</a><br /> Kom meer te weten over Esener via onze <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>korte video</a><br />  </p>";"";"/nl/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"bg";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Нови изследвания подпомагат изготвянето на проучването ESENER за 2014 г.";"<p>   Две нови публикации оценяват ефективността на въпросите в проучването сред предприятията относно новите и възникващи рискове (ESENER) за 2009 г. В изследването първоначалните респонденти са запитани как са разбрали и отговорили на въпросите в ESENER.</p> <p>   Докладите включват препоръки за промени и преструктуриране на въпросите в проучването, за да се избегнат недоразумения и да се повиши надеждността на резултатите. Констатациите са взети предвид при проектирането и разработката на ESENER за 2014.</p> <p>   Преглед на <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>фактическите констатации</a> и <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>обзорните доклади</a> от <@#&>Последващата оценка на качеството на ESENER<@#&> <br /> Преглед на подобни <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>публикации</a><br /> Научете още за ESENER от нашия кратък <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>видеозапис</a><br />  </p>";"";"/bg/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"fi";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vuoden 2014 ESENER-kyselytutkimus suunnitellaan uusien tutkimustulosten pohjalta";"<p>   Kahdessa uudessa julkaisussa arvioidaan uusia ja kehittyviä riskejä vuonna 2009 selvittäneen Euroopan yrityksille tehdyn kyselytutkimuksen (ESENER) kysymyksiä. Alkuperäisiä tutkimuksen vastaajia haastateltiin tarkoituksena selvittää, miten he ymmärsivät tutkimuskysymykset ja miten he vastasivat niihin.</p> <p>   Raporteissa on suosituksia tutkimuskysymysten muuttamiseksi tai uudelleenmuotoilemiseksi väärinymmärrysten välttämiseksi ja tulosten reliabiliteetin parantamiseksi. Tuloksia käytetään vuoden 2014 ESENER-tutkimuksen suunnitteluun ja kehittämiseen.</p> <p>   Lue ESENER-tutkimuksen laadullisen jälkiarvioinnin <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>keskeiset tulokset</a> ja <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>yleiskatsaus</a><br /> Tutustu asiaan liittyviin <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>julkaisuihin</a><br /> Lisätietoja ESENER-tutkimuksesta <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>lyhyessä videoesityksessä</a><br />  </p>";"";"/fi/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"sk";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Návrh štruktúry prieskumu ESENER 2014 sleduje najnovšie výsledky výskumu";"<p>   V dvoch nových publikáciách sa hodnotí vhodnosť otázok položených v rámci prieskumu podnikov o nových a vznikajúcich rizikách (ESENER) v roku 2009. Predmetom výskumu sú pohovory s pôvodnými respondentmi, aby sa zistilo, ako porozumeli otázkam v prieskume a ako na ne odpovedali.</p> <p>   Správa prináša odporúčania na zmeny a preformulovanie otázok v prieskume, aby sa predišlo nedorozumeniam a zlepšila sa spoľahlivosť výsledkov. Zistenia sú premietnuté do štruktúry a prípravy prieskumu ESENER 2014.</p> <p>   Prečítajte si kvalitatívne následné vyhodnotenie prieskumu ESENER (Qualitative post-test evaluation of ESENER) v podobe <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>hlavných zistení</a> a <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>súhrnných správ</a><br /> Venujte pozornosť súvisiacim <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikáciám</a><br /> Viac informácií o prieskume ESENER vám ponúka náš <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>krátky videopríspevok</a><br />  </p>";"";"/sk/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"lv";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Jaunu ESENER 2014. gada apsekojuma pētījuma norādījumu izstrāde.";"<p>   Divās jaunās publikācijās novērtē 2009. gada Eiropas uzņēmumu apsekojumā par jaunajiem un nākotnes riskiem (ESENER) uzdoto jautājumu efektivitāti. Pētījums ietvēra intervijas ar attiecīgajiem respondentiem, lai uzzinātu kā respondenti saprata un atbildēja apsekojuma jautājumus.</p> <p>   Ziņojumos ir iekļauti ieteikumi apsekojuma jautājumu grozīšanai vai pārstrukturēšanai, lai novērstu neizpratni un uzlabotu rezultātu ticamību. Rezultāti tiek izmantoti  ESENER 2014. gada apsekojuma plānošanā un izstrādē. </p> <p>   Izlasiet publikāciju ''ESENER kvalitatīvs pēcpārbaudes novērtējums'' –  <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>galvenie rezultāti</a> un <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>pārskata ziņojumi</a><br /> Izpētiet ar to saistītās  <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikācijas</a><br /> Uzziniet vairāk par ESENER no mūsu  <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>īsvideo</a><br />  </p>";"";"/lv/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"es";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Dos informes ayudan a actualizar la encuesta ESENER 2014";"<p>   Dos nuevas publicaciones evalúan la eficacia de las preguntas planteadas en la encuesta de las empresas sobre riesgos nuevos y emergentes 2009 (ESENER). En el marco de esta iniciativa, se entrevistó a quienes participaron en la encuesta para saber cómo entendieron las preguntas del formulario y respondieron a ellas.</p> <p>   Los informes incluyen recomendaciones para modificar o reorganizar las preguntas de la encuesta con el fin de evitar malentendidos y aumentar la fiabilidad de sus resultados. Las conclusiones se tendrán en cuenta a la hora de planificar y elaborar la encuesta ESENER 2014.</p> <p>   Leer los <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>resultados principales</a> y los <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>informes generales</a> de la «Evaluación cualitativa ex post de ESENER» <br /> Explorar <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publicaciones</a> relacionadas <br /> Más información sobre ESENER en nuestro <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>vídeo breve</a><br />  </p>";"";"/es/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"sl";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Izsledki nove študije bodo podlaga za zasnovo raziskave ESENER 2014";"<p>   Dve novi publikaciji ocenjujeta učinkovitost vprašanj, zastavljenih anketirancem v raziskavi podjetij o novih in nastajočih tveganjih (ESENER) v letu 2009. Študija je vključevala razgovore s prvotnimi anketiranci, njen namen pa je bil ugotoviti, kako so ti razumeli anketna vprašanja in odgovarjali nanje.</p> <p>   Poročila vključujejo priporočila za dopolnitev in preoblikovanje anketnih vprašanj, da bi se izognili napačnemu razumevanju in izboljšali zanesljivost rezultatov. Izsledki študije bodo upoštevani pri zasnovi in pripravi raziskave ESENER v letu 2014.</p> <p>   V <@#&>Kvalitativni naknadni oceni raziskave ESENER<@#&> si preberite <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>glavne ugotovitve</a> in <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>pregledna poročila</a>.<br /> Oglejte si tudi s tem povezane <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikacije</a>.<br /> O raziskavi ESENER lahko izveste več v našem <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>kratkem videoposnetku</a>.<br />  </p>";"";"/sl/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"hr";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Novi dizajn uputa za istraživanje u sklopu ankete ESENER u 2014.";"<p>   Dvije nove publikacije ocjenjuju učinkovitost pitanja postavljenih u anketi među poduzetnicima o novim i nadolazećim rizicima (ESENER) iz 2009. Istraživanje je uključivalo intervjue s izvornim ispitanicima da bi se razumjelo kako su oni shvatili anketna pitanja te na njih odgovorili.</p> <p>   Izvješća uključuju preporuke za izmjenu odnosno preoblikovanje anketnih pitanja kako bi se izbjegle nejasnoće te poboljšalo pouzdanost rezultata. Rezultati su inkorporirani u izradu i razvoj ankete ESENER za 2014.</p> <p>   Pročitajte ‘Kvalitativna ocjena ESENER-a nakon rezultata’ <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>značajni nalazi</a> i <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>opća izvješća</a><br /> Istražite povezane <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikacije</a><br /> Saznajte više o anketi ESENER u našem <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>kratki video</a><br />  </p>";"";"/hr/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"sv";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ny forskning vägleder utformningen av Esener-undersökningen 2014";"<p>   Två nya publikationer utvärderar effektiviteten hos de frågor som ställdes i den europeiska företagsundersökningen av nya och framväxande risker (Esener) 2009. I utvärderingen gjordes intervjuer med dem som då svarade på frågorna för att ta reda på hur de uppfattade och svarade på frågorna i undersökningen.</p> <p>   I rapporten finns rekommendationer för att ändra eller omstrukturera frågorna i undersökningen för att undvika missförstånd och förbättra undersökningsresultatens tillförlitlighet. Resultaten från undersökningen används i utformningen och utarbetandet av Esener-undersökningen 2014.</p> <p>   Läs om <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>viktiga resultat</a> och <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>översiktliga rapporter</a> om <@#&>Qualitative post-test evaluation of ESENER<@#&>. <br /> Titta på relaterade <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikationer</a>.<br /> Lär dig mer om Esener i vår <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>korta video</a>.<br />  </p>";"";"/sv/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"pl";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nowy wzór poradników do badania ESENER 2014";"<p>   Dwie nowe publikacje oceniają skuteczność pytań zadawanych w Europejskim badaniu przedsiębiorstw na temat nowych i pojawiających się zagrożeń (ESENER). W badaniu ujęto rozmowy z respondentami w celu poznania sposobu rozumienia i odpowiedzi na pytania ankietowe.</p> <p>   W sprawozdaniach znajdują się zalecenia dotyczące zmiany lub przeredagowywania pytań ankietowych w celu uniknięcia nieporozumień i poprawy wiarygodności wyników. Wyniki są brane pod uwagę przy opracowywaniu projektu ankiety ESENER na 2014 r.</p> <p>   Przeczytaj <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>istotne wyniki</a> oraz <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>sprawozdania z analizy</a><br /> „Oceny jakościowej ESENER po przeprowadzeniu testu”. "/pt/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"pt";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Conceção dos novos guias de investigação do inquérito ESENER 2014";"<p>   Duas novas publicações avaliam a eficácia das questões colocadas no Inquérito às Empresas sobre Riscos Novos e Emergentes (ESENER) de 2009. A investigação incluiu entrevistas com os respondentes originais, a fim de analisar a forma como entenderam e responderam às questões do inquérito.</p> <p>   Os relatórios incluem recomendações relativas à alteração ou restruturação das questões do inquérito a fim de evitar mal-entendidos e melhorar a fiabilidade dos resultados. Os resultados estão a ser utilizados na conceção e no desenvolvimento do inquérito ESENER 2014.</p> <p>   Leia os <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>resultados substantivos</a> e os <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>relatórios de síntese</a> da «Avaliação qualitativa <i>a posteriori</i> do inquérito ESENER»<br /> Consulte <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publicações</a> relacionadas<br /> Mais informação sobre o ESENER no nosso <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>breve vídeo</a><br />  </p>";"";"/pt/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"mt";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Disinn ġdid tal-gwidi ta' riċerka tal-istħarriġ ESENER 2014";"<p>   Żewġ pubblikazzjonijiet ġodda jevalwaw l-effikaċja tal-mistoqsijiet magħmula fl-Istħarriġ tal-Intrapriżi 2009 dwar Riskji Ġodda u Emerġenti (ESENER). Ir-riċerka kienet tinvolvi intervisti ma' persuni li wieġbu oriġinarjament biex jiġi konkluż kif dawn fehmu u wieġbu għall-mistoqsijiet tal-istħarriġ.</p> <p>   Ir-rapporti jinkludu rakkomandazzjonijiet dwar kif il-mistoqsijiet tal-istħarriġ jiġu emendati u ristrutturati biex jiġi evitat nuqqas ta' fehim u titjieb l-affidabbiltà tar-riżultati. "/no/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"no";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ny forskning bak utformingen av ESENER-undersøkelsen for 2014";"<p>   To nye publikasjoner evaluerer effektiviteten ved spørsmålene i 2009-utgaven av Den europeiske bedriftsundersøkelsen om nye og framvoksende risikoer (ESENER). Under forskningen ble det gjennomført intervjuer med de opprinnelige respondentene for å lære om hvordan de forsto og besvarte spørsmålene i undersøkelsen.</p> <p>   Rapportene inneholder anbefalinger om endring eller omstrukturering av spørsmålene i undersøkelsen for å unngå misforståelser og øke påliteligheten ved resultatene. Resultatene mates nå inn i utformingen og utviklingen av ESENER-undersøkelsen for 2014.</p> <p>   Se <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>de viktigste funnene</a> og les <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>oversiktsrapportene</a> fra <@#&>Qualitative post-test evaluation of ESENER<@#&><br /> Se nærmere på relaterte <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikasjoner</a><br /> Lær mer om ESENER fra vår <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>videosnutt</a><br />  </p>";"";"/no/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"et";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uue hinnangu tulemusi kasutatakse ESENERi 2014. aasta uuringu kavandamisel";"<p>   Kahes uues väljaandes hinnatakse 2009. aasta uute ja tekkivate riskide Euroopa ettevõtete uuringu (ESENER) küsimuste efektiivsust. Hinnangus vesteldi uuringuküsimustele vastanutega, et selgitada, kuidas nad küsimusi tõlgendasid ja kuidas vastasid.</p> <p>   Aruannetes antakse soovitusi uuirnguküsimuste muutmiseks ja ümbersõnastamiseks, et vältida segasust ja tõsta tulemuste usaldusväärsust. Järeldusi võetakse arvesse ESENERi 2014. aasta uuringu kavandamisel ja koostamisel.</p> <p>   ESENERi kvalitatiivse järelkontrolli hinnangu <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>sisulised järeldused</a> ja <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>ülevaatearuanded</a><br /> Seonduvad <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>väljaanded</a><br /> Lisateave ESENERi kohta on meie <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>lühivideos</a><br />  </p>";"";"/et/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"da";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Forskningsvejledning til ESENER-undersøgelsen 2014 har fået nyt design";"<p>   I to nye publikationer vurderes effektiviteten af de spørgsmål, der i 2009 blev stillet i den europæiske virksomhedsundersøgelse af nye arbejdsmiljørisici og risici i fremvækst (ESENER). Forskningen omfattede interviews med personer, der oprindeligt havde besvaret undersøgelsesspørgsmålene, med henblik på at finde ud af, hvordan de havde forstået og besvaret dem.</p> <p>   Rapporterne indeholder anbefalinger til, hvorledes undersøgelsens spørgsmål kan ændres eller omstruktureres for at undgå misforståelser og forbedre resultaternes pålidelighed. De fremkomne oplysninger indarbejdes i udformningen og udarbejdelsen af ESENER-undersøgelsen 2014.</p> <p>   Læs <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>de væsentligste resultater</a> af den kvalitative efterfølgende vurderingsundersøgelse af ESENER samt <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>oversigtsrapporterne</a><br /> Find relaterede <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>publikationer</a><br /> Se en <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>kort video</a> om ESENER<br />  </p>";"";"/da/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"el";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Νέος σχεδιασμός των ερευνητικών οδηγών για την ESENER 2014";"<p>   Δύο νέες δημοσιεύσεις αξιολογούν την χρησιμότητα των ερωτήσεων που διατυπώθηκαν στην έρευνα του 2009 για τις επιχειρήσεις σχετικά με τους νέους και τους αναδυόμενους κινδύνους (ESENER). Η έρευνα περιλάμβανε συνεντεύξεις με πραγματικούς ερωτώμενους προκειμένου να διαπιστωθεί πώς εκείνοι είχαν αντιληφθεί και απαντήσει στις ερωτήσεις της έρευνας.</p> <p>   Στις εκθέσεις διατυπώνονται συστάσεις για τροποποίηση ή αναδιατύπωση των ερωτήσεων της έρευνας, με σκοπό να αποφευχθούν οι παρανοήσεις και να βελτιωθεί η αξιοπιστία των αποτελεσμάτων. Τα συμπεράσματα που προκύπτουν ενσωματώνονται στον σχεδιασμό και την ανάπτυξη της έρευνας ESENER 2014.</p> <p>   Διαβάστε την <@#&>Ποιοτική αξιολόγηση του τελικού ερωτηματολογίου (post-test) της ESENER’ <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>ουσιαστικά συμπεράσματα</a> και <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>εκθέσεις επισκόπησης</a><br /> Διερευνητικές <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&x=-1019&y=-266&hideHighlights=True&typelist=<@#&>>δημοσιεύσεις</a><br /> Μάθετε περισσότερα για την ESENER στο <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&feature=youtu.be<@#&>>σύντομο βίντεό μας</a><br />  </p>";"";"/el/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey";"en";"";"published";"2014-01-13 11:01:06";"2014-07-25 10:42:50";"2014-01-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"New research guides design of 2014 ESENER survey";"<p>   Two new publications evaluate the effectiveness of the questions asked in the 2009 Enterprise Survey on New and Emerging Risks (ESENER). The research involved interviews with original respondents to learn how they understood and responded to the survey questions.</p>  <p>   The reports include recommendations for amending or restructuring the survey questions to avoid misunderstandings and improve the reliability of the results. The findings are being fed into the design and development of the 2014 ESENER survey.</p>  <p>   Read the ‘Qualitative post-test evaluation of ESENER’ <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-substantive-findings/view<@#&>>substantive findings</a> and <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/qualitative-post-test-evaluation-of-esener-overview-report/view<@#&>>overview reports</a><br />   Explore related <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications?SearchableText=ESENER&amp;x=-1019&amp;y=-266&amp;hideHighlights=True&amp;typelist=<@#&>>publications</a><br />   Learn more about ESENER from our <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srixyhUFu1U&amp;feature=youtu.be<@#&>>short video</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/en/teaser/new-research-guides-design-of-2014-esener-survey/ESENER.jpg";"";"esener";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins";"el";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins";"published";"2014-01-09 15:38:43";"2014-07-25 15:25:39";"2014-01-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Εκστρατεία για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας 2014-2015: Αρχίζει η αντίστροφη μέτρηση";"<p>   Η επόμενη Εκστρατεία του EU-OSHA για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας 2014-2015 με τίτλο <@#&>Διαχείριση του άγχους και των ψυχοκοινωνικών κινδύνων στην εργασία<@#&> ξεκινάει τον Απρίλιο του 2014.</p>  <p>   Η εκστρατεία αποσκοπεί στην παροχή στήριξης και καθοδήγησης σε εργαζομένους και εργοδότες, προκειμένου να αναγνωρίζουν και να αντιμετωπίζουν αποτελεσματικά το άγχος στον χώρο εργασίας, και παράλληλα προωθεί τη χρήση πρακτικών εργαλείων για τον σκοπό αυτό.</p>  <p>   Συμβουλευθείτε τον νέο Οδηγό Εκστρατείας στη διεύθυνση <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu<@#&>>www.healthy-workplaces.eu</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/el/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins/HWC 2014-2015.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""

EU-OSHA Saugių darbo vietų kampanija „Streso ir psichosocialinės rizikos valdymas darbe “ prasideda 2014 m. balandžio mėn.</p>  <p>   Kampanijos metu darbuotojams ir darbdaviams bus stengiamasi padėti ir patarti, kaip atpažinti ir spręsti streso darbo vietoje problemą, ir skatinama naudotis praktinėmis priemonėmis.</p>  <p>   Naująjį kampanijos vadovą rasite adresu <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu<@#&>>www.healthy-workplaces.eu</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/lt/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins/HWC 2014-2015.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""

"/sv/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins";"sv";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins";"published";"2014-01-09 15:38:43";"2014-07-25 15:25:39";"2014-01-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampanjen Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv 2014–2015: Nedräkningen börjar";"<p>   Arbetsmiljöbyråns kampanj <@#&>Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv<@#&> 2014–2015 har temat <@#&>Förebygga stress och psykosociala risker på arbetsplatsen<@#&> och börjar i april 2014.</p>  <p>   Kampanjen kommer att ge stöd och vägledning till arbetstagare och arbetsgivare så att de på ett effektivt sätt kan identifiera och hantera stress på arbetsplatsen och använda praktiska verktyg för detta.</p>  <p>   Titta på vår kampanjvägledning på <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu<@#&>>www.healthy-workplaces.eu</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sv/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins/HWC 2014-2015.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""

"/hu/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins";"hu";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins";"published";"2014-01-09 15:38:43";"2014-07-25 15:25:39";"2014-01-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014-2015. évi Egészséges munkahelyek kampány: megkezdődött a visszaszámlálás";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA 2014-2015-ös következő, <@#&>A munkahelyi stressz és pszichoszociális kockázatok kezelése<@#&> elnevezésű Egészséges munkahelyek kampánya 2014 áprilisában kezdődik.</p>  <p>   A kampány a munkavállalók és a munkáltatók számára támogatást és iránymutatást nyújt a munkahelyi stressz hatékony felismeréséhez és kezeléséhez, valamint gyakorlati eszközök alkalmazására ösztönöz.</p>  <p>   Tekintse meg a új Kampányútmutatót a <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu<@#&>>www.healthy-workplaces.eu</a> oldalon!<br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins/HWC 2014-2015.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""

Se tarjoaa myös käytännön työvälineitä.</p>  <p>   Tutustu uuteen kampanjaoppaaseen osoitteessa <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu<@#&>>www.healthy-workplaces.eu</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/fi/teaser/healthy-workplaces-campaign-2014-2015-the-countdown-begins/HWC 2014-2015.PNG";"";"campaign_2014_15";"";"";"";""

"/el/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"el";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Η Ελλάδα αναλαμβάνει επικεφαλής της τρέχουσας προεδρικής τριάδας";"<p>   Την 1η Ιανουαρίου 2014 η Προεδρία της ΕΕ περνάει στην Ελλάδα: πρόκειται για την τελευταία χώρα της τρέχουσας προεδρικής τριάδας που αναλαμβάνει την προεδρία. Βασικοί στόχοι της Ελλάδας είναι η τόνωση της ανάπτυξης και της απασχόλησης, η διαφύλαξη της σταθερότητας του ευρώ, η προώθηση της ανάπτυξης μέσα από θετικές μεταναστευτικές πολιτικές και ο επαναπροσδιορισμός της θαλάσσιας πολιτικής της ΕΕ.</p>  <p>   Η Ελλάδα θα αναλάβει την προεδρία έως τις 30 Ιουνίου 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/european-presidency/<@#&>>Μάθετε περισσότερα για την ελληνική προεδρία</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"it";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"La Grecia ospita l'ultima presidenza dell'attuale troika";"<p>   Il 1° gennaio 2014 la presidenza europea passerà alla Grecia, l'ultimo paese dell'attuale troika destinato ad ospitarla. Gli obiettivi principali della Grecia prevedono l'incremento della crescita e dell'occupazione, la salvaguardia della stabilità dell'euro, un maggiore sviluppo attraverso politiche positive in materia di migrazione, nonché la ridefinizione della politica marittima dell'UE.</p>  <p>   La Grecia ospiterà la presidenza fino al 30 giugno 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/european-presidency/<@#&>>Per saperne di più sulla presidenza greca</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"cs";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Řecko jako poslední země ze současné trojky převezme předsednictví EU";"<p>   Dne 1. ledna 2014 převezme evropské předsednictví Řecko: poslední země současné trojky, která se ujme předsednictví. Mezi hlavní cíle Řecka patří zvyšování růstu a počtu pracovních míst, zajištění stability eura, podpora růstu pomocí pozitivních migračních politik a nové vymezení námořní politiky EU.</p> <p>   Řecko bude předsedat do 30. června 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/european-presidency/<@#&>>Více informací o řeckém předsednictví naleznete zde</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
