"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"en";"";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Greece hosts final Presidency of the current troika";"<p>   On 1 January 2014 the European Presidency passes to Greece: the final country in the current troika to host the Presidency. The main objectives for Greece are increasing growth and jobs, safeguarding the stability of the euro, boosting growth through positive migration policies and redefining the EU Maritime Policy.</p>  <p>   Greece will host the Presidency until 30 June 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/<@#&>>Learn more about the Greek Presidency</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"is";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Grikkland heldur síðasta fund forsætisnefndar núverandi þríeykis (e. troika)";"<p>   1. janúar 2014 færist formennska Evrópusambandsins yfir til Grikklands: síðasta landið í núverandi þríeyki til þess að fara með formennskuna. Helstu markmið Grikklands eru að auka hagvöxt og störf, vernda stöðugleika evrunnar, auka hagvöxt með jákvæðum stefnum í málefnum innflytjenda og endurskilgreina sjávarútvegsstefnu Evrópusambandsins.</p>  <p>   Grikkland mun fara með formennskuna fram til 30. júní 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/european-presidency/<@#&>>Fræðast meira um formennsku Grikklands</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"fr";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"La Grèce assure la présidence finale de l’actuelle troïka!";"<p>   Le 1<sup>er</sup> janvier 2014, la Grèce, le dernier pays de l'actuelle troïka à qui revient la présidence européenne, prend la relève. Ses principaux objectifs seront l'augmentation de la croissance et des emplois, la sauvegarde de la stabilité de l'euro, la promotion de la croissance par des politiques de migration positives et la redéfinition de la politique maritime de l'UE.</p>  <p>   La Grèce assurera la présidence jusqu'au 30 juin 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/european-presidency/<@#&>>En savoir plus sur la présidence grecque</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"bg";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Гърция поема последното председателство на настоящата тройка";"<p>   На 1&nbsp;януари 2014&nbsp;г. европейското председателство отива в Гърция: последната държава в настоящата тройка, която поема председателството. Основните цели на Гърция са увеличаване на растежа и работните места, запазване на стабилността на еврото, насърчаване на растежа посредством положителни миграционни политики и предефиниране на морската политика на ЕС.</p>  <p>   Гърция ще запази председателството до 30&nbsp;юни 2014&nbsp;г.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/european-presidency/<@#&>>Научете повече за гръцкото председателство</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"hr";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Grčka preuzima posljednje predsjedanje Europskom unijom trenutačne trojke EU-a";"<p>   Dana 1. siječnja 2014. godine Grčka preuzima predsjedanje Europskom unijom kao posljednja zemlja od zemalja trenutačne trojke EU-a koja preuzima predsjedanje. Glavni ciljevi koje bi Grčka trebala ostvariti su povećanje gospodarskog rasta i broja radnih mjesta, čuvanje stabilnosti eura, jačanje razvoja putem pozitivnih migracijskih politika te redefiniranje pomorske politike EU-a.</p> <p>   Grčka će predsjedati Europskom unijom do 30. lipnja 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/<@#&>>Saznajte više o grčkom predsjedanju</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"lt";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Paskutinioji dabartinėje trijų pirmininkaujančių valstybių narių grupėje pirmininkauja Graikija";"<p>   2014&nbsp;m. sausio 1&nbsp;d. pirmininkavimą Europos Sąjungai perima Graikija – paskutinioji pirmininkaujanti dabartinio trejeto šalis. Pagrindiniai Graikijos uždaviniai – didinti ekonomikos augimą ir kurti darbo vietas, užtikrinti euro stabilumą, skatinti ekonomikos augimą vykdant teigiamos migracijos politiką ir iš naujo apibrėžti ES jūrų politiką.</p>  <p>   Graikija Europos Sąjungai pirmininkaus iki 2014&nbsp;m. birželio 30&nbsp;d.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/european-presidency/<@#&>>Plačiau apie Graikijos pirmininkavimą</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"ro";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Grecia asigură ultima preşedinţie în cadrul troicii actuale";"<p>   La 1 ianuarie 2014, preşedinţia europeană va fi transferată Greciei: ultima ţară din troica actuală care va asigura preşedinţia. Principalele obiective pentru Grecia sunt reprezentate de îmbunătăţirea creşterii economice şi a ocupării forţei de muncă, asigurarea stabilităţii monedei euro, promovarea creşterii economice prin politici pozitive în domeniul migraţiei şi redefinirea politicii maritime a UE.</p>  <p>   Grecia va deţine preşedinţia până la 30 iunie 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/european-presidency/<@#&>>Aflaţi mai multe despre preşedinţia elenă</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"pl";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Grecja obejmuje ostatnią prezydencję obecnej trojki";"<p>   Z dniem 1 stycznia 2014 r. Grecja obejmuje przewodnictwo w unii Europejskiej – ostatnie z państw sprawujących prezydencję w ramach obecnej trojki. Główne cele Grecji w ramach prezydencji to zwiększenie wzrostu gospodarczego i zatrudnienia, zabezpieczenie stabilności euro, stymulacja wzrostu gospodarczego poprzez pozytywną politykę migracyjną oraz przedefiniowanie unijnej polityki morskiej.</p>  <p>   Grecja będzie sprawować prezydencję do 30 czerwca 2014 r.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/european-presidency/<@#&>>Więcej o greckiej prezydencji</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"de";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Griechenland übernimmt die letzte Ratspräsidentschaft der derzeitigen Troika";"<p>   Am 1.&nbsp;Januar 2014 geht die Europäische Ratspräsidentschaft auf Griechenland über, dem letzten Land der Troika, die die derzeitige Ratspräsidentschaft bildet. Die wichtigsten Ziele für Griechenland sind Wirtschaftswachstum und Verbesserung der Beschäftigungslage, Erhaltung der Stabilität des Euro, Stärkung des Wachstums durch positive Zuwanderungspolitiken und Neugestaltung der EU-Meerespolitik.</p>  <p>   Griechenland wird den Ratsvorsitz bis zum 30.&nbsp;Juni 2014 innehaben.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/european-presidency/<@#&>>Weitere Informationen über die griechische Ratspräsidentschaft</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"hu";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"A jelenlegi elnökségi trió utolsó tagjaként Görögország látja el a soros elnökséget";"<p>   2014. január 1-én a jelenlegi elnökségi trióból utolsóként Görögország veszi át az Európai Unió soros elnökségét. Görögország fő célkitűzései között szerepel a növekedés és munkahelyteremtés felgyorsítása, az euró stabilitásának megőrzése, a növekedés elősegítése kedvező migrációs politikák révén, valamint az uniós tengerpolitika újbóli meghatározása.</p>  <p>   Görögország 2014. június 30-ig tölti be az elnökséget.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/european-presidency/<@#&>>Tudjon meg többet a görög elnökségről!</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"fi";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kreikka vastaa nykyisen troikan viimeisestä puheenjohtajakaudesta";"<p>   Euroopan unionin puheenjohtajuus siirtyy 1. tammikuuta 2014 Kreikalle; se on nykyisen troikan viimeinen puheenjohtajavaltio. Kreikan tärkeimmät tavoitteet ovat kasvun ja työpaikkojen lisääminen, euron vakauden turvaaminen, kasvun edistäminen suotuisien muuttoliikepolitiikkojen avulla ja EU:n meripolitiikan uudelleenmäärittely.</p>  <p>   Kreikan puheenjohtajuuskausi kestää 30. kesäkuuta 2014 saakka.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/european-presidency/<@#&>>Lue lisää Kreikan puheenjohtajuuskaudesta</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"sl";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Grčija prevzema zadnje predsedovanje sedanje trojke";"<p>   Grčija bo 1.&nbsp;januarja&nbsp;2014 prevzela predsedovanje Evropski uniji, s čemer bo to zadnja država iz sedanje trojke, ki prevzema predsedovanje. Glavni cilji Grčije so povečanje rasti in zaposlovanja, zaščita stabilnosti eura, spodbujanje rasti s politikami prirastka prebivalstva zaradi priseljevanja in vnovična opredelitev pomorske politike EU.</p>  <p>   Grčija bo Evropski uniji predsedovala do 30.&nbsp;junija 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/european-presidency/<@#&>>Več o grškem predsedovanju</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"pt";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Grécia assegura a última Presidência da atual troika";"<p>   Em 1 de janeiro de 2014, a Presidência Europeia passará para a Grécia: o último país da atual troika que a irá exercer. A Grécia tem como objetivos principais o aumento do crescimento e do emprego, a salvaguarda da estabilidade do euro, o estímulo do crescimento através de políticas de migração positivas e a redefinição da Política Marítima da União Europeia.</p> <p>   A Grécia assegurará a Presidência até 30 de junho de 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/european-presidency/<@#&>>Saiba mais sobre a Presidência grega</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"no";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hellas overtar formannskapet som det siste medlemmet av dagens troika";"<p>   Den 1. januar 2014 overtar Hellas formannskapet i EU som det siste medlemmet av dagens troika. De viktigste prioriteringene for Hellas er økt vekst og sysselsetting, å holde euroen stabil, fremme vekst gjennom positiv migrasjonspolitikk og omdefinere EUs sjøfartspolitikk.</p>  <p>   Hellas skal ha formannskapet fram til 30. juni 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/european-presidency/<@#&>>Les mer om det greske formannskapet</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"lv";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Grieķija sāks pašreizējās trijotnes pēdējo prezidentūru";"<p>   Par Eiropas prezidentvalsti 2014. gada 1. janvārī kļūs Grieķija, kas ir pēdējā valsts no pašreizējās prezidentvalstu trijotnes. Par galvenajiem mērķiem Grieķija ir izvirzījusi izaugsmes sekmēšanu un darbavietu radīšanu, eirozonas stabilitātes nodrošināšanu, izaugsmes palielināšanu, ieviešot pozitīvu migrācijas politiku un atkārtoti definējot ES jūrniecības politiku.</p>  <p>   Grieķija būs prezidentvalsts līdz 2014. gada 30. jūnijam.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/european-presidency/<@#&>>Uzziniet vairāk par Grieķijas prezidentūru</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"es";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Grecia ejerce la Presidencia final de la actual troika";"<p>   El 1 de enero de 2014, la Presidencia Europea se traspasa a Grecia: el último país de la troika actual en ejercer la Presidencia. Los objetivos principales de Grecia son aumentar el crecimiento y el empleo, proteger la estabilidad del euro, impulsar el crecimiento a través de políticas de migración positivas y redefinir la política marítima de la UE.</p> <p>   Grecia ejercerá la Presidencia hasta el 30 de junio de 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/european-presidency/<@#&>>Más información sobre la Presidencia griega</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"nl";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Griekenland derde voorzitter van de huidige trojka";"<p>   Op 1 januari 2014 wordt het Europees voorzitterschap overgedragen aan Griekenland: het derde land binnen de huidige trojka dat het voorzitterschap op zich neemt. De voornaamste doelstellingen van Griekenland zijn: het versterken van groei en werkgelegenheid, het waarborgen van de stabiliteit van de euro, het stimuleren van groei door een positief migratiebeleid en het herdefiniëren van het maritiem beleid van de EU.</p>  <p>   Griekenland zal tot en met 30 juni 2014 het voorzitterschap bekleden.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/european-presidency/<@#&>>Lees meer over het Griekse voorzitterschap</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"sk";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Funkciu posledného predsedníctva v súčasnej trojke má Grécko";"<p>   Európske predsedníctvo preberá 1. januára 2014 Grécko: je poslednou krajinou v súčasnej trojke, ktorá sa ujme predsedníctva. Hlavnými cieľmi Grécka je zvýšenie rastu a zamestnanosti, zabezpečenie stability eura, posilnenie rastu kladnými migračnými politikami a opätovné vymedzenie námornej politiky EÚ.</p>  <p>   Grécko bude predsedať do 30. júna 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/european-presidency/<@#&>>Viac informácií o gréckom predsedníctve</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"mt";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Il-Greċja ser ikollha l-aħħar Presidenza tat-trojka attwali";"<p>   Fl-1&nbsp;ta'&nbsp;Jannar&nbsp;2014 il-Presidenza Ewropea tgħaddi għall-Greċja: l-aħħar pajjiż fit-trojka attwali li ser ikollu l-Presidenza. L-għanijiet ewlenin għall-Greċja huma ż-żieda tat-tkabbir u l-impjiegi, is-salvagwardja tal-istabbiltà tal-euro, l-ispinta għat-tkabbir permezz ta' politiki tal-migrazzjoni pożittivi u definizzjoni ġdida tal-Politika Marittima tal-UE.</p>  <p>   Il-Greċja ser ikollha l-Presidenza sat-30&nbsp;ta'&nbsp;Ġunju&nbsp;2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/european-presidency/<@#&>>Tgħallem aktar dwar il-Presidenza Griega</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"da";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Grækenland overtager som det sidste land i den nuværende trojka formandskabet for EU";"<p>   Den 1. januar 2014 overgår formandskabet for EU til Grækenland: Det er det sidste land i den nuværende trojka, der overtager formandskabet. Grækenland fokuserer på øget vækst og flere arbejdspladser, beskyttelse af euroens stabilitet, fremme af vækst via positive migrationspolitikker og omlægning af EU's havpolitik.</p>  <p>   Grækenland vil have formandskabet frem til den 30. juni 2014.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/european-presidency/<@#&>>Læs mere om det græske formandskab</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"sv";"/en/teaser/greece-EU-presidency";"published";"2013-11-20 16:30:48";"2014-07-25 15:06:37";"2014-01-01 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Grekland är sista ordförandelandet i den nuvarande trojkan";"<p>   Den 1 januari 2014 övergår EU-ordförandeskapet till Grekland, det sista landet i den nuvarande trojkan som blir ordförandeland. Huvudmålen för Grekland är att stärka tillväxt och sysselsättning, säkra eurons stabilitet, öka tillväxten genom positiv migrationspolitik samt omformulera EU:s havspolitik.</p> <p>   Grekland kommer att inneha ordförandeskapet till den 30 juni 2014.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/european-presidency/<@#&>>Läs mer om Greklands ordförandeskap</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/greece-EU-presidency/logo-GR-presidency.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"fi";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uusi vuosi – uudet toimitilat EU-OSHAlle";"<p>   EU-OSHA muutti päätoimipaikkansa joulukauden aikana uusiin toimitiloihin. Ne sijaitsevat Bilbaossa Miribillan alueella, joka on tunnettu kaivos- ja teollisuushistoriastaan.</p> <p>   Uudet toimitilat luovat hallinnollisia kustannussäästöjä samalla, kun ne tarjoavat aiempaa paremmat tilat henkilökunnalle ja viraston eurooppalaisen verkoston kansainvälisille asiantuntijoille, jotka tapaavat säännöllisesti Bilbaossa.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Katso uudet yhteystietomme</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"pl";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Na Nowy Rok – nowa siedziba EU-OSHA";"<p>   W okresie Świąt Bożego Narodzenia nastąpiła przeprowadzka EU-OSHA do nowej siedziby położonej w dzielnicy Miribilla, dawnej górniczo-przemysłowej części Bilbao.</p> <p>   Nowe lokum pozwoli ograniczyć koszty administracyjne, a jednocześnie zapewni lepszy standard wyposażenia na użytek personelu oraz międzynarodowych ekspertów z europejskiej sieci Agencji, których spotkania regularnie odbywają się w Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Nasze nowe informacje kontaktowe</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"mt";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Sena Ġdida – Bini Ġdid għall-EU-OSHA";"<p>   L-EU-OSHA bidel il-kwartieri matul il-perjodu tal-Milied għal bini ġdid li jinsab fid-distrett ta' Miribilla ta' Bilbao, magħruf għall-istorja ta' minjieri u industrijali tiegħu.</p> <p>   Il-bini l-ġdid se jiġġenera ffrankar fl-ispejjeż amministrattivi filwaqt li fl-istess ħin jipprovdi faċilitajiet imtejba għall-persunal u l-esperti internazzjonali tan-netwerk Ewropew tal-Aġenzija li jiltaqgħu regolarment f'Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Ara l-informazzjoni l-ġdida ta' kuntatt tagħna</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"de";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Im neuen Jahr - neue Räumlichkeiten für die EU-OSHA";"<p>   Über die Weihnachtsfeiertage ist der Hauptsitz der EU-OSHA in die neuen Räumlichkeiten in dem durch seine Bergbau- und Industriegeschichte bekannten Stadtviertel Miribilla in Bilbao verlegt worden.</p> <p>   Neben Einsparungen bei den Verwaltungskosten bieten die neuen Räumlichkeiten dem Personal und den regelmäßig in Bilbao zusammentreffenden internationalen Sachverständigen des europäischen Netzwerks ein verbessertes Arbeitsumfeld. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Unsere neuen Kontaktinformationen finden Sie hier</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"es";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Año nuevo, sede nueva para EU-OSHA";"<p>   EU-OSHA ha trasladado su sede durante el período de Navidad a un nuevo edificio situado en el barrio bilbaíno de Miribilla, conocido por su historia minera e industrial.</p>  <p>   La nueva sede permitirá reducir costes administrativos y al mismo tiempo proporcionará mejores instalaciones para el personal y los expertos internacionales de la red europea de la Agencia que se reúnen habitualmente en Bilbao.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/about/contact_us<@#&>>Consulte nuestra nueva información de contacto</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"et";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uuel aastal jätkab EU-OSHA uutes ruumides";"<p>   EU-OSHA peakorter kolis jõulude ajal uutesse ruumidesse, mis asuvad Bilbaos Miribilla piirkonnas, mis on tuntud oma kaevandus- ja tööstusajaloo poolest.</p> <p>   Uute ruumidega väheneb halduskulu ja tagatakse paremad töötingimused EU-OSHA töötajatele ja Euroopa võrgustiku rahvusvahelistele ekspertidele, kes kohtuvad regulaarselt Bilbaos.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Meie uued kontaktandmed</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"hr";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nova godina – nove prostorije za EU-OSHA-u";"<p>   EU-OSHA je u razdoblju oko Božića premjestila svoje sjedište u nove prostorije u Miribilli, okrugu Bilbaoa koji je poznat po svojoj rudarskoj i industrijskoj povijesti.</p> <p>   Nove prostorije istodobno će omogućiti uštedu administrativnih troškova i osigurati naprednije uvjete rada za osoblje i međunarodne stručnjake Agencijine europske mreže koji se redovito sastaju u Bilbau.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Vidi informacije o našim novim kontaktnim podacima</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"sv";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nytt år – Nya lokaler för Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyrån";"<p>   Under julhelgen flyttade Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyråns huvudkontor in i nya lokaler i området Miribilla i Bilbao, som är känt för sin gruv- och industrihistoria.</p> <p>   Det nya huvudkontoret kommer att medföra kostnadsbesparingar, samtidigt som vi kan erbjuda bättre lokaler åt personalen och de internationella experter i arbetsmiljöbyråns europeiska nätverk som har regelbundna möten i Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/about/contact_us<@#&>>Se vår nya kontaktinformation</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"lt";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Nauji metai – naujos EU-OSHA patalpos";"<p>   Kalėdų laikotarpiu EU-OSHA savo būstinę perkėlė į naujas patalpas, esančias Bilbao miesto Miribijos rajone, garsiame savo angliakasybos ir pramonės istorija.</p> <p>   Persikėlus į naujas patalpas sumažės administracinių išlaidų, o darbuotojai ir tarptautiniai agentūros Europos tinklo ekspertai, kurie reguliariai susitinka Bilbao mieste, galės dirbti patogesnėmis sąlygomis.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Mūsų nauja informacija ryšiams</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"da";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Nyt år - EU-OSHA flytter til nye lokaler";"<p>   I juleferien flyttede EU-OSHA sit hovedkontor til nye lokaler i Miribillaområdet i Bilbao, der er kendt for sin mine- og industrihistorie.</p> <p>   De nye lokaler vil medføre færre administrative omkostninger og samtidig skabe bedre rammer for vores personale og de internationale eksperter i agenturets europæiske netværk, der regelmæssigt mødes i Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Se vores nye kontaktoplysninger</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"pt";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Ano Novo - Novas instalações para a EU-OSHA";"<p>   A EU-OSHA mudou a sua sede, durante o período de Natal, para as novas instalações localizadas no bairro Miribilla de Bilbau, famoso pelo seu passado histórico industrial e mineiro.</p> <p>   As novas instalações permitem economizar nas despesas administrativas, ao mesmo tempo que proporcionam melhores condições de trabalho ao seu pessoal e aos peritos internacionais da rede europeia da Agência que se reúnem periodicamente em Bilbau. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Veja os nossos novos dados de contacto</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"lv";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Jauns gads — jaunas telpas EU-OSHA";"<p>   Ziemassvētku laikā EU-OSHA pārcels savu galveno biroju uz jaunām telpām, kuras atrodas Bilbao Miribilla rajonā, kas pazīstams ar savu kalnrūpniecības un rūpniecības vēsturi.</p> <p>   Jaunajās telpās būs iespējams samazināt administratīvās izmaksas, un vienlaicīgi tās nodrošinās uzlabotas ērtības personālam un aģentūras Eiropas tīkla starptautiskajiem speciālistiem, kas regulāri tiekas Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Skatiet mūsu jauno kontaktinformāciju</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"it";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"L'anno nuovo e i nuovi uffici dell’EU-OSHA";"<p>   Nel periodo natalizio l’EU-OSHA ha trasferito la propria sede presso Miribilla, un quartiere di Bilbao noto per la sua tradizione mineraria e la sua storia industriale.</p> <p>   I nuovi uffici consentiranno il risparmio dei costi amministrativi, fornendo nel contempo strutture migliori per il personale e gli esperti internazionali della rete europea dell’Agenzia che si incontrano periodicamente a Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Visualizza i nostri nuovi contatti</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"cs";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nový rok – nové prostory pro agenturu EU-OSHA";"<p>   Během Vánoc se agentura EU-OSHA přestěhovala do nových prostor do čtvrtě Miribilla města Bilbao, které je známé svou hornickou a průmyslovou minulostí.</p> <p>   Nové prostory sebou přinesou administrativní úspory a rovněž zlepšení vybavení pro zaměstnance a mezinárodní experty evropské sítě agentury, kteří se v Bilbau pravidelně scházejí.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/about/contact_us<@#&>>Naše nové kontaktní údaje</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"is";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Nýtt ár - nýtt húsnæði EU-OSHA";"<p>   EU-OSHA flutti höfuðstöðvar sínar yfir jólin í nýtt húsnæði í Miribilla hverfinu í Bilbao sem þekkt er fyrir námu- og iðnsögu sína. </p> <p>   Nýja húsnæðið sparar stjórnsýslukostnað og býður á sama tíma upp á bætta aðstöðu fyrir starfsfólk og alþjóðlega sérfræðinga í Evrópuneti stofnunarinnar sem hittast reglulega í Bilbao. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Sjá nýjar samskiptaupplýsingar okkar</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"no";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nytt år i nye lokaler for EU-OSHA";"<p>   I løpet av juledagene flyttet EU-OSHAs hovedkontor inn i nye lokaler i Miribilla i Bilbao, som er kjent for sin gruvedrift og industrihistorie.</p> <p>   De nye lokalene vil gi besparelser i administrasjonen samtidig som de vil gi bedre fasiliteter for de ansatte og de internasjonale ekspertene i Byråets europeiske nettverk som møtes regelmessig i Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Se våre nye kontaktopplysninger</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"el";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Νέο έτος - Νέες εγκαταστάσεις για τον EU-OSHA";"<p>   Η έδρα του EU-OSHA μεταφέρθηκε κατά την περίοδο των Χριστουγέννων σε νέες εγκαταστάσεις στην περιοχή Miribilla του Μπιλμπάο, η οποία είναι γνωστή για την ιστορία της στον τομέα της εξόρυξης και της βιομηχανίας.</p> <p>   Οι νέες εγκαταστάσεις αναμένεται να συμβάλουν στην περικοπή των διοικητικών δαπανών παρέχοντας ταυτόχρονα βελτιωμένες δυνατότητες για το προσωπικό και τους διεθνείς εμπειρογνώμονες του ευρωπαϊκού δικτύου του Οργανισμού που συνεδριάζουν τακτικά στο Μπιλμπάο.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Δείτε τα νέα στοιχεία επικοινωνίας μας</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"nl";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Een nieuw jaar - een nieuw pand voor EU-OSHA";"<p>   EU-OSHA is tijdens de periode rond kerst verhuisd naar een nieuw pand in Miribilla, een district in Bilbao dat bekend staat om zijn rijke geschiedenis van mijnbouw en industrie.</p> <p>   De nieuwe huisvesting zal leiden tot lagere kosten en biedt betere faciliteiten aan de medewerkers en de internationale deskundigen van het Europese netwerk van het agentschap, die regelmatig in Bilbao bijeenkomen.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Onze nieuwe contactgegevens vindt u hier</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"bg";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Нова година — нови помещения за ЕU-OSHA";"<p>В навечерието на Коледните празници ЕU-OSHA премести своето седалище в нови помещения, разположени в квартала Мирибиля на Билбао, известен със своята история в областта на минното дело и промишлеността.</p> <p>Новите помещения ще позволят да бъдат икономисани административни разходи, предлагайки същевременно подобрени условия за персонала и международните експерти на европейската мрежа на Агенцията, които се срещат редовно в Билбао.</p> <p><a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Вижте новите ни данни за връзка</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"sl";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Novo leto – novi prostori agencije EU-OSHA";"<p>   Agencija EU-OSHA se je v božičnem obdobju preselila na nov sedež v okrožje Miribilla v Bilbau, ki je znano po rudarski in industrijski zgodovini.</p> <p>   Novi prostori bodo zagotavljali prihranek pri stroških upravljanja ter boljše delovno okolje za osebje in mednarodne strokovnjake evropske mreže agencije, ki se redno srečujejo v Bilbau.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Ogled naših novih kontaktnih podatkov</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"ro";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un an nou - un sediu nou pentru EU-OSHA";"<p>   În perioada Crăciunului, EU-OSHA şi-a mutat sediul într-o locaţie nouă din cartierul Miribilla din Bilbao, cunoscut pentru istoria sa minieră şi industrială.</p> <p>   Noul sediu va determina realizarea de economii privind costurile administrative şi, în acelaşi timp, va oferi resurse îmbunătăţite pentru personal şi experţii internaţionali din reţeaua europeană a Agenţiei, care se reunesc în mod regulat la Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Consultaţi datele noastre de contact actualizate</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"sk";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Nový rok – nové priestory pre EU-OSHA";"<p>   Ústredie EU-OSHA sa počas vianočného obdobia presunulo do nových priestorov nachádzajúcich sa v obvode Miribilla v meste Bilbao, ktoré je známe svojou baníckou a priemyselnou históriou.</p> <p>   Nové priestory budú vytvárať úspory v oblasti administratívnych nákladov a zároveň poskytnú lepšie zariadenia pre zamestnancov a medzinárodných expertov európskej siete agentúry, ktorí sa pravidelne v Bilbau stretávajú.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Tu sú naše nové konktaktné údaje</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"hu";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Új év – új EU-OSHA-központ";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA a karácsonyi ünnepek alatt új helyre, Bilbao Miribilla negyedébe költözött, amely bányászati és ipari múltjáról nevezetes.</p> <p>   Az adminisztrációs költségmegtakarításon túl az új központ kényelmesebb elhelyezést biztosít dolgozóink és az Ügynökség európai hálózatának nemzetközi szakértői számára, akik rendszeresen Bilbaóban találkoznak.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>Tekintse meg új elérhetőségeinket!</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"fr";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Nouvelle année — Nouveaux locaux pour l'EU-OSHA";"<p>   Durant la période de Noël, l'EU-OSHA a établi ses quartiers dans de nouveaux locaux situés dans le quartier anciennement minier et industriel de Miribilla à Bilbao.</p> <p>   Les nouveaux locaux permettront de réaliser des économies de coûts administratifs et offriront de meilleures conditions de travail au personnel et aux experts internationaux du réseau européen de l'Agence, qui se réunissent régulièrement à Bilbao.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/about/contact_us<@#&>>Voir nos nouvelles coordonnées</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha";"en";"";"published";"2013-11-26 12:25:03";"2014-07-25 10:43:01";"2013-12-20 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"New Year - New Premises for EU-OSHA";"<p>   EU-OSHA moved headquarters during the Christmas period into new premises located in the Miribilla district of Bilbao, known for its mining and industrial history.</p>  <p>   The new premises will generate administrative cost savings at the same time as providing improved facilities for staff and the international experts of the Agency’s European network who regularly meet in Bilbao.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/contact_us<@#&>>See our new contact information</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/new-year-new-premises-for-eu-osha/IMG_3686.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/en/teaser/wintergreeting2014";"en";"";"published";"2005-12-13 11:26:22";"2014-07-25 10:49:24";"2013-12-17 02:00:00";"kruger_osha_europa_eu";"Dear Visitors, Partners and Collaborators,";"<p>   Season’s greetings and best wishes for 2014 from the Director and all the Staff of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work. May the Year 2014 be a year of personal happiness and professional success <strong>in an increasingly healthy and safe environment!</strong></p>";"";"/en/teaser/wintergreeting2014/Seasons greetings 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"en";"";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Wind energy: healthy for the environment, but how healthy for workers?";"<p>   Wind is key to the EU’s move towards renewable energy. The wind energy sector is growing quickly, but bringing with it many occupational safety and health risks as many aspects of onshore and offshore wind turbines are unique, and so are the working environments in which they are found.</p>  <p>   EU-OSHA’s report examines the risks to wind energy workers along the various stages of onshore and offshore wind turbines’ life cycle and looks at the challenges faced by the industry as it progresses towards providing a safer working environment.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Read the report: Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector </a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"nl";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Windenergie: goed voor het milieu, maar ook goed voor de installateurs?";"<p>   Windenergie is van doorslaggevend belang voor de overstap van de EU naar duurzame energie. De windenergiesector groeit snel, maar dit gaat ook gepaard met risico's voor de veiligheid en de gezondheid op het werk. Er zitten immers vele unieke kanten aan de plaatsing van windturbines te land en ter zee en hetzelfde geldt voor de werkomgeving die daarbij hoort.</p> <p>   In het verslag van EU-OSHA worden de risico's onderzocht waaraan installateurs en onderhoudsmonteurs blootstaan bij hun werkzaamheden aan windturbines te land en ter zee en wordt gekeken naar de uitdagingen waarvoor de sector staat als het gaat om het bieden van een veilige werkomgeving.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lees het verslag: Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector </a> (Gezondheid en veiligheid op het werk in de windenergiesector)</p> <p>    </p>";"";"/nl/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"pt";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Energia eólica: saudável para o ambiente, mas quão saudável para os trabalhadores?";"<p>   A energia eólica é um avanço fundamental na direção das fontes de energia renováveis. O setor da energia eólica está a crescer rapidamente mas acarreta muitos riscos profissionais e relacionados com a saúde, dada a especificidade de muitos aspetos relacionados com as turbinas eólicas instaladas em terra e no mar, assim como dos respetivos ambientes de trabalho.</p> <p>   O relatório da EU-OSHA examina os riscos a que estão sujeitos os trabalhadores do setor da energia eólica nas várias fases do ciclo de vida das turbinas eólicas instaladas em terra e no mar, e analisa os desafios com que a indústria se confronta à medida que avança em prol de um ambiente de trabalho mais seguro.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Leia o relatório: A saúde e a segurança no local de trabalho no setor da energia eólica </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/pt/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"hr";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Energija vjetra: povoljna po okoliš, no u kojoj mjeri povoljno utječe na zdravlje radnika?";"<p>   Vjetar ima ključnu ulogu u strategiji EU-a za energiju iz obnovljivih izvora. Brzi rast sektora energije vjetra donosi sa sobom i mnoge rizike za sigurnost i zdravlje na radu, budući da su mnogi aspekti vezani uz vjetroturbine na kopnu i na moru specifični, kao što su i radna okruženja u kojima se one nalaze.</p> <p>   U izvještaju EU-OSHA-e ispituju se rizici za radnike u području energije vjetra kao i različiti stupnjevi životnog ciklusa vjetroturbina s osvrtom na izazove s kojima se industrija suočava na svojem putu k sigurnijem radnom okruženju.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Pročitajte izvještaj: Sigurnost i zdravlje na radu u sektoru energije vjetra</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/hr/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"fr";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Énergie éolienne: dans quelle mesure cette énergie, respectueuse de l'environnement, est-elle bonne pour la santé des travailleurs?";"<p>   L'énergie éolienne est essentielle dans le cadre de l'évolution de l'UE vers l'utilisation de sources d'énergie renouvelables. Le secteur de l'énergie éolienne connaît une croissance rapide, mais celle-ci s'accompagne de nombreux risques pour la sécurité et la santé professionnelles liés à la spécificité des éoliennes côtières et en mer et des environnements de travail propres aux sites sur lesquels elles sont implantées.</p> <p>   Le rapport de l'EU-OSHA examine les risques que présentent les éoliennes côtières et en mer, tout au long des différentes étapes de leur cycle de vie, pour les travailleurs du secteur de l'énergie éolienne et analyse les défis qui se posent pour le secteur dans les efforts qu'il déploie en vue de mettre en place un environnement de travail plus sûr.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lire le rapport: Sécurité et santé au travail dans le secteur de l'énergie éolienne</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/fr/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"da";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vindenergi: sundt for miljøet, men hvad med arbejdstagerne?";"<p>   Vind er nøglen til EU's udvikling hen imod vedvarende energi. Vindenergisektoren er i rivende vækst, men med en række arbejdsmiljørisici til følge, eftersom mange aspekter ved land- og havvindmøller er helt unikke, ligesom de dertil knyttede arbejdsmiljøer.</p> <p>   EU-OSHA’s rapport undersøger risiciene for vindenergisektorens arbejdstagere i land- og havvindmøllernes forskellige livscyklusfaser og ser nærmere på de udfordringer, som sektoren står overfor i sine bestræbelser på at skabe et mere sikkert arbejdsmiljø.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Læs rapporten: arbejdsmiljø inden for vindenergisektoren </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/da/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"mt";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"L-enerġija mir-riħ: tajba għall-ambjent, iżda kemm hija tajba għall-ħaddiema?";"<p>   Ir-riħ huwa riżors ewlieni għall-mixja tal-UE lejn l-enerġija rinnovabbli. Is-settur tal-enerġija mir-riħ qed jikber b'mod mgħaġġel, iżda qed iġib miegħu riskji ta' saħħa u sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol peress li ħafna aspetti tat-turbini tar-riħ fuq il-kosta u lill hinn minnha huma uniċi, u hekk huma wkoll l-ambjenti tax-xogħol fejn jinsabu dawn. </p> <p>   Ir-rapport tal-UE-OSHA jeżamina r-riskji għall-ħaddiema fl-enerġina mir-riħ tul id-diversi stadji taċ-ċiklu tal-ħajja tat-turbini tar-riħ fuq il-kosta u lill hinn minnha u jħares lejn l-isfidi li tiffaċċja l-industrija waqt li tagħmel progress lejn il-provvediment ta' ambjent tax-xogħol aktar sigur.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Aqra r-rapport: Is-saħħa u s-sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol fis-settur tal-enerġija mir-riħ </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/mt/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"el";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Αιολική ενέργεια: φιλική προς το περιβάλλον, φιλική όμως και προς την υγεία των εργαζομένων;";"<p>   Ο αέρας αποτελεί το <@#&>κλειδί<@#&> για τη μετάβαση της ΕΕ στις ανανεώσιμες πηγές ενέργειας. Παράλληλα με τη δυναμική ανάπτυξη που παρουσιάζει ο τομέας της αιολικής ενέργειας πολλά είναι και τα ζητήματα που προκύπτουν σχετικά με τους κινδύνους που ενέχει ο συγκεκριμένος τομέας για την ασφάλεια και την υγεία στην εργασία. Αυτό συμβαίνει διότι πολλές πτυχές που συνδέονται με τις χερσαίες και τις υπεράκτιες ανεμογεννήτριες είναι πολύ ιδιαίτερες, όπως ιδιαίτερες είναι και οι συνθήκες εργασίας σε αυτές.</p> <p>   Η έκθεση του EU-OSHA εξετάζει τους κινδύνους που αντιμετωπίζουν οι εργαζόμενοι στον τομέα της αιολικής ενέργειας στα διάφορα στάδια του κύκλου ζωής των χερσαίων και υπεράκτιων ανεμογεννητριών, καθώς και τις προκλήσεις που αντιμετωπίζει ο κλάδος στην πορεία για τη διασφάλιση ενός ασφαλέστερου εργασιακού περιβάλλοντος.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την έκθεση: Η επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία στον τομέα της αιολικής ενέργειας</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/el/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"cs";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Větrná energie: zdravá pro životní prostředí, nakolik však zdravá pro pracovníky?";"<p>   Vítr je klíčem k přechodu EU k obnovitelné energii. Odvětví větrné energie zaznamenává rychlý růst, z hlediska bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci však s sebou přináší mnohá rizika, protože mnohé aspekty větrných turbín na souši i na moři jsou velice specifické, a totéž platí i o příslušných pracovních prostředích.</p> <p>   Zpráva agentury EU-OSHA zkoumá rizika, která ohrožují pracovníky v odvětví větrné energie v jednotlivých fázích životního cyklu větrných turbín na souši i na moři, a zaměřuje se na problémy, jimž toto odvětví čelí v rámci úsilí o zajištění bezpečnějšího pracovního prostředí.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si zprávu „Bezpečnost a ochrana zdraví při práci v odvětví větrné energie“</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/cs/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"it";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Energia eolica: pur essendo salutare per l'ambiente, quanto lo è per i lavoratori?";"<p>   Il vento è di primaria importanza per favorire il passaggio dell'UE verso le energie rinnovabili. Pur essendo il settore dell'energia eolica in rapida crescita, esso implica molti rischi per la sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro, poiché svariati aspetti collegati all'utilizzo delle turbine eoliche sulla terra ferma e in mare aperto sono unici nel loro genere, così come le condizioni di lavoro constatate.</p> <p>   La relazione dell'EU-OSHA esamina i rischi per i lavoratori del settore dell'energia eolica assieme alle varie fasi del ciclo di vita delle turbine eoliche sulla terra ferma e in mare aperto e le sfide che l'industria deve affrontare nell'evoluzione verso un ambiente di lavoro più sicuro.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Leggere la relazione: sicurezza e salute nel lavoro nel settore dell’energia eolica </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/it/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"sk";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Veterná energia: zdravá pre životné prostredie, avšak ako zdravá pre zamestnancov?";"<p>   Vietor je kľúčovým prvkom smerovania EÚ k obnoviteľnej energii. Odvetvie veternej energie sa rýchlo rozrastá, zároveň však so sebou prináša riziká v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia pri práci, keďže mnohé aspekty veterných turbín na pevnine alebo na mori sú výnimočné, ako je aj pracovné prostredie, v ktorom sa nachádzajú.</p> <p>   V správe agentúry EU-OSHA sa skúmajú riziká hroziace pracovníkom na veterných turbínach v rôznych štádiách životného cyklu veterných turbín na pevnine a na mori, ako aj problémy, s ktorými sa toto odvetvie stretáva pri vyváraní bezpečnejšieho pracovného prostredia.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Prečítať správu: Bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri práci v odvetví veternej energie </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/sk/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"hu";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Szélenergia: a környezetnek megfelel, de egészséges-e a dolgozóknak?";"<p>   A szélenergia kulcsfontosságú az EU-nak a megújuló energiaforrások felhasználására törekvésében. A szélenergia ágazat gyorsan fejlődik, de egyúttal több foglalkozási biztonsági és munkahelyi egészségi kockázatot is magában foglal, mivel a szárazföldi és tengeri szélturbinák számos vonatkozása és a kapcsolódó munkakörnyezet is egyedi.</p> <p>   Az EU-OSHA jelentése szélenergia ágazat dolgozóira irányuló kockázatokat vizsgálja a szárazföldi és tengeri szélturbinák különféle termékciklusaiban, és egyúttal számba veszi azokat a kihívásokat, amelyekkel az iparágnak szembe kell néznie a biztonságosabb munkakörnyezet biztosítása érdekében.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Olvassa el a jelentést: Munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem a szélenergia ágazatban </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/hu/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"lt";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vėjo energijos gamyba saugi aplinkai, tačiau ar nekenkia darbuotojams?";"<p>   Vėjas yra būdas ES pradėti naudoti atsinaujinančių šaltinių energiją. Vėjo energijos sektorius sparčiai plečiasi kartu keldamas įvairią riziką šios srities darbuotojų sveikatai ir saugai. Kadangi atviroje jūroje ir sausumoje esančių vėjo jėgainių aplinka labai specifiška, specifiška yra ir darbo su jomis aplinka.</p> <p>   EU-OSHA ataskaitoje analizuojama vėjo energijos sektoriaus darbuotojams kylanti rizika, atsirandanti įvairiuose jūroje ir sausumoje esančių vėjo turbinų gyvavimo etapuose, ir nurodomi sunkumai, su kuriais susiduria pramonė siekdama sukurti saugesnę darbo aplinką savo darbuotojams. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Skaityti ataskaitą: Vėjo energijos sektoriaus darbuotojų sauga ir sveikata </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/lt/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"no";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vindkraft er sunt for miljøet, men hvor sunt er det for arbeidstakerne?";"<p>   Vind er nøkkelen til EUs utvikling mot fornybare energikilder. Vindkraftbransjen vokser raskt men fører også med seg mange HMS-risikoer ettersom mange aspekter ved vindturbiner og arbeidsmiljøet på land og til havs er unike.</p> <p>   EU-OSHAs rapport undersøker risikoene for arbeidstakerne i vindkraftbransjen på de ulike trinnene i en vindturbins livssyklus, både på land og til havs, og ser på utfordringene industrien står ovenfor når den beveger seg mot et tryggere arbeidsmiljø.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Les rapporten: HMS i vindkraftsektoren </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/no/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"is";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vindorka: heilsusamleg umhverfinu en hversu heilnæm er hún fyrir starfsmenn?";"<p>   Vindur er lykillinn að stefnu Evrópusambandsins í átt að endurnýjanlegri orku. Vindorkugeirinn vex hratt en því fylgja margir áhættuþættir er snerta vinnuverndarmál þar sem margar hliðar vindhverfla á landi og undan ströndum eru einstakar sinnar tegundar og það sama gildir um vinnuhverfi þeirra. </p> <p>   Skýrsla EU-OSHA fjallar um þær áhættur, sem starfsmenn við vindorku standa frammi fyrir, ásamt ýmsum stigum í endingartíma vindhverfla á landi og undan ströndum og skoðar þær áskoranir, sem blasa við greininni, á leiðinni í átt að öruggara vinnuumhverfi. </p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lesa skýrsluna: Vinnuvernd í vindorkugeiranum </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/is/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"pl";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Energia wiatrowa – zdrowa dla środowiska, ale czy zdrowa dla pracowników?";"<p>   Wiatr jest kluczowym elementem na drodze UE w stronę energii odnawialnej. Sektor energii wiatrowej szybko rośnie, ale tym samym pojawiają się liczne zagrożenia związane z bezpieczeństwem i zdrowiem w pracy. Wiele aspektów lądowych i morskich turbin wiatrowych ma charakter wyjątkowy, stąd też wyjątkowe są środowiska pracy, w których się one znajdują.</p> <p>   Sprawozdanie EU-OSHA analizuje zagrożenia dla pracowników farm wiatrowych oraz różne etapy cyklu „życia<@#&> lądowych i morskich turbin wiatrowych, a także bada wyzwania dla przemysłu przy tworzeniu bezpieczniejszego środowiska pracy.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj sprawozdanie: Bezpieczeństwo i zdrowie w pracy w sektorze energii wiatrowej</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/pl/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"fi";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tuulivoima: hyväksi ympäristölle - entä työntekijöille?";"<p>   Tuulivoima on tärkeä tekijä EU:n pyrkiessä kohti uusiutuvaa energiaa. Tuulivoima-ala on kasvamassa nopeasti, mutta se tuo mukanaan monia työsuojeluriskejä, sillä monet maalla ja merellä oleviin tuuliturbiineihin liittyvät näkökohdat ovat ainutlaatuisia kuten myös niiden työympäristöt.</p> <p>   EU-OSHAn raportissa käsitellään tuulivoiman parissa työskentelevien riskejä maalla ja merellä olevien tuuliturbiinien elämänkaaren eri vaiheissa ja tarkastellaan alan haasteita sen pyrkiessä parantamaan työympäristöjen turvallisuutta.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lue raportti Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector (työsuojelu tuulivoima-alalla)</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/fi/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"et";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tuuleenergia: hea keskkonnale, aga kas ka tervislik töötajatele?";"<p>   Tuuleenergia on Euroopa Liidu taastuvenergiale ülemineku võti. Tuuleenergeetika on kiiresti kasvav valdkond, kuid sellega kaasneb palju tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu riske, sest maismaal ja meres asuvate tuuleparkide paljud aspektid ja töötingimused on ainulaadsed.</p> <p>   EU-OSHA aruandes käsitletakse tuuleenergeetika töötajate riske maal ja meres asuvate tuulikute olelustsükli eri etappidel, samuti uuritakse, mida tehakse valdkonnas töökeskkonna ohutumaks muutmisel.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Aruanne: tööohutus ja töötervishoid tuuleenergeetikas</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/et/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"sv";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vindenergi: hälsosamt för miljön, men hur hälsosamt är det för arbetstagare?";"<p>   Vind är en nyckel till EU:s omställning till förnybar energi. Vindenergisektorn växer snabbt, men det innebär också att det uppstår många nya arbetsmiljörisker eftersom många aspekter med vindturbiner till lands och till havs är unika liksom den arbetsmiljö där vi träffar på dem.</p> <p>   Arbetsmiljöbyråns rapport undersöker riskerna för arbetstagare i vindenergisektorn i samtliga stadier av en vindturbins livscykel på land eller till havs. Rapporten behandlar också de utmaningar industrin möter på sin väg mot en säkrare arbetsmiljö.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Läs rapporten: Arbetsmiljön i vindenergisektorn (Occupational safety and health in the wind energy sector) </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/sv/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"sl";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vetrna energija: zdrava za okolje, a koliko je zdrava za delavce?";"<p>   Veter je bistven za usmerjanje Evropske unije k rabi energije iz obnovljivih virov. Sektor vetrne energije naglo raste, a s tem naraščajo tudi tveganja za poklicno varnost in zdravje pri delu, saj so številni vidiki kopenskih in pomorskih vetrnih turbin specifični in so zato posebna tudi nijhova delovna okolja.</p> <p>   Poročilo EU-OSHA preučuje tveganje za delavce pri pridobivanju vetrne energije v različnih stopnjah v življenjskega cikla kopenskih in pomorskih vetrnih turbin, prav tako pa obravnava izzive, s katerimi se sooča industrija v prizadevanjih za zagotavljanje varnejšega delovnega okolja.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Preberite poročilo: varnost in zdravje pri delu v sektorju vetrne energije</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/sl/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"bg";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Вятърна енергетика: полезна за околната среда, но доколко полезна за работниците?";"<p>   Вятърът е от ключово значение за ЕС по отношение на възобновяемата енергия. Секторът на вятърната енергетика се разраства бързо, но носи със себе си много професионални рискове за безопасността и здравето, тъй като работната среда е също толкова уникална, колкото вятърните турбини на сушата и в морето.</p> <p>   Докладът на EU-OSHA разглежда рисковете за работниците в сектора на вятърната енергетика заедно с различните етапи от жизнения цикъл на вятърните турбини на сушата и в морето, както и предизвикателствата, пред които е изправена индустрията в напредъка й към осигуряване на по-безопасна работна среда.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Прочетете доклада: Безопасност и здраве в сектора на вятърната енергетика</a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/bg/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"ro";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Energia eoliană: sănătoasă pentru mediu, dar în ce măsură este sănătoasă pentru lucrători?";"<p>   Vântul este esenţial pentru tranziţia UE spre energia regenerabilă. Sectorul energiei eoliene se dezvoltă rapid, dar aduce cu sine multe riscuri pentru securitatea şi sănătatea în muncă întrucât multe aspecte ale turbinelor eoliene de pe continent şi din larg sunt unice, la fel ca mediile de lucru în care se găsesc acestea.</p> <p>   Raportul EU-OSHA analizează riscurile la care sunt expuşi lucrătorii în domeniul energiei eoliene pe parcursul diverselor stadii ale ciclului de viaţă al turbinelor eoliene de pe continent şi din larg şi prezintă provocările cu care se confruntă industria pe măsură ce progresează în oferirea unui mediu de lucru mai sigur.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Citiţi raportul: Securitatea şi sănătatea în muncă în sectorul energiei eoliene </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/ro/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"de";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Windenergie: Gesund für die Umwelt, aber wie gesund für Arbeitnehmer?";"<p>   Wind ist der Schlüssel der EU auf ihrem Weg zu erneuerbaren Energien. Der Windenergiesektor wächst schnell, bringt aber viele arbeitsbedingte Sicherheits- und Gesundheitsrisiken mit sich, da viele Aspekte der land- und seeseitigen Windturbinen neuartig sind, so wie auch die Arbeitsumgebung, in der sie sich befinden.</p> <p>   Der EU-OSHA-Bericht untersucht die Risiken für Arbeitnehmer im Bereich Windenergie in den verschiedenen Phasen des Lebenszyklusses von Windturbinen und beleuchtet die Herausforderungen für die Industrie bei ihren Fortschritten zur Gewährleistung einer sichereren Arbeitsumgebung.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Zum Bericht: Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz im Windsektor </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/de/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"es";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Energía eólica: saludable para el medio ambiente, pero ¿hasta qué punto saludable para los trabajadores?";"<p>   El viento es fundamental para el tránsito de la UE hacia unas fuentes de energía renovables. El sector de la energía eólica está en rápida expansión, pero lleva aparejados muchos riesgos para la seguridad y la salud, porque muchos apectos de las turbinas eólicas mar adentro son unicos, de la misma forma que el entorno laboral en el que se encuentran.</p>  <p>   El informe de EU-OSHA examina los riesgos para los trabajadores del sector de la energía eólica a lo largo de las diversas fases del ciclo de vida de las turbinas eólicas en tierra y mar adentro y examina los riesgos a los que hace frente el sector a medida que avanza hacia la prestación de un entorno de trabajo más seguro.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lea el informe: La seguridad y la salud en el trabajo en el sector de la energía eólica </a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/es/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"lv";"/en/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers";"published";"2013-12-05 13:59:48";"2014-07-25 10:49:17";"2013-12-13 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vēja enerģija — veselīga videi, bet vai arī darba ņēmējiem?";"<p>   Vējš ir galvenais elements ES virzībā uz atjaunojamo enerģiju. Vēja enerģijas nozare strauji attīstās, bet tā ietver daudzus darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības riskus, jo iekšzonas un ārzonas vēja turbīnām daudzi aspekti ir unikāli un šīs turbīnas atrodas tieši tādās pašās, unikālās darba vidēs.</p> <p>   EU-OSHA ziņojumā ir pētīti riski darba ņēmējiem vēja enerģijas nozarē iekšzonas un ārzonas vēja turbīnu dzīves cikla dažādos posmos, kā arī aplūkoti šīs nozares uzdevumi, jo šī nozare tiek attīstīta, domājot par drošāku darba vidi.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-wind-energy-sector/view<@#&>>Lasiet ziņojumu: Darba drošība un veselības aizsardzība vēja enerģijas nozarē </a></p> <p>    </p>";"";"/lv/teaser/wind-energy-healthy-for-the-environment-but-how-healthy-for-workers/wind energy.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"el";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"published";"2013-11-26 12:48:41";"2014-07-25 15:43:22";"2013-12-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Σύνοδος κορυφής για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας 2013 – Δείτε τώρα τη σύνοψη της διάσκεψης, φωτογραφίες και βίντεο!";"<p>   Στις 11-12 Νοεμβρίου 2013, ο EU-OSHA διοργάνωσε στο Μπιλμπάο μια επιτυχημένη διάσκεψη κορυφής για την επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία. Η εκδήλωση σηματοδότησε τη λήξη της εκστρατείας <@#&>Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώροι Εργασίας<@#&> με θέμα <@#&>Πρόληψη των κινδύνων στην εργασία με τη συμμετοχή όλων<@#&> και συγκέντρωσε περισσότερους από 250 συμμετέχοντες από τουλάχιστον 30 χώρες.</p>  <p>   Μπορείτε να τηλεφορτώσετε παρουσιάσεις, φωτογραφίες, σύνοψη της εκδήλωσης καθώς και ένα βίντεο της εκστρατείας. Μάθετε τα πάντα για την εκδήλωση τώρα!</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/hwc-summit-2013<@#&>>Σύνοψη της Συνόδου κορυφής για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας 2013, παρουσιάσεις και ομιλητές</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157637591302936/<@#&>>Φωτογραφίες από την εκδήλωση</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/_MfntqLh9Q0<@#&>>Βίντεο σχετικά με την εκστρατεία <@#&>Πρόληψη των κινδύνων στην εργασία με τη συμμετοχή όλων<@#&></a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now/hw-summit-2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

The event marked the closing of the Healthy Workplaces Campaign on ‘Working together for risk prevention’ and gathered 250 participants from over 30 countries.</p>  <p>   Presentations, pictures, a summary of the event and a campaign video are available for download. "/de/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"de";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"published";"2013-11-26 12:48:41";"2014-07-25 15:43:22";"2013-12-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Gipfeltreffen Gesunde Arbeitsplätze 2013 – Zusammenfassung, Bilder und Video jetzt verfügbar!";"<p>   Vom 11. bis&nbsp;12.&nbsp;November 2013 richtete die EU-OSHA in Bilbao ein erfolgreiches Gipfeltreffen zu Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit aus. Die Veranstaltung bildete den Abschluss der Kampagne für gesunde Arbeitsplätze „Partnerschaft für Prävention“ und zog 250&nbsp;Teilnehmer aus über 30 Ländern an.</p>  <p>   Präsentationen, Bilder, eine Zusammenfassung der Veranstaltung und ein Video über die Kampagne können jetzt von der Website heruntergeladen werden. "/ro/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"ro";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"published";"2013-11-26 12:48:41";"2014-07-25 15:43:22";"2013-12-10 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Summitul pentru locuri de muncă sigure şi sănătoase 2013 – Rezumat, imagini şi material video disponibile acum!";"<p>   La 11 şi 12 noiembrie 2013, EU-OSHA a găzduit la Bilbao un summit de succes privind securitatea şi sănătatea la locul de muncă. Evenimentul a marcat încheierea Campaniei pentru locuri de muncă sigure şi sănătoase cu tema „Împreună pentru prevenirea riscurilor” şi a reunit 250 de participanţi din peste 30 de ţări.</p>  <p>   Sunt disponibile pentru descărcare prezentări, imagini, un rezumat al evenimentului şi un material video al campaniei. "/pl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"pl";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"published";"2013-11-26 12:48:41";"2014-07-25 15:43:22";"2013-12-10 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Szczyt kończący kampanię „Zdrowe i bezpieczne miejsca pracy 2013” – relacja, zdjęcia i filmy już dostępne!";"<p>   W dniach 11–12 listopada 2013 r. w Bilbao odbył się udany szczyt EU-OSHA na temat bezpieczeństwa i higieny pracy. Impreza stanowiła zwieńczenie kampanii „Zdrowe i bezpieczne miejsca pracy – Partnerstwo dla prewencji” i zgromadziła 250 uczestników z ponad 30 państw.</p>  <p>   Do pobrania dostępne są już zdjęcia, relacja ze szczytu oraz film poświęcony kampanii. Wszystkie fakty w jednym miejscu – zapraszamy!</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/hwc-summit-2013<@#&>>Relacja ze szczytu „Zdrowe i bezpieczne miejsca pracy 2013”, wystąpienia i prelegenci</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157637591302936/<@#&>>Zdjęcia z imprezy</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/_MfntqLh9Q0<@#&>>Film poświęcony kampanii „Partnerstwo dla prewencji”</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now/hw-summit-2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"fr";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"published";"2013-11-26 12:48:41";"2014-07-25 15:43:22";"2013-12-10 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Sommet «Lieux de travail sains» 2013: résumé, photos et vidéo désormais disponibles!";"<p>   Les 11 et 12 novembre 2013, l'EU-OSHA a organisé à Bilbao un sommet sur la santé et la sécurité au travail, qui a rencontré un franc succès. Cet événement phare, qui clôturait la campagne «Lieux de travail sains: ensemble pour la prévention des risques», a rassemblé 250 participants représentant plus de 30 pays.</p>  <p>   Vous pouvez dès maintenant consulter et télécharger les présentations, les photographies, un résumé de l'événement et une vidéo sur la campagne. "/lv/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"lv";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"published";"2013-11-26 12:48:41";"2014-07-25 15:43:22";"2013-12-10 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu kampaņas samits (2013. gads) — ir pieejams kopsavilkums, attēli un video!";"<p>   Bilbao 2013. gada 11. un 12. novembrī EU-OSHA rīkoja drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu samitu. "/lt/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"lt";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"published";"2013-11-26 12:48:41";"2014-07-25 15:43:22";"2013-12-10 02:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"2013 m. saugių darbo vietų kampanijos aukščiausiojo lygio susitikimas. Santrauka, nuotraukos ir vaizdo įrašas jau čia!";"<p>   2013&nbsp;m. lapkričio 11–12&nbsp;d. Bilbao mieste EU-OSHA surengė sėkmingą aukščiausiojo lygio darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos susitikimą.
