"/hr/teaser/transport-workers-brave-a-variety-of-hazards";"hr";"/en/teaser/transport-workers-brave-a-variety-of-hazards";"published";"2012-06-09 11:31:08";"2014-07-25 10:48:59";"2013-12-09 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Radnici u sektoru prometa suočeni s nizom opasnosti";"<p>   Promet je jedan od sektora koji se najbrže razvija i mijenja u Europi. Proširenje Europske unije, promjena navika putovanja i konzumacije hrane, slobodno kretanje roba kao i problemi vezani uz okoliš doprinijeli su značajnim promjenama u načinu poslovanja prijevoznika. To je u velikoj mjeri utjecalo na uvjete rada zaposlenika u tim poduzećima.<br /> Promjene u organizaciji rada i oprečni zahtjevi potražnje u gospodarstvu s rastućim sektorom usluga doveli su do porasta umora među radnicima u sektoru prijevoza kao i do nasilja nad njima. Broj radnika u sektoru prometa koji pate od stresa i cijelog niza mišićno-koštanih poremećaja i dalje je u porastu.</p> <p>   Više informacija nalazi se u odjeljku <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/sector/rail_air_water_transport/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Željeznički, zračni i vodeni promet</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/transport-workers-brave-a-variety-of-hazards/transport.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/transport-workers-brave-a-variety-of-hazards";"en";"";"published";"2012-06-09 11:31:08";"2014-07-25 10:48:59";"2013-12-09 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Transport workers brave a variety of hazards";"<p>   Transport is one of the most thriving and rapidly changing sectors in Europe. The expansion of the European Union, changing traveling and food consumption habits, the free movement of goods, as well as environmental concerns, have contributed to significant changes in the way transport companies operate. This has had a remarkable impact on their employees’ working conditions.<br />   Work organisational changes and conflicting demands in a growing service economy contribute to an increase in fatigue among transport workers, and acts of violence against then. The number of transport workers suffering from stress and a variety of musculoskeletal disorders continues to grow.</p>  <p>   To learn more, visit our section <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/sector/rail_air_water_transport/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Rail, Air and Water Transport</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/transport-workers-brave-a-variety-of-hazards/transport.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/tmp/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"en";"";"private";"2013-12-09 07:15:17";"2013-12-09 07:22:10";"2013-12-09 00:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Healthy Workplaces Summit 2013 – Summary, pictures and video available now!";"<p>   On 11-12 November 2013 in Bilbao, EU-OSHA hosted a successful occupational safety and health summit. The event marked the closing of the Healthy Workplaces Campaign on ‘Working together for risk prevention’ and gathered 250 participants from over 30 countries.</p>  <p>   Presentations, pictures, a summary of the event and a campaign video are available for download. Get all the facts now!</p>  <blockquote>   <p>    <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/seminars/hwc-summit-2013<@#&>>Summary of the Healthy Workplaces Summit 2013, presentations and speakers</a><br />    <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/euosha/sets/72157637591302936/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Pictures of the event</a><br />    Video about the ‘Working together for risk prevention’ campaign</p>  </blockquote>";"";"/en/tmp/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now/new-premises.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/no/tmp/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"no";"/en/tmp/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now";"private";"2013-12-09 07:15:17";"2013-12-09 07:22:10";"2013-12-09 00:00:00";"thomas_syslab_com";"Healthy Workplaces Summit 2013 – Summary, pictures and video available now!";"";"";"/no/tmp/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013-2013-summary-pictures-and-video-available-now/new-premises.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"el";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Το προσωπικό στον τομέα της υγειονομικής περίθαλψης χρειάζεται αποτελεσματική προστασία";"<p>Ο τομέας της υγειονομικής περίθαλψης απασχολεί σήμερα περίπου το 10% όλων των εργαζομένων στην ΕΕ. Τα τρία τέταρτα και πλέον αυτών είναι γυναίκες. Οι εργαζόμενοι στον συγκεκριμένο τομέα εκτελούν εργασίες και εκτίθενται σε συνθήκες που θέτουν σε κίνδυνο την υγεία τους. </p><p>Επισκεφτείτε την <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/el/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>ενότητα του τομέα υγειονομικής περίθαλψης</a> στον δικτυακό μας τόπο. Εκεί θα βρείτε διάφορα παραδείγματα καλής πρακτικής, από την πρόληψη τραυματισμών με βελόνες και αιχμηρά αντικείμενα έως την προαγωγή της ψυχικής υγείας, τα οποία περιέχονται σε <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/el/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>περιπτωσιολογικές μελέτες</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/el/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>συχνές ερωτήσεις</a>, εργαλεία για την εκτίμηση κινδύνων και συνδέσμους σε συναφείς πληροφορίες από ολόκληρη την Ευρώπη.</p>";"";"/el/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"en";"";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Healthcare staff need proper protection";"<p>   Today, the healthcare sector employs around 10% of all workers throughout the EU. More than three-quarters of them are women. People employed in this sector have to deal with activities and environments that pose a threat to their health.</p>  <p>   Visit our <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>healthcare section</a> to access&nbsp; a variety of good practice information ranging from the prevention of needlestick and sharps injuries to promoting mental health, in the form of <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>case studies</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>frequently asked questions</a>, risk assessment tools and links to relevant information across Europe.</p>";"";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"is";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Starfsfólk í heilbrigðisþjónustu þarf á viðeigandi vörnum að halda";"<p>Í dag vinnur um 10% alls starfsfólks í Evrópusambandinu í heilbrigðisgeiranum.  Meira en þrír fjórðu hlutar þeirra eru konur. Fólk, sem vinnur í þessum geira, þarf að takast á við heilsuspillandi starfsemi og umhverfi. </p><p>Skoða <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/is/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>síðuna okkar um heilbrigðisþjónustu</a> til þess að fá aðgang að ýmiss konar upplýsingum um góða starfshætti, allt frá forvörnum gegn nálastungum og áverkum af völdum beittra hluta til geðheilsueflingar í formi <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>dæmisagna</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>algengra spurninga</a>, hættuathugunartóla og hlekkja á viðeigandi upplýsingar um alla Evrópu. </p>";"";"/is/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"es";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"El personal sanitario necesita una protección adecuada";"<p>Actualmente, el sector sanitario emplea a cerca del 10 % de todos los trabajadores de la UE. Más de las tres cuartas partes son mujeres. Los trabajadores que desempeñan funciones en dicho sector deben enfrentarse a entornos y actividades que suponen una amenaza para su salud. </p><p>Consulte nuestra <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/es/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>sección sobre la atención sanitaria</a> para acceder a informaciones sobre buenas prácticas que abarcan una gran variedad asuntos, desde la prevención de lesiones producidas por agujas e instrumentos cortantes y punzantes hasta la promoción de la salud mental, y se presentan en forma de <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/es/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>estudios de caso</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/es/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>preguntas más frecuentes</a>, herramientas para la evaluación de riesgos y enlaces a información pertinente en todo el territorio europeo.</p>";"";"/es/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"nl";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Personeel in de gezondheidszorg heeft adequate bescherming nodig";"<p>Ongeveer 10% van alle werknemers in de EU is werkzaam in de gezondheidszorg. Meer dan driekwart daarvan is vrouw. Mensen die in deze sector werken, hebben te maken met werkzaamheden en werkomgevingen die een bedreiging kunnen vormen voor hun gezondheid. </p><p>Bezoek onze <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/nl/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>rubriek gezondheidszorg</a> voor informatie over goede praktijken op allerlei terreinen, van het voorkomen dat mensen zich prikken aan naalden of zich verwonden aan scherpe voorwerpen, tot de bevordering van geestelijke gezondheid, in de vorm van <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/nl/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>casestudy's</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/nl/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>veelgestelde vragen</a>, instrumenten voor risicobeoordeling en links naar relevante informatie overal in Europa.</p>";"";"/nl/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"pt";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Os trabalhadores do sector da saúde precisam de proteção adequada";"<p>Atualmente, o sector da saúde emprega cerca de 10% do total de trabalhadores na UE. Mais de três quartos desses trabalhadores são mulheres. Os trabalhadores do sector da saúde têm de fazer face a uma série de atividades e ambientes que constituem uma ameaça para a sua saúde. </p><p>Visite a nossa <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pt/sector/healthcare<@#&>>secção para os trabalhadores do sector da saúde</a> para aceder a um conjunto de informações sobre boas práticas, desde a prevenção de ferimentos provocados por agulhas ou objetos cortantes à promoção da saúde mental, sob a forma de <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pt/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>estudos de casos</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pt/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>perguntas mais frequentes</a>, instrumentos de avaliação dos riscos e links para informações relevantes em toda a Europa.</p>";"";"/pt/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"it";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Il personale sanitario necessita di una protezione adeguata";"<p>Oggigiorno il settore sanitario impiega circa il 10% dell'intera forza lavoro a livello di UE. Più di tre quarti di questi lavoratori sono donne. Le attività delle persone impiegate in questo settore, così come gli ambienti in cui operano, costituiscono una minaccia per la loro salute. </p><p>Visita la nostra sezione riguardante <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/it/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>il settore sanitario/ospedaliero</a> per accedere a una serie di informazioni sulle buone prassi: dalla prevenzione di ferite da taglio o da punta alla promozione della salute mentale, sotto forma di <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/it/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>studi di casi</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/it/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>domande frequenti</a>, strumenti di valutazione dei rischi e link a informazioni pertinenti in Europa.</p>";"";"/it/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"cs";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Pracovníci ve zdravotnictví potřebují řádnou ochranu";"<p>Odvětví zdravotnictví dnes zaměstnává přibližně 10 % všech pracovníků v celé EU. Více než tři čtvrtiny z nich jsou ženy. Lidé zaměstnaní ve zdravotnictví musí vykonávat celou řadu činností, které ohrožují jejich zdraví, a prostředí, v němž pracují, je pro jejich zdraví rovněž ohrožující. </p><p>Navštivte náš <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/cs/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>oddíl věnovaný zdravotnictví</a> a získejte přístup k nejrůznějším praktickým informacím týkajícím se řady témat (od prevence poranění injekčními jehlami a ostrými předměty až po podporu duševního zdraví) v podobě <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/cs/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>případových studií</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/cs/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>častých dotazů</a>, nástrojů pro hodnocení rizik a odkazů na příslušné informace v celé Evropě.</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"et";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Tervishoiutöötajad vajavad korralikku kaitset";"<p>Täna on tervishoiusektoris hõivatud ligikaudu 10% kõikidest ELi töötajatest. Üle kolme neljandiku neist on naised. Kõnealuses sektoris töötavad inimesed peavad puutuma kokku tegevuste ja keskkonnaga, mis ohustavad nende tervist. </p><p>Külastage meie <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/et/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>tervishoiu jaotist</a>, kust leiate mitmesugust teavet hea tava kohta – alates süstlatorkevigastustest ja lõikehaavadest ning lõpetades vaimse tervise edendamisega – <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/et/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>juhtumiuuringute</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/et/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>korduvate küsimuste</a>, riskihindamise vahendite ning linkidena asjakohastele andmetele üle Euroopa.</p>";"";"/et/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"no";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Helsepersonell trenger hensiktsmessig beskyttelse";"<p>I dag arbeider 10 % av alle arbeidstakere i EU i helsesektoren. Mer enn tre firedeler av dem er kvinner. Personer som arbeider i denne sektoren, må hanskes med aktiviteter og miljøer som utgjør en risiko for helsen. </p><p>Besøk vår <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/no/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>seksjon om helsesektoren</a>, der du finner en mengde informasjon om god praksis innen alt fra forebygging av nålestikk og skader fra skarpe gjenstander til tiltak for å fremme psykisk helse, i form av <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>casestudier</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/en/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>ofte stilte spørsmål</a>, risikovurderingsverktøy og lenker til relevant informasjon rundt om i Europa.</p>";"";"/no/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"lv";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Veselības aprūpes darbiniekiem vajadzīga pienācīga aizsardzība";"<p>Mūsdienās veselības aprūpes nozarē visā ES strādā aptuveni 10 % darba ņēmēju. Cilvēkiem, kas strādā šajā nozarē, nākas saskarties ar darbībām un vidi, kas apdraud veselību. </p><p>Apmeklējiet mūsu <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/lv/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>sadaļu par veselības aprūpi</a>, kur atrodama labas prakses informācija par dažādām tēmām — no injekciju adatu un asu instrumentu radītu ievainojumu novēršanas līdz garīgās veselības veicināšanai —, kas sniegta kā <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/lv/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>gadījumu izpētes</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/lv/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>bieži uzdoti jautājumi</a>, riska novērtēšanas rīki un saites uz noderīgu informāciju Eiropā.</p>";"";"/lv/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"lt";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Būtina užtikrinti tinkamą sveikatos priežiūros darbuotojų apsaugą";"<p>Sveikatos priežiūros sektoriuje šiuo metu dirba apie 10 proc. visų ES darbuotojų. Šio sektoriaus darbuotojai atlieka pavojingas užduotis ir dirba sveikatai pavojingoje aplinkoje. </p><p>Apsilankykite mūsų svetainės <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/lt/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>puslapiuose, skirtuose sveikatos priežiūros darbuotojams</a>: čia rasite įvairios informacijos apie gerąją patirtį, pradedant patarimais, kaip išvengti įsidūrimų švirkštais ir sužeidimų aštriais įrankiais, ir baigiant psichikos sveikatingumo skatinimu. "/bg/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"bg";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Здравният персонал се нуждае от подходяща защита";"<p>Днес секторът на здравното обслужване осигурява заетост на около 10 % от всички работници в ЕС. Над три четвърти от тях са жени. Хората, заети в този сектор, се занимават с дейности и среди, които представляват заплаха за тяхното здраве. </p><p>Посетете нашата <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/bg/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>секция за здравното обслужване</a>, за да получите информация за различни добри практики, вариращи от превенцията на наранявания с игли и остри предмети до насърчаване на психичното здраве, под формата на <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/bg/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>проучвания на конкретни случаи</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/bg/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>често задавани въпроси</a>, инструменти за оценка на риска и връзки към съответната информация в Европа.</p>";"";"/bg/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"de";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Beschäftigte im Gesundheitswesen brauchen angemessenen Schutz";"<p>Heute sind im Gesundheitssektor – bezogen auf die gesamte Europäische Union – etwa 10 % aller Arbeitnehmer beschäftigt. Mehr als drei Viertel davon sind Frauen. Die Beschäftigten in diesem Sektor haben mit Tätigkeiten und Umgebungen zu tun, die Gefahren für ihre Gesundheit bergen. </p><p>Besuchen Sie den Bereich <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/de/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>Gesundheitswesen</a>, der Ihnen verschiedenste Informationen zu guten praktischen Lösungen, etwa zur Vermeidung von Nadelstichverletzungen und Verletzungen durch scharfe/spitze Gegenstände, aber auch zu Maßnahmen zur Förderung der geistigen Gesundheit in Form von <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/de/practical-solutions/case-studies/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Fallstudien</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/de/practical-solutions/faqs/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>häufig gestellten Fragen</a>, Instrumenten zur Gefährdungsbeurteilung und Links zu einschlägigen Informationen in ganz Europa bietet.</p>";"";"/de/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"hu";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Az egészségügyi dolgozóknak megfelelő védelemre van szükségük";"<p>Ma az egészségügyi ágazat az Európai Unió munkavállalóinak mintegy 10 százalékát foglalkoztatja. E munkavállalók több mint háromnegyede nő. Az ágazatban dolgozóknak olyan tevékenységekkel és környezetekkel kell megküzdeniük, amelyek veszélyt jelentenek az egészségükre. </p><p>Látogassa meg weboldalunk <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/hu/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>egészségüggyel</a> foglalkozó részét, hogy <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/hu/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>esettanulmányok</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/hu/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>gyakran ismételt kérdések</a>, kockázatértékelő eszközök és az Európa-szerte elérhető releváns információkra mutató hivatkozások formájában a tű vagy más éles vagy hegyes eszközök által okozott sérülések megelőzésétől a mentális egészség javításáig számos témában helyes gyakorlati információkhoz juthasson.</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"ro";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Personalul din sectorul sănătăţii are nevoie de protecţie adecvată";"<p>În prezent, în sectorul sănătăţii sunt angajaţi aproximativ 10% din totalul lucrătorilor din UE, peste trei sferturi fiind femei. Persoanele angajate în acest sector trebuie să se ocupe de activităţi şi să lucreze în medii care reprezintă o ameninţare pentru sănătate. </p><p>Vizitaţi <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/ro/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>secţiunea dedicată sectorului sănătăţii</a> pentru a accesa o diversitate de informaţii practice de valoare, de la prevenirea rănilor cauzate de înţepăturile de ac şi obiecte ascuţite până la promovarea sănătăţii psihice, sub formă de <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/ro/practical-solutions/case-studies/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>studii de caz</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/ro/practical-solutions/faqs/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>întrebări frecvente</a>, instrumente de evaluare a riscurilor şi linkuri către informaţii relevante din întreaga Europă.</p>";"";"/ro/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"pl";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Pracownicy służby zdrowia potrzebują odpowiedniej ochrony";"<p>Obecnie w sektorze opieki zdrowotnej zatrudnionych jest około 10% wszystkich pracowników w UE. Ponad trzy czwarte z nich to kobiety. Osoby zatrudnione w tym sektorze mają do czynienia z działaniami i warunkami, które stanowią zagrożenie dla ich zdrowia. </p><p>Odwiedź naszą sekcję na temat <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pl/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>opieki zdrowotnej</a>, aby uzyskać dostęp do różnych informacji o dobrych praktykach – od zapobiegania skaleczeniom przez igły i ostre przedmioty po promowanie zdrowia psychicznego. Informacje te przedstawione są w postaci <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pl/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>studiów przypadku</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/pl/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>często zadawanych pytań</a>, narzędzi oceny ryzyka oraz linków do odpowiednich informacji z całej Europy.</p>";"";"/pl/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"fr";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Le personnel des soins de santé doit être correctement protégé";"<p>Le secteur des soins de santé emploie aujourd'hui environ 10 % de tous les travailleurs de l'Union européenne. Plus de trois quarts sont des femmes. Les employés de ce secteur doivent gérer des activités et des environnements qui représentent une menace pour leur santé. </p><p>Notre section <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/fr/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Santé et sécurité du personnel des soins de santé</a> contient  diverses informations sur les bonnes pratiques: de la prévention des blessures dues aux seringues ou aux objets tranchants à la promotion de la santé mentale, les sujets sont abordés sous forme d'<a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/fr/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>études de cas</a>, de <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/fr/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>questions fréquentes (FAQ)</a>, d'outils d'évaluation des risques et de liens vers des informations pertinentes dans toute l'Europe.</p>";"";"/fr/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"sk";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Zamestnanci v oblasti zdravotníctva potrebujú riadnu ochranu";"<p>Odvetvie zdravotníctva v súčasnosti zamestnáva približne 10 % všetkých pracovníkov v EÚ. Viac ako tri štvrtiny z nich tvoria ženy. Osoby zamestnané v tomto odvetví vykonávajú také činnosti a v takých druhoch prostredia, ktoré predstavujú hrozbu pre ich zdravie. </p><p>Navštívte <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sk/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>časť venovanú zdravotnej starostlivosti</a> a získajte rôzne informácie o dobrej praxi (od prevencie pred pichnutím ihlou a poraneniami ostrými predmetmi až po podporu duševného zdravia) vo forme <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sk/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>prípadových štúdií</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sk/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>často kladených otázok</a>, nástrojov na hodnotenie rizika a odkazov na dôležité informácie v celej Európe.</p>";"";"/sk/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"mt";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Il-persunal tal-kura tas-saħħa jeħtieġ il-protezzjoni xierqa";"<p>Illum, is-settur tal-kura tas-saħħa jimpjega madwar 10% tal-ħaddiema kollha madwar l-UE. Iktar minn tliet kwarti minnhom huma nisa. In-nies impjegati f'dan is-settur iridu jaħdmu f'attivitajiet u ambjenti li huma ta' periklu għal saħħithom. </p><p>Żur it-<a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/mt/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>taqsima tal-kura tas-saħħa</a> tagħna biex taċċessa firxa ta' tagħrif dwar il-prattiki tajba li jvarjaw mill-prevenzjoni ta' korrimenti bil-labar u oġġetti li jaqtgħu sal-promozzjoni tas-saħħa mentali, fil-forma ta' <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/mt/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>studji tal-każijiet</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/mt/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>mistoqsijiet komuni</a>, għodod għall-valutazzjoni tar-riskji u links għal tagħrif relevanti madwar l-Ewropa.</p>";"";"/mt/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"sl";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Zdravstveni delavci potrebujejo primerno zaščito";"<p>V zdravstvu je zaposlenih okoli 10 % vseh delavcev v vsej EU. Več kot tri četrtine je žensk. Ljudje, ki so zaposleni v tem sektorju, opravljajo dejavnosti v okoljih, ki pomenijo tveganje za njihovo zdravje. </p><p>Obiščite <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sl/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>razdelek o zdravstvu</a>, če želite dostopati do različnih informacij o dobrih praksah, od preprečevanja poškodb z injekcijskimi iglami in ostrimi medicinskimi instrumenti do spodbujanja duševnega zdravja s <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sl/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>študijami primerov</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sl/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>pogosto zastavljenimi vprašanji</a>, orodji za ocenjevanje tveganja in povezavami do ustreznih informacij iz vse Evrope.</p>";"";"/sl/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"fi";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Terveydenhuoltoalalla suojauduttava asianmukaisesti";"<p>Terveydenhuoltoala työllistää noin 10 prosenttia kaikista työntekijöistä Euroopan unionin alueella. Yli kolme neljäsosaa työntekijöistä on naisia. Alan työntekijöiden toimintaan tai ympäristöön liittyy väistämättä uhka terveydelle. </p><p>Tutustu viraston <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/fi/sector/healthcare/index_html<@#&>>terveydenhuoltoalaa käsittelevään osioon</a>, josta löytyy runsaasti tietoa hyvistä käytännöistä aina terävien instrumenttien aiheuttamien pisto- ja viiltohaavojen välttämisestä mielenterveyden tukemiseen: <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/fi/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>tapaustutkimuksia</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/fi/practical-solutions/faqs/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>usein esitettyjä kysymyksiä</a>, riskinarviointivälineitä sekä linkkejä eri puolilta Eurooppaa kerättyyn tietoon.</p>";"";"/fi/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"da";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Plejepersonale skal have ordentlig beskyttelse";"<p>I dag beskæftiger sundhedssektoren ca. 10 % af alle arbejdstagere i hele EU. Mere end tre fjerdedele af dem er kvinder. Ansatte i denne sektor skal forholde sig til aktiviteter og miljøer, der udgør en trussel mod deres helbred. </p><p>Besøg vores <a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/da/sector/healthcare<@#&>>afsnit om sundhed</a> for at få adgang til en lang række oplysninger om god praksis, lige fra hvordan man forebygger nålestiksskader og skader forårsaget af skarpe genstande til fremme af psykisk sundhed, gennem <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/da/practical-solutions/case-studies/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>caseundersøgelser</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/da/practical-solutions/faqs/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>hyppigt stillede spørgsmål</a>, risikovurderingsværktøjer og links til relevant information fra hele Europa.</p>";"";"/da/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"sv";"/en/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection";"published";"2012-06-08 23:39:59";"2014-07-25 15:23:55";"2013-12-08 02:00:00";"tijero";"Sjukvårdspersonalen behöver ett ordentligt skydd";"<p>I dag arbetar cirka 10 procent av alla arbetstagare i EU i hälso- och sjukvårdssektorn. Mer än tre fjärdedelar av dem är kvinnor. De som arbetar i den här sektorn måste hantera situationer och miljöer som utgör ett hot mot deras hälsa. </p><p>I vår <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sv/sector/healthcare<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>hälso- och sjukvårdssektion</a> finns en mängd exempel på god praxis, allt ifrån hur man förhindrar nålstick och skärskador till hur man främjar mental hälsa, i form av <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sv/practical-solutions/case-studies?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>fallstudier</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://osha.europa.eu/sv/practical-solutions/faqs?keywords:list=healthcare#database_search<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>frågor och svar</a>, verktyg för riskbedömning och länkar till informationskällor i hela Europa.</p>";"";"/sv/teaser/healthcare-staff-need-proper-protection/health care.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"pl";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ogłoszenie: Projekt pilotażowy Parlamentu Europejskiego dotyczący zdrowia i bezpieczeństwa pracowników w starszym wieku";"<p>   Celem europejskiego projektu pilotażowego <em>Bezpieczniejsze i zdrowsze warunki pracy dla osób w każdym wieku – bezpieczeństwo i higiena pracy (BHP)</em> w kontekście starzejącej się siły roboczej jest zbadanie polityki, strategii, programów i praktyk w państwach członkowskich i w innych państwach w celu wsparcia rozwoju polityki i dostarczenia przykładów dobrych strategii i praktyk. Poglądy i doświadczenia zebrane w miejscach pracy przyczynią się do zapewnienia pełnego obrazu aktualnej sytuacji, wskazując działania, które należy podjąć.</p>  <p>   Projekt wspiera <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>wniosek Parlamentu Europejskiego</a>. EU-OSHA wspiera <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Komisję Europejską</a> w jego wdrażaniu w ramach umowy o delegowaniu zadań.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Zapoznaj się z dodatkowymi informacjami na temat tego projektu na stronie internetowej EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"fr";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Communication: projet pilote du Parlement européen concernant la santé et la sécurité des travailleurs âgés";"<p>   Un projet pilote européen, intitulé <em>«Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce»</em> (travailler dans des conditions plus sûres et plus saines à tout âge: la sécurité et la santé au travail [SST] dans le contexte d'une population active vieillissante) étudie les politiques, stratégies, programmes et pratiques des États membres et non membres dans le domaine de la SST pour aider à l'élaboration d'une politique et fournir des exemples de bonnes pratiques et stratégies. Les avis et expériences issus du terrain contribueront à obtenir une représentation complète de ce qui se fait déjà et de ce qui doit être amélioré.</p>  <p>   Le projet répond à une <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>demande formulée par le Parlement européen</a>. L'EU-OSHA a signé avec la <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=fr<@#&>>Commission européenne</a> une convention de délégation pour l'aider à y répondre.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lire d'autres informations sur ce projet sur le site web de l'EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"bg";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Съобщение: Пилотен проект на Европейския парламент за здравето и безопасността на по-възрастните работници";"<p>   Европейският пилотен проект <em>По-безопасна и по-здравословна работа на всяка възраст — безопасността и здравето при работа (БЗР) в контекста на застаряващата работна сила</em> има за цел да проучи политиките, стратегиите, програмите и практиките в областта на БЗР в държавите членки и трети страни, с цел да подпомогне разработването на политики и да предостави примери за добри стратегии и практики. Ще бъдат документирани мненията и опитът на хора, заети на различни работни места, които ще допринесат за съставяне на пълна картина на съществуващите процеси и необходимите мерки.</p>  <p>   Проектът подпомага изпълнението на <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/bg/-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-BG-C/FXAL12056BGC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056BGC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056BGC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-BG-C<@#&>>искане на Европейския парламент</a>. EU-OSHA оказва съдействие на <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=bg<@#&>>Европейската комисия</a> за изпълнението на искането по силата на сключено споразумение за делегиране на правомощия.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Прочетете повече за този проект на уебсайта на EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"lv";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Paziņojums: Eiropas Parlamenta pilotprojekts vecāka gadagājuma darbinieku veselības aizsardzībai un drošībai";"<p>   Eiropas pilotprojektā <em>Drošāks un veselībai nekaitīgāks darbs jebkurā vecumā — darba drošība un veselības aizsardzība (DDVA) novecojoša darbaspēka kontekstā</em> tiek pētīta DDVA politika, stratēģija, programmas un prakse dalībvalstīs un citās pasaules valstīs, lai palīdzētu politikas izstrādē un sniegtu labas stratēģijas un prakses piemērus. Darbavietās noskaidrotie uzskati un pieredze palīdzēs izveidot pilnīgu priekšstatu par notiekošo un nepieciešamo.</p>  <p>   Projektu paredz <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>Eiropas Parlamenta pieprasījums</a>. EU-OSHA saskaņā ar deleģēšanas nolīgumu palīdz <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Eiropas Komisijai</a> īstenot šo pieprasījumu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lasīt vairāk par šo projektu EU-OSHA tīmekļa vietnē</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"lt";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Pranešimas: Europos Parlamento bandomasis projektas, skirtas vyresnių darbuotojų sveikatai ir saugai stiprinti";"<p>   Europoje vykdant bandomąjį projektą <em>„Saugesnis ir sveikesnis darbas bet kokiame amžiuje. Senstančių darbuotojų profesinė sauga ir sveikata“</em> tiriama darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos politika, strategija, programos ir praktika valstybėse narėse ir kitur. Taip siekiama padėti formuoti politiką, pateikti gerų strategijų ir praktikos pavyzdžių. Įvairiose darbo vietose surinktos nuomonės ir patirtis padės išsamiai išsiaiškinti, kas šiuo metu vyksta ir ką reikia daryti.</p>  <p>   Šiuo projektu siekiama patenkinti <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>Europos Parlamento prašymą</a>. EU--OSHA padeda jį įgyvendinti <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Europos Komisijai</a> pagal su ja sudarytą įgaliojimo susitarimą.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Daugiau apie šį projektą EU-OSHA svetainėje</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"ro";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Informare: Proiectul pilot al Parlamentului European privind sănătatea și securitatea lucrătorilor vârstnici";"<p>   Un proiect pilot european, intitulat <em>Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce [Munca în condiții mai bune de securitate și sănătate la orice vârstă – securitatea și sănătatea în muncă (SSM) în contextul îmbătrânirii populației active]</em>, examinează politicile, strategiile, programele și practicile de SSM din statele membre și din alte state, pentru a contribui la dezvoltarea politicilor și a oferi exemple de bune practici și strategii. Perspectivele și experiențele de la locul de muncă vor contribui la obținerea unei imagini complete a măsurilor care se iau deja și a măsurilor care sunt necesare.</p>  <p>   Proiectul are la bază o <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>solicitare din partea Parlamentului European</a>. EU-OSHA sprijină <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Comisia Europeană</a> în vederea punerii în aplicare a acestuia, prin intermediul unui acord de delegare.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Citiți mai multe despre acest proiect pe site-ul EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"it";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Avviso: il progetto pilota del Parlamento europeo sulla salute e la sicurezza dei lavoratori più anziani";"<p>   Un progetto pilota europeo, dal titolo <em>Lavoro più sicuro e più salutare a qualsiasi età – la salute e la sicurezza sul lavoro (SSL) nel contesto di una forza lavoro in età avanzata</em>, analizza politiche, strategie, programmi e prassi in materia di SSL all'interno degli Stati membri e in altri paesi per favorire lo sviluppo politico e fornire esempi di buone prassi e strategie. Pareri ed esperienze tratti dai luoghi di lavoro contribuiranno ad offrire un quadro completo sugli eventi in corso e sugli aspetti necessari.</p>  <p>   Il progetto sostiene una <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>richiesta del Parlamento europeo</a> e l'EU-OSHA assiste la <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Commissione europea</a> nell'attuazione della richiesta attraverso un accordo di delega.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Per maggiori informazioni sul progetto consultare il sito Internet dell'EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"cs";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Oznámení: Pilotní projekt Evropského parlamentu týkající se bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví starších pracovníků";"<p>   Evropský pilotní projekt, <em>Bezpečnější a zdravější práce v každém věku – bezpečnost a ochrana zdraví při práci (BOZP) v kontextu stárnoucí pracovní síly</em>, zkoumá politiku, programy a postupy v oblasti BOZP v členských státech i ve světě s cílem pomoci při vývoji politik a poskytnout příklady dobrých strategií a postupů. Názory a zkušenosti z pracovišť přispějí k vytvoření uceleného pohledu na aktuální situaci a na to, co je potřeba udělat.</p>  <p>   Projekt podporuje <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>žádost Evropského parlamentu</a>. Agentura EU-OSHA pomáhá <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Evropské komisi</a> při provádění této žádosti na základě dohody o přenesení pravomocí.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Více informací o tomto projektu si můžete přečíst na internetové stránce EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"et";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Teade: Euroopa Parlamendi eakate töötajate töötervishoiu ja -ohutuse katseprojekt";"<p>   Euroopa Liidu katseprojektis <em>Ohutum ja tervislikum töö sõltumata east – tööohutus ja -tervishoid vananeva tööjõu kontekstis</em> uuritakse Euroopa Liidu liikmesriikide ja muude piirkondade tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu poliitikat, strateegiat, programme ja tavasid, et aidata kaasa poliitika kujundamisele ning esitada heade strateegiate ja tavade näiteid. Töökohtadel kogutud arusaamad ja kogemused aitavad luua tervikliku pildi praegusest olukorrast ja vajadustest.</p>  <p>   Projektiga toetatakse <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>Euroopa Parlamendi taotlust</a>. Euroopa Tööohutuse ja Töötervishoiu Agentuur abistab <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Euroopa Komisjoni</a> delegatsioonikokkuleppe kaudu projekti rakendamisel.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Loe sellest projektist Euroopa Tööohutuse ja Töötervishoiu Agentuuri veebilehel</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"el";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ανακοίνωση: Πιλοτικό σχέδιο του Ευρωπαϊκού Κοινοβουλίου σχετικά με την υγεία και ασφάλεια των εργαζομένων μεγαλύτερης ηλικίας";"<p>   Το ευρωπαϊκό πιλοτικό σχέδιο με τίτλο <em>Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce (Μεγαλύτερη ασφάλεια και υγεία στην εργασία σε κάθε ηλικία - επαγγελματική ασφάλεια και υγεία (ΕΑΥ) στο πλαίσιο του γηράσκοντος εργατικού δυναμικού)</em> εξετάζει τις πολιτικές, τις στρατηγικές, τα προγράμματα και τις δράσεις της ΕΑΥ στα κράτη μέλη της ΕΕ και όχι μόνο, επιχειρώντας να συνδράμει στην ανάπτυξη πολιτικής και να παράσχει παραδείγματα ορθών στρατηγικών και πρακτικών. Απόψεις και εμπειρίες από χώρους εργασίας θα συμβάλουν στο να αναδειχθεί ποια είναι η κατάσταση σήμερα και τι πρέπει να γίνει.</p>  <p>   Το σχέδιο υποστηρίζει <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>αίτημα του Ευρωπαϊκού Κοινοβουλίου</a>. Ο EU-OSHA συνδράμει την <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή</a> στην υλοποίησή του, βάσει σχετικής συμφωνίας ανάθεσης.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Διαβάστε περισσότερα σχετικά με αυτό το σχέδιο στον δικτυακό τόπο του EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"es";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nota: Proyecto piloto del Parlamento Europeo sobre la seguridad y la salud de los trabajadores mayores";"<p>   Un proyecto piloto europeo, <em>Trabajo más seguro y saludable a cualquier edad – seguridad y salud en el trabajo (SST) en el marco del envejecimiento de la población activa, </em>está investigando las políticas, estrategias, programas y prácticas en materia de SST en los Estados miembros y otros países, para ayudar a elaborar políticas y proporcionar ejemplos de buenas prácticas y estrategias. Los puntos de vista y experiencias de los lugares de trabajo contribuirán a ofrecer un panorama completo de lo que está ocurriendo y lo que se necesita.</p>  <p>   El proyecto apoya una <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>petición del Parlamento Europeo</a>. EU-OSHA está apoyando a la <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Comisión Europea</a> en su aplicación, a través de un acuerdo de delegación.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lea más sobre este proyecto en el sitio web de EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"nl";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kennisgeving: proefproject van het Europees Parlement over veiligheid en gezondheid van oudere werknemers";"<p>   Een Europees proefproject, getiteld <em>Veiliger en gezonder werk op elke leeftijd – veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk in het kader van een ouder wordende beroepsbevolking</em>, onderzoekt beleidsmaatregelen, strategieën, programma's en praktijken op het gebied van veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk in de lidstaten en daarbuiten om een bijdrage te leveren aan beleidsontwikkeling en voorbeelden van goede strategieën en praktijken aan te reiken. De opvattingen en ervaringen op de werkplek zullen helpen een compleet beeld te geven van wat er speelt en wat er nodig is.</p>  <p>   Het project steunt een <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>verzoek van het Europees Parlement</a>. EU-OSHA assisteert de <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Europese Commissie</a> bij de uitwerking van dit verzoek, in het kader van een delegatieovereenkomst.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lees meer over dit project op de website van EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"pt";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Aviso: Projeto-piloto do Parlamento Europeu para a segurança e saúde dos trabalhadores idosos";"<p>   Um projeto-piloto europeu, <em>Trabalho mais seguro e saudável em qualquer idade — segurança e saúde no trabalho (SST) no contexto do envelhecimento da população ativa</em> tem vindo a investigar as políticas, estratégias, programas e práticas de SST nos Estados-Membros e países terceiros, com vista a apoiar o desenvolvimento de políticas nesta área e fornecer exemplos de boas práticas e estratégias. Todos os pontos de vista e experiências adquiridos nos locais de trabalho contribuirão para fornecer um quadro completo do que está a acontecer e do que é necessário fazer.</p>  <p>   O projeto serve de apoio a um <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>pedido do Parlamento Europeu</a>. A EU-OSHA presta assistência à <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Comissão Europeia</a> na sua implementação, através de um acordo de delegação.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Saiba mais sobre este projeto no sítio web da EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"no";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Melding: Europaparlamentets pilotprosjekt om eldre arbeidstakeres helse og sikkerhet";"<p>   Et europeisk pilotprosjekt, <em>Sikrere og sunnere arbeidsplasser uansett alder – helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen i lys av en aldrende arbeidsstyrke</em>, undersøker HMS-politikk, strategi, programmer og praksiser innenfor HMS i og utenfor medlemsstatene som vil være til hjelp i utviklingen av politikken og presentere eksempler på gode strategier og praksiser. Synspunkter og erfaringer fra arbeidsplasser kompletterer bildet av hva som skjer og hva som trengs.</p>  <p>   Prosjektet gjennomføres som støtte etter en <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>anmodning fra Europaparlamentet</a>. EU-OSHA bistår <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Europakommisjonen </a> i gjennomføringen av prosjektet gjennom en delegasjonsavtale.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Les mer om prosjektet på EU-OSHAs nettsted</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"en";"";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Notice: European Parliament pilot project on health and safety of older workers";"<p>   A European pilot project, <em>Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce</em> is investigating OSH policy, strategy, programmes and practices in the member states and beyond to assist policy development and provide examples of good strategies and practices. Views and experiences from workplaces will contribute to provide a complete picture of what is taking place and what is needed.</p>  <p>   The project supports a <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>request by the European Parliament</a>. EU-OSHA is assisting the <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>European Commission</a> in its implementation, through a delegation agreement.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Read more about this project on EU-OSHA's website</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"ageing";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"is";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Athugið: Tilraunaverkefni Evrópuþingsins um vinnuvernd eldri launþega";"<p>   Evrópska tilraunaverkefnið, <em>Öruggari og heilbrigðari vinna á öllum aldri - vinnuvernd meðal eldri launþega</em> snýst um rannsóknir á vinnuverndarstefnum, -áætlunum, -verkefnum og -venjum í aðildarríkjunum og víðar til þess að aðstoða við stefnumótun og veita dæmi um góðar stefnur og venjur. Sjónarmið og reynsla vinnustaða mun stuðla að því að heildarmynd fáist af því sem er að eiga sér stað og hvers sé þörf.</p>  <p>   Verkefnið er vegna <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>óskar Evrópuþingsins</a>. EU-OSHA aðstoðar <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>framkvæmdastjórn Evrópusambandsins</a> við framkvæmdina með samkomulagi.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lesa meira um verkefnið á vefsíðu EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"hr";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napomena: Pilot-projekt Europskog parlamenta o zdravlju i sigurnosti radnika starije dobi";"<p>   Europski pilot-projekt <em>Sigurniji i zdraviji rad u svakoj dobi – sigurnost i zdravlje na radu (OSH) u kontekstu starenja radne snage</em> istražuje politike, strategije, programe i prakse sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu (OSH) u državama članicama i šire radi pružanja pomoći u razvoju politika i osiguravanja primjera uspješnih strategija i praksi. Saznanja o stajalištima i iskustvima na radnim mjestima pridonijet će potpunijoj slici trenutačnog stanja i potreba.</p> <p>   Projekt podržava <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>zahtjev Europskog parlamenta</a>. EU-OSHA pomaže <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&langId=en<@#&>>Europskoj komisiji</a> u provedbi projekta putem sporazuma o delegiranju.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Pročitajte više o ovom projektu na EU-OSHA-inoj internetskoj stranici</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"de";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hinweis: Pilotprojekt des Europäischen Parlaments zu Gesundheitsschutz und Sicherheit älterer Arbeitnehmer";"<p>   Ein Pilotprojekt mit dem Arbeitstitel <em>Sicherere und gesündere Arbeitsplätze in jedem Alter – Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit (OSH) im Kontext einer alternden Belegschaft </em>untersucht OSH-Grundsätze, Strategien, Programme und Praktiken in den Mitgliedstaaten und darüber hinaus, um deren Weiterentwicklung zu unterstützen und Beispiele guter Strategien und praktischer Lösungen zu liefern. Einblicke und Erfahrungen von Arbeitsstätten werden dazu beitragen, ein umfassendes Bild darüber zu vermitteln, was gerade geschieht und was unternommen werden muss.</p>  <p>   Das Projekt unterstützt ein <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>Ersuchen des Europäischen Parlaments</a>. Die EU-OSHA hilft der <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=de<@#&>>Europäischen Kommission</a> bei dessen Umsetzung im Rahmen einer Übertragungsvereinbarung (Delegation Agreement).</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Erfahren Sie mehr über dieses Projekt auf der Website der EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"hu";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Felhívás: Az Európai Parlament kísérleti projektje: Az idősebb munkavállalók munkahelyi egészsége és biztonsága";"<p>   A <em>Biztonságosabb és egészségesebb munkát minden korosztálynak – munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem (OSH) az idősödő munkaerő tükrében</em> című európai projekt az OSH-politikákat, stratégiákat, programokat és gyakorlatokat vizsgálja a tagállamokban és azokon túl, hogy ezáltal segítse a szakpolitikák kialakítását és példákkal szolgáljon a helyes stratégiákra és gyakorlatokra. A munkahelyek véleményei és tapasztalatai nagyban hozzájárulnak ahhoz, hogy átfogó képet kaphassunk a jelenlegi helyzetről és arról, hogy milyen tennivaló van még.</p>  <p>   A projekt az <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>Európai Parlament kérését</a> támogatja. A projekt végrehajtásához az EU-OSHA hatáskör-átruházási megállapodás formájában nyújt segítséget az <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Európai Bizottságnak</a>.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Tudjon meg többet a projektről az EU-OSHA weboldalán</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"mt";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Avviz: Proġett pilota tal-Parlament Ewropew dwar is-saħħa u s-sigurtà ta' ħaddiema akbar fl-età";"<p>   Il-proġett pilota Ewropew, <em>Xogħol aktar sigur u b'saħħtu f'kull età – is-sigurtà u s-saħħa fuq il-post tax-xogħol (OSH) fil-kuntest ta' forza tax-xogħol li qiegħda tixjieħ</em> qiegħed jinvestiga politika, strateġija, programmi u prattiki tal-OSH fl-Istati Membri tal-UE u lil hinn minnhom biex jassisti fi żvilupp ta' politika u jipprovdi eżempji ta' strateġiji u prattiki tajba. Il-fehmiet u l-esperjenzi mill-postijiet tax-xogħol se jikkontribwixxu biex jipprovdu stampa sħiħa ta' x'qiegħed isir u x'inhu meħtieġ.</p>  <p>   Il-proġett jappoġġa <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>talba mill-Parlament Ewropew</a>. L-EU-OSHA qiegħda tassisti lill-<a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Kummissjoni Ewropea</a> fl-implimentazzjoni tiegħu, permezz ta' ftehim ta' delega.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Aqra aktar dwar dan il-proġett fuq il-website tal-EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"sl";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Opomba: Pilotni projekt Evropskega parlamenta o zdravju in varnosti starejših delavcev";"<p>   Namen evropskega pilotnega projekta <em>Varnejše in bolj zdravo delo pri vseh starostih – zagotavljanje storitev v zvezi z varnostjo in zdravjem pri delu glede na staranje delovne sile</em> je preučiti politiko, strategijo, programe in prakse na področju varnosti in zdravja pri delu v državah članicah in drugod za pomoč pri oblikovanju politik ter zagotovitev primerov dobrih strategij in praks. Stališča in izkušnje z delovnih mest bodo prispevali k zagotovitvi celotne slike dogajanja in potrebnih ukrepov.</p>  <p>   Projekt podpira <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>zahtevo Evropskega parlamenta</a>. Agencija EU-OSHA pomaga <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Evropski komisiji</a> pri njegovi uresničitvi na podlagi sporazuma o prenosu pooblastil.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Več o tem projektu lahko preberete na spletni strani agencije EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"fi";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tiedote: Euroopan parlamentin ikääntyneiden työntekijöiden työterveyttä ja työturvallisuutta koskeva pilottihanke";"<p>   Eurooppalaisessa pilottihankkeessa <em>Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce (Turvallisempaa ja terveellisempää työtä kaikenikäisille – työsuojelu työvoiman ikääntyessä)</em> selvitetään työvoiman ikääntymistä koskevaa työsuojelupolitiikkaa, -strategioita, -ohjelmia ja -käytäntöjä EU:n jäsenvaltioissa ja laajemminkin. Tuloksista on apua politiikan kehittämisessä, ja ne tarjoavat esimerkkejä toimivista strategioista ja käytännöistä. Työpaikoilta saadut näkemykset ja kokemukset auttavat muodostamaan kokonaiskuvan käynnissä olevasta kehityksestä ja vallitsevista tarpeista.</p>  <p>   Hanke perustuu <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>Euroopan parlamentin esittämään pyyntöön</a>. EU-OSHA avustaa <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Euroopan komissiota</a> hankkeen toteuttamisessa valtuutussopimuksen nojalla.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Lue lisää hankkeesta EU-OSHAn verkkosivuilla</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"da";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Meddelelse: Europa-Parlamentets pilotprojekt om arbejdsmiljø blandt ældre arbejdstagere";"<p>   Et europæisk pilotprojekt, <em>Safer and healthier work at any age – occupational safety and health (OSH) in the context of an ageing workforce</em> undersøger politikker, strategier, programmer og praksis vedrørende sikkerhed og sundhed på arbejdspladsen i medlemsstaterne og andre lande for at bidrage til den politiske udvikling og give eksempler på gode strategier og god praksis. Synspunkter og erfaringer fra arbejdspladser vil bidrage til at give et bedre billede af, hvad der sker i øjeblikket, og hvad der er behov for.</p>  <p>   Projektet støtter en <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>anmodning fra Europa-Parlamentet</a>. EU-OSHA hjælper <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Europa-Kommissionen</a> med gennemførelsen via en delegationsaftale.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Læs mere om dette projekt på EU-OSHA's websted</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"sv";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Notis: Europaparlamentets pilotprojekt om hälsa och säkerhet för äldre arbetstagare";"<p>   Inom det europeiska pilotprojektet <em>Säkra och hälsosamma arbetsplatser för alla åldrar – arbetsmiljö i samband med en åldrande arbetskraft</em>, granskas arbetsmiljöpolitik, arbetsmiljöstrategier, arbetsmiljöprogram och arbetsmiljöåtgärder i och utanför EU:s medlemsländer för att ge stöd till framtagande av policyer och ge exempel på bra strategier och metoder. Synpunkter och erfarenheter från arbetsplatserna kommer att bidra till en helhetsbild av vad som redan görs och vad som behöver göras.</p>  <p>   Projektet är ett svar på en <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>begäran från Europaparlamentet</a>. Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyrån biträder <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Europeiska kommissionen</a> med genomförandet, genom ett avtal om delegering.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Läs mer om projektet på arbetsmiljöbyråns webbplats</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"sk";"/en/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers";"published";"2013-10-01 12:02:15";"2014-07-25 13:33:22";"2013-11-28 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Poznámka: Pilotný projekt Európskeho parlamentu v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia starších zamestnancov";"<p>   V rámci európskeho pilotného projektu <em>Bezpečnejšia a zdravšia práca v každom veku – bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia pri práci (BOZP) v súvislosti so starnúcou pracovnou silou</em> sa skúma politika, stratégia, programy a postupy v oblasti BOZP v členských štátoch i mimo nich s cieľom pomáhať pri rozvíjaní stratégie a poskytnúť príklady vhodných stratégií a osvedčených postupov. Názory a skúsenosti z pracovísk prispejú k vytvoreniu ucelenej predstavy o tom, čo sa deje a čo je potrebné vykonať.</p>  <p>   Projekt podporuje <a href=<@#&>http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/official-journal-of-the-european-union-l-56-29.02.2012-pbFXAL12056/downloads/FX-AL-12-056-EN-C/FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf?FileName=FXAL12056ENC_002.pdf&amp;SKU=FXAL12056ENC_PDF&amp;CatalogueNumber=FX-AL-12-056-EN-C<@#&>>žiadosť Európskeho parlamentu</a>. Agentúra EU-OSHA pomáha <a href=<@#&>http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=148&amp;langId=en<@#&>>Európskej komisii</a> pri realizácii projektu na základe dohody o delegovaní.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/priority_groups/ageingworkers/ep-osh-project<@#&>>Ďalšie informácie o tomto projekte sa nachádzajú na webovej stránke agentúry EU-OSHA</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/ep-osh-project-ageing-workers/EU-parliament.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"sl";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampanja za preprečevanje tveganj se bo končala z evropskim vrhom";"<p>   Kampanja agencije EU-OSHA „Partnerstvo za preprečevanje tveganj“ se bo uradno končala z vrhom kampanje za zdravo delovno okolje, ki bo potekal v Bilbau 11.&nbsp;in 12.&nbsp;novembra&nbsp;2013.</p>  <p>   Udeležili se ga bodo številni partnerji kampanje pa tudi vodilni evropski strokovnjaki za varnost in zdravje pri delu.</p>  <p>   Na vrhu bo razglašen tudi prvi dobitnik priznanja Evropske podjetniške mreže na področju varnosti in zdravja pri delu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Preberite sporočilo za javnost</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Spremljajte nas na Twitterju</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sl/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Več o vrhu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotografije z dogodka</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"sv";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampanjen för riskförebyggande arbete avslutas med EU-toppmöte";"<p>   Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyråns kampanj ”Samverkan för att förebygga” avslutas officiellt med toppmötet om ”Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv” i Bilbao den 11–12&nbsp;november 2013.</p>  <p>   Många av byråns kampanjpartner deltar tillsammans med ledande yrkesfolk från arbetsmiljöområdet.</p>  <p>   Mottagaren av den första arbetsmiljöutmärkelsen någonsin från Enterprise Europe Network kommer också att tillkännages under evenemanget.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Läs pressmeddelandet</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Följ oss på Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sv/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Mer om toppmötet</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Foton från evenemanget</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"sk";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampaňou za prevenciu rizík sa uzatvára európsky samit";"<p>   Kampaň agentúry EU-OSHA s názvom Spolupráca pri prevencii rizík sa oficiálne končí na samite o BOZP, ktorý sa uskutoční 11. - 12. novembra 2013 v Bilbau.</p>  <p>   Na tomto samite sa zúčastnia mnohí partneri kampane spolu s vedúcimi odborníkmi v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia pri práci v Európe.</p>  <p>   Na tomto podujatí bude tiež vyhlásený víťaz prvej ceny za BOZP v rámci siete Enterprise Europe Network (EEN).</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Prečítajte si tlačovú správu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Sledujte nás na Twitteri</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sk/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Viac informácií o samite</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotografie z podujatia</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
