"/mt/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"mt";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Il-kampanja għall-prevenzjoni tar-riskji tagħlaq b'summit Ewropew";"<p>   Il-kampanja tal-EU-OSHA <@#&>Naħdmu flimkien biex nevitaw ir-riskji<@#&> tasal uffiċjalment fi tmiemha bis-Summit dwar il-Postijiet tax-Xogħol Ħielsa mill-Periklu f'Bilbao fil-11 u t-12&nbsp;ta'&nbsp;Novembru&nbsp;2013.</p>  <p>   Ser jattendu diversi msieħba fil-kampanja tal-Aġenzija, flimkien ma' professjonisti Ewropej ewlenin fil-qasam tas-saħħa u s-sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol.</p>  <p>   F'dan is-summit ser jiġi żvelat ukoll ir-rebbieħ tal-ewwel premju OHS Network Enterprise Europe li qatt ingħata.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Aqra l-istqarrija għall-istampa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Segwina fuq Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/mt/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Aktar dwar is-summit</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Ritratti tal-avveniment</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"el";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Η εκστρατεία για την πρόληψη των κινδύνων στην εργασία ολοκληρώνεται με μια ευρωπαϊκή διάσκεψη";"<p>   Η εκστρατεία του EU-OSHA «Πρόληψη των κινδύνων στην εργασία με τη συμμετοχή όλων» ολοκληρώνεται επισήμως με τη Διάσκεψη για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασία στο Μπιλμπάο στις 11 και 12 Νοεμβρίου 2013.</p>  <p>   Στην εκδήλωση θα συμμετέχουν πολλοί εταίροι της εκστρατείας του Οργανισμού, καθώς και κορυφαίοι ευρωπαίοι επαγγελματίες στον τομέα της επαγγελματικής ασφάλειας και υγείας.</p>  <p>   Στο πλαίσιο της διάσκεψης, θα ανακοινωθεί επίσης ο νικητής του πρώτου βραβείου ΕΑΥ του Δικτύου «Enterprise Europe».</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Διαβάστε το δελτίο Τύπου</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Ακολουθήστε μας στο Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/el/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Περισσότερες πληροφορίες σχετικά με τη διάσκεψη</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Φωτογραφίες της εκδήλωσης</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"en";"";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Campaign for risk prevention closes with European summit";"<p>   EU-OSHA’s ‘Working together for risk prevention’ campaign officially ends with the Healthy Workplaces Summit in Bilbao on 11 and 12 November 2013.</p>  <p>   Many of the Agency’s campaign partners are in attendance, together with leading European occupational safety and health professionals.</p>  <p>   The winner of the first ever Enterprise Europe Network OSH award is also announced at the event.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Read the press release</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Follow us on Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>More on the summit</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Photos of the event</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"Campaign 2012-13";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"lt";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Rizikos mažinimo darbe kampanija baigiasi Europos aukščiausio lygio susitikimu.";"<p>   EU-OSHA kampanijos „Bendromis jėgomis mažinkime riziką darbe“ oficiali pabaiga – 2013 m. lapkričio 11–12 d. Bilbao mieste vyksiantis aukščiausio lygio susitikimas saugių darbo vietų tema.</p>  <p>   Susitikime dalyvaus dauguma Agentūros kampanijos partnerių, įskaitant geriausius Europos darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos specialistus.</p>  <p>   Renginio metu taip pat bus paskelbtas pirmą kartą skiriamo Europos įmonių tinklo apdovanojimo darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos srityje laimėtojas.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Skaitykite spaudos pranešimą</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Sekite mūsų naujienas Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lt/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Daugiau informacijos apie aukščiausio lygio susitikimą</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Renginio nuotraukos</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"ro";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Campania privind prevenirea riscurilor ia sfârşit în cadrul summit-ului european";"<p>   Campania „Împreună pentru prevenirea riscurilor” a EU-OSHA ia sfârşit în mod oficial în cadrul summit-ului privind locurile de muncă sigure şi sănătoase de la Bilbao din 11 şi 12 noiembrie 2013.</p>  <p>   Mulţi dintre partenerii de campanie ai agenţiei participă la acest summit alături de experţi europeni de seamă în domeniul securităţii şi sănătăţii la locul de muncă.</p>  <p>   De asemenea, în cadrul evenimentului va fi anunţat şi câştigătorul primului premiu SSM pentru promovarea Reţelei întreprinderilor europene.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Citiţi comunicatul de presă</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Urmaţi-ne pe Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/ro/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Mai multe despre summit</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotografii despre eveniment</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"pl";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Organizacja europejskiego szczytu na zakończenie kampanii „Partnerstwo dla prewencji”";"<p>   Kampania EU-OSHA „Partnerstwo dla prewencji” oficjalnie zakończy się podczas szczytu poświęconemu inicjatywie Zdrowe i bezpieczne miejsce pracy, który odbędzie się w Bilbao w dniach 11 i 12 listopada 2013 r.</p>  <p>   W szczycie weźmie udział wielu partnerów kampanii Agencji, a także wiodący europejscy eksperci w dziedzinie bezpieczeństwa i higieny pracy.</p>  <p>   Podczas szczytu wyłoniony zostanie również laureat pierwszej w historii nagrody w obszarze BHP przyznawanej przez Europejską Sieć Przedsiębiorczości.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Zapoznaj się z komunikatem prasowym</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Śledź nas na Twitterze</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pl/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Dodatkowe informacje na temat szczytu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Zdjęcia ze szczytu</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"is";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Herferð fyrir áhættuforvarnir lýkur með leiðtogafundi í Evrópu";"<p>   Herferð EU-OSHA „Vinnuvernd - allir vinna“ lýkur opinberlega með leiðtogafundi herferðarinnar í Bilbao 11. og 12. nóvember 2013.</p>  <p>   Margir af samstarfsaðilum stofnunarinnar í herferðinni taka þátt ásamt leiðandi sérfræðingum í Evrópu á sviði vinnuverndarmála.</p>  <p>   Einnig verður tilkynnt um fyrsta sigurvegara vinnuverndarverðlauna Fyrirtækjanets Evrópu á fundinum.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Lesa fréttatilkynninguna</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Fylgja okkur á Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/is/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Meira um fundinn</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Myndir af viðburðinum</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"it";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"La campagna per la prevenzione dei rischi termina con il vertice europeo";"<p>   La campagna <@#&>Lavoriamo insieme per la prevenzione dei rischi<@#&>, promossa dall'EU-OSHA, terminerà ufficialmente con il vertice sugli ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri, che si terrà a Bilbao l'11 e il 12 novembre 2013.</p>  <p>   Saranno presenti molti partner della campagna dell'Agenzia, insieme ai principali operatori europei del settore della sicurezza e della salute sul lavoro.</p>  <p>   Durante l'evento sarà anche proclamato il vincitore del premio SSL, conferito per la prima volta nell'ambito dell'iniziativa Enterprise Europe Network.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Leggi il comunicato stampa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Seguici su Twitter</a> #Vertice eu-osha</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/it/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Maggiori informazioni sul vertice</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Foto dell'evento</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"cs";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampaň v oblasti prevence rizik bude zakončena evropským summitem";"<p>   Kampaň agentury EU-OSHA s názvem Partnerství při prevenci rizik bude oficiálně zakončena summitem kampaně Zdravé pracoviště konaným ve dnech 11. a 12. listopadu 2013 ve španělském Bilbau.</p>  <p>   Zúčastní se jej mnoho partnerů kampaně agentury společně s předními evropskými odborníky na bezpečnost a ochranu zdraví při práci.</p>  <p>   Na summitu bude také vyhlášen vůbec první vítěz ceny Enterprise Europe Network za BOZP.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Přečíst tiskovou zprávu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Sledujte nás na Twitteru</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/cs/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Více o summitu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotografie ze summitu</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"hr";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampanja za prevenciju rizika završava europskim sastankom na vrhu";"<p>   EU-OSHA-ina kampanja „Raditi zajedno za prevenciju rizika” službeno završava sastankom na vrhu o zdravim radnim mjestima u Bilbau 11. i 12. studenoga 2013.</p> <p>   Prisustvuju joj mnogi od Agencijinih partnera u kampanji zajedno s vodećim europskim stručnjacima iz područja sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu.</p> <p>   Na događaju se također proglašava i dobitnik po prvi put dodijeljene nagrade iz područja sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu pod nazivom Enterprise Europe Network (EEN).</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Pročitajte priopćenje za medije</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Pratite nas na Twitteru</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Saznajte više o sastanku na vrhu</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotografije događaja</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"de";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Abschluss der Kampagne zur Risikoprävention bei europäischem Gipfeltreffen";"<p>   Die EU-OSHA-Kampagne „Partnerschaft für Prävention“ endet offiziell mit dem Gipfeltreffen Gesunde Arbeitsplätze&nbsp;2013, das am 11./12.&nbsp;November&nbsp;2013 in Bilbao stattfindet.</p>  <p>   Zahlreiche Kampagnenpartner der Agentur sowie führende europäische Fachleute aus dem Bereich Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit werden erwartet.</p>  <p>   Außerdem werden auf der Veranstaltung die Gewinner des erstmals verliehenen Preises für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit von Enterprise Europe Network (EEN) bekanntgegeben.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Pressemitteilung lesen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Folgen Sie uns bei Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/de/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Mehr über das Gipfeltreffen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotos von der Veranstaltung</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"da";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampagnen om risikoforebyggelse slutter med det europæiske topmøde";"<p>   EU-OSHA’s kampagne <@#&>Samarbejde om risikoforebyggelse<@#&> slutter officielt med topmødet om sunde arbejdspladser i Bilbao den 11.-12. november 2013.</p>  <p>   Mange af agenturets kampagnepartnere vil være til stede sammen med førende europæiske eksperter inden for sikkerhed og sundhed på arbejdspladsen.</p>  <p>   Vinderen af Enterprise Europe Networks (EEN) første pris nogensinde for sikkerhed og sundhed på arbejdspladsen afsløres også ved arrangementet.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Læs pressemeddelelsen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Følg os på Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/da/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Mere om topmødet</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Billeder fra arrangementet</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"fr";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Clôture de la campagne pour la prévention des risques par un sommet européen";"<p>   La campagne «Ensemble pour la prévention des risques» de l'EU-OSHA se clôture officiellement avec le sommet «Lieux de travail sains» qui se tiendra à Bilbao les 11 et 12 novembre 2013.</p>  <p>   De nombreux partenaires de campagne de l'Agence y participent aux côtés d'experts européens de haut niveau dans le domaine de la sécurité et la santé au travail.</p>  <p>   Le lauréat du premier prix SST du «Réseau Entreprise Europe» sera également connu lors de l'événement.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Lire le communiqué de presse</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Nous suivre sur Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fr/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>En savoir plus sur le sommet</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Photos de l'événement</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"bg";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Кампанията за превенция на риска се закрива със среща на върха";"<p>   Кампанията на ЕU-OSHA <@#&>Съвместна работа за превенция на риска<@#&> завършва официално със срещата на върха <@#&>Здравословни работни места<@#&> в Билбао на 11 и 12 ноември 2013 г.</p>  <p>   Ще присъстват много от партньорите на кампанията на Агенцията, заедно с водещи европейски специалисти по безопасност и здраве при работа.</p>  <p>   Удостоеният за първи път досега с наградата за БЗР на Европейската мрежа за предприемачество (ЕМП) също ще бъде обявен на тази среща.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Прочетете съобщението за медиите</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Следeте ни в Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/bg/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Допълнителна информация за срещата на върха</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Снимки от мероприятието</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"nl";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Campagne voor risicopreventie wordt afgesloten met Europese topbijeenkomst";"<p>   EU-OSHA's campagne 'Samen sterk voor preventie' wordt officieel afgesloten met een topbijeenkomst in Bilbao op 11 en 12 november 2013.</p>  <p>   Veel van de campagnepartners van het Agentschap maken hun opwachting, evenals toonaangevende Europese deskundigen op het gebied van veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk.</p>  <p>   Tijdens het evenement wordt ook de winnaar van de allereerste Enterprise Europe Network Award voor veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk aangekondigd.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Lees het persbericht</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Volg ons op Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/nl/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Meer informatie over de top</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Foto's van het evenement</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"pt";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"A campanha de prevenção dos riscos profissionais encerra com a Cimeira Europeia";"<p>   A campanha da EU-OSHA «Juntos na prevenção dos riscos profissionais» termina oficialmente com a Cimeira «Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis» em Bilbau, em 11 e 12 de novembro de 2013.</p>  <p>   A Cimeira contará com a presença de muitos dos parceiros da campanha da Agência, bem de peritos de alto nível da área da segurança e saúde no trabalho.</p>  <p>   O vencedor da primeira edição do prémio SST da Rede Europeia de Empresas («Enterprise Europe Network») será igualmente anunciado no âmbito do evento.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Ler o comunicado de imprensa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Siga-nos no Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pt/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Mais sobre a cimeira</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotos do evento</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"et";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Riskide ennetamise kampaania lõpeb Euroopa tippkohtumisega";"<p>   EU-OSHA kampaania „Ennetame riske üheskoos” lõpeb ametlikult 11. ja 12. novembril 2013 Bilbaos toimuva tervislike töökohtade tippkohtumisega.</p>  <p>   Osalevad paljud EU-OSHA kampaania partnerid, samuti juhtivad Euroopa tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu spetsialistid.</p>  <p>   Tippkohtumisel kuulutatakse välja ka Euroopa ettevõtlusvõrgustiku esmakordse tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu auhinna võitja.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Pressiteade</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Jälgi meid Twitteris</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/et/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Rohkem teavet tippkohtumisest</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Ürituse fotod</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"es";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"La campaña de prevención de riesgos concluye con la Cumbre europea";"<p>   La campaña “Trabajando juntos para la prevención de riesgos” de EU-OSHA finaliza oficialmente con la Cumbre Trabajos Saludables en Bilbao los días 11 y 12 de noviembre de 2013.</p>  <p>   Se cuenta con la presencia de muchos de los socios de la campaña organizada por la Agencia, junto con los principales profesionales europeos de los ámbitos de la seguridad y salud laboral.</p>  <p>   Asimismo, se da a conocer el nombre del ganador del primer premio de SST de la Enterprise Europe Network en el marco de este evento.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Lea el comunicado de prensa</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Síganos en Twitter</a>&nbsp; #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/es/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Más información sobre la Cumbre</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Fotos del evento</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"no";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kampanjen for risikoforebygging runder av med et europeisk toppmøte";"<p>   EU-OSHAs kampanje <@#&>Samarbeid, ledelse og medvirkning<@#&> avsluttes offisielt med toppmøtet for Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø i Bilbao den 11. og 12. november 2013.</p>  <p>   Mange av Byråets kampanjepartnere vil delta, sammen med ledende europeiske HMS-fagfolk.</p>  <p>   Vinneren av den aller første HMS-prisen Enterprise Europe Network vil bli annonsert på toppmøtet.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Les pressemeldingen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Følg oss på Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/no/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Mer om toppmøtet</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Bilder fra arrangementet</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"lv";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Risku novēršanas kampaņa noslēgsies ar Eiropas samitu";"<p>   EU-OSHA rīkotā kampaņa “Novērsīsim darba vides riskus kopā” oficiāli beigsies ar Drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu kampaņas samitu, kas notiks Bilbao 2013. gada 11. un 12. novembrī.</p>  <p>   Pasākumu apmeklēs daudzi Aģentūras kampaņas partneri, kā arī Eiropas darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības vadošie speciālisti.</p>  <p>   Pasākumā paziņos pirmās Eiropas Biznesa atbalsta tīkla DDVA balvas ieguvēju.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Izlasiet paziņojumu presei</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Sekojiet mūsu jaunumiem sociālajā tīklā Twitter</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lv/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Plašāka informācija par samitu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Pasākuma fotoattēli</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"fi";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Riskienehkäisykampanja päättyy eurooppalaiseen kokoukseen";"<p>   EU-OSHAn kampanja ”Yhteistyöllä riskit hallintaan” päättyy virallisesti Terveellinen työ -kokoukseen, joka pidetään Bilbaossa 11. ja 12. marraskuuta 2013.</p>  <p>   Monet viraston kampanjakumppaneista osallistuvat kokoukseen Euroopan johtavien työsuojeluasiantuntijoiden kanssa.</p>  <p>   Kokouksessa julkistetaan myös Yrittäjyyden Eurooppa-verkoston ensimmäisen työsuojelupalkinnon voittaja.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Lue lehdistötiedote</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Seuraa meitä Twitterissä</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fi/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Lisätietoja kokouksesta</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>Valokuvia tapahtumasta</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"hu";"/en/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit";"published";"2013-10-21 11:20:34";"2014-07-25 13:07:12";"2013-11-11 14:00:00";"dimitrovan";"A kockázatmegelőzési kampány európai csúcsértekezlettel zárul";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA „Együtt a kockázatok megelőzéséért” című kampánya a 2013. november 11–12-én Bilbaóban tartandó nagyszabású konferenciával hivatalosan is véget ér.</p>  <p>   Az Ügynökség számos kampánypartnere és Európa vezető munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségvédelmi szakemberei is jelen lesznek az eseményen.</p>  <p>   Itt jelentik be az Európai Vállalkozói Hálózat (EEN) most először odaítélt munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségvédelmi díjának nyertesét is.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/press/press-releases/worlds-largest-occupational-safety-and-health-campaign-closes-following-a-record-level-of-involvement<@#&>>Sajtóközlemény</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Kövessen bennünket a Twitteren</a> #eu_oshaSummit</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/hu/get-involved/summit-2013#mainContent#appendix<@#&>>Bővebben a csúcstalálkozóról</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/photos/campaigns/healthy-workplaces-summit-2013<@#&>>A rendezvény fényképei</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/campaign-for-risk-prevention-closes-with-european-summit/CLEV 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"pl";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Zdrowe miejsca pracy – w więzieniu?";"<p>   Film „C(us)todians” zdobył nagrodę filmową „Zdrowe miejsca pracy” 2013 na Międzynarodowym Festiwalu DOK Lepizig. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   „C(us)todians” przedstawia codzienność w brazylijskim więzieniu z punktu widzenia strażników – to obraz trudnych warunków skłaniający do dyskusji o zagrożeniach psychospołecznych w miejscu pracy, które staną się tematem kolejnej kampanii EU-OSHA w latach 2014–2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Komunikat prasowy</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Więcej informacji na temat filmu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Nagroda filmowa „Zdrowe miejsca pracy”</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Filmy</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"fr";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Lieux de travail sains - dans une prison?";"<p>   «C(us)todians» a été déclaré lauréat du Prix du film «Lieux de travail sains»&nbsp;2013 au festival international de Leipzig du film documentaire et du film d'animation. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   C(us)todians dépeint la vie quotidienne dans une prison brésilienne de la perspective des gardiens. Ce film fait le portrait d'un environnement de travail complexe et suscite le débat sur les risques psychosociaux sur le lieu de travail, le thème de la prochaine campagne «Lieux de travail sains» 2014-2015 de l'EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Lire le communiqué de presse</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>En savoir plus sur le film</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Prix du film «Lieux de travail sains»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Vidéos</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"bg";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Здравословни работни места - в затвора?";"<p>   Филмът С(us)todians (<@#&>Надзиратели<@#&>) беte обявен за носител на филмовата награда на тема <@#&>Здравословни работни места<@#&> за 2013 г. на Международния фестивал DOK Лайпциг. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Филмът С(us)todians разказва за ежедневието в бразилски затвор от гледната точка на надзирателите, описвайки изпълнена с трудности работна среда и приканвайки към дискусия на психо-социалните рискове на работното място - темата на следващата кампания на EU-OSHA <@#&>Здравословни работни места<@#&> за 2014-2015 г.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Прочетете съобщението за медиите</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Научете повече за филма</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Филмови награди на тема <@#&>Здравословни работни места<@#&></a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Видеоматериали</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"sv";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv – i ett fängelse?";"<p>   ”C(us)todians” har utsetts till mottagare av 2013 års filmpris på temat ”Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv” vid den internationella dokumentärfilmfestivalen DOK i Leipzig.  </p> <p>   ”C(us)todians” handlar om det dagliga livet i ett brasilianskt fängelse sett ur fångvaktarnas synvinkel. Filmen skildrar en krävande arbetsmiljö och väcker diskussion om psykosociala risker i arbetet, en fråga som också utgör temat för arbetsmiljöbyråns nästa kampanj om ett hälsosamt arbetsliv som pågår 2014–2015.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Läs pressmeddelandet</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Mer om filmen</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmpriset ”Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv”</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videor</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"sk";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Zdravé pracoviská – vo väzení?";"<p>   Film C(us)todians vyhlásili za víťaza filmovej ceny Zdravé pracoviská 2013 na medzinárodnom festivale DOK v Lipsku. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Film C(us)todians zachytáva každodenný život v brazílskom väzení z pohľadu dozorcov, pričom zobrazuje náročné pracovné prostredie a vyvoláva diskusiu o psychologických rizikách na pracovisku, ktoré sú témou nasledujúcej kampane agentúry EU-OSHA Zdravé pracoviská 2014 – 2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Tlačová správa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Viac o filme</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmová cena Zdravé pracoviská</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videá</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"mt";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Postijiet tax-Xogħol Ħielsa mill-Periklu - f'ħabs?";"<p>   <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&> tħabbar bħala r-rebbieħ tal-Premju tal-2013 għall-Films dwar il-Postijiet tax-Xogħol Ħielsa mill-Periklu fil-Festival Interazzjonali ta' DOK Leipzig. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   C(us)todians, juri l-ħajja ta' kuljum f'ħabs Brażiljan mill-perspettiva tal-gwardjani, fejn tingħata stampa ta' ambjent ta' xogħol mimli sfidi u jqajjem diskussjoni dwar ir-riskji psikosoċjali fuq il-post tax-xogħol, it-tema tal-Kampanja li jmiss dwar il-Postijiet tax-Xogħol Ħielsa mill-Periklu tal-EU-OSHA għall-2014-2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Aqra l-istqarrija għall-istampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Aktar dwar il-film</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Il-Premju għall-Films dwar il-Postijiet tax-Xogħo Ħielsa mill-Periklu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Vidjows</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"pt";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Locais de trabalho saudáveis - numa prisão?";"<p>   O filme «A Gente / C(us)todians foi o vencedor do Prémio Cinematográfico «Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis» 2013, no Festival Internacional de Leipzig de Cinema Documental e Animado (DOK). &nbsp;</p>  <p>   O documentário premiado descreve a vida quotidiana numa prisão brasileira do ponto de vista dos guardas, retratando um ambiente laboral difícil e promovendo o debate sobre os riscos psicossociais presentes no local de trabalho, que será o tema da próxima Campanha «Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis» 2014-2015 da EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Leia o comunicado de imprensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Saiba mais sobre o filme</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Prémio Cinematográfico «Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Vídeos</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"no";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø – i et fengsel?";"<p>   <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&> ble kåret til vinner av Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø-filmprisen for 2013 på den internasjonale DOK Leipzig-festivalen. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Filmen C(us)todians omhandler dagliglivet i et brasiliansk fengsel fra fengselsbetjeningens ståsted. Den skildrer et utfordrende arbeidsmiljø og skaper debatt om psykososial risiko på arbeidsplassen, som er temaet for EU-OSHAs neste Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø-kampanje for 2014–2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Les pressemeldingen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Mer om filmen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø-filmprisen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videoer</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"lv";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vai cietums ir droša un veselībai nekaitīga darbavieta?";"<p>   2013.&nbsp;gada Drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu filmu balvu Starptautiskajā <em>DOK Leipzig</em> festivālā ieguva <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&>. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Šī filma ataino ikdienas dzīvi kādā Brazīlijas cietumā no uzraugu skatpunkta, proti, pārbaudījumiem pilnu darba vidi, sekmējot diskusijas par psihosociālo risku darbavietā, kas ir <em>EU-OSHA</em> 2014.–2015.&nbsp;gada Drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu kampaņas tēma.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Lasīt informāciju presei</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Vairāk par filmu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu filmu balva</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Video</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"da";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sunde arbejdspladser - i et fængsel?";"<p>   <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&> blev udråbt som vinderen af filmprisen 2013 for sunde arbejdspladser ved den internationale DOK Leipzigfestival. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&> viser dagligdagen i et brasiliansk fængsel set med fængselspersonalets øjne. Den tegner et portræt af det udfordrende arbejdsmiljø og fremmer en diskussion om psykosociale risici på arbejdspladsen, som er temaet for EU-OSHA’s næste arbejdsmiljøkampagne 2014-2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Læs pressemeddelelsen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Mere om filmen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmprisen for sunde arbejdspladser</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videoer</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"fi";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Terveellinen työ - vankilassa?";"<p>   Elokuva <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&> julistettiin Terveellinen työ -elokuvapalkinnon 2013 voittajaksi Leipzigin kansainvälisillä dokumentti- ja animaatioelokuvan DOK Leipzig -festivaaleilla. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   C(us)todians kuvaa jokapäiväistä elämää brasilialaisessa vankilassa vartijoiden näkökulmasta. Dokumentti paljastaa haastavan työympäristön ja edistää keskustelua työympäristön psykososiaalisista riskeistä, jotka ovat Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusviraston seuraavan Terveellinen työ -kampanjan 2014–2015 teema.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Lue lehdistötiedote</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Lisätietoja elokuvasta</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Terveellinen työ -elokuvapalkinto</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videot</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"hu";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Egészséges munkahelyek – egy börtönben?";"<p>   A „C(us)todians” (Őrök) című film nyerte a 2013. évi Egészséges Munkahely Filmdíjat a Lipcsei Nemzetközi Dokumentum- és Animációs Filmfesztiválon (DOK Leipzig). &nbsp;</p>  <p>   A film egy brazil börtön hétköznapjait mutatja be a börtönőrök szemszögéből ábrázolva e kihívásokkal teli munkakörnyezetet, elősegítve ezáltal a munkahelyi pszichoszociális kockázatokról szóló vitát, amely az EU-OSHA következő, 2014–2015-re szóló Egészséges Munkahelyek kampányának témája.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Sajtóközlemény</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Tudjon meg többet a filmről!</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Egészséges Munkahelyek Filmdíj</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videók</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"en";"";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Healthy Workplaces - in a prison?";"<p>   <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&> was announced the winner of the 2013 Healthy Workplaces Film Award at the International DOK Leipzig Festival. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   C(us)todians depicts daily life in a Brazilian prison from the guards' point of view, portraying a challenging working environment and fostering discussion on psychosocial risks in the workplace, the theme of EU-OSHA’s next Healthy Workplaces Campaign 2014-2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>More about the film</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Healthy Workplaces Film Award</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videos</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"Campaign 2012-13";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"is";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vinnuvernd er allra hagur - í fangelsi?";"<p>   „C(us)todians“ var tilkynntur sigurvegari kvikmyndaverðlauna herferðarinnar Vinnuvernd er allra hagur 2013 á alþjóðlegu DOK Leipzig hátíðinni. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   C(us)todians lýsir daglegu lífi í brasilísku fangelsi frá sjónarhorni fangavarðanna og sýnir þannig krefjandi vinnuumhverfi og fjallar um sálfélagslegar áhættur á vinnustaðnum, en það er þema næstu herferðar EU-OSHA Vinnuvernd er allra hagur 2014-2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Lesa fréttatilkynninguna</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Meira um myndina</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Kvikmyndaverðlaun herferðarinnar</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Myndbönd</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"it";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri: in carcere?";"<p>   <@#&>C(us)todians<@#&> è stato proclamato vincitore del premio cinematografico Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri 2013 durante il Festival internazionale DOK di Lipsia. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   C(us)todians parte dal punto di vista dei sorveglianti per portare in scena la vita quotidiana in un carcere brasiliano, descrivendo un ambiente di lavoro impegnativo e promuovendo il dibattito sui rischi psicosociali sul luogo di lavoro, l'argomento della prossima campagna Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri 2014-2015 dell'EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Leggi il comunicato stampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Ulteriori informazioni sul film</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Premio cinematografico Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Video</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"lt";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Saugios darbo vietos – kalėjime?";"<p>   2013&nbsp;m. saugių darbo vietų kino apdovanojimas tarptautiniame festivalyje „DOK Leipzig“ atiteko filmui „Mes, kalėjimo sargai“ („C(us)todians“). &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Šiame filme rodoma Brazilijos kalėjimo kasdienybė jo prižiūrėtojų akimis. Filme atskleidžiamos sunkios darbo sąlygos kalėjime. Jis skatina diskutuoti apie psichosocialinę riziką darbe, kuri yra ir būsimos 2014–2015&nbsp;m. EU-OSHA Saugių darbo vietų kampanijos tema.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Skaitykite pranešimą spaudai</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Daugiau apie filmą</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Saugių darbo vietų kino apdovanojimas</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Vaizdo medžiaga</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"ro";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Locuri de muncă sigure şi sănătoase – în închisoare?";"<p>   Filmul „C(us)todians” a fost desemnat câștigătorul Premiului de film dedicat locurilor de muncă sigure şi sănătoase 2013, în cadrul Festivalului internațional DOK de la Leipzig. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   „C(us)todians” descrie viața cotidiană într-o închisoare din Brazilia din punctul de vedere al gardienilor, ilustrând un mediu de lucru dificil și încurajând discuțiile pe marginea riscurilor psihosociale la locul de muncă, acestea reprezentând tema următoarei campanii EU-OSHA „Locuri de muncă sigure și sănătoase” 2014-2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Comunicat de presă</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Mai multe detalii despre film</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Premiul de film dedicat locurilor de muncă sigure şi sănătoase</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Materiale video</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"hr";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Zdrava radna mjesta – u zatvoru?";"<p>   Film „Čuvari” proglašen je dobitnikom filmske nagrade Zdrava radna mjesta 2013. na Međunarodnom festivalu DOK Leipzig.  </p> <p>   Film Čuvari oslikava svakodnevni život u brazilskom zatvoru s gledišta čuvara, zorno prikazujući izazovno radno okruženje i potičući raspravu o psihosocijalnim rizicima na radnome mjestu, što je tema EU-OSHA-ine sljedeće kampanje Zdrava radna mjesta 2014. – 2015.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Pročitajte priopćenje za tisak</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Detaljnije o filmu</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmska nagrada Zdrava radna mjesta</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videozapisi</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"de";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Gesunde Arbeitsplätze – in einem Gefängnis?";"<p>   Aly Muritibas „C(us)todians“ wurde auf dem Internationalen Leipziger Festival für Dokumentar- und Animationsfilm (DOK&nbsp;Leipzig) mit dem Filmpreis „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze&nbsp;2013“ ausgezeichnet. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Der Film schildert den Alltag in einem brasilianischen Gefängnis aus Sicht des Wachpersonals und zeigt dabei nicht nur ein anspruchsvolles und schwieriges Arbeitsumfeld, sondern regt auch zu Diskussionen über die psychosozialen Risiken bei der Arbeit –&nbsp;dem Thema der nächsten Kampagne „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“ 2014-2015 der EU-OSHA&nbsp;– an.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Pressemitteilung lesen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Mehr Informationen zum Film</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmpreis „Gesunde Arbeitsplätze“</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videos</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"es";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Lugares de trabajo saludables: ¿en una cárcel?";"<p>   C(us)todians se proclamó vencedora del Galardón Cinematográfico Lugares de Trabajo Saludables 2013 en el Festival Internacional DOK Leipzig. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   C(us)todians describe la vida cotidiana en una prisión brasileña desde el punto de vista de los guardias. Además de retratar un ambiente laboral complejo, promueve el debate sobre los riesgos psicosociales en el lugar de trabajo, tema de la próxima Campaña de Lugares de Trabajo Saludables de la EU-OSHA, en 2014-2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Lea el comunicado de prensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Ampliar información sobre la película</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Galardón Cinematográfico «Lugares de Trabajo Saludables»</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Vídeos</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"nl";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Gezonde werkplekken – in een gevangenis?";"<p>   <@#&>C(us)todians uitgeroepen tot winnaar van de Filmprijs Gezonde Werkplekken 2013 tijdens het internationale filmfestival DOK Leipzig. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   In C(us)todians wordt het dagelijkse leven in een Braziliaanse gevangenis getoond vanuit het perspectief van de bewakers. De film portretteert een moeilijke werkomgeving en voedt de discussie over psychosociale risico's op de werkplek, het thema van de volgende campagne 'Een gezonde werkplek' (2014-2015) van EU-OSHA.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Lees het persbericht</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Meer over de film</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmprijs Gezonde Werkplekken</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Video's</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"cs";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Zdravé pracoviště – ve vězení?";"<p>   Vítězným snímkem filmové ceny v rámci kampaně Zdravé pracoviště 2013 byl na mezinárodním festivalu DOK Leipzig vyhlášen film „C(us)todians”. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Film C(us)todians zobrazuje každodenní život v brazilském vězení z pohledu příslušníků vězeňské stráže. Líčí náročné pracovní prostředí a podněcuje diskuzi o psychosociálních rizicích na pracovišti, která jsou tématem příští kampaně Zdravé pracoviště agentury EU-OSHA v letech 2014–2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Přečtěte si tiskovou zprávu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Více o filmu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmová cena v rámci kampaně Zdravé pracoviště</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videa</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"et";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tervislikud töökohad – ka vanglas?";"<p>   Festivalil DOK Leipzig kuulutati 2013. aasta tervislike töökohtade filmiauhinna võidufilmiks „C(us)todians”. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Filmis „C(us)todians” näidatakse valvuri vaatenurgast igapäevaelu Brasiilia vanglas, kujutades keerukat töökeskkonda ja arutledes töökoha psühhosotsiaalsete riskide üle, mis on ka EU-OSHA järgmise tervislike töökohtade kampaania (2014–2015) teema.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Pressiteade</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Filmi lisateave</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Tervislike töökohtade filmiauhind</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videod</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"el";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώροι εργασίας - σε σωφρονιστικό κατάστημα;";"<p>   Το βραβείο καλύτερης ταινίας για το 2013 απονεμήθηκε στο ντοκιμαντέρ «C(us)todians» στο πλαίσιο του Διεθνούς Φεστιβάλ DOK Leipzig. &nbsp;</p>  <p>   Το ντοκιμαντέρ «C(us)todians» περιγράφει την καθημερινή ζωή των υπαλλήλων ενός σωφρονιστικού καταστήματος της Βραζιλίας, σκιαγραφώντας το απαιτητικό εργασιακό τους περιβάλλον και τροφοδοτώντας τη συζήτηση για τους ψυχοκοινωνικούς κινδύνους στον χώρο εργασίας, οι οποίοι και αποτελούν το θέμα της επόμενης εκστρατείας «Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώροι Εργασίας» που διοργανώνει ο EU-OSHAγια την περίοδο 2014-2015.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Διαβάστε το δελτίο Τύπου</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Περισσότερα για το ντοκιμαντέρ</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Κινηματογραφικά βραβεία για τους ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώρους εργασίας</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Βίντεο</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"sl";"/en/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig";"published";"2013-11-04 12:11:15";"2014-07-25 13:06:09";"2013-11-07 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Zdravo delovno okolje – v zaporu?";"<p>   „C(us)todians“ je bil na mednarodnem festivalu DOK v Leipzigu razglašen za dobitnika filmske nagrade Zdravo delovno okolje za leto 2013.  </p> <p>   Film upodablja vsakdanje življenje v brazilskem zaporu z vidika varnostnikov, pri čemer prikazuje delovno okolje, ki je polno izzivov, ter spodbuja razpravo o  psihosocialnih tveganjih na delovnem mestu, kar bo tema naslednje kampanje agencije EU-OSHA Zdravo delovno okolje 2014–15.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig<@#&>>Preberite sporočilo za javnost</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://grafoaudiovisual.com/movie/a-gente/<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Več o filmu</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Filmska nagrada Zdravo delovno okolje</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA93C2FAA58F5F484<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Videoposnetki</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/c-us-todians-secures-fifth-edition-of-healthy-workplaces-film-award-in-leipzig/Aly_Muritiba.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"mt";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"L-EU-OSHA tipparteċipa fil-fiera kummerċjali A+A 2013 għas-sikurezza u s-sigurtà";"<p>   Mill-5 sat-8 ta' Novembru 2013 l-EU-OSHA se tipparteċipa fil-fiera kummerċjali A+A f'Düsseldorf, il-Ġermanja. A+A hija l-akbar fiera kummerċjali speċjalizzata fid-dinja għas-sikurezza u s-sigurtà.</p> <p>   Din is-sena, il-kwistjonijiet ewlenin jinkludu l-ġestjoni korporattiva tas-saħħa u t-terapija tal-istress psikoloġiku.</p> <p>   L-EU-OSHA tipparteċipa f'seminar iddedikat għat-trasport u torganizza skrining u dibattitu ta' Work Hard - Play Hard, rebbieħ tal-premju għall-film dwar Postijiet tax-Xogħol Ħielsa mill-Periklu.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>L-attivitajiet tal-EU-OSHA fil-fiera</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>It-trejler uffiċjali Work Hard – Play Hard</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"sl";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Agencija EU-OSHA na trgovskem sejmu za varnost in zaščito A+A 2013";"<p>   Agencija EU-OSHA se bo od 5. do 8. novembra 2013 udeležila trgovskega sejma za varnost in zaščito A+A 2013 v nemškem Düseldorfu.  Gre za največji specializirani sejem za varnost in zaščito na svetu.</p> <p>   Glavni letošnji temi sta upravljanje zdravja v podjetjih in zdravljenje psihološkega stresa.</p> <p>   Predstavniki agencije se bodo udeležili seminarja o prevozu in organizirali predvajanje filma Work Hard – Play Hard, dobitnika filmske nagrade na temo zdravo delovno okolje.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>Dejavnosti agencije EU-OSHA na sejmu</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>Uradni predstavitveni film Work Hard – Play Hard.</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"sv";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Arbetsmiljöbyrån deltar i handelsmässan A+A 2013 för skydd och säkerhet";"<p>   Den 5–8 november deltar arbetsmiljöbyrån i handelsmässan A+A i Düsseldorf i Tyskland. A+A är världens största handelsmässa som är specialiserad på skydd och säkerhet.</p> <p>   I år är några av huvudfrågorna främjande av hälsa på arbetsplatsen och behandling av psykisk stress.</p> <p>   Arbetsmiljöbyrån deltar i ett seminarium om transporter och anordnar en visning och debatt av Work Hard – Play Hard, filmen som fått Ett hälsosamt arbetslivs filmpris.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>Arbetsmiljöbyrån på mässan</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>Den officiella trailern till Work Hard – Play Hard</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"sk";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Agentúra EU-OSHA sa predstaví na veľtrhu A+A 2013 zameranom na bezpečnosť";"<p>   Agentúra EU-OSHA sa od 5. do 8. novembra 2013 zúčastní na veľtrhu A+A 2013 v nemeckom Düsseldorfe. Ide o najväčší špecializovaný veľtrh na svete zameraný na oblasť bezpečnosti.</p> <p>   Medzi tohtoročné hlavné témy patria riadenie ochrany zdravia v podniku a terapia psychologického stresu. </p> <p>   Agentúra EU-OSHA sa zúčastní na seminári venovanom doprave, zorganizuje premietanie a následnú diskusiu o filme Work Hard – Play Hard, ktorý zvíťazil v súťaži o filmovú cenu v rámci kampane Zdravé pracoviská.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>Činnosti agentúry EU-OSHA na veľtrhu</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>Oficiálna ukážka filmu Work Hard – Play Hard.</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"el";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ο EU-OSHA συμμετέχει στην εμπορική έκθεση A+A 2013 με θέμα την ασφάλεια και την προστασία";"<p>   Από τις 5 έως τις 8 Νοεμβρίου 2013 ο EU-OSHA θα συμμετάσχει στην εμπορική έκθεση A+A , η οποία θα πραγματοποιηθεί στο Ντύσελντορφ της Γερμανίας.  Η A+A είναι η μεγαλύτερη εμπορική έκθεση ειδικά αφιερωμένη στην ασφάλεια και την προστασία.</p> <p>   Μεταξύ των σημαντικότερων θεμάτων εφέτος περιλαμβάνονται η εταιρική διαχείριση της υγείας και η θεραπεία του ψυχολογικού άγχους. </p> <p>   O EU-OSHA συμμετέχει σε σεμινάριο που είναι αφιερωμένο στις μεταφορές και διοργανώνει την προβολή της ταινίας Work Hard – Play Hard, νικήτριας του διαγωνισμού καλύτερης ταινίας για τους ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώρους εργασίας, ενώ θα ακολουθήσει συζήτηση σχετικά με το θέμα.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>Δραστηριότητες του EU-OSHA στην έκθεση</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>Επίσημο τρέιλερ της ταινίας Work Hard – Play Hard.</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"en";"";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA takes part in A+A 2013 trade fair for safety and security";"<p>   From 5 to 8 November 2013 EU-OSHA takes part in the A+A trade fair in Düsseldorf, Germany. A+A is the world's largest specialist trade fair for safety and security.</p>  <p>   Core issues this year include corporate health management and therapy of psychological stress.</p>  <p>   EU-OSHA takes part in a seminar dedicated to transport and organises a screening and debate of Work Hard – Play Hard, winner of the Healthy Workplaces film award.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>EU-OSHA activities at the fair</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>Work Hard – Play Hard official trailer</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"pl";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"EU-OSHA uczestniczy w targach pracy A+A 2013 w zakresie bezpieczeństwa i ochrony";"<p>   W dniach 5-8 listopada 2013 r. EU-OSHA weźmie udział w targach A+A w Düsseldorfie (Niemcy). A+A są największymi targami specjalistycznymi w zakresie bezpieczeństwa i ochrony.</p> <p>   Kluczowe tematy w tym roku obejmują zarządzanie zdrowiem w organizacji oraz leczenie stresu psychologicznego.</p> <p>   EU-OSHA uczestniczy w seminarium poświęconym transportowi oraz organizuje projekcję i debatę poświęconą filmowi „Work Hard - Play Hard”, który zdobył nagrodę filmową „Zdrowe miejsca pracy”.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>Działania EU-OSHA na targach</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>„Work Hard – Play Hard” – oficjalny zwiastun</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"fr";"/en/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security";"published";"2013-10-03 16:22:09";"2014-07-25 14:01:45";"2013-10-30 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"L'EU-OSHA participe au salon A+A 2013 sur la sécurité.";"<p>   Du 5 au 8 novembre 2013, l'EU-OSHA participera au salon A+A, à Düsseldorf (Allemagne). A+A est le plus grand salon du monde spécialisé dans la sécurité.</p> <p>   Parmi les questions fondamentales abordées cette année, figurent la gestion de la santé dans les entreprises et la thérapie du stress psychologique.</p> <p>   L'EU-OSHA participe à un séminaire consacré aux transports et organise une projection, suivie d'un débat, du film  Work Hard – Play Hard, vainqueur du prix Lieux de travail sains.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/promotional_material/AA-Dusseldorf-2013/view<@#&>>Activités de l'EU-OSHA au salon</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeLY9y6VP2U<@#&>>Bande-annonce officielle du film Work Hard - Play Hard.</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/eu-osha-takes-part-in-a-a-2013-trade-fair-for-safety-and-security/napo-AA-fair.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
