Astoņās nominētajās filmās ir iekļauti dažādi ar darbu saistīti temati, uzsverot darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības nozīmīgumu darbavietā.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/competitions/hw_film_award_2013/index_html<@#&>>Uzzināt vairāk par Drošu un veselībai nekaitīgu darbavietu filmu balvu</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.dok-leipzig.de/dok/press/pressemeldungen-2013/?lang=en&amp;/?lang=en&amp;<@#&>>Lasīt paziņojumu presei par DOK Leipzig festivālu</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/eu-osha-healthy-workplaces-film-award-nominations-announced/Film Award.JPG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"hu";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kövessen minket az interneten: fedezze fel kapcsolati hálózatunkat!";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA aktívan jelen van a szociális médiában, amelyet nagyon hasznos gócpontnak talál a munkahelyi biztonsággal és egészségvédelemmel kapcsolatos információk megosztása szempontjából.   A szociális média csatornái az egészséges munkahelyekért folytatott kampányunkhoz többletet adnak , mivel segítségükkel nagyobb közönséghez tudjuk a munkavállalók biztonságának és egészségének fontosságára felhívó, egyértelmű üzenetünket eljuttatni.  </p> <p>   A következő kapcsolati hálózati platformokon vagyunk jelen: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> és <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Csatlakozzon a munkahelyi biztonságot és egészségvédelmet fontosnak tartó, egyre növekvő közösségünkhöz az interneten!</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"fr";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Restez connectés: explorez nos réseaux sociaux.";"<p>   L'EU-OSHA maintient une présence active sur les réseaux sociaux car ils lui servent de centres d'échange des connaissances sur la sécurité et la santé au travail. Les médias sociaux apportent une valeur ajoutée à nos efforts de campagnes pour des lieux de travail sains   en nous aidant à atteindre un public  plus large et à faire circuler des messages simples sur l'importance de la sécurité et la santé des travailleurs.</p> <p>   Nous sommes présents sur les plates-formes des réseaux sociaux suivants: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> et <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Connectez-vous, rejoignez notre communauté SST qui s'élargit.</p>";"";"/fr/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"hr";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ostanite povezani: istražite naše društvene mreže";"<p>   EU-OSHA aktivno je prisutna u društvenim mrežama kojima se koristi kao mjestima za razmjenu znanja o zašiti i zdravlju na radu. Kanali društvenih mreža daju dodanu vrijednost našim naporima u promicanju zdravih radnih mjesta   i omogućuju nam da širem krugu ljudi prenesemo razumljive poruke o važnosti zaštite i zdravlja radnika.</p> <p>   Prisutni smo na ovim društvenim platformama: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> and <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Povežite se, pridružite se našoj rastućoj zajednici OSH-a.</p>";"";"/hr/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"it";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Rimani collegato: esplora le nostre reti sociali";"<p>   L'EU-OSHA mantiene una presenza attiva nei media sociali servendosene come di un centro di condivisione delle conoscenze in tema di salute e sicurezza sul lavoro. I media sociali sono un valore aggiunto per gli sforzi dell'EU OSHA intesi a promuovere luoghi di lavoro sani  in quanto le consentono di interagire con un pubblico più vasto, inviando segnali più chiari sull'importanza della salute e sicurezza dei lavoratori.</p> <p>   EU OSHA è presente sulle seguenti reti sociali: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> e <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Collegati ed entra in una comunità SSL in continua crescita.</p>";"";"/it/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"mt";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Żomm kuntatt: esplora n-netwerks soċjali tagħna";"<p>   L-EU-OSHA żżomm preżenza attiva fil-midja soċjali fejn tużaha bħala ċ-ċentru għall-kondiviżjoni ta' tagħrif dwar is-saħħa u s-sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol.  Il-mezzi tal-midja soċjali jżidu valur għall-isforzi ta' kampanji tagħna għall-postijiet tax-xogħol ħielsa mill-periklu  billi jgħinuna nimpenjaw ruħna ma' udjenza usa' u jwasslu messaġġi sempliċi dwar l-importanza tas-saħħa u s-sigurtà tal-ħaddiema.</p> <p>   Aħna ninsabu fil-pjattaformi ta' netwerking soċjali li ġejjin: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> and <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Ikkonnettja, inagħqad mal-komunità OSH tagħna li qed tikber.</p>";"";"/mt/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"lt";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Palaikykite ryšį su mumis socialiniuose tinkluose";"<p>   EU-OSHA aktyviai dalyvauja socialinės žinasklaidos tinkluose, naudodamasi jais kaip vieta, kur galima keistis žiniomis apie profesinę saugą ir sveikatą. Socialinės žiniasklaidos kanalai prisideda prie mūsų siekio propaguoti darbo vietų saugą. Mes čia galime pasiekti platesnę auditoriją ir pateikti lengvai suprantamą informaciją apie darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos svarbą.</p> <p>   Dalyvaujame šiose socialinių tinklų platformose: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>„Twitter“</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>„Facebook“</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>„LinkedIn“</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>„YouTube“</a> ir <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>„Slideshare“</a>. </p> <p>   Susisiekite su mumis, prisijunkite prie mūsų gausėjančios DSS bendruomenės.</p>";"";"/lt/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"is";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vertu í sambandi:  kynntu þér samfélagsmiðlana okkar";"<p>   EU-OSHA heldur úti virkri viðveru á samfélagsmiðlunum og notar þá sem vettvang til þess að miðla þekkingu um vinnuverndarmál.  Samfélagsmiðlarásirnar auka gildi herferðarstarfs okkar fyrir heilbrigða vinnustaði  með því að hjálpa okkur að ná til breiðari hóps fólks og koma auðskildum skilaboðum um mikilvægi öryggis og heilbrigðis launþega á framfæri. </p> <p>   Okkur má finna á eftirfarandi samfélagsmiðlum: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> og <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Tengdu þig og gakktu til liðs við hið vaxandi vinnuverndarsamfélag okkar. </p>";"";"/is/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"lv";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Saglabājiet pieslēgumu — izpētiet mūsu sociālos tīklus";"<p>   EU-OSHA aktīvi piedalās sociālajos plašsaziņas līdzekļos, izmantojot tos kā centru zināšanu apmaiņai par darba drošību un veselības aizsardzību. Sociālo plašsaziņas līdzekļu kanāli dod pievienoto vērtību mūsu centieniem rīkot kampaņas par veselīgām darbavietām , palīdzot mums pulcēt plašāku auditoriju, kā arī paust tai saprotamu informāciju par darbinieku drošības un veselības aizsardzības nozīmību.</p> <p>   Mēs piedalāmies šādās sociālās tīklošanas platformās: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> un <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Pieslēdzieties un pievienojieties mūsu augošajai OSH kopienai.</p>";"";"/lv/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"no";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hold deg orientert – sjekk ut våre sosiale nettverk";"<p>   EU-OSHA har en aktiv tilstedeværelse på sosiale medier og bruker dem som et knutepunkt for kunnskapsutveksling om helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen. Sosiale medier tilfører merverdi til kampanjene våre om et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø  ved at vi når ut til et bredere publikum og får fram budskapet om betydningen av helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen på en mer direkte måte.</p> <p>   Vi er til stede på følgende sosiale nettverk: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> og <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Følg oss, og bli en del av det stadig voksende HMS-samfunnet vårt.</p>";"";"/no/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"pt";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Fique ligado: explore as nossas redes sociais";"<p>   A EU-OSHA mantém uma presença ativa nos meios de comunicação social, que utiliza como um centro de partilha de conhecimentos em matéria de segurança e saúde no trabalho. Os canais de comunicação social acrescentam valor aos nossos esforços de sensibilização para a importância de locais de trabalho saudáveis,  uma vez que nos ajudam a chegar a um público mais vasto e a transmitir mensagens claras sobre a importância da segurança e saúde dos trabalhadores.</p> <p>   Estamos presentes nas seguintes plataformas de redes sociais: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> e <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Ligue-se a nós e junte-se à nossa cada vez maior comunidade de SST.</p>";"";"/pt/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"bg";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Останете на линия: проучете нашите социални мрежи";"<p>   EU-OSHA поддържа активно присъствие в социалните медии и ги използва като център за обмен на познания по въпросите на безопасността и здравето при работа. Каналите на социалните медии допълват нашите усилия по време на кампаниите за безопасност и здраве при работа, като ни помагат да достигнем до по-широка публика и да отправим ясни послания за значението на безопасността и здравето на работещите.</p> <p>   Ние участваме в следните платформи на социални мрежи: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> и <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Свържете с нас, присъединете се към нашата растяща общност по безопасност и здраве при работа.</p>";"";"/bg/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"el";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Μείνετε συνδεδεμένοι: ανακαλύψτε τα κοινωνικά μας δίκτυα";"<p>   Ο EU-OSHA έχει ενεργό παρουσία στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης, την οποία χρησιμοποιεί για την ανταλλαγή γνώσεων στον τομέα της επαγγελματικής ασφάλειας και υγείας. Τα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης συννεισφέρουν σημαντικά στις προσπάθειες της εκστρατείας μας για υγιείς χώρους εργασίας  βοηθώντας μας να μεταδώσουμε με άμεσο τρόπο μηνύματα σχετικά με τη σπουδαιότητα της ασφάλειας και της υγείας των εργαζομένων.</p> <p>   Συμμετέχουμε στις ακόλουθες πλατφόρμες κοινωνικής δικτύωσης: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> και<a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Συνδεθείτε και γίνετε μέλος της κοινότητας ΕΑΥ η οποία διευρύνεται διαρκώς.</p>";"";"/el/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"cs";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nenechte si nic ujít: připojte se k sociálním sítím naší agentury";"<p>   Agentura EU-OSHA se v sociálních médiích i nadále aktivně angažuje a používá je jako platformu ke sdílení poznatků o bezpečnosti a ochraně zdraví při práci. Využívání sociálních médií jako komunikačních kanálů zhodnocuje úsilí naší agentury při kampaních za zdravé pracoviště,  neboť díky nim můžeme oslovit širší veřejnost a cíleně sdílet srozumitelně formulovaná poselství o důležitosti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví pracovníků.</p> <p>   Naší agenturu můžete nalézt na těchto sociálních platformách: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> a <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Nezůstávejte stranou, přidejte se k naší rozšiřující se komunitě se zaměřením na BOZP.</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"de";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bleiben Sie auf dem Laufenden und besuchen Sie unsere sozialen Netzwerke.";"<p>   Die EU-OSHA ist in den sozialen Medien aktiv und nutzt sie als Plattform für den Austausch von Kenntnissen im Bereich Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit. Die Kanäle in den sozialen Medien erhöhen die Wirksamkeit unserer Kampagnenbemühungen im Bereich gesunde Arbeitsplätze , da wir durch sie ein breiteres Publikum erreichen und konkrete Botschaften über die Bedeutung von Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz der Arbeitnehmer aussenden können.</p> <p>   In folgenden sozialen Medien sind wir vertreten: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> und <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Schalten Sie sich ein und werden Sie Teil unserer stetig wachsenden Gemeinschaft rund um Themen von Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit.</p>";"";"/de/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"es";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Permanezca en conexión: explore nuestras redes sociales";"<p>   EU-OSHA mantiene una presencia activa en los medios sociales utilizándola como centro de difusión de conocimientos en materia de salud y seguridad en el trabajo. Los canales de medios sociales añaden valor a nuestros esfuerzos en las campañas en favor de lugares de trabajo saludables   al ayudarnos a contactar con una audiencia más amplia y transmitir mensajes más directos sobre la importancia de la seguridad y la salud de los trabajadores.</p> <p>   Estamos presentes en las siguientes plataformas sociales: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> and <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Permanezca conectado, únase a nuestra cada vez mayor comunidad de SST.</p>";"";"/es/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"da";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hold dig opdateret: besøg vores sociale netværk";"<p>   EU-OSHA deltager aktivt i de sociale medier og bruger dem som et centralt videndelingspunkt inden for arbejdsmiljø. De sociale mediekanaler tilfører merværdi til vores kampagner om sunde arbejdspladser, da de hjælper os med at nå ud til et bredere publikum og formidle enkle budskaber om vigtigheden af et sikkert og sundt arbejdsmiljø for arbejdstagerne.</p> <p>   Vi er til stede på følgende sociale netværk: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> og <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Kom med - og bliv en del af det stadig voksende samfund inden for arbejdsmiljø.</p>";"";"/da/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"fi";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Pidä yhteydettä: tutustu sosiaalisiin verkostoihimme";"<p>   EU-OSHA on aktiivisesti läsnä sosiaalisessa mediassa ja hyödyntää sitä keskeisenä työsuojelutiedon jakelukanavana. Sosiaalisen median  lisäarvo työsuojelukampanjoinnissa  auttaa saamaan laajemman yleisön ja välittämään selväsanaista viestiä työntekijöiden työterveyden ja -turvallisuuden merkityksestä.</p> <p>   Olemme seuraavilla sosiaalisten vekostojen foorumeilla: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> ja <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Ole mukana, liity kasvavaan työsuojeluyhteisöömme.</p>";"";"/fi/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"et";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Tule veebi ja tutvu meie sotsiaalvõrgustikega";"<p>   EU-OSHA osaleb aktiivselt sotsiaalmeedias, jagades selle kaudu teadmisi tööohutusest ja -tervishoiust. Tervislike töökohtade kampaania leiab nii laiema kõlapinna, sest sotsiaalmeediakanalite kaudu jõuavad selgesõnalised tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu sõnumid laiema üldsuseni. </p> <p>   Oleme järgmistel sotsiaalmeediaplatvormidel: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> ja <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Tule veebi ning liitu tööohutuse ja -tervishoiu kasvava kogukonnaga!</p>";"";"/et/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"ro";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Rămâneţi conectaţi: exploraţi reţelele noastre sociale";"<p>   EU-OSHA menţine o prezenţă activă pe platforme de comunicare socială ca sursă de partajare de informaţii cu privire la siguranţa şi sănătatea în muncă. Canalele de comunicare socială adaugă valoare eforturilor noastre pentru o campanie de promovare a locurilor de muncă sănătoase   ajutându-ne să atragem un public cât mai larg şi să transmitem mesaje directe cu privire la importanţa siguranţei şi sănătăţii lucrătorilor.</p> <p>   Suntem prezenţi pe următoarele platforme de socializare: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> şi <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Conectaţi-vă, alăturaţi-vă comunităţii noastre SSM aflată în creştere.</p>";"";"/ro/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"pl";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Utrzymuj kontakt: odkryj nasze sieci społecznościowe";"<p>   EU-OSHA pozostaje aktywna w mediach społecznościowych, wykorzystując je jako platformę do dzielenia się wiedzą na temat BHP. Kanały mediów społecznościowych wzmacniają nasze starania w zakresie promowania kampanii na rzecz zdrowych miejsc pracy,  umożliwiając dotarcie do szerszego grona odbiorców i przekazując jasne treści na temat wagi zdrowia i bezpieczeństwa pracowników.</p> <p>   Jesteśmy obecni na następujących platformach społecznościowych: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> i <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Utrzymuj kontakt – dołącz do naszej powiększającej się wspólnoty BHP.</p>";"";"/pl/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"nl";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Blijf in verbinding: ontdek onze sociale netwerken";"<p>   EU-OSHA is actief aanwezig in de sociale media en gebruikt deze als een springplank voor het delen van kennis over veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk. De kanalen van de sociale media hebben een toegevoegde waarde voor de inspanningen van onze campagne voor gezonde werkplekken  waarmee we een breder publiek bereiken en directe boodschappen afgeven over het belang van veiligheid en gezondheid voor werknemers.</p> <p>   Wij doen mee aan de volgende platforms voor sociaal netwerken: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> en <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Maak de verbinding, sluit u aan bij onze groeiende OSH-gemeenschap.</p>";"";"/nl/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"sk";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ostaňte pripojený: preskúmajte naše sociálne siete";"<p>   Agentúra EU-OSHA je aktívne zastúpená v sociálnych médiách, ktoré využíva ako centrum na výmenu poznatkov v oblasti ochrany zdravia a bezpečnosti pri práci. Sociálne médiá sú pridanou hodnotou k nášmu úsiliu, ktoré vynakladáme na vedenie kampaní za zdravé pracoviská , a pomáhajú nám osloviť širšiu verejnosť a odovzdávať jasné posolstvá o význame ochrany zdravia a bezpečnosti zamestnancov.</p> <p>   Sme prihlásení v týchto platformách na vytváranie sociálnych sietí: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> a <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Prihláste sa a pripojte sa k našej rozširujúcej sa komunite, ktorá sa zaujíma o BOZP.</p>";"";"/sk/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"sl";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ostanite povezani: raziščite naša družabna omrežja";"<p>   Agencija EU-OSHA je aktivna v družbenih medijih. Uporablja jih kot platforme za širjenje znanja o varnosti in zdravju na delovnem mestu. Družbeni mediji in kanali dajo dodano vrednost njenim kampanjam za zdravo delovno okolje,  saj z njihovo pomočjo doseže širše občinstvo in posreduje jasna sporočila o pomenu varnosti in zdravja delavcev.</p> <p>   Prisotna je na naslednjih družabnih platformah: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> in <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Ostanite povezani, pridružite se vedno večji skupnosti za varnost in zdravje pri delu.</p>";"";"/sl/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"sv";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Koppla upp dig och upptäck våra sociala nätverk";"<p>   Arbetsmiljöbyrån är aktiv i sociala medier och använder dem för att utbyta kunskap om arbetsmiljö. Sociala medier bidrar till våra kampanjinsatser  genom att de hjälper oss nå ut till en bredare publik och förmedla lättfattliga budskap om vikten av god arbetsmiljö.</p> <p>   Vi finns på följande sociala nätverksplattformar: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> och <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>. </p> <p>   Koppla upp dig och bli en av de allt fler som är aktiva på arbetsmiljöområdet.</p>";"";"/sv/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks";"en";"";"private";"2013-10-08 11:18:45";"2014-07-25 10:48:26";"2013-10-08 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Stay connected: explore our social networks";"<p>   EU-OSHA maintains an active presence in social media using it as a knowledge sharing hub on occupational safety and health. Social media channels add value to our campaigning efforts for healthy workplaces&nbsp; by helping us engage with a wider audience and convey straightforward messages on the importance of workers’ safety and health.</p>  <p>   We are present in the following social networking platforms: <a href=<@#&>https://twitter.com/EU_OSHA<@#&>>Twitter</a>, <a href=<@#&>https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanAgencyforSafetyandHealthatWork<@#&>>Facebook</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.linkedin.com/company/european-agency-for-safety-and-health-at-work<@#&>>LinkedIn</a>, <a href=<@#&>http://www.youtube.com/euosha<@#&>>YouTube</a> and <a href=<@#&>http://www.slideshare.net/EUOSHA<@#&>>Slideshare</a>.&nbsp;</p>  <p>   Get connected, join our growing OSH community.</p>";"";"/en/teaser/stay-connected-explore-our-social-networks/stay connected.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"lv";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Datumi Jūsu kalendāram: Eiropas nedēļa, 2013. gada 21.līdz 25. oktobris";"<p>   Eiropas Darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības nedēļa nu vairs nav aiz kalniem. Šī nedēļa solās būt bagāta ar informētības veicināšanas pasākumiem un aktivitātēm, kurās Jūs varat līdzdarboties.</p>  <p>   Uzsvars tiek likts uz pašreizējo veselīgu darbavietu kampaņu <@#&>Novērsīsim darba vides riskus kopā<@#&>. Iesaistieties un uzziniet, kāpēc ir svarīgi stingru vadību apvienot ar aktīvu darbinieku līdzdalību.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Noskatieties video</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lv/hw2012<@#&>>Plašāk par Veselīgu darbavietu kampaņu</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"lt";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Europos savaitės renginiai vyks 2013 m. spalio 21–25 d. Šią datą pasižymėkite kalendoriuje.";"<p>   Iki Europos darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos savaitės liko nedaug laiko. Šią savaitę vyks daugybė informacinio pobūdžio renginių ir veiklos, kurioje galite dalyvauti ir jūs.</p>  <p>   Savaitės tema&nbsp;– šiuo metu vykdoma saugių darbo vietų kampanija „Bendromis jėgomis mažinkime riziką darbe“. Prisijunkite prie kampanijos ir sužinokite, kodėl taip svarbu skirti dėmesį ir stipriam vadovavimui, ir aktyviam darbuotojų dalyvavimui.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Žiūrėti vaizdinę medžiagą</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/lt/hw2012<@#&>>Išsamesnė informacija apie saugių darbo vietų kampaniją</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"ro";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"O dată pentru agenda dumneavoastră.: Săptămâna europeană, 21-25 octombrie 2013";"<p>   Nu mai este mult până la Săptămâna europeană a sănătăţii şi securităţii în muncă. Săptămâna se anunţă bogată în evenimente şi activităţi de sensibilizare la care puteţi participa.</p>  <p>   În centrul atenţiei se află actuala Campanie pentru locuri de muncă sănătoase intitulată „Împreună pentru prevenirea riscurilor”. Implicaţi-vă şi descoperiţi de ce este importantă asocierea dintre un management puternic şi o participare activă a lucrătorilor.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/ro/hw2012<@#&>>Mai multe informaţii despre Campania pentru locuri de muncă sănătoase</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Urmăriți prezentarea video</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"is";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Dagur fyrir dagbókina: Evrópuvikan 21.-25. október 2013";"<p>   Það er ekki langt í að Evrópuvika vinnuverndar renni upp. Vikan verður full af viðburðum og starfsemi til vitundarvakningar sem þú getur tekið þátt í.</p>  <p>   Kastljósinu er beint að núverandi herferð Vinnuvernd er allra hagur „Vinnuvernd - allir vinna“. Taktu þátt til þess að komast að því hvers vegna það er svo mikilvægt að sameina styrka stjórnun og virka þátttöku starfsmanna.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/is/hw2012<@#&>>Meira um herferðina Vinnuvernd er allra hagur</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Horfa á myndbandið</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"it";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un appuntamento per la tua agenda: Settimana europea, 21 - 25 ottobre 2013";"<p>   La Settimana europea per la sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro è alle porte, preannunciandosi ricca di eventi e attività di sensibilizzazione per i partecipanti.</p>  <p>   L'attenzione si concentrerà sull'attuale campagna Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri <@#&>Lavoriamo insieme per la prevenzione dei rischi<@#&>. Partecipa e scopri la grande importanza di associare una solida gestione alla partecipazione attiva dei lavoratori.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/it/hw2012<@#&>>Maggiori informazioni sulla campagna Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Guarda il video</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"cs";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Data, která byste si měli poznačit do diáře: Evropský týden, 21.–25. října 2013";"<p>   Od Evropského týdne bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci nás nyní dělí již jen krátká doba. Tento týden bude nabitý osvětovými akcemi a činnostmi, jichž se můžete zúčastnit.</p>  <p>   Zaměří se zejména na právě probíhající kampaň Zdravé pracoviště, jejímž tématem je „Partnerství při prevenci rizik“. Zapojte se i vy! Dozvíte se, proč je kombinace kvalitního vedení s aktivní účastí zaměstnanců tak důležitá.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/cs/hw2012<@#&>>Více informací o kampani Zdravé pracoviště</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Prohlédněte si video</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"nl";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Noteer in uw agenda: de Europese Week van 21 tot en met 25 oktober 2013";"<p>   Binnenkort begint de Europese Week voor veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk. Tijdens deze week kunt u weer deelnemen aan talrijke sensibiliseringsevenementen en -activiteiten.</p>  <p>   Daarin staat de huidige campagne voor een gezonde werkplek 'Samen sterk voor preventie' centraal. Doe mee en ontdek waarom het zo belangrijk is sterk management te combineren met actieve werknemersparticipatie.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Bekijk de video</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/nl/hw2012<@#&>>Meer weten over de campagne 'Een gezonde werkplek'</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"pt";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uma data a fixar: a Semana Europeia, de 21 a 25 de outubro de 2013";"<p>   A Semana Europeia da Segurança e da Saúde no Trabalho realizar-se-á em breve. A Semana será preenchida por muitos eventos e atividades de sensibilização nos quais pode participar.</p>  <p>   Terá como objeto principal a atual Campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis com o lema «Juntos na prevenção dos riscos profissionais». Participe e descubra a razão por que é tão importante combinar uma liderança forte com a participação ativa dos trabalhadores.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pt/hw2012<@#&>>Saiba mais sobre a Campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Veja o vídeo</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"no";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Legg inn i kalenderen din: Den europeiske arbeidsmiljøuken 21.–25. oktober 2013";"<p>   Nå er det ikke lenge til Den europeiske arbeidsmiljøuken! Uken kommer til å bugne av holdningsskapende arrangementer og aktiviteter du kan være med på.</p>  <p>   Fokuset vil være på den pågående Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø-kampanjen <@#&>Samarbeid, ledelse og medvirkning<@#&>. Involver deg og oppdag hvorfor kombinasjonen sterk ledelse og aktiv arbeidstakermedvirkning er så viktig.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/no/hw2012<@#&>>Mer om Et sikkert og godt arbeidsmiljø-kampanjen</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Se videoen</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"el";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Σημειώστε την ημερομηνία: Ευρωπαϊκή εβδομάδα, 21–25 Οκτωβρίου 2013";"<p>   Η αντίστροφη μέτρηση για την Ευρωπαϊκή Εβδομάδα για την Ασφάλεια και την Υγεία στην Εργασία έχει αρχίσει. Το πρόγραμμα της Εβδομάδας επιφυλάσσει στο κοινό πολλές εκδηλώσεις και δραστηριότητες ευαισθητοποίησης.</p>  <p>   Η Ευρωπαϊκή Εβδομάδα επικεντρώνεται στην εν εξελίξει εκστρατεία για τους ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώρους εργασίας με τίτλο «Πρόληψη των κινδύνων στην εργασία με τη συμμετοχή όλων». Πάρτε μέρος στις εκδηλώσεις και ανακαλύψτε γιατί είναι τόσο σημαντικό το δίπτυχο της ισχυρής διοίκησης και της ενεργού συμμετοχής των εργαζομένων.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/el/hw2012<@#&>>Περισσότερα σχετικά με την εκστρατεία για τους ασφαλείς και υγιείς χώρους εργασίας</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Παρακολουθείστε το βίντεο</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""

The Week is set to be full of awareness-raising events and activities for you to take part in.</p>  <p>   The focus is on the current Healthy Workplaces Campaign ‘Working together for risk prevention’. Get involved and discover why combining strong management with active worker participation is so important.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/hw2012<@#&>>More about the Healthy Workplaces Campaign</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Watch the video</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"Campaign 2012-13";"";"";"";""

"/mt/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"mt";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Data għad-djarju tiegħek: Il-Ġimgħa Ewropea, 21-25 ta' Ottubru 2013";"<p>   Ma fadalx ħafna issa biex il-Ġimgħa Ewropea għas-Saħħa u s-Sigurtà fuq il-Post tax-Xogħol tkun magħna. Din il-Ġimgħa hija mistennija li tkun mimlija avvenimenti ta' sensibilizzazzjoni u attivitajiet li tista' tieħu sehem fihom.</p>  <p>   Il-Kampanja attwali dwar il-Postijiet tax-Xogħol Ħielsa mill-Periklu <@#&>Naħdmu flimkien biex nevitaw ir-riskji<@#&> hija ċ-ċentru ta' dawn l-avvenimenti. V tem tednu se bodo zvrstile številne prireditve za ozaveščanje in dogodki, ki se jih lahko udeležite.</p>  <p>   Poudarek je na trenutni kampanji za zdravo delovno okolje: „Partnerstvo za preprečevanje tveganj“. Vključite se in spoznajte, zakaj je združevanje močnega vodstva z dejavnim sodelovanjem delavcev tako pomembno.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Oglejte si video posnetek</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sl/hw2012<@#&>>Več o kampanji za zdravo delovno okolje</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sl/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"bg";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Дата за отбелязване във вашия календар: европейска седмица, 21-25 октомври 2013 г.";"<p>   Европейската седмица за безопасност и здраве при работа ще започне съвсем скоро. По време на седмицата са планирани множество събития и дейности за повишаване на осведомеността, в които можете да участвате.</p>  <p>   Акцентът е поставен върху текущата кампания за здравословни работни места <@#&>Да работим заедно за превенция на риска<@#&>. Включете се и открийте защо силното ръководство в съчетание с активно участие на работниците и служителите е толкова важно.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/bg/hw2012<@#&>>Повече за кампанията за здравословни работни места</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Видеоклип</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"hr";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Datum za vaš kalendar: Europski tjedan, 21.-25. listopada 2013.";"<p>   Bliži se Europski tjedan sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu. Tjedan donosi mnogo događaja za podizanje svijesti i aktivnosti u kojima možete sudjelovati.</p> <p>   Naglasak je na najnovijoj kampanji za zdravo radno okruženje „Partnerstvo za sprečavanje rizika”. Uključite se i otkrijte zašto je važno udružiti snažnu upravu i aktivno sudjelovanje radnika.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/about/focal-points/<@#&>>U lokalnoj središnjici saznajte više o događajima i aktivnostima na vašem području</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/hw2012<@#&>>Više o kampanji za zdravo radno okruženje</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"de";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ein Termin, den Sie in Ihren Kalender eintragen sollten: die Europäische Woche vom 21.-25. Oktober 2013";"<p>   Bald beginnt die Europäische Woche für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit. Im Rahmen dieser Woche werden zahlreiche Sensibilisierungsveranstaltungen und -aktivitäten stattfinden, an denen Sie teilnehmen können.</p>  <p>   Im Mittelpunkt steht die diesjährige Kampagne für gesunde Arbeitsplätze unter dem Motto „Partnerschaft für Prävention“. Beteiligen Sie sich und erfahren Sie, warum ein starkes Management zusammen mit aktiver Arbeitnehmerbeteiligung so wichtig ist.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/de/hw2012<@#&>>Hier erfahren Sie mehr über die Kampagne für gesunde Arbeitsplätze</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Video abspielen</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"da";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sæt kryds i kalenderen: Den europæiske arbejdsmiljøuge, 21.-25. oktober 2013";"<p>   Nu varer det ikke længe, før den europæiske arbejdsmiljøuge finder sted. Der vil i løbet af ugen være en masse bevidstgørelsesarrangementer og -aktiviteter, du vil kunne deltage i.</p>  <p>   Fokus vil være på den nuværende kampagne for et sikkert og sundt arbejdsmiljø, <@#&>Samarbejde om forebyggelse<@#&>. Bliv en del af kampagnen, og find ud af, hvorfor det er så vigtigt at kombinere stærkt lederskab med medarbejderdeltagelse.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/da/hw2012<@#&>>Yderligere oplysninger om kampagnen Et sikkert og sundt arbejdsmiljø</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Se videoen</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"sv";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Du har väl lagt in Europeiska arbetsmiljöveckan den 21–25 oktober 2013 i almanackan?";"<p>   Nu dröjer det inte länge förrän Europeiska arbetsmiljöveckan genomförs. Veckan kommer att vara späckad med evenemang och aktiviteter i upplysningssyfte som du kan delta i.</p>  <p>   Tyngdpunkten ligger på den aktuella kampanjen Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv <@#&>Samverkan för att förebygga<@#&>. Kom med och upptäck varför det är så viktigt att kombinera ett starkt ledarskap med aktiv arbetstagarmedverkan!</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&> target=<@#&>_blank<@#&>>Se videon</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sv/hw2012<@#&>>Mer om kampanjen Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"sk";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Poznačte si do kalendára: Európsky týždeň, 21. – 25. október 2013";"<p>   Už zanedlho sa začne Európsky týždeň bezpečnosti a&nbsp;ochrany zdravia pri práci. V rámci neho bude prebiehať mnoho podujatí a činností zameraných na zvyšovanie informovanosti, na ktorých sa môžete zúčastniť.</p>  <p>   Pozornosť sa bude zameriavať na prebiehajúcu kampaň Zdravé pracoviská, ktorej témou je Spolupráca pri prevencii rizík. Zapojte sa aj vy a zistite, prečo je kombinácia silného riadenia a aktívnej participácie zamestnancov taká dôležitá.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sk/hw2012<@#&>>Viac informácií o kampani Zdravé pracoviská</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://youtu.be/3rqqZXl-jRE<@#&>>Pozrieť si video</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement/campaign.png";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/fr/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"fr";"/en/teaser/european-week-2013-announcement";"published";"2013-09-10 11:56:15";"2014-07-25 14:30:50";"2013-10-03 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"À noter dans vos agendas: la Semaine européenne organisée du 21 au 25 octobre 2013";"<p>   La Semaine européenne de la sécurité et de la santé au travail se déroulera très bientôt! "/en/teaser/four-agencies-seminar-2013-eu-osha-in-the-european-parliament";"en";"";"private";"2013-10-03 16:02:34";"2014-07-25 14:49:05";"2013-10-03 00:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Four Agencies Seminar – EU-OSHA in the European Parliament";"<p>   In September, EU-OSHA joined three other agencies in the European Parliament in Brussels to highlight the work we are doing to help make Europe a safer, healthier and more productive place to work.</p>  <p>   The event was hosted by the Employment Committee and brought EU-OSHA together with Eurofound, Cedefop and ETF to discuss how each agency contributes to the strength of the European social model and how that model itself contributes to a more competitive Europe.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/about/director_corner/blog/four-agencies-seminar-2013-eu-osha-in-the-european-parliament<@#&>>Read our blog entry</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu//en/press/press-releases/supporting-materials/Speech_Christa_Sedlatschek_EU-OSHA_4-agencies.pdf<@#&>>Read the speech given by Christa Sedlatschek, EU-OSHA director</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/four-agencies-seminar-2013-eu-osha-in-the-european-parliament/4Agencies 2013.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"el";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Σύνοδος κορυφής για τους Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώρους Εργασίας με θέμα <@#&>Πρόληψη των κινδύνων στην εργασία με τη συμμετοχή όλων<@#&>";"<p>   Η σύνοδος κορυφής για τη λήξη της εκστρατείας <@#&>Ασφαλείς και Υγιείς Χώροι Εργασίας 2012-13<@#&> με θέμα <@#&>Πρόληψη των κινδύνων στην εργασία με τη συμμετοχή όλων<@#&> θα διεξαχθεί στις 11-12 Νοεμβρίου 2013 στο Μπιλμπάο και θα εστιάσει στα κυριότερα σημεία της εκστρατείας καθώς και στον επιτελικό ρόλο της διοίκησης και στη συμμετοχή των εργαζομένων ως καθοριστικών παραγόντων για την υγεία και την ασφάλεια στον χώρο εργασίας. Με την ευκαιρία της συνόδου, ο επίτροπος László Andor θα παράσχει επίσης ενημέρωση σχετικά με τον σημερινό προβληματισμό της ΕΕ όσον αφορά το μέλλον της επαγγελματικής ασφάλειας και υγείας στην ΕΕ και αλλού.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Πρόγραμμα </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/el/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Μάθετε περισσότερα για τη Διάσκεψη Κορυφής</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"en";"";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Healthy Workplaces Summit on ‘Working together for risk prevention’";"<p>   The Summit for the closing of the Healthy Workplaces Campaign 2012-13 on ‘Working together for risk prevention’ takes place on 11-12 November 2013 in Bilbao and focuses on the highlights of the campaign and on management leadership and worker participation as the key to good workplace safety and health. At this occasion Commissioner László Andor will also provide an update on current EU thinking on the future of occupational safety and health in the EU and beyond.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Programme </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Get to know more about the Summit</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"management_leadership, worker_participation, Campaign 2012-13";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"nl";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"'Samen sterk voor preventie': topbijeenkomst in het kader van de campagne 'Een gezonde werkplek'";"<p>   Op 11 en 12 november 2013 vindt in Bilbao onder de titel 'Samen sterk voor preventie' een topbijeenkomst plaats ter afsluiting van de campagne 'Een gezonde werkplek' 2012/2013. De bijeenkomst zal de hoogtepunten van de campagne voor het voetlicht brengen en de nadruk leggen op leiderschap van het management en participatie van de werknemers als sleutel tot een goede veiligheid en gezondheid op de werkplek. Commissielid László Andor zal van de gelegenheid ook gebruikmaken om een stand van zaken te geven van hoe momenteel in de EU wordt gedacht over de toekomst van veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk in de EU en daarbuiten.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Programma </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/nl/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Meer weten over de top</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"pt";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Cimeira Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis - «Juntos na prevenção dos riscos profissionais»";"<p>   A cimeira de encerramento da Campanha Locais de Trabalho Seguros e Saudáveis 2012-13, com o lema «Juntos na prevenção dos riscos profissionais», realiza-se em 11-12 de novembro de 2013, em Bilbau, e centra-se nos aspetos-chave da campanha, bem como na liderança da gestão e na participação dos trabalhadores como elementos essenciais para a segurança e a saúde no local de trabalho. Nessa ocasião, o Comissário László Andor fará também o ponto da situação sobre a posição atual da UE relativamente ao futuro da segurança e da saúde no trabalho na UE e fora dela.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Programa </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pt/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Mais informações sobre a Cimeira</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/cs/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"cs";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Summit kampaně Zdravé pracoviště na téma „Partnerství při prevenci rizik“";"<p>   Summit konaný při příležitosti ukončení kampaně Zdravé pracoviště pro období 2012–2013 na téma „Partnerství při prevenci rizik“ proběhne ve dnech 11. a 12. listopadu 2013 v&nbsp;Bilbau. "/es/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"es";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Cumbre sobre trabajos saludables 'Trabajando juntos para la prevención de riesgos'.";"<p>   La cumbre de clausura de la Campaña sobre Trabajos Saludables 2012-2013 <@#&>Trabajando juntos para la prevención de riesgos<@#&> tendrá lugar en Bilbao los días 12-13 de Noviembre de 2013, y estará centrada en los aspectos principales de la campaña y en el liderazgo en la gestión de la prevención y la participación de los trabajadores como claves de la seguridad y la salud en el trabajo. "/is/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"is";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Leiðtogafundur herferðarinnar Vinnuvernd er allra hagur með heitið  „Vinnuvernd - allir vinna“";"<p>   Leiðtogafundurinn markar endalok herferðarinnar Vinnuvernd er allra hagur 2012-13, sem ber heitið „Vinnuvernd - allir vinna“, og verður haldinn 11. - 12. nóvember 2013 í Bilbao. Hann beinir sjónum sínum að hápunktum herferðarinnar og því að stjórnunarforysta og starfsmannaþátttaka er lykillinn að góðri vinnuvernd. Á viðburðinum mun László Andor, einn af framkvæmdastjórum ESB, segja frá núverandi hugsanagangi ESB um framtíð vinnuverndar í Evrópusambandinu og annars staðar.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Dagskrá </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/is/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Fræðast meira um leiðtogafundinn</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"it";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vertice Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri: <@#&>Lavoriamo insieme per la prevenzione dei rischi<@#&>";"<p>   L'11 e il 12 novembre 2013 si svolgerà a Bilbao il vertice conclusivo dell'edizione 2012-2013 della campagna Ambienti di lavoro sani e sicuri, dedicata al tema <@#&>Lavoriamo insieme per la prevenzione dei rischi<@#&>. La manifestazione ripercorrerà i punti salienti della campagna, ponendo l'accento sul valore essenziale della direzione gestionale e della partecipazione dei lavoratori per garantire buone condizioni di sicurezza e salute sul lavoro. Inoltre, durante l'evento il commissario László Andor fornirà un aggiornamento sull'attuale posizione dell'UE in merito al futuro della sicurezza e salute sul lavoro all'interno e all'esterno dell'Unione.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Programma </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/it/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Maggiori informazioni sul vertice</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"pl";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Szczyt wieńczący kampanię „Zdrowe miejsca pracy: Partnerstwo dla prewencji”";"<p>   Szczyt zamykający kampanię „Zdrowe miejsca pracy 2012-13: Partnerstwo dla prewencji” odbędzie się w dniach 11-12 listopada 2013 r. w Bilbao i będzie dotyczyć w szczególności najważniejszych wydarzeń kampanii, jak również przywództwa w zarządzaniu i udziału pracowników jako kluczowych czynników zapewniających bezpieczeństwo i zdrowie w pracy. Z tej okazji komisarz UE László Andor przedstawi najnowsze informacje dotyczące obecnego spojrzenia UE na przyszłość bezpieczeństwa i zdrowia w pracy, zarówno w UE jak i poza nią.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Program </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/pl/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Dowiedz się więcej o szczycie</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"fr";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sommet «Lieux de travail sains: Ensemble pour la prévention des risques»";"<p>   Le sommet de clôture de la campagne 2012-2013: «Lieux de travail sains: Ensemble pour la prévention des risques», se tiendra à Bilbao, les 11 et 12 novembre 2013, et sera consacré aux points forts de la campagne ainsi qu'à la prise d'initiatives par l'encadrement et à la participation des travailleurs comme facteurs clés d'une bonne sécurité et d'une bonne santé au travail. À cette occasion, le Commissaire László Andor exposera les dernières informations sur la réflexion européenne actuelle en matière de sécurité et santé au travail dans l'UE et ailleurs.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Programme </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fr/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>En savoir plus sur le sommet</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"bg";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Среща на високо равнище за здравословни работни места: <@#&>Да работим заедно за превенция на риска<@#&>";"<p>   Срещата на високо равнище за закриване на кампанията за здравословни работни места 2012-2013&nbsp;г.: <@#&>Да работим заедно за превенция на риска<@#&> ще се състои на 11-12 ноември 2013 г. в Билбао и ще бъде насочена към основните акценти на кампанията и към управленското ръководство и участието на работниците като ключов фактор за безопасни и здравословни работни места. "/ro/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"ro";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Summitul privind locurile de muncă sigure şi sănătoase „Împreună pentru prevenirea riscurilor”";"<p>   Summitul organizat cu ocazia încheierii Campaniei pentru locuri de muncă sigure şi sănătoase 2012-2013 intitulate „Împreună pentru prevenirea riscurilor” va avea loc la Bilbao în perioada 11-12 noiembrie 2013 şi va pune accentul pe evenimentele importante ale campaniei şi pe aptitudinile de conducere şi participarea lucrătorilor ca factori principali pentru asigurarea unor condiţii bune de sănătate şi securitate la locul de muncă. "/hr/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"hr";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Sastanak na vrhu za zdrava radna mjesta o projektu <@#&>Raditi zajedno za prevenciju rizika<@#&>";"<p>   Sastanak na vrhu za zatvaranje kampanje za zdrava radna mjesta 2012.-2013. odnosno za projekt <@#&>Raditi zajedno za prevenciju rizika<@#&> održava se 11. i 12. studenoga 2013. u Bilbau i usmjeren je na ključne točke kampanje te na menadžersko rukovođnje i sudjelovanje radnika, što je ključ za dobru sigurnost i zdravlje na radnom mjestu. "/de/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"de";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Gipfeltreffen zur Kampagne für gesunde Arbeitsplätze unter dem Motto „Partnerschaft für Prävention“";"<p>   Das Gipfeltreffen zum Abschluss der Kampagne für gesunde Arbeitsplätze 2012/2013 unter dem Motto „Partnerschaft für Prävention“ findet am 11./12.&nbsp;November 2013 in Bilbao statt; im Mittelpunkt stehen die Höhepunkte der Kampagne sowie Managementführung und Arbeitnehmerbeteiligung als Schlüssel für Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit. Kommissionsmitglied László Andor wird diese Gelegenheit nutzen, um aktuelle Informationen zum derzeitigen Meinungsstand der EU zur Zukunft von Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in der Europäischen Union und darüber hinaus zu liefern.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Programm </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/de/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Erfahren Sie mehr über den Gipfel</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"hu";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Az Együtt a kockázatok megelőzéséért<@#&> témájú Egészséges munkahelyek kampány csúcstalálkozója";"<p>   Az <@#&>Együtt a kockázatok megelőzéséért<@#&> című 2012-2013-as Egészséges munkahelyek kampányt lezáró csúcstalálkozó 2013. november 11-12 között, Bilbaoban kerül megrendezésre, és a kampány legfontosabb eseményei, valamint a megfelelő munkahelyi biztonság és egészségvédelem szempontjából kulcsfontosságú irányítás vezetés és dolgozói részvétel képezik központi témáit. "/sl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"sl";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Vrhovno srečanje za zdravo delovno okolje na temo <@#&>Partnerstvo za preprečevanje tveganj<@#&>";"<p>   Vrhovno srečanje ob zaključku kampanje za zdravo delovno okolje 2012-2013 na temo <@#&>Partnerstvo za preprečevanje tveganj<@#&> bo potekalo 11. in 12.&nbsp;novembra&nbsp;2013 v Bilbau. Osrednja tema bodo glavni poudarki kampanje, vodilna vloga in pobuda vodstva ter sodelovanje delavcev kot ključni dejavniki za varnost in zdravje pri delu. Ob tej priložnosti bo komisar László Andor predstavil tudi najnovejša stališča EU glede prihodnosti na področju varnosti in zdravja pri delu v Evropski uniji in drugod.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Program </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sl/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Preberite več o vrhovnem srečanju</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"fi";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Terveellinen työ -huippukokouksen teema:Yhteistyöllä riskit hallintaan";"<p>   Terveellinen työ -kampanja 2012-2013, jonka teemana on <@#&>Yhteistyöllä riskit hallintaan<@#&>, on loppuvaiheessaan, ja tähän liittyen Bilbaoon on suunniteltu 11-12. marraskuuta pidettävä huippukokous. Kokouksessa on tarkoitus käsitellä kampanjan kohokohtia sekä johtamisen ja työntekijöiden osallistumisen merkitystä hyvin toimivan työsuojelun edellytyksenä. Komission jäsenen László Andorin on myös tarkoitus kertoa, miten EU:ssa suhtaudutaan tulevaisuuden työsuojeluun sekä Euroopassa että muualla maailmassa.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Ohjelma </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/fi/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Lisää tietoa huippukokouksesta</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"da";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Arbejdsmiljøtopmøde med temaet <@#&>Samarbejde om forebyggelse<@#&>";"<p>   Topmødet, som afslutter arbejdsmiljøkampagnen 2012-13 om <@#&>Samarbejde om forebyggelse<@#&>, finder sted den 11.-12. november 2013 i Bilbao og tager fokus på kampagnens højdepunkter og ledelsens lederskab og medarbejderdeltagelse som nøglen til et godt arbejdsmiljø. Her vil kommissær László Andor komme med en opdatering omkring de nuværende tanker i EU om fremtidens arbejdsmiljø både i og udenfor EU.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Program </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/da/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Læs mere om topmødet</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"sv";"/en/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention";"published";"2013-09-05 12:56:47";"2014-07-25 15:45:06";"2013-09-27 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Toppmötet om Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv <@#&>Samverkan för att förebygga<@#&>";"<p>   Det avslutande toppmötet för kampanjen Ett hälsosamt arbetsliv 2012–2013 ”Samverkan för att förebygga” äger rum i Bilbao den 11–12 november 2013. Vid mötet kommer höjdpunkter från kampanjen att presenteras, liksom vikten av ledarskap och arbetstagarmedverkan när det gäller att skapa en god arbetsmiljö kommer att tas upp. Dessutom kommer kommissionsledamot László Andor att informera om aktuella tankegångar inom EU i fråga om arbetsmiljö i och utanför EU.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/en/get-involved/draft-programme-healthyworkplacessummit2013.pdf<@#&>>Program </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.healthy-workplaces.eu/sv/get-involved/summit-2013<@#&>>Läs mer om toppmötet</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/healthy-workplaces-summit-on-working-together-for-risk-prevention/CLEV 2013.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"sk";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Európsky sociálny model – hlavná hnacia sila konkurencieschopnosti";"<p>   Štyri agentúry EÚ - Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF a&nbsp;Eurofound - spoločnými silami 25. septembra 2013 preskúmajú a poukážu na to, ako každá z nich svojim vlastným a výnimočným spôsobom prispieva k posilňovaniu európskeho sociálneho modelu. Toto podujatie sa uskutoční pod záštitou Výboru Európskeho parlamentu pre zamestnanosť a sociálne veci a budú na ňom predstavené najnovšie uznesenia, ktoré prijal Európsky parlament v tejto oblasti, ako aj prehľad a činnosti týchto štyroch agentúr.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Prezrieť si fotografie z podujatia</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Podrobnejšie informácie</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"sl";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Evropski socialni model - ključno gonilo konkurenčnosti";"<p>   Štiri agencije EU, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF in Eurofound bodo 25. septembra 2013 združile moči pr pregledovanju in odločanju, kako vsaka na svoj način prispeva k okrepljenemu evropskemu socialnemu modelu. Dogodek bo potekal pod okriljem Odbora za zaposlovanje in socialne zadeve pri Evropskem parlamentu, na njem pa bodo predstavljene najnovejše resolucije, ki jih je na tem področju sprejel Parlament, kot tudi poznavanje tematike in delo vseh štirih agencij.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Poglejte fotografije s prireditve</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Več informacij</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"no";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Den europeiske samfunnsmodellen - en viktig drivkraft for konkurranseevne";"<p>   Fire EU-byråer, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF og Eurofound, vil den 25. september 2013 forene sine krefter for å undersøke og sette fokus på hvordan hvert av dem bidrar til å styrke den europeiske samfunnsmodellen, hver på sin måte. På seminaret, som støttes av Europaparlamentets komité for sysselsetting og sosiale spørsmål, vil Europaparlamentets siste resolusjoner på området presenteres i tillegg til de fire byråenes kunnskap og arbeid.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Se bilder fra arrangementet</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Finn ut mer</a></p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/no/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"lt";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Europos socialinis modelis – pagrindinė konkurencingumo skatinimo priemonė";"<p>   2013&nbsp;m. rugsėjo 25&nbsp;d. keturių ES agentūrų – Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF ir Eurofound – susitikime bus bendrai nagrinėjamas ir aptariamas kiekvienos agentūros indėlis į Europos socialinio modelio plėtojimą. Renginyje, kurį organizuoja Europos Parlamento Užimtumo ir socialinių reikalų komitetas, bus pristatytos naujausios Parlamento priimtos šios srities rezoliucijos, taip pat šių keturių agentūrų veiklos kryptys ir nuveikti darbai.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Žiūrėkite renginio nuotraukas</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Plačiau</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"hu";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Az európai szociális modell - a versenyképesség fő motorja";"<p>   Négy EU-ügynökség, a Cedefop, az EU-OSHA, az ETF és az Eurofound 2013. szeptember 25-én egyesítik erőfeszítéseiket, és kihangsúlyozva az egyéni szerepvállalásukat, megvizsgálják, hogyan járulhatnak hozzá a megerősített európai szociális modellhez. A rendezvény az Európai Parlament Foglalkoztatási és Szociális Ügyek Bizottságának védnöksége alatt kerül megrendezésre, ahol bemutatják a Parlament által e téren tett aktuális rendezési terveket, valamint a négy ügynökség tevékenységébe is betekintést nyerhetnek a látogatók.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Bővebb információ</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
