"/el/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"el";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Το ευρωπαϊκό κοινωνικό πρότυπο - βασικός παράγοντας για την ανταγωνιστικότητα";"<p>   Τέσσερις οργανισμοί της ΕΕ (Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF και Eurofound) ενώνουν τις δυνάμεις τους στις 25 Σεπτεμβρίου 2013 προκειμένου να εξετάσουν και να αναδείξουν πώς ο κάθε οργανισμός συμβάλλει - με τον δικό του μοναδικό τρόπο - στην ενίσχυση του ευρωπαϊκού κοινωνικού προτύπου. Η εκδήλωση θα πραγματοποιηθεί υπό την αιγίδα της Επιτροπής Απασχόλησης και Κοινωνικών Υποθέσεων του Ευρωπαϊκού Κοινοβουλίου. Θα παρουσιαστούν τα τελευταία ψηφίσματα του Κοινοβουλίου σε αυτόν τον τομέα, ενώ οι τέσσερις οργανισμοί θα παρουσιάσουν το έργο τους και άλλες πληροφορίες.</p>  <p>   &nbsp;</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Δείτε στιγμιότυπα από την εκδήλωση</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Περισσότερες πληροφορίες</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"bg";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Европейският социален модел - ключов фактор за конкурентност";"<p>   Четири агенции на ЕС, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF и Eurofound, ще обединят сили на 25 септември 2013 г., за да изследват и покажат как всяка от тях допринася за подобряване на Европейския социален модел - по свой начин. Събитието ще се проведе под егидата на Комисията по заетост и социални въпроси на Европейския парламент и ще представи последните решения на Парламента в областта, а също заключенията и дейността, извършена от четирите агенции.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Уебстрийм</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Снимки от събитието</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Повече информация</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"de";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Das Europäische Sozialmodell – ein wichtiger Faktor für die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit";"<p>   Vier EU-Agenturen –&nbsp;Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF und Eurofound&nbsp;– werden am 25.&nbsp;September&nbsp;2013 mit vereinten Kräften untersuchen und präsentieren, wie jede dieser Agenturen, auf ihre spezielle Weise, zu einem stärkeren Europäischen Sozialmodell beiträgt. Die Veranstaltung findet unter der Schirmherrschaft des Ausschusses für Beschäftigung und soziale Angelegenheiten des Europäischen Parlaments statt. Dabei werden neben den jüngsten Entschließungen des Parlaments in diesem Bereich die Tätigkeiten und Erkenntnisse der vier Agenturen vorgestellt.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Fotos von der Veranstaltung</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Weitere Informationen</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"cs";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Evropský sociální model – klíčový faktor pro konkurenceschopnost";"<p>   Čtyři agentury EU (Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF a Eurofound) spojí své síly a dne 25. září 2013 prodiskutují a vyzdvihnou, jak každá z nich svým vlastním, jedinečným způsobem přispívá k posílenému evropskému sociálnímu modelu. Akce se bude konat pod záštitou Výboru pro zaměstnanost a sociální věci Evropského parlamentu. Budou na ní představena nejnovější usnesení, která v této oblasti přijal Parlament, a uvedené čtyři agentury přiblíží svůj náhled na tuto problematiku a svoji činnost v dané oblasti.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Prohlédněte si fotografie z akce</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Více informací</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"es";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"El modelo social europeo - motor esencial de la competitividad";"<p>   Cuatro agencias de la UE (Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF y Eurofound) se reunirán el 25 de septiembre de 2013 para examinar y concretar cómo cada una de ellas puede contribuir a su manera a fortalecer el modelo social europeo. El acto se celebrará bajo los auspicios de la Comisión de Empleo y Asuntos Sociales del Parlamento Europeo y presentará las últimas resoluciones adoptadas por el Parlamento en este ámbito, así como las ideas y actividades de las cuatro agencias.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Vea fotos del evento</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Más información</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"da";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Den europæiske samfundsmodel - en vigtig drivkraft for konkurrenceevnen";"<p>   Fire agenturer, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF og Eurofound, vil den 25. september 2013 forene kræfterne om at undersøge og sætte fokus på, hvordan de hver på sin måde bidrager til at styrke den europæiske samfundsmodel. Ved arrangementet, som støttes af Europa-Parlamentets Udvalg om Beskæftigelse og Sociale Anliggender, vil de seneste beslutninger vedtaget af Europa-Parlamentet på området blive præsenteret sammen med de fire agentures viden og arbejde.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Se fotos fra arrangementet</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Læs mere</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"fr";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Le modèle social européen, facteur clé de la compétitivité";"<p>   Quatre agences de l'UE (à savoir, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF et Eurofound) regroupent leurs forces le 25 septembre 2013 afin d'examiner et de souligner la manière dont chacune d'elles contribue, de façon unique, à renforcer le modèle social européen. Cette manifestation sera organisée sous l'égide de la commission de l'emploi et des affaires sociales du Parlement européen et permettra de présenter les résolutions les plus récentes adoptées par le Parlement en la matière, ainsi que les analyses et travaux des quatre agences.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Voir des photos de la conférence</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>En savoir plus</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"it";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Il modello sociale europeo - un fattore trainante per la competitività";"<p>   Quattro agenzie dell'UE, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF ed Eurofound, uniranno le loro forze il 25 settembre 2013 per esaminare ed evidenziare come ciascuna di loro contribuisca, nel suo unico modo, al consolidamento del modello sociale europeo. L'evento si svolgerà sotto gli auspici della commissione per l'occupazione e gli affari sociali del Parlamento europeo e presenterà le ultime risoluzioni adottate dal Parlamento in tale settore nonché conoscenze e operato delle quattro agenzie.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Guarda le foto dell'evento</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Per saperne di più</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"is";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Félagsgerð Evrópu - helsti hvatinn fyrir samkeppnishæfni";"<p>   Fjórar stofnanir Evrópusambandsins, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF og Eurofond, ætla að taka höndum saman 25. september 2013 til þess að kanna og undirstrika hvernig hver og ein þeirra stuðlar að sterkari félagsgerð í Evrópu – hver með sínum hætti. Viðburðurinn verður haldinn á vegum atvinnu- og félagsmálanefndar Evrópuþingsins og verða þar nýjustu ályktanir þingsins á þessu sviði kynntar, ásamt því sem veitt verður innsýn inn í störf stofnananna fjögurra.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Skoða myndir af viðburðinum</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Frekari upplýsingar </a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"fi";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Eurooppalainen sosiaalinen malli – kilpailukyvyn avaintekijä";"<p>   Neljä EU-virastoa – Euroopan ammatillisen koulutuksen kehittämiskeskus, Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusvirasto, Euroopan koulutussäätiö sekä Euroopan elin- ja työolojen kehittämissäätiö – yhdistävät voimansa 25. syyskuuta 2013 tarkastellakseen ja tuodakseen esiin sitä, miten kukin omalla erityisellä tavallaan lujittaa Euroopan sosiaalista mallia. Tapahtuma järjestetään Euroopan parlamentin työllisyys- ja sosiaalivaliokunnan tukemana, ja siinä esitellään parlamentin viimeisimmät päätöslauselmat alalla.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Katso valokuvia tapahtumasta</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Lisätietoja</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"hr";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Europski socijalni model – ključni pokretač konkurentnosti";"<p>   Četiri agencije EU-a, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF i Eurofound, udružuju snage 25. rujna 2013. kako bi proučile i istaknule način na koji svaka od njih pridonosi ojačanom europskom socijalnom modelu – svaka na svoj način. Događaj će se održati pod pokroviteljstvom Odbora za zapošljavanje i socijalna pitanja Europskog parlamenta i predstavit će najnovije usvojene rezolucije Parlamenta na tom području kao i spoznaje te rad četiri agencije.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Pregledavati fotografije </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Saznajte više</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"et";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Euroopa sotsiaalne mudel – konkurentsivõime põhiedendaja";"<p>   Neli Euroopa Liidu asutust – Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF ja Eurofound kohtuvad 25. septembril 2013, et arutada ja näidata, kuidas nad kõik oma ainulaadsel viisil panustavad Euroopa tugevdatud sotsiaalsesse mudelisse. Üritus toimub Euroopa Parlamendi tööhõive ja sotsiaalvaldkonna egiidi all ja selle raames tutvustatakse valdkonda käsitlevaid parlamendi uusimaid resolutsioone ning nelja asutuse arvamusi ja tegevust.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Ürituse fotod</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Lisateave</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"lv";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Eiropas sociālais modelis - konkurētspējas galvenais dzinējspēks";"<p>   Četras ES aģentūras – Eiropas Profesionālās izglītības attīstības centrs, Eiropas Darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības aģentūra, Eiropas Izglītības fonds un Eiropas Dzīves un darba apstākļu uzlabošanas fonds 2013.&nbsp;gada 25. septembrī apvieno pūliņus, lai izpētītu un uzsvērtu veidus, kā katra no tām savā īpašā veidā sniedz ieguldījumu Eiropas sociālā modeļa nostiprināšanā. Šis pasākums tiks rīkots Eiropas Parlamenta Nodarbinātības un sociālo lietu komitejas vadībā, un tas sniegs iespēju iepazīties ar jaunākajām Parlamenta rezolūcijām šajā jomā, kā arī ar šo četru aģentūru pieredzi un darbu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Skatīt pasākuma fotogrāfijas </a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Papildinformācija</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"sv";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Den europeiska sociala modellen – en viktig förutsättning för konkurrenskraft";"<p>   Fyra EU-organ, Europeiska centrumet för yrkesutbildning, Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyrån, Europeiska yrkesutbildningsstiftelsen och Europeiska institutet för förbättring av levnads- och arbetsvillkor, samlas den 25 september 2013 för att granska och belysa hur var och en av dem på sitt eget unika sätt bidrar till att förstärka den europeiska sociala modellen. Evenemanget äger rum hos Europaparlamentets utskott för sysselsättning och sociala frågor. Parlamentets senaste resolutioner på området kommer att presenteras tillsammans med de fyra EU-organens erfarenheter och arbete.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Se bilder från evenemanget</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Läs mer</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"ro";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Modelul social european - un motor-cheie pentru competitivitate";"<p>   Patru agenţii ale UE, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF şi Eurofound, îşi reunesc forţele pe 25 septembrie 2013 pentru a evalua şi evidenţia modul în care contribuie fiecare - în felul său unic - la un model social european consolidat. Evenimentul va avea loc sub auspiciile Comisiei pentru ocuparea forței de muncă și afaceri sociale din cadrul Parlamentului European şi va prezenta cele mai recente rezoluţii adoptate de Parlament în domeniu, precum şi informaţii despre cele patru agenţii şi activităţile desfăşurate de acestea.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Vizualizaţi fotografiile de la eveniment</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Aflaţi mai multe informaţii</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"mt";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Il-mudell soċjali Ewropew - protagonist ewlieni għall-kompetittività";"<p>   Nhar il-25 ta' Settembru 2013, erba' aġenziji tal-UE, is-Cedefop, l-UE-OSHA, l-ETF u l-Eurofound se jingħaqdu flimkien biex jeżaminaw u jissottolinjaw kif kull aġenzija qed tikkontribwixxi għat-tisħiħ tal-Mudell Soċjali Ewropew - kulħadd bil-metodu tiegħu. L-attività ser tkun taħt l-awspiċi tal-Kumitat tal-Impjiegi u l-Affarjiet Soċjali tal-Parlament Ewropew u ser tippreżenta l-aħħar riżoluzzjonijiet adottati mill-Parlament f'dan il-qasam, kif ukoll xi tagħrif u l-ħidma tal-erba' aġenziji.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Ara r-ritratti mill-avveniment</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Sir af aktar</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"pl";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Europejski model społeczny: kluczowy czynnik konkurencyjności";"<p>   Cztery agencje unijne&nbsp;–&nbsp;CEDEFOP, EU-OSHA, ETF i Eurofound&nbsp;–&nbsp;spotkają się dnia 25 września 2013&nbsp;r. w celu zanalizowania i podkreślenia unikalnej roli każdej z nich we wzmacnianiu europejskiego modelu społecznego. Podczas wydarzenia,&nbsp;które odbędzie się pod patronatem Komisji Zatrudnienia i Praw Socjalnych Parlementu Europejskiego,&nbsp;zostaną przedstawione ostatnie rezolucje przyjęte przez Parlament w tej dziedzinie, oraz spostrzeżenia i działalność uczestniczących agencji.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Zobacz zdjęcia z imprezy</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Więcej informacji</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"nl";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Het Europese sociale model - een essentiële aanjager voor concurrentievermogen";"<p>   Op 25 september 2013 bundelen vier EU-agentschappen, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF en Eurofound, hun krachten om te bekijken hoe ze - elk op hun eigen unieke manier - bijdragen aan een versterkt Europees sociaal model. Het evenement vindt plaats onder auspiciën van de Commissie werkgelegenheid en sociale zaken van het Europees Parlement. De recente door het Parlement op dit gebied vastgestelde resoluties zullen aan de orde komen, evenals de ervaringen en werkzaamheden van de vier agentschappen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Foto's van het evenement</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Meer informatie</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"pt";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"O Modelo Social Europeu - um motor essencial da competitividade";"<p>   Quatro agências da UE, o Cedefop, a EU-OSHA, a ETF e a Eurofound, congregam esforços, em 25 de setembro de 2013, para analisar e salientar o modo como cada uma contribui, à sua maneira única, para o reforço do Modelo Social Europeu. O evento será realizado sob os auspícios da Comissão do Emprego e dos Assuntos Sociais do Parlamento Europeu e apresentará as mais recentes resoluções adotadas pelo Parlamento neste domínio, bem como as perspetivas e o trabalho das quatro agências.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>Veja as fotografias do evento</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Informações adicionais</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness";"en";"";"published";"2013-07-22 14:41:31";"2014-07-25 10:48:50";"2013-09-23 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"The European social model - a key driver for competitiveness";"<p>   Four EU agencies, Cedefop, EU-OSHA, ETF and Eurofound, are joining forces on 25 September 2013 to examine and highlight how each one is contributing to a strengthened European Social Model – in its own unique way. The event will be held under the auspices of the European Parliament’s Employment and Social Affairs Committee and will present the latest resolutions adopted by the Parliament in this field, as well as insights and work from the four agencies.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.europarl.europa.eu/ep-live/en/committees/video?event=20130925-0930-COMMITTEE-EMPL<@#&>>Webstream</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.flickr.com/photos/eurofoundimages<@#&>>View photos from the event</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.cedefop.europa.eu/EN/events/21628.aspx<@#&>>Find out more</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/the-european-social-model-a-key-driver-for-competitiveness/4agencies.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"de";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Bericht zu den Hauptfaktoren für die Praxis im Bereich Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz";"<p>   Ein neuer Bericht der EU-OSHA legt die kontextuellen und umfeldbedingten Faktoren dar, die bestimmend für die Vorgehensweisen beim Arbeitsschutzmanagement sind.</p>  <p>   Der Bericht als Folgestudie zur ESENER-Erhebung gelangt zu dem Schluss, dass die Arbeitsumfelder in den EU-Mitgliedstaaten dynamisch und veränderlich sind. Allerdings weisen sie erhebliche Unterschiede auf.</p>  <p>   Daraus wird zum Teil deutlich, warum die Arbeitsbestimmungen der EU am Arbeitsplatz nicht durchgängig angewendet werden.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Lesen Sie die Presseerklärung</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lesen Sie den Bericht</a> (in englischer Sprache)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/de/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lesen Sie die Zusammenfassung</a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"es";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un informe arroja luz sobre factores clave para determinar prácticas en materia de salud y seguridad en el trabajo";"<p>   Un nuevo informe de EU-OSHA describe los factores contextuales y ambientales que determinan los enfoques para la gestión de la salud y la seguridad en el trabajo.</p>  <p>   Este informe, que es un estudio de seguimiento de la encuesta ESENER, pone de manifiesto que los entornos de trabajo en los Estados miembros de la UE tienen un carácter dinámico y cambiante. No obstante, existen diferencias significativas entre ellos.</p>  <p>   Este informe ayuda a explicar por qué las disposiciones laborales de la UE no se aplican de forma universal en el lugar de trabajo.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Lea el comunicado de prensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lea el informe</a> (en inglés)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lea el resumen</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"et";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Uues aruandes käsitletakse peamisi tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu tavasid määravaid tegureid";"<p>   EU-OSHA uues aruandes kirjeldatakse tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu juhtimisviise kujundavaid tausta- ja keskkonnategureid.</p>  <p>   Uute ja tekkivate riskide alase Euroopa ettevõtete uuringu (ESENER) järeluuringus leitakse, et ELi liikmesriikide töökeskkonnad on dünaamilised ja muutlikud. Erinevused nende vahel on aga märgatavad.</p>  <p>   Aruande järeldused aitavad selgust tuua küsimuses, miks ELi töönõudeid ei kohaldata töökohtades ühtsel viisil.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/et/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Pressiteade</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Aruanne</a> (ingl k)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Kokkuvõte</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"sk";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Správa vysvetľuje kľúčové faktory podmieňujúce prax v oblasti bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia pri práci.";"<p>   Nová správa agentúry Európskej agentúry pre bezpečnosť a&nbsp;ochranu zdravia pri práci (EU-OSHA) opisuje kontextové faktory a&nbsp;faktory týkajúce sa prostredia, ktoré formujú prístupy k&nbsp;riadeniu bezpečnosti a&nbsp;ochrany zdravia pri práci.</p>  <p>   Správa vypracovaná v&nbsp;rámci štúdie nadväzujúcej na prieskum podnikov o&nbsp;nových a&nbsp;vznikajúcich rizikách (ESENER) obsahuje zistenia, podľa ktorých majú pracovné prostredia v&nbsp;členských štátoch EÚ dynamickú a&nbsp;premenlivú povahu. Rozdiely medzi nimi sú však výrazné.</p>  <p>   Podrobná analýza pomáha vysvetliť nejednotnosť pri uplatňovaní pracovných požiadaviek EÚ na pracoviskách.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sk/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Prečítajte si tlačovú správu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Prečítajte si správu</a> (v&nbsp;angličtine)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Prečítajte si súhrn</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"pt";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"O relatório contribui para clarificar os principais fatores que determinam a prática de SST";"<p>   Um novo relatório da EU-OSHA descreve os fatores contextuais e ambientais que configuram as abordagens à gestão da SST.</p>  <p>   O relatório, um estudo complementar ao Inquérito Europeu às Empresas sobre Riscos Novos e Emergentes (ESENER), conclui que os ambientes de trabalho nos Estados-Membros da UE têm uma natureza dinâmica e evolutiva. Contudo, prevalecem diferenças significativas.</p>  <p>   Esta visão ajuda a explicar por que razão as condições de trabalho exigidas na UE não são aplicadas no local de trabalho de forma universal.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pt/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Ler o comunicado de imprensa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Ler o relatório</a> (em inglês)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Ler o resumo</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"bg";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Доклад хвърля светлина върху основни фактори, определящи практиката при БЗР";"<p>   Нов доклад от EU-OSHA описва контекстуалните и екологичните фактори, които оформят подходите към управлението на БЗР.</p>  <p>   Последващо проучване към ESENER — в доклада се установява, че работната среда в държавите членки на ЕС, има динамичен и променлив характер. Разликите между тях обаче са значителни.</p>  <p>   Това вникване помага да се обясни защо работните изисквания в ЕС не се прилагат на работното място по универсален начин.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Прочетете прессъобщението</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Прочетете доклада</a> (на английски език)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/bg/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Прочетете резюмето</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"is";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Skýrsla varpar ljósi á lykilatriði er varða vinnuverndarverklag";"<p>   Skýrsla frá Vinnuverndarstofnun Evrópu lýsir þáttum er lúta að samhengi og umhverfi, sem móta aðferðir við stjórnun vinnuverndar.</p>  <p>   Skýrslan, sem er framhaldsrannsókn á vegum ESENER, kemst að þeirri niðurstöðu að eðli vinnuumhverfis í aðildarríkjum ESB sé bæði virkt og breytilegt. Hins vegar eru frávikin þar á milli mikilvæg.</p>  <p>   Þessi innsýn skýrir hvers vegna starfskröfur innan ESB eiga ekki við um vinnustaði á alþjóðlega vísu.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/is/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Lesa fréttatilkynninguna</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lesa skýrsluna</a> (á ensku)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lesa samantektina</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"lt";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ataskaita padeda geriau suprasti pagrindinius darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos praktiką lemiančius veiksnius";"<p>   Naujoje Europos saugos ir sveikatos darbe agentūros ataskaitoje aprašomi kontekstiniai ir aplinkos veiksniai, pagal kuriuos kuriami darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos valdymo metodai.</p>  <p>   Ataskaita yra Europos įmonių apklausos dėl naujų ir atsinaujinančių rizikos rūšių (ESENER) tęsinys. Joje pateikti duomenys rodo, kad ES valstybėse narėse darbo sąlygos yra dinamiškos ir kintančios. Vis dėlto šios sąlygos labai skiriasi.</p>  <p>   Ši įžvalga padeda paaiškinti, kodėl ES reikalavimai darbo vietoms nėra taikomi visuotinai.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lt/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Skaitykite pranešimą spaudai</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Skaitykite ataskaitą</a> (anglų kalba)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Skaitykite santrauką</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"da";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ny rapport kaster lys over afgørende nøglefaktorer for arbejdsmiljøpraksis";"<p>   En ny rapport fra EU-OSHA beskriver de årsagssammenhænge og miljømæssige faktorer, der former strategier for arbejdsmiljøforvaltning.</p>  <p>   Rapporten følger op på ESENER-undersøgelsen og konkluderer, at arbejdsmiljøer i EU's medlemsstater har en dynamisk og skiftende karakter. Der er imidlertid markante forskelle mellem de forskellige lande.</p>  <p>   Undersøgelsen er med til at afdække, hvorfor EU's arbejdsmiljøkrav ikke anvendes generelt på arbejdsladsen.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/da/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Læs pressemeddelelsen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Læs rapporten</a> (på engelsk)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Læs sammendraget</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"nl";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Het verslag besteedt aandacht aan de factoren die bepalend zijn voor praktijken op het gebied van veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk";"<p>   Een nieuw verslag van EU-OSHA beschrijft de contextuele en omgevingsfactoren die van invloed zijn op de manier waarop wordt omgegaan met veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk.</p>  <p>   Uit het verslag, een vervolgstudie op de bedrijvenenquête over nieuwe en opkomende risico's (Esener), komt naar voren dat werkomgevingen in de EU-lidstaten een dynamisch en veranderlijk karakter hebben. Er zijn echter grote onderlinge verschillen.</p>  <p>   Dit inzicht verklaart waarom Europese arbeidseisen niet op een universele manier op de werkplek worden toegepast.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Lees het persbericht</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lees het verslag</a> (Engelstalig)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lees de samenvatting</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"hr";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Izvješće rasvjetljava ključne čimbenike koji određuju provođenje OSH-a";"<p>   Novo izvješće EU-OSHA-e opisuje kontekstualne i okolinske čimbenike koji oblikuju pristupe upravljanju OSH-om.</p> <p>   Izvješće studija praćenja ESENER-a pokazuje da su uvjeti rada u državama članicama EU-a dinamične i promjenjive prirode. Međutim razlike među njima su znatne.</p> <p>   Ovaj uvid objašnjava zašto se uvjeti rada u EU-u ne primjenjuju na radno mjesto na jedinstven način.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Pročitajte priopćenje za javnost</a><br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Pročitajte izvješće</a> (na engleskom jeziku)<br /> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Pročitajte sažetak</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"it";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Relazione OSHA: chiariti i fattori chiave alla base delle prassi in materia di SSL";"<p>   Una nuova relazione dell'EU-OSHA descrive i fattori contestuali e ambientali che determinano gli approcci alla gestione della SSL.</p>  <p>   Come studio di follow-up dell'indagine ESENER, la relazione rileva che gli ambienti di lavoro negli Stati membri dell'UE presentano una natura dinamica e mutevole. Tuttavia, vi sono tra questi differenze significative.</p>  <p>   L'analisi contribuisce a spiegare perché i requisiti dell'UE in materia di occupazione non sono applicati in modo univoco nei luoghi di lavoro.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/it/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Leggi il comunicato stampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Leggi la relazione</a> (in inglese)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Leggi la sintesi</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"mt";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ir-rapport jitfa' dawl fuq il-fatturi ewlenin li jistabbilixxu l-prattika tal-OHS";"<p>   Rapport ġdid mill-EU-OSHA jiddeskrivi l-fatturi kuntestwali u ambjentali li jiffurmaw l-approċċi għall-ġestjoni tal-OHS.</p>  <p>   Ir-rapport, li huwa studju ta' segwitu għall-ESENER, isib li l-ambjenti tax-xogħol fl-Istati Membri tal-UE għandhom natura dinamika u li tinbidel. Madankollu, id-differenzi bejniethom huma sinifikanti.</p>  <p>   Dan ir-rapport ġenerali jgħin biex jispjega għaliex ir-rekwiżiti ta' xogħol fl-UE ma jiġux applikati b'mod universali fuq il-post tax-xogħol.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/mt/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Aqra l-istqarrija għall-istampa</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Aqra r-rapport</a> (bl-Ingliż)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Aqra s-sommarju</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"fi";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Raportti valottaa TTT-käytäntöjä määrittäviä avaintekijöitä";"<p>   Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusviraston (EU-OSHA) uudessa raportissa esitellään tausta- ja ympäristötekijöitä, jotka muokkaavat lähestymistapoja työsuojelun hallintaan.</p>  <p>   Raportti on ESENER-tutkimuksen seurantatutkimus, ja siitä käy ilmi, että EU:n jäsenvaltioiden työympäristöt ovat luonteeltaan dynaamisia ja muuttuvia. Niiden välillä on kuitenkin merkittäviä eroja.</p>  <p>   Tämä auttaa ymmärtämään, miksi EU:n työtä koskevia vaatimuksia ei sovelleta työpaikoilla yleispätevästi.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fi/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Lue lehdistötiedote</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lue raportti</a> (englanniksi)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lue yhteenveto</a></p>";"";"/fi/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"fr";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Le rapport explique les facteurs clés déterminant les pratiques de SST";"<p>   Un nouveau rapport de l'EU-OSHA décrit les facteurs contextuels et environnementaux qui influencent les approches de la gestion de la SST.</p>  <p>   Rédigé en tant qu'étude de suivi à la suite de l'ESENER, le rapport conclut que les environnements de travail des États membres de l'UE possèdent une nature dynamique et évolutive. Ils sont toutefois marqués par des différences importantes.</p>  <p>   Cela permet d'expliquer pourquoi les exigences de l'UE concernant le lieu de travail ne sont pas appliquées de manière uniforme.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Lire le communiqué de presse</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lire le rapport</a> (en anglais)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/fr/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lire le résumé</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"lv";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ziņojumā ir skaidroti galvenie faktori, kas nosaka DDVA praksi.";"<p>   Jaunajā EU-OSHA ziņojumā ir aprakstīti kontekstuālie un vides faktori, kas nosaka DDVA pārvaldības metodes.</p>  <p>   Ziņojumā, kas ir uz Eiropas uzņēmumu apsekojuma par jaunajiem un nākotnes riska veidiem (ESENER) datiem balstīts pētījums, ir konstatēts, ka darba vide ES dalībvalstīs ir dinamiska un mainīga. Tomēr šajā ziņā vērojamas arī nozīmīgas atšķirības.</p>  <p>   Šis ieskats palīdz izskaidrot, kāpēc ES prasības attiecībā uz darbu dažādās darbavietās netiek piemērotas universāli.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Lasīt paziņojumu presei</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lasīt ziņojumu</a> (angļu valodā)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/lv/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Lasīt kopsavilkumu</a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"no";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Rapport belyser hvilke faktorer som bestemmer HMS-praksis";"<p>   En ny rapport fra EU-OSHA beskriver hvilke kontekstuelle og miljømessige faktorer som former tilnærmingene til HMS-styring.</p>  <p>   Rapporten er en oppfølgingsstudie til ESENER og finner at arbeidsmiljøet i EUs medlemsstater har en dynamisk og skiftende natur. Det er imidlertid store forskjeller medlemsstatene imellom.</p>  <p>   Dette er en del av forklaringen på hvorfor EUs krav til arbeidsmiljø ikke blir ensartet gjennomført.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/no/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Les pressemeldingen</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Les rapporten</a> (på engelsk)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Les sammendraget</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"cs";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Zpráva vysvětluje klíčové faktory určující postupy BOZP";"<p>   Nová zpráva agentury EU-OSHA popisuje faktory, které vyplývají ze souvislostí a prostředí a utvářejí přístupy k&nbsp;řízení BOZP.</p>  <p>   Zpráva, která je studií navazující na průzkum ESENER, přináší zjištění, že pracovní prostředí v&nbsp;členských státech EU má dynamický a měnící se charakter. Rozdíly mezi nimi jsou však výrazné.</p>  <p>   Tento přehled pomáhá vysvětlit, proč pracovní požadavky v&nbsp;EU nejsou na pracovišti uplatňovány jednotně.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/cs/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Přečtěte si tiskovou zprávu</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Přečtete si zprávu</a> (v&nbsp;angličtině)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Přečtěte si shrnutí</a></p>";"";"/cs/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sv/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"sv";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Rapporten belyser de viktigaste faktorerna bakom arbetsmiljöpraxis.";"<p>   En ny rapport från Europeiska arbetsmiljöbyrån beskriver de sammanhangs- och miljöfaktorer som formar strategierna bakom arbetsmiljöledning.</p>  <p>   Rapporten är en uppföljningsstudie till Esener och beskriver arbetsmiljöerna i EU:s medlemsstater som dynamiska och föränderliga. Skillnaden mellan länderna är dock tydlig.</p>  <p>   Denna insikt är en del av förklaringen till att EU:s arbetarskydd inte tillämpas på ett enhetligt sätt på arbetsplatserna.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Läs pressmeddelandet</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Läs rapporten</a> (på engelska)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sv/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Läs sammanfattningen</a></p>";"";"/sv/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"pl";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"W sprawozdaniu naświetlono podstawowe czynniki, które determinują praktykę BHP";"<p>   W nowym sprawozdaniu EU-OSHA opisano kontekstowe i środowiskowe czynniki, które kształtują podejście do zarządzania BHP.</p>  <p>   Na podstawie badania monitorującego ESENER w sprawozdaniu stwierdza się, że atmosfera w pracy w państwach członkowskich UE ma charakter dynamiczny i zmienny. Różnice między poszczególnymi państwami członkowskimi są jednak znaczne.</p>  <p>   Niniejsza analiza pomaga wyjaśnić przyczyny niejednorodnego stosowania wymogów UE w miejscach pracy.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/pl/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Przeczytaj komunikat prasowy</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj sprawozdanie</a> (w języku angielskim)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Przeczytaj podsumowanie</a></p>";"";"/pl/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"ro";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Un raport care scoate în evidenţă principalii factori care stau la baza practicilor SSM";"<p>   Un nou raport publicat de EU-OSHA descrie factorii contextuali şi de mediu care influenţează abordările gestionării SSM.</p>  <p>   Raportul, un studiu realizat în urma rezultatelor ESENER, constată că mediile de lucru din statele membre au un caracter dinamic şi schimbător. Între aceste medii de lucru există însă diferenţe considerabile.</p>  <p>   Informaţiile prezentate ajută la explicarea motivelor pentru care nu există o modalitate universală de aplicare la locurile de muncă a cerinţelor UE în materie de muncă.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Citiţi comunicatul de presă</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Citiţi raportul</a> (în limba engleză)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Citiţi rezumatul</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"el";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Η έκθεση σκιαγραφεί τους βασικούς παράγοντες που καθορίζουν τις πρακτικές ΕΑΥ";"<p>   Μια νέα έκθεση του EU-OSHA περιγράφει τους γενικούς και περιβαλλοντικούς παράγοντες που διαμορφώνουν τις προσεγγίσεις για τη διαχείριση της ΕΑΥ.</p>  <p>   Η εν λόγω έκθεση, η οποία διενεργήθηκε σε συνέχεια της έρευνας ESENER, καταδεικνύει ότι οι χώροι εργασίας στα κράτη μέλη της ΕΕ παρουσιάζουν δυναμικό και εξελισσόμενο χαρακτήρα, αλλά ταυτόχρονα και σημαντικές διαφορές.</p>  <p>   Η κατανόηση των διαφορών αυτών εξηγεί τους λόγους για τους οποίους οι απαιτήσεις της ΕΕ στον τομέα της εργασίας δεν εφαρμόζονται στον χώρο εργασίας με ομοιογενή τρόπο.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Διαβάστε το δελτίο Τύπου</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την έκθεση</a> (στα αγγλικά)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/el/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Διαβάστε την περίληψη</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"hu";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"A jelentés fényt derített a munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségvédelmi gyakorlatot meghatározó tényezőkre";"<p>   Az EU-OSHA új jelentése bemutatja a munkahelyi biztonsági és egészségvédelmi irányításhoz való hozzáállást meghatározó kontextuális és környezeti tényezőket.</p>  <p>   Az ESENER utókövető tanulmányaként elkészült jelentés megállapította, hogy a munkakörnyezet az EU tagállamaiban dinamikusan, folyamatosan változik. A tagállamok között mindazonáltal jelentős különbségek vannak.</p>  <p>   A betekintés révén magyarázatot kapunk arra, hogy az uniós munkahelyi követelményeket miért nem alkalmazzák egységesen a munkahelyeken.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/hu/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Sajtóközlemény</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>A jelentés</a> (angol nyelven)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Összefoglalás</a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"sl";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"V poročilu so predstavljeni ključni dejavniki, od katerih je odvisno ravnanje na področju varnosti in zdravja pri delu.";"<p>   V novem poročilu agencije EU-OSHA so opisani dejavniki, ki se nanašajo na okoliščine in okolje ter oblikujejo pristope k upravljanju varnosti in zdravja pri delu.</p>  <p>   Poročilo, ki nadgrajuje raziskavo ESENER, ugotavlja, da so delovna okolja v državah članicah EU dinamična in se spreminjajo. Vendar so razlike med njimi velike.</p>  <p>   Ta vpogled pomaga pojasniti, zakaj se zahteve na področju dela v EU na delovnih mestih ne uporabljajo enotno.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/sl/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Preberite sporočilo za javnost</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Preberite poročilo</a> (v angleščini)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Preberite povzetek</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice";"en";"";"published";"2013-08-29 12:57:47";"2014-07-25 10:47:48";"2013-09-19 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Report sheds light on the key factors determining OSH practice";"<p>   A new report from EU-OSHA describes the contextual and environmental factors that shape approaches to OSH management.</p>  <p>   A follow-up study to ESENER, the report finds that working environments in EU Member States have a dynamic and changing nature. However, the differences between them are significant.</p>  <p>   This insight helps to explain why EU work requirements are not applied in the workplace in a universal manner.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/press/press-releases/how-can-successful-prevention-strategies-at-eu-level-take-account-of-different-factors-at-national-level<@#&>>Read the press release</a><br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Read the report</a> (in English)<br />   <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/publications/reports/summary-analysis-determinants-workplace-OSH-in-EU/view<@#&>>Read the summary</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/report-sheds-light-on-the-key-factors-determining-osh-practice/ESENER.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/el/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"el";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Πρόσκληση εκδήλωσης ενδιαφέροντος για συμμετοχή στο Διεθνές Φεστιβάλ Μέσων Επικοινωνίας για την Πρόληψη - 2014";"<p>   Το Διεθνές Φεστιβάλ Μέσων Επικοινωνίας για την Πρόληψη (IMFP) διοργανώνεται στις 25-27 Αυγούστου 2014 στο πλαίσιο του 20ού Παγκόσμιου Συνεδρίου Ασφάλειας και Υγείας στην Εργασία, στη Φρανκφούρτη/Main, Γερμανία.</p> <p>   Στο Φεστιβάλ θα προβληθούν κινηματογραφικές ταινίες και πολυμεσικές παραγωγές από ολόκληρο τον κόσμο παρέχοντας στους συμμετέχοντες τη δυνατότητα να παρουσιάσουν τα έργα τους σε ευρύ κοινό σημαντικών διεθνών φορέων του τομέα της ασφάλειας και της υγείας.</p> <p>   Η προθεσμία υποβολής συμμετοχών είναι η 31 Ιανουαρίου 2014. Η απονομή των βραβείων θα πραγματοποιηθεί στο Παγκόσμιο Συνέδριο 2014 στη Φρανκφούρτη.</p> <p>   Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες, επισκεφθείτε τον δικτυακό τόπο του <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>20ού Παγκόσμιου Συνεδρίου Ασφάλειας και Υγείας στην Εργασία - 2014</a></p>";"";"/el/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"en";"";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"International Media Festival for Prevention 2014 calls for participants";"<p>   The International Media Festival for Prevention (IMFP) takes place from August 25th – 27th, 2014 as part of the XX World Congress on Safety and Health at Work in Frankfurt/Main, Germany.</p>  <p>   The Festival offers an overview of films and multimedia productions from all over the world and provides an opportunity for participants to present their projects to a major group of influential international safety and health professionals.</p>  <p>   The deadline for entries is January 31st, 2014. Prizes will be awarded at the World Congress 2014 in Frankfurt.</p>  <p>   To learn more, visit the website of the <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX World Congress on Safety and Health at Work 2014</a></p>";"";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"esener";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"is";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Hin alþjóðlega fjölmiðlahátíð um forvarnir 2014 kallar eftir þátttakendum";"<p>   Hin alþjóðlega fjölmiðlahátíð um forvarnir (IMFP) verður haldin dagana 25. – 27. ágúst, 2014 og er hluti af XX vinnuverndarheimsþinginu í Frankfurt/Main í Þýskalandi.</p> <p>   Á hátíðinni er boðið upp á yfirlit kvikmynda og margmiðlunarframleiðslu víðsvegar að úr heiminum og þar er tækifæri fyrir þátttakendur til að kynna verkefni sín fyrir stórum hópi áhrifamikilla sérfræðinga í vinnuvernd.</p> <p>   Skilafrestur til þátttöku er til 31. janúar, 2014. Verðlaun verða veitt á heimsþinginu 2014 í Frankfurt.</p> <p>   Til að fræðast frekar, heimsækið vefsíðu <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX vinnuverndarheimsþingsins 2014</a></p>";"";"/is/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"it";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Festival internazionale dei media per la prevenzione 2014: invito a partecipare";"<p>   Il Festival internazionale dei media per la prevenzione (IMFP) si terrà dal 25 al 27 agosto 2014 nell'ambito del XX Congresso mondiale sulla sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro a Francoforte (Germania).</p> <p>   Il Festival propone una panoramica di film e produzioni multimediali di tutto il mondo, offrendo ai partecipanti l'occasione di presentare i propri progetti a un pubblico importante di esperti internazionali di peso nel settore della salute e della sicurezza.</p> <p>   Il termine per le iscrizioni è il 31 gennaio 2014. I premi saranno consegnati in occasione del Congresso mondiale 2014 a Francoforte.</p> <p>   Per saperne di più, visita il sito del <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX Congresso mondiale sulla sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro 2014</a></p>";"";"/it/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"cs";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Mezinárodní mediální festival pro prevenci 2014 zve k účasti";"<p>   Mezinárodní mediální festival pro prevenci (IMFP z angl. International Media Festival for Prevention) se koná ve dnech 25. až 27. srpna 2014 v rámci XX. světového kongresu pro bezpečnost a ochranu zdraví při práci v německém Frankfurtu nad Mohanem.</p> <p>   Festival nabízí přehled filmů a multimediálních děl z celého světa a účastníkům dává příležitost představit jejich projekty významné skupině vlivných odborníků na bezpečnost a ochranu zdraví z celého světa.</p> <p>   Termín pro odeslání příspěvků je 31. ledna 2014. Ceny budou uděleny na světovém kongresu 2014 ve Frankfurtu.</p> <p>   Chcete-li více informací, navštivte internetové stránky <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX. světového kongresu pro bezpečnost a ochranu zdraví při práci 2014</a>.</p>";"";"/cs/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"et";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014. aasta rahvusvaheline ennetamise meediafestival ootab osalejaid";"<p>   Rahvusvaheline ennetamise meediafestival (International Media Festival for Prevention, IMFP) toimub 25.–27. augustil 2014 XX tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu maailmakongressi raames Saksamaal Frankfurdis.</p> <p>   Festivalil antakse ülevaade maailma eri paikadest pärit teemakohastest filmidest ja multimeediatoodangust ning osalistel on võimalus tutvustada oma projekte mõjukatest rahvusvahelistest ohutus- ja tervishoiuspetsialistidest koosnevale hindamisrühmale.</p> <p>   Lahendusi saab esitada 31. jaanuarini 2014. Auhinnad antakse üle 2014. aasta maailmakongressil Frankfurdis.</p> <p>   Lisateave <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>2014. aastal toimuva XX tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu maailmakongressi veebilehel</a>.</p>";"";"/et/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"fr";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"L'édition 2014 du Festival international des médias de la prévention recherche des participants";"<p>   Le Festival international des médias de la prévention (FIMP) est organisé du 25 au 27 août 2014, dans le cadre du XXe Congrès mondial pour la sécurité et la santé au travail à Francfort-sur-le-Main, en Allemagne.</p> <p>   Proposant une sélection de films et de productions multimédias du monde entier, le Festival permet aux participants de présenter leurs projets à un grand nombre de professionnels internationaux de premier plan dans le domaine de la santé et de la sécurité.</p> <p>   Les candidatures peuvent être envoyées jusqu'au 31 janvier 2014. Les prix seront remis à l'occasion du Congrès mondial 2014 à Francfort.</p> <p>   Pour en savoir plus, visitez le site web du <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/fr/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XXe Congrès mondial pour la sécurité et la santé au travail 2014</a></p>";"";"/fr/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"bg";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Покана за участници в Международния медиен фестивал за превенция 2014 г.";"<p>   Международният медиен фестивал за превенция (IMFP) се провежда от 25-ти до 27-ми август 2014 г., като част от XX-я Световен конгрес за безопасност и здраве при работа във Франкфурт на Майн, Германия.</p> <p>   Фестивалът предлага преглед на филми и мултимедийни продукции от целия свят и предоставя възможност на участниците да представят своите проекти пред значителна група от влиятелни международни специалисти по безопасност и здраве.</p> <p>   Крайният срок за подаване на кандидатури е 31 януари 2014 г. Наградите ще бъдат връчени на Световния конгрес през 2014 г. във Франкфурт.</p> <p>   За допълнителна информация посетете уебсайта на <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX-я Световен конгрес за безопасност и здраве при работа 2014 г.</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"hr";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Međunarodni medijski festival za prevenciju 2014. poziva sudionike";"<p>   Međunarodni medijski festival za prevenciju (IMFP) održava se od 25. do 27. kolovoza 2014. kao dio XX. svjetskog kongresa o sigurnosti i zdravlju na radu u Frankfurtu na Majni u Njemačkoj.</p> <p>   Festival nudi pregled filmova i multimedijskih produkcija iz cijeloga svijeta te sudionicima pruža mogućnost predstavljanja svojih projekata velikoj skupini specijalista za međunarodnu sigurnost i zdravlje.</p> <p>   Rok za prijavu je 31. siječnja 2014. Nagrade će biti dodijeljene na Svjetskom kongresu 2014. u Frankfurtu.</p> <p>   Kako biste saznali više, posjetite internetsku stranicu <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX. svjetskog kongresa o sigurnosti i zdravlju na radu 2014.</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"no";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Nå kan du melde deg på den internasjonale mediefestivalen for forebygging 2014 (The International Media Festival for Prevention 2014)";"<p>   Den internasjonale mediefestivalen for forebygging går av stabelen 25.-27. august 2014 som del av den 20. verdenskongressen for sikkerhet og helse på arbeidsplassen (XX World Congress on Safety and Health at Work) i Frankfurt/Main i Tyskland.</p> <p>   Festivalen gir en oversikt over filmer og multimedieproduksjoner fra hele verden og gir deltakerne anledning til å presentere sine prosjekter for en større gruppe innflytelsesrike internasjonale HMS-fagfolk.</p> <p>   Fristen for innsending av bidrag er 31. januar 2014. Premiene deles ut på verdenskongressen 2014 i Frankfurt.</p> <p>   Ønsker du å vite mer, kan du besøke nettstedet til <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX World Congress on Safety and Health at Work 2014</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"lv";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"2014. gada Starptautiskais plašsaziņas līdzekļu festivāls profilakses jomā aicina pieteikties dalībniekus";"<p>   Starptautiskais plašsaziņas līdzekļu festivāls profilakses jomā (IMFP) notiks 2014. gada 25., 26. un 27. augustā XX Pasaules darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības kongresa ietvaros Frankfurtē pie Mainas, Vācijā.</p> <p>   Festivāls piedāvā pārskatu par filmām un multivides produktiem no visas pasaules, kā arī sniedz dalībniekiem iespēju par saviem projektiem informēt ietekmīgus darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības speciālistus, kuri darbojas starptautiskā mērogā.</p> <p>   Darbu iesniegšanas termiņš ir 2014. gada 31. janvāris. Apbalvošana notiks 2014. gada Pasaules kongresā Frankfurtē.</p> <p>   Lai uzzinātu vairāk, apmeklējiet tīmekļa vietni <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>XX Pasaules darba drošības un veselības aizsardzības kongress, 2014. gads</a>.</p>";"";"/lv/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants/Frankfurt 2014.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"lt";"/en/teaser/international-media-festival-for-prevention-2014-calls-for-participants";"published";"2013-08-29 12:30:34";"2014-07-25 15:57:21";"2013-09-12 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Kviečiame dalyvauti 2014 m. Tarptautiniame žiniasklaidos festivalyje prevencijai skatinti";"<p>   Tarptautinis žiniasklaidos festivalis prevencijai skatinti vyks 2014 m. rugpjūčio 25–27 d. rengiant Vokietijoje, Frankfurte prie Maino, vykstantį XX pasaulinį darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos kongresą.</p> <p>   Festivalyje bus pateikiama bendra viso pasaulio filmų ir daugialypės terpės darbų apžvalga, taip pat dalyviams bus suteikta galimybė pristatyti savo projektus didelei tarptautinei įtakingų saugos ir sveikatos specialistų grupei.</p> <p>   Galutinis paraiškų pateikimo terminas – 2014 m. sausio 31 d. Apdovanojimai bus teikiami per 2014 m. Frankfurte vyksiantį pasaulinį kongresą.</p> <p>   Daugiau informacijos ieškokite: <a href=<@#&>http://www.safety2014germany.com/en/imfp/imfp.html<@#&>>2014 m.
