"/lv/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"lv";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Veidojot darba aizsardzības ainu Eiropas Savienībā: darba drošība un veselības aizsardzība skaitļos";"<p>   EU-OSHA organizē apsekojumus un sabiedriskās domas aptaujas visā Eiropā, lai vāktu informāciju par darba aizsardzības statistiku. Mēs apskatām šādas jomas: nelaimes gadījumi darba vietās, demogrāfiskās tendences un darba izraisītas slimības, riska pārvaldība darba vietā, cilvēku priekšstati par Eiropas darba vidi.</p> <p>   Mūsu Eiropas uzņēmumu apsekojumā par  jaunajiem un nākotnes riska veidiem atspoguļots vadītāju un darbinieku pārstāvju viedoklis par veselības un drošības riska veidu pārvaldību viņu darba vietās.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Apmeklējiet mūsu tīmekļa sadaļu <@#&>Darba drošība un veselības aizsardzība skaitļos<@#&></a></p>";"";"/lv/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"lt";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos statistika Europos Sąjungoje";"<p>   EU-OSHA rengia tyrimus ir apklausas Europoje darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos statistiniams duomenims surinkti. Šiuose tyrimuose renkama įvairi informacija, pavyzdžiui, apie nelaimingus atsitikimus darbe, demografines tendencijas, profesines ligas, rizikos valdymą darbo vietose ir žmonių nuomonę apie darbo sąlygas Europoje.</p> <p>   Rengdami Europos įmonių apklausą apie naują ir kylančią riziką (ESENER) tiriame, ką vadovai ir darbuotojų atstovai mano apie sveikatos ir saugos rizikos veiksnių valdymą savo darbo vietoje.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Apsilankykite mūsų svetainės darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos statistikos skiltyje</a></p>";"";"/lt/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"ro";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"O imagine ilustrativă a securităţii şi sănătăţii în muncă în UE: SSM în cifre";"<p>   EU-OSHA efectuează anchete şi sondaje de opinie paneuropene pentru a culege informaţii privind statistici referitoare la sănătate şi securitate în muncă. Ne ocupăm de domenii precum accidentele la locul de muncă, tendinţele demografice şi bolile profesionale, gestionarea riscurilor la locul de muncă, percepţiile oamenilor asupra mediului de lucru din Europa.</p> <p>   Sondajul nostru european în rândul întreprinderilor privind riscurile noi şi emergente (ESENER) analizează opiniile managerilor şi reprezentanţilor lucrătorilor cu privire la modul în care sunt gestionate riscurile pentru sănătatea şi securitatea la locul de muncă.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/ro/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Vizitaţi secţiunea noastră web „SSM în cifre”</a></p>";"";"/ro/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"hr";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Razvijanje slike sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu u Europskoj uniji: OSH u brojkama";"<p>   EU-OSHA provodi ankete i ispitivanja javnog mnijenja diljem Europe kako bi prikupila informacije o statistikama sigurnosti i zdravlja na radu. Pokrivamo područja kao što su nezgode na radu, demografski trendovi i profesionalne bolesti, upravljanje rizikom na radnom mjestu, percepcije ljudi o radnom okružju u Europi.</p> <p>   Naše Europsko istraživanje poduzeća o novim rizicima i rizicima u nastanku (ESENER) istražuje stajališta predstavnika voditelja i zaposlenika o tomu kako se upravlja rizicima po zdravlje i sigurnost na njihovom radnom mjestu.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Posjetite našu mrežnu stranicu OSH u brojkama</a></p>";"";"/hr/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"de";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Darstellung von Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in der EU: Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in Zahlen";"<p>   EU-OSHA führt in ganz Europa Erhebungen und Befragungen durch, um statistische Informationen über Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz zu sammeln. Wir decken folgende Bereiche ab: Arbeitsunfälle, demografische Trends und arbeitsbedingte Krankheiten, Risikomanagement am Arbeitsplatz, Wahrnehmung des Arbeitsumfelds in Europa durch die Menschen.</p> <p>   Unsere Europäische Unternehmensumfrage über neue und aufkommende Risiken (ESENER) untersucht die Meinungen von Führungskräften und Arbeitnehmervertretern über den Umgang mit Risiken für Sicherheit und Gesundheit an ihrer Arbeitsstätte.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Besuchen Sie unsere Rubrik <@#&>Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit in Zahlen<@#&></a></p>";"";"/de/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"da";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Vi danner et billede af arbejdsmiljøet i EU: Arbejdsmiljø i tal";"<p>   EU-OSHA  gennemfører undersøgelser og meningsmålinger i Europa for at indsamle oplysninger om arbejdsmiljøstatistikker. Vi dækker f.eks. områder som ulykker på arbejdspladsen, demografiske tendenser og arbejdsrelaterede sygdomme, risikostyring på arbejdspladsen og opfattelser af arbejdsmiljøet i Europa.</p> <p>   Vores europæiske virksomhedsundersøgelse af nye risici og risici i fremvækst (ESENER) ser nærmere på ledernes og arbejdstagerrepræsentanternes syn på, hvordan arbejdsmiljørisiciene håndteres på arbejdspladsen.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Besøg afsnittet om arbejdsmiljø i tal på vores webside</a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"et";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Tööohutus ja töötervishoid Euroopa Liidus: uuringutulemused ja statistika";"<p>   Euroopa Tööohutuse ja Töötervishoiu Agentuur korraldab tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu teabe ja statistika saamiseks kogu Euroopas uuringuid ja arvamusküsitlusi. Muu hulgas käsitleme selliseid küsimusi nagu tööõnnetused, demograafilised suundumused ja kutsehaigused, riskijuhtimine töökohal ning inimeste arvamus Euroopa töökeskkonnast.</p> <p>   Uute ja tekkivate riskide Euroopa ettevõtete uuringu (ESENER) raames uurisime juhtkonna ja töötajate esindajate arvamust selle kohta, kuidas käsitleti nende töökohas töötervishoiu ja tööohutuse riske.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Tööohutus ja töötervishoid arvudes</a></p>";"";"/et/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"es";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Crear una imagen de seguridad y salud laborales en la UE: la SST en cifras";"<p>   La EU-OSHA realiza encuestas y estudios en toda Europa para recopilar información sobre estadísticas de seguridad y salud laborales. Abarcamos todas las áreas como los accidentes en el trabajo, tendencias demográficas y enfermedades laborales, gestión de riesgos en el lugar de trabajo y la percepción qie la ciudadanía tiene del entorno laboral de Europa.</p> <p>   La encuesta europea de las empresas sobre los riesgos nuevos y emergentes (ESENER) analiza las opiniones de los directivos y los representantes de los trabajadores sobre la gestión de los riesgos para la seguridad y la salud en su lugar de trabajo.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/es/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Visite nuestra sección web <@#&>la SST en cifras<@#&></a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"nl";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Een beeld schetsen van veiligheid en gezondheid in de EU: Veiligheid en gezondheid in cijfers";"<p>   EU-OSHA organiseert enquêtes en polls in alle delen van Europa om kwantitatieve informatie te verzamelen over veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk. De enquêtes en polls hebben betrekking op onder meer ongevallen op het werk, demografische trends en beroepsziekten, risicobeheer op het werk, en hoe mensen in Europa hun werkomgeving ervaren.</p> <p>   Met onze Europese bedrijvenenquête over nieuwe en opkomende risico's (ESENER) proberen wij inzicht te krijgen in de meningen van managers en veiligheidsvertegenwoordigers over hoe risico's voor veiligheid en gezondheid op hun werklocatie worden aangepakt.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/nl/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Bezoek onze rubriek Veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk in cijfers</a></p>";"";"/nl/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"pt";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Criar um panorama geral em matéria de segurança e saúde no trabalho na UE:  os números sobre a SST";"<p>   A EU-OSHA realiza inquéritos e consultas em toda a Europa para recolher informações estatísticas em matéria de segurança e saúde no trabalho. As áreas abrangidas incluem os acidentes no trabalho, as tendências demográficas e as doenças relacionadas com o trabalho, a gestão de riscos no local de trabalho ou as opiniões das pessoas sobre o ambiente de trabalho na Europa.</p> <p>   O nosso inquérito europeu às empresas sobre riscos novos e emergentes (ESENER) aborda as opiniões dos gestores e dos representantes dos trabalhadores sobre a forma como os riscos em matéria de segurança e saúde no trabalho são tratados no local de trabalho.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Visite a nossa página Web dedicada aos números da SST</a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"no";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"EU-OSHA bygger opp et klart bilde av helse og sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen i Europa: HMS i tall:";"<p>   EU-OSHA gjennomfører spørreundersøkelser og meningsmålinger i hele Europa for å samle inn HMS-statistikk. Vi dekker områder som ulykker på arbeidsplassen, demografiske trender og arbeidsrelaterte sykdommer, risikostyring på arbeidsplassen og oppfatninger om arbeidsmiljøet i Europa.</p> <p>   Vår europeiske bedriftsundersøkelse om nye og framvoksende risikoer (ESENER) undersøker hva ledere og ansatterepresentanter mener om hvordan helse- og sikkerhetsrisikoene håndteres på deres arbeidsplass.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Besøk seksjonen <@#&>HMS i tall<@#&> på nettstedet vårt.</a></p>";"";"/no/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"sl";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Ustvarite si sliko o varnosti in zdravju pri delu v EU: varnost in zdravje pri delu v številkah";"<p>   Agencija EU-OSHA izvaja raziskave in ankete po vsej Evropi ter tako zbira statistične podatke o varnosti in zdravju pri delu. Z njimi raziskujemo področja, kot so nezgode pri delu, demografska gibanja in poklicne bolezni, obvladovanje tveganj na delovnem mestu in vprašanje, kako ljudje dojemajo delovno okolje v Evropi.</p> <p>   Z evropsko raziskavo podjetij o novih in nastajajočih tveganjih (ESENER) raziskujemo stališča vodilnih delavcev in predstavnikov delavcev glede tega, kako se tveganja za zdravje in varnost obvladujejo na delovnih mestih v njihovih podjetjih.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Obiščite rubriko naše spletne strani o varnosti in zdravju pri delu v številkah</a></p>";"";"/sl/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"sk";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Vytváranie obrazu bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia pr ipráci v EÚ: BOZP v číslach";"<p>   Agentúra EU-OSHA uskutočňuje ankety a prieskumy verejnej mienky v celej Európe s cieľom zhromaždiť štatistické údaje týkajúce sa bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia pri práci. Pokrývame také oblasti ako pracovné úrazy, demografické trendy a choroby z povolania, riadenie rizík na pracovisku, ako aj to, ako ľudia vnímajú pracovné prostredie v Európe.</p> <p>   Európsky prieskum podnikov o nových a vznikajúcich rizikách (ESENER) skúma názory manažérov a zástupcov zamestnancov o riadení zdravotných a bezpečnostných rizík na pracovisku.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Navštívte sekciu našej webovej stránky venovanú BOZP v číslach</a></p>";"";"/sk/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"mt";"/en/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures";"published";"2013-07-23 11:40:05";"2014-07-25 13:05:04";"2013-08-20 02:00:00";"mlizarralde@codesyntax.com";"Nibnu stampa dwar is-saħħa u s-sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol fl-UE: L-OSH f'ċifri";"<p>   L-UE-OSHA twettaq stħarriġ minn madwar l-Ewropa biex tiġbor l-informazzjoni dwar l-istatistika dwar is-saħħa u s-sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol. Aħna nkopru oqsma bħal aċċidenti fuq ix-xogħol, xejriet demografiċi u mard relatat max-xogħol, ġestjoni tar-riskju fuq ix-xogħol u perċezzjonijiet tan-nies dwar l-ambjent tax-xogħol Ewropew.</p> <p>   L-Istħarriġ Ewropew tagħna tal-intraprizi dwar riskji ġodda u emerġenti (ESENER) jesplora l-fehmiet tar-rappreżentanti tal-maniġers u l-ħaddiema dwar kif huma mmexxija r-riskji tas-saħħa u s-sigurtà fuq il-post tax-xogħol tagħhom.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>https://osha.europa.eu/en/safety-health-in-figures<@#&>>Żur is-sezzjoni onlajn tagħna tall-OSH f'ċifri</a></p>";"";"/mt/teaser/building-up-a-picture-of-occupational-safety-and-health-in-the-eu-osh-in-figures/osh in figures.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"hu";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo legújabb filmje a csúszásos és botlásos munkahelyi balesetekre hívja fel a figyelmet";"<p>   Az elcsúszás és a megbotlás nem tréfa. Ez a két balesettípus jelenti a leggyakoribb munkahelyi kockázatot, illetve okoz több tízezer munkahelyi balesetet évente. Napo, az animációs munkavállaló ezt a fontos üzenetet mégis könnyed és felejthetetlen módon illusztrálja.</p>  <p>   A film&nbsp; megkísérli előmozdítani az elcsúszások és megbotlások megelőzésére irányuló helyes gyakorlatot, és mindenféle ipari ágazatra és munkavállalóra nézve irányadó.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/hu/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>A „Napo – Nem tréfa” című film megtekintése</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/hu/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"sk";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"V najnovšom filme s postavičkou Napo sa podporuje informovanosť o pošmyknutiach a zakopnutiach pri práci.";"<p>   Pošmyknutia a zakopnutia nie sú vôbec na smiech. Predstavujú jedno z najbežnejších nebezpečenstiev na pracovisku a každoročne sú príčinou desiatok tisícov úrazov na pracovisku. Animovaný zamestnanec Napo však ilustruje tento kľúčový odkaz ľahkým a nezabudnuteľným spôsobom.</p>  <p>   Cieľom tohto filmu&nbsp;, ktorý sa týka všetkých priemyselných odvetví a všetkých zamestnancov, je podporiť osvedčené postupy na predchádzanie pošmyknutiam a zakopnutiam.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sk/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Pozrite si „Napo vo filme ... To vôbec nie je na smiech“</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sk/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/no/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"no";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Den siste filmen om Napo handler om snubling og fall på arbeidsplassen";"<p>   Snubling og fall er ingenting å le av. Det utgjør den største faren på arbeidsplassen og forårsaker mange tusen ulykker årlig. Napo, animasjonsfiguren vår, illustrerer dette budskapet på en enkel, uforglemmelig måte.</p>  <p>   Filmen&nbsp; har til formål å fremme god praksis for å forebygge snubling og fall, og den er like gyldig for alle arbeidstakere uansett sektor.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/no/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Se “Napo i…Ingenting å le av”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/no/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pl/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"pl";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Ostatni film o Napo zwiększa świadomość o poślizgnięciach i potknięciach w miejscu pracy";"<p>   Poślizgnięcia i potknięcia „To nie są żarty”. Są jednym z najczęściej występujących zagrożeń w miejscu pracy i każdego roku powodują dziesiątki tysięcy wypadków w miejscach pracy. Ale animowany pracownik Napo ilustruje to kluczowe przesłanie w łatwy i zapamiętywalny sposób.</p>  <p>   Film&nbsp; ma na celu promowanie dobrych praktyk, dzięki którym uniknie się poślizgnięć i potknięć w miejscu pracy, przy czym dotyczy wszystkich sektorów przemysłowych oraz wszystkich pracowników.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/pl/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Obejrzyj „Napo w…To nie są żarty”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/pl/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"fi";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napon viimeisimmässä elokuvassa aiheena ovat liukastumiset ja kompastumiset työpaikalla.";"<p>   Liukastumiset ja kompastumiset - <@#&>Ei mikään naurun asia<@#&>. Ne ovat yksi työpaikkojen tavallisimmista vaaroista ja ne aiheuttavat kymmeniä tuhansia tapaturmia vuosittain. Mutta piirretty työntekijämme Napo tuo tämän tärkeän viestin tietoisuuteemme kevyesti ja mieliinpainuvasti.</p>  <p>   Elokuvan&nbsp; tarkoitus on edistää hyviä käytäntöjä liukastumisten ja kompastumisten ehkäisemiseksi ja se sopii kaikille teollisuuden aloille ja kaikenlaisille työntekijöille.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/fi/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Katso “Napo elokuvassa…Ei mikään naurun asia”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/fi/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sl/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"sl";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Najnovejši film o Napu spodbuja ozaveščenost o zdrsih in spotikih pri delu";"<p>   Zdrsi in spotiki „niso razlog za smeh“. Ti so najpogostejše nevarnosti na delovnem mestu in so vsako leto razlog za deset tisoče nezgod na delovnem mestu. Napo, animirani uslužbenec, posreduje to ključno sporočilo na zabaven in nepozaben način.</p>  <p>   Film&nbsp; spodbuja dobro prakso pri preprečevanju zdrsov in spotikov in je namenjen vsem industrijskim sektorjem in vsem delavcem.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/sl/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Poglejte film „Napo v…Ni razloga za smeh”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/sl/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/mt/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"mt";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"L-aktar film riċenti ta' Napo jistimula ż-żieda fl-għarfien dwar aċċidenti ta' żelqiet u waqgħat fuq il-post tax-xogħol";"<p>   Żelqiet u waqgħat mhumiex “Kwistjoni tad-daħk”. Dawn huma wieħed mill-perikli l-aktar komuni fuq il-post tax-xogħol u jikkawżaw għexieren ta' eluf ta' aċċidenti kull sena fuq il-post tax-xogħol. Għaldaqstant Napo, l-impjegat animat, jagħti dan il-messaġġ ewlieni b'eżempju ħafif iżda li ma jintesiex.</p>  <p>   Dan il-film&nbsp; ifittex li jippromwovi prattika tajba biex jiġu evitati żelqiet u waqgħat u japplika għas-setturi industrijali u għall-ħaddiema kollha.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/mt/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Ara “Napo fi…Kwistjoni li mhijiex tad-daħk”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/mt/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"is";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Síðasta mynd Napó örvar vitundina um að hrasa og renna til í vinnunni";"<p>   Hrösun og fótaskortur eru „ekkert aðhlátursefni“. Þetta er ein af algengusta hættan á vinnustöðum og veldur tíu þúsundum slysa á vinnustöðum á ári hverju. En samt kemur Napó, teiknimyndastarfsmaðurinn, þessum skilaboðum á framfæri með léttum og ógleymanlegum hætti.</p>  <p>   Myndin&nbsp; miðar að því að efla góðar starfsvenjur til þess að koma í veg fyrir hrösun og fótaskort og er fyrir alla iðngeira og starfsmenn.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/is/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Horfa á „Napó í ... engu aðhlátursefni“ </a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/is/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"it";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"L'ultimo film di Napo stimola la consapevolezza degli scivolamenti e degli incespicamenti sul lavoro";"<p>   Scivolamenti e incespicamenti <@#&>C'è poco da ridere<@#&>. Si tratta dei più comuni rischi sul luogo di lavoro e che sono all'origine di decine di migliaia di infortuni ogni anno sul lavoro. Eppure, Napo, il dipendente animato, illustra questo messaggio chiave in maniera leggera e indimenticabile.</p>  <p>   Questo filmato&nbsp; si propone di promuovere la buona prassi per prevenire scivolamenti e incespicamenti e si applica a tutti i settori industriali e a tutti i lavoratori.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/it/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Seguite “Napo in…C'è poco da ridere”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/it/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"hr";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napov najnoviji crtani film potiče na oprezno ponašanje kako bi se izbjegle nezgode i ozljede na radu";"<p>   Nezgode i ozljede – „Shvatimo ih ozbiljno”. Među najčešćim su opasnostima na radu i uzrok su na desetke tisuća nesretnih slučajeva na radnom mjestu godišnje. Animirani zaposlenik Napo dočarava ovu ključnu poruku na šaljiv i nezaboravan način.</p> <p>   Ovaj film  promiče ispravan način ponašanja kako bi se spriječile nezgode i ozljede i primjenjiv je na sve sektore industrije i sve zaposlenike.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/en/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Pogledajte „Napo u... Shvatimo ih ozbiljno”</a><br />  </p>";"";"/hr/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"pt";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"O último filme do Napo incentiva a sensibilização face às escorregadelas e tropeções no trabalho";"<p>   A questão das escorregadelas e tropeções <@#&>Não é para rir<@#&>. Eles constituem um dos perigos mais comuns no local de trabalho e causam dezenas de milhares de acidentes no local de trabalho todos os anos. Contudo, Napo, o empregado animado, ilustra esta mensagem-chave de forma informal e inesquecível.</p>  <p>   Este filme&nbsp; visa promover as boas práticas no sentido de prevenir escorregadelas e tropeções no trabalho e aplica-se a todos os setores industrias e a todos os trabalhadores.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/pt/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Assista ao «Napo em…Não é para rir»</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/pt/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"nl";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Het nieuwste filmpje van Napo stimuleert bewustwording van uitglijers op het werk";"<p>   Uitglijders en valpartijen zijn <@#&>geen lachertje<@#&>. Uitglijden en vallen zijn veel voorkomende gevaren op de werkvloer en leiden elk jaar tot tienduizenden arbeidsongevallen. Het tekenfilmfiguurtje Napo weet deze belangrijke boodschap op lichtvoetige en onvergetelijke wijze over te brengen.</p>  <p>   Dit filmpje&nbsp; wil goede praktijken ter voorkoming van uitglijders en valpartijen bevorderen en is van toepassing op alle industriële sectoren en alle werknemers.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/nl/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Bekijk “Napo in…geen lachertje”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/nl/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""

Et pourtant Napo, l'employé animé, illustre ce message clé avec légèreté et de façon inoubliable.</p>  <p>   Ce film&nbsp;, dont l'objectif est de promouvoir les bonnes pratiques destinées à éviter les glissades et trébuchements, s'adresse à tous les secteurs industriels et à tous les travailleurs.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/fr/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?set_language=fr&amp;filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Regarder Napo dans…<@#&>Il ne faut pas plaisanter avec ça<@#&></a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/fr/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""

Son uno de los riesgos más comunes que existen en el lugar de trabajo y la causa de miles de accidentes laborales al año. Napo, el empleado de animación, nos hace llegar este importante mensaje de forma clara e inolvidable.</p>  <p>   Esta película&nbsp; tiene por objeto prevenir caídas y tropiezos a través de la promoción de buenas prácticas, válidas para todos los sectores industriales y todos los trabajadores.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/es/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Vea “Napo en…no es gracioso”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/es/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""

Totuşi, Napo, angajatul animat, ilustrează acest mesaj important într-un mod simplu şi de neuitat.</p>  <p>   Prin acest filmuleţ&nbsp; se doreşte promovarea celor mai bune practici de prevenire a alunecărilor şi împiedicărilor şi se aplică tuturor sectoarelor industriale şi tuturor lucrătorilor.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/ro/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Urmăriţi „Napo în…o chestiune serioasă”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/ro/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work";"en";"";"published";"2013-07-19 12:34:31";"2014-07-25 10:42:19";"2013-08-08 02:00:00";"dimitrovan";"Napo’s latest film stimulates awareness of slips and trips at work";"<p>   Slips and trips are “No laughing matter”. They are one of the most common workplace hazards and cause tens of thousands of accidents in the workplace every year. Yet Napo, the animated employee, illustrates this key message in a light and unforgettable way.</p>  <p>   This film&nbsp; seeks to promote good practice to prevent slips and trips and is applicable to all industrial sectors and all workers.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>http://www.napofilm.net/en/napos-films/multimedia-film-episodes-listing-view?filmid=napo-018-no-laughing-matter<@#&>>Watch “Napo in…No laughing matter”</a><br />   &nbsp;</p>";"";"/en/teaser/napo-latest-film-stimulates-awareness-of-slips-and-trips-at-work/No laughing matter.PNG";"";"accident_prevention";"";"";"";""
"/hu/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"hu";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Biztonság és egészség a szálloda- és vendéglátó-ipari (HORECA) ágazatban";"<p>Közel 8 millió alkalmazottjával a szálloda- és vendéglátóipar (HORECA) Európa egyik legjelentősebb munkahelyteremtő ágazata. Ez rávilágít a megfelelő munkavédelmi irányítás és az ágazatbeli munkahelyi balesetekre és foglalkozási megbetegedésekre vonatkozó kockázatmegelőzés fontosságára.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/hu/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Tudjon meg többet a kockázatmegelőzésről a szálloda- és vendéglátó-ipari (HORECA) ágazatban</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Az EU-OSHA jelentése a munkavállalók védelméről a szállodákban, éttermekben és a vendéglátásban</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors </a></p>";"";"/hu/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lt/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"lt";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Viešbučių, restoranų ir viešojo maitinimo sektoriaus darbuotojų sveikata ir sauga";"<p>Viešbučių, restoranų ir viešojo maitinimo sektorius yra tarp daugiausia darbo vietų siūlančių Europos sektorių: jame dirba beveik 8 milijonai žmonių. Todėl nepaprastai svarbu tinkamai valdyti šio sektoriaus darbuotojų saugą ir sveikatą, taip pat rūpintis nelaimingų atsitikimų ir profesinių ligų rizikos prevencija.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/lt/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Sužinokite, kaip išvengti rizikos viešbučių, restoranų ir viešojo maitinimo sektoriuje</a></p><p><a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&>>EU-OSHA pranešimas apie viešbučių, restoranų ir viešojo maitinimo įstaigų darbuotojų apsaugą</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/lt/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/pt/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"pt";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Segurança e saúde no sector HORECA";"<p>O sector HORECA - hotelaria, restauração e catering - é um dos sectores responsáveis por criar mais postos de trabalho na Europa, empregando cerca de 8 milhões de pessoas. Estes dados reforçam a importância de uma boa gestão da segurança e saúde no trabalho e da prevenção dos riscos no que respeita a acidentes de trabalho e doenças profissionais no sector.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/pt/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Leia mais sobre prevenção dos riscos no sector HORECA</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Relatório da EU-OSHA - Proteção dos trabalhadores do sector da hotelaria, restauração e catering</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors </a></p>";"";"/pt/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/it/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"it";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Sicurezza e salute per il settore HORECA";"<p>Il settore alberghiero, della ristorazione e del catering (HORECA) è uno dei settori che crea il più alto numero di posti di lavoro in Europa e impiega quasi 8 milioni di persone. Questi dati evidenziano l'importanza di misure adeguate nel settore in materia di gestione della sicurezza e della salute e prevenzione dei rischi per infortuni sul lavoro e malattie professionali.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/it/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Informazioni su come prevenire i rischi nel settore HORECA</a></p><p><a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&>>Relazione dell'EU-OSHA sulla protezione dei lavoratori del settore alberghiero, della ristorazione e del catering</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/it/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/lv/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"lv";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Drošība un veselības aizsardzība HORECA nozarē";"<p>Viesnīcu, restorānu un sabiedriskās ēdināšanas (<em>HORECA</em>) nozare Eiropā rada ļoti daudz darbavietu — tajā strādā gandrīz 8 miljoni cilvēku. Šis fakts apliecina, cik svarīga šajā nozarē ir pienācīga drošības un veselības aizsardzības pārvaldība un riska novēršana attiecībā uz nelaimes gadījumiem darbā un arodslimībām.</p><p><a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>/lv/sector/horeca/<@#&>>Informācija, kā novērst riskus <em>HORECA</em> nozarē</a></p><p><a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&>><em>EU-OSHA</em> ziņojums par viesnīcu, restorānu un sabiedriskās ēdināšanas nozares darbinieku aizsardzību</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/lv/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""

"/pl/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"pl";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Bezpieczeństwo i higiena pracy w sektorze hotelarskim, restauracyjnym i gastronomicznym (HORECA)";"<p>Sektor hotelarski, restauracyjny i gastronomiczny (HORECA) jest w Europie jednym z sektorów, w których powstaje najwięcej miejsc pracy. Zatrudnionych jest w nim prawie 8 milionów osób. Podkreśla to znaczenie odpowiedniego zarządzania bezpieczeństwem i higieną pracy oraz zapobiegania zagrożeniom pod względem wypadków przy pracy i chorób zawodowych w tym sektorze.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/pl/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Dowiedz się, jak zapobiegać zagrożeniom w sektorze hotelarskim, restauracyjnym i gastronomicznym</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Sprawozdanie EU-OSHA w sprawie ochrony pracowników w hotelach, restauracjach i gastronomii</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/pl/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/hr/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"hr";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"moral_osha_europa_eu";"Sigurnost i zdravlje za HORECA-u";"<p>   Gospodarska grana hotela, restorana i cateringa (HORECA) u kojoj je zaposleno oko 8 milijuna zaposlenika, zaslužna je za stvaranje velikog broja poslova u Europi. Ovim se ističe važnost primjerenog upravljanja sigurnošću i zdravljem te sprečavanja ozljeda na radu i bolesti u dotičnom sektoru.</p> <p> <a href=<@#&>/sector/horeca/<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Naučite kako spriječiti rizike u HORECA-i</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>EU-OSHA-ino izvješće o zaštiti radnika u hotelima, restoranima i cateringu</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Inovativna rješenja koja se tiču sigurnosnih i zdravstvenih rizika u sektoru graditeljstva, zdravstva i HORECA-e </a><br />  </p>";"";"/hr/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/nl/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"nl";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Veiligheid en gezondheid in de horeca";"<p>De Europese horeca (hotels, restaurants en catering) is een van de sectoren waar de meeste banen worden geschapen. Bijna 8 miljoen mensen zijn werkzaam in deze sector. Een goed veiligheids- en gezondheidbeheer en risicopreventie ten aanzien van beroepsongevallen en ziekten in de sector zijn dan ook van groot belang.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/nl/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Lees meer over risicopreventie in de horeca</a></p><p><a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&>>EU-OSHA-verslag over de bescherming van werknemers in de horeca</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/nl/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/da/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"da";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Sikkerhed og sundhed i hotel- og restaurationsbranchen";"<p>Hotel- og restaurationsbranchen er en af de største jobskabende sektorer i Europa, som beskæftiger knap 8 millioner mennesker. Dette sætter fokus på betydningen af en tilstrækkelig håndtering af sundhed og sikkerhed og risikoforebyggelse i forbindelse med arbejdsulykker og -skader i denne sektor.</p> <p><a href=<@#&>/da/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Få mere at vide om risikoforebyggelse i hotel- og restaurationsbranchen</a></p> <p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>EU-OSHA's rapport om beskyttelse af arbejdstagere i hotel- og restaurationsbranchen</a></p> <p> <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors </a></p>";"";"/da/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/ro/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"ro";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Securitate şi sănătate pentru HORECA";"<p>Industria hotelieră, a restaurantelor şi de catering (HORECA) este unul din principalii creatori de locuri de muncă din Europa, numărând aproape 8 milioane de angajaţi. Acest lucru evidenţiază importanţa gestionării adecvate a securităţii şi sănătăţii şi a prevenirii riscurilor pentru accidente şi boli profesionale în acest sector.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/ro/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Aflaţi cum să preveniţi riscurile în sectorul HORECA</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Raportul EU-OSHA privind protecţia lucrătorilor din sectorul hoteluri, restaurante şi catering</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/ro/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/cs/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"cs";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Bezpečnost a ochrana zdraví v odvětví hotelových, restauračních a stravovacích služeb";"<p>Odvětví hotelových, restauračních a stravovacích služeb patří k odvětvím, která vytváří nejvíce pracovních míst v Evropě. V tomto odvětví je zaměstnáno téměř 8 milionů lidí. Tato skutečnost poukazuje na význam odpovídajícího řízení BOZP a prevence rizik v souvislosti s pracovními úrazy a nemocemi z povolání v tomto odvětví.</p><p><a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>/cs/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&>>Více informací o tom, jak předcházet rizikům v odvětví hotelových, restauračních a stravovacích služeb</a></p><p><a rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&> href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&>>Zpráva agentury EU-OSHA o ochraně pracovníků v hotelových, restauračních a stravovacích službách</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/cs/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/bg/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"bg";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Безопасност и здраве за HORECA";"<p>   Секторът на хотелиерските, ресторантьорските и кетъринговите услуги (HORECA) е един от секторите, които създават най-много работни места в Европа, като осигурява заетост на близо 8 милиона души. Това подчертава значението на адекватното управление на безопасността и здравето и превенцията на риска от трудови злополуки и заболявания в сектора.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/bg/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Научете как да предотвратявате рискове в HORECA</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Доклад на EU-OSHA относно защитата на работници в сектора на хотелиерските, ресторантьорските и кетъринговите услуги</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a></p>";"";"/bg/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fi/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"fi";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Terveyttä ja turvallisuutta HoReCa-alalle";"<p>Hotelli-, ravintola- ja cateringala (HoReCa-ala) on Euroopan tärkeimpiä uusia työpaikkoja luovia aloja, joka työllistää lähes kahdeksan miljoonaa henkilöä. Siksi terveys- ja turvallisuusasioiden riittävä hallinta sekä työtapaturmien ja työperäisten sairauksien ja riskinehkäisy alalla on erittäin tärkeää.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/fi/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Opi torjumaan riskejä HoReCa-alalla</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Euroopan työterveys- ja työturvallisuusviraston raportti hotelli-, ravintola- ja catering-alan työntekijöiden suojelusta</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/fi/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/fr/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"fr";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Sécurité et santé dans le secteur HORECA";"<p>Le secteur de l'hôtellerie, de la restauration et des cafés (HORECA) est l'un des plus grands créateurs d'emplois en Europe; près de 8 millions de personnes y travaillent. Ce chiffre souligne l'importance d'une bonne gestion de la sécurité et de la santé, ainsi que de mesures adéquates pour la prévention des risques d'accidents et maladies professionnels dans le secteur.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/fr/sector/horeca/<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Comment prévenir les risques dans le secteur HORECA</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Rapport de l'EU-OSHA sur la protection des travailleurs dans le secteur de l'hôtellerie, de la restauration et des cafés</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/fr/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/de/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"de";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz im Gastgewerbe (HORECA)";"<p>Das Gastgewerbe (Hotels, Restaurants und Catering, auch HORECA-Sektor), in dem fast 8 Millionen Menschen beschäftigt sind, ist einer der Sektoren mit dem höchsten Beschäftigungswachstum in Europa. Vor diesem Hintergrund gewinnen Management von Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz und Risikoprävention eine ganz neue Bedeutung für die Vermeidung von Arbeitsunfällen und Berufskrankheiten in diesem Sektor.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/de/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Hier erfahren Sie, wie Sie Risiken im Gastgewerbe vorbeugen können</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Bericht der Agentur über Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz von Arbeitnehmern im Gastgewerbe</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/de/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/es/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"es";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"La salud y la seguridad para el sector de la hostelería, la restauración y el catering";"<p>   El sector de la hostelería, la restauración y el catering (HORECA) es una de las principales fuentes de empleo en Europa, con prácticamente ocho millones de trabajadores. Esto refuerza la importancia de contar con una prevención de riesgos ante los accidentes y las enfermedades profesionales y con una gestión de la salud y la seguridad en el sector que resulten adecuadas.</p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/es/sector/horeca/index_html<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Conozca cómo prevenir los riesgos en el sector HORECA</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Informe de la EU-OSHA sobre la protección de los trabajadores del sector de la hostelería, la restauración y el catering</a></p>  <p>   <a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a></p>";"";"/es/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/is/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"is";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Öryggi og heilbrigði fyrir HORECA";"<p>Hótel- og veitingaiðnaðurinn (HORECA) er einn af stærstu atvinnuskapandi geirum Evrópu með yfir 8 milljón manns í vinnu.  Þetta sýnir mikilvægi þess að staðið sé að vinnuverndarstjórnun og hættuforvörnum gegn vinnuslysum og -sjúkdómum í geiranum með fullnægjandi hætti.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/sector/horeca/<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Fræðast um hvernig koma megi í veg fyrir hættur í HORECA</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Skýrsla EU-OSHA um vernd starfsmanna í hótel- og veitingageiranum</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/is/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/sk/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"sk";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Bezpečnosť a ochrana zdravia v odvetví HORECA";"<p>Odvetvie hotelov, reštaurácií a stravovacích služieb (HORECA) je jedným z odvetví, ktoré vytvárajú najväčší počet pracovných miest v Európe, a zamestnáva približne 8 miliónov ľudí. Táto skutočnosť poukazuje na význam primeraného riadenia bezpečnosti a ochrany zdravia a prevencie rizík v súvislosti s pracovnými úrazmi a chorobami z povolania v tomto odvetví.</p><p><a href=<@#&>/sector/horeca/<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Viac informácií o tom, ako predchádzať rizikám v sektore HORECA</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/TE7007132ENC_horeca/view?searchterm=None<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Správa agentúry EU-OSHA o ochrane zamestnancov v hotelových, reštauračných a stravovacích službách</a></p><p><a href=<@#&>/en/publications/reports/innovative-solutions-OSHrisks<@#&> rel=<@#&>nofollow<@#&>>Innovative solutions to safety and health risks in the construction, healthcare and HORECA sectors</a> </p>";"";"/sk/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca/horeca.jpg";"";"";"";"";"";""
"/et/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"et";"/en/teaser/safety-and-health-for-horeca";"published";"2012-06-08 23:29:06";"2014-07-25 10:48:15";"2013-07-25 02:00:00";"tijero";"Tööohutus ja töötervishoid hotelli-, restorani- ja toitlustussektoris";"<p>Hotelli-, restorani- ja toitlustussektor on üks Euroopa peamisi töökohtade loojaid, kus on tööl ligikaudu 8 miljonit inimest.
